# notes:                
40001001	Incwadi yomlibo wokubelethwa kwakaJesu Krestu iNdodana kaDavida osizukulwana saka-Abrahamu .
40001002	U-Abrahamu wabeletha u-Isaka , u-Isaka wabeletha uJakopo , uJakopo wabeletha uJuda nabafowabo .
40001003	UJuda wabeletha uPerezi noZara kuTamara , uPerezi wabeletha uHesromu , uHesromu wabeletha u-Aramu ,
40001004	u-Aramu wabeletha u-Aminadaba , u-Aminadaba wabeletha uNarhitjhoni , uNarhitjhoni wabeletha uSalmoni ,
40001005	uSalmoni wabeletha uBhowazi kuRarhabi , uBhowazi wabeletha u-Obede kuRute , u-Obede wabeletha uJese ,
40001006	uJese wabeletha ikosi uDavida . UDavida wabeletha uSolomoni kumka-Uriya ,
40001007	uSolomoni wabeletha uRerhobhowamu , uRerhobhowamu wabeletha u-Abiya , u-Abiya wabeletha u-Asafa ,
40001008	u-Asafa wabeletha uJerhotjhafati , uJerhotjhafati wabeletha uJoramu , uJoramu wabeletha u-Uziya ,
40001009	u-Uziya wabeletha uJotamu , uJotamu wabeletha u-Arhazi , u-Arhazi wabeletha uHezekiya ,
40001010	uHezekiya wabeletha uManase ; uManase wabeletha u-Amosi , u-Amosi wabeletha uJosiya ;
40001011	uJosiya wabeletha uKoniya nabafowabo lokha u-Israyeli nagade athunjelwe eBhabheli .
40001012	Ngemva kokuthunjelwa eBhabheli , uKoniya wabeletha uTjhaltiyeli ; uTjhaltiyeli wabeletha uZerubhabheli .
40001013	UZerubhabheli wabeletha u-Abiyudi ; u-Abiyudi wabeletha u-Eliyakhimu ; u-Eliyakhimu wabeletha u-Azori ;
40001014	u-Azori wabeletha uTsadoki ; uTsadoki wabeletha u-Arhimu ; u-Arhimu wabeletha u-Eliyudi ;
40001015	u-Eliyudi wabeletha u-Elazara ; u-Elazara wabeletha uMathani ; uMathani wabeletha uJakopo ,
40001016	uJakopo wabeletha uJosefa , indoda kaMariya unina kaJesu okuthiwa nguKrestu .
40001017	Yeke bekuneenzukulwana ezilitjhumi nane kusukela ku-Abrahamu ukuya kuDavida , nezilitjhumi nane kusukela kuDavida kufikela ekuthunjweni eBhabheli , nezilitjhumi nane kusukela ekuthunjweni eBhabheli ukuya ekubelethweni kwakaKrestu .
40001018	Ukubelethwa kwakaJesu Krestu kwaba nje : Unina uMariya bekabonwe nguJosefa , kodwana ngaphambi kobana bahlangane , wazifumana asidisi ngoMoya oCwengileko .
40001019	Ngebanga lokobana uJosefa isokana lakhe bekumumuntu olungileko , nokobana bekangafuni ukumdalula ebantwini , wahlosa ukumtlhala ngesidu .
40001020	Kwathi asakhumbula lokho , ingilozi kaSomnini yazibonakalisa kuye ebhudangweni yathi : “ Josefa , sizukulwana sakaDavida , ungesabi ukuthatha uMariya abe mkakho ngombana lokho akubambileko kubuya kuMoya oCwengileko .
40001021	UMariya uzakubeletha indodana , uyithiye ibizo bona nguJesu ngombana izakusindisa abantu bayo ezonweni zabo . ”
40001022	Koke lokhu kwenzeka kobana kuzaliseke lokho uSomnini akukhuluma ngomphorofidi wathi :
40001023	“ Qala , itlawu lizakuba sidisi , libelethe indodana ; izakubizwa bona ngu-Imanuweli . ”
40001024	Kwathi uJosefa navukako , wenza njengombana ingilozi kaSomnini imyalile , wathatha uMariya bona abe mkakhe .
40001025	Kodwana azange akhe alale naye ngaphambi kobana abelethe indodana . Wathiya indodana leyo bona nguJesu .
40002001	Ngemva kobana uJesu abelethwe eBhethelehema eseJudiya emihleni yokubusa kwekosi uHerode , kweza izazi eJerusalema zivela epumalanga .
40002002	Zabuza zathi : “ Uphi obelethwe bona abe yikosi yamaJuda na ? Sibone ikwekwezakhe lokha nayiphuma ngepumalanga , nje-ke size bona sizomkhothamela . ”
40002003	Kwathi bona ikosi uHerode izwe lokho , yawurubajeka , neJerusalema loke lawurubajeka nayo .
40002004	Sele ibizele ndawonye boke abaphathi babaphristi kanye nabafundisi bomthetho , yababuza bonyana uKrestu ubelethelwephi .
40002005	Bayiphendula bathi : “ NgeBhethelehema eseJudiya ngombana lokhu ngilokho umphorofidi atlole ngakho nasithi ,
40002006	“ ‘ Wena Bhethelehema esenarheni yakwaJuda , awusingomncancani hlangana nababusi bakwaJuda ngombana kuwe kuzokuvela umbusi ozokuba ngumelusi wabantu bami u-Israyeli . ’ ”
40002007	Yeke uHerode wabizela izazi zepumalanga ngasese wazibuza isikhathi ikwekwezi evele ngaso .
40002008	Wazithumela eBhethelehema wathi : “ Khambani niyokufunisisa kuhle ngomntwana ; nithi ningamfumana , ningazise , khona nami ngizakuya ngiyomkhothamela . ”
40002009	Ngemva kobana sele zizwe ikosi , zangena indlela . Qala , ikwekwezi ebeziyibone ngepumalanga yakhamba phambi kwazo beyayokujama ngehla kwendawo lapha bekunomntwana khona .
40002010	Kwathi lokha nazibona ikwekwezi , zajabula khulu .
40002011	Zathi nazingena ngekumbeni , zabona umntwana anonina uMariya , yeke zakhothama zamlotjha . Zavula amagugwazo zamkhunga ngezipho : igolide , itjhwalo nemire .
40002012	Sele ziyelelisiwe ebhudangweni kobana zingabuyeli emuva kuHerode , zaya enarheni yekhabo zikhamba ngenye indlela .
40002013	Kwathi bona izazi zikhambe , ingilozi kaSomnini yazibonakalisa kuJosefa ngebhudango yathi : “ Vuka uthathe umntwana nonina nibalekele eGibhide . Hlalani lapho benginitjele ngombana uHerode uzokufunana nomntwana kobana ambulale . ”
40002014	Yeke wavuka , wathatha umntwana nonina , wakhamba ebusuku waya eGibhide ,
40002015	lapha ahlala khona uHerode wabe wafa . Kwazaliseka bunjalo-ke okwatjhiwo nguSomnini ngomphorofidi wathi : “ Ngabiza indodanami kobana iphume eGibhide . ”
40002016	Kwathi bona uHerode alemuke bonyana izazi zepumalanga zimkhohlisile , wasilingeka . Wakhupha umyalo bona kubulawe boke abantwana ababesana eBhethelehema neendaweni ezihlanu kwayo , kusukela eminyakeni emibili nengaphasi . Lokhu kwenzeka malungana nalokho akuzwa ngezazi .
40002017	Ngaleyondlela kwazaliseka lokho okwatjhiwo ngomphorofidi uJoromiya nasithi :
40002018	“ Ilizwi lizwakele eRama , ukulila okukhulu nokutlhuwa ; uRarheli ulilela abantwabakhe , akafuni nokutjhiriywa ngombana bangasekho . ”
40002019	Ngemva kokuhlongakala kwakaHerode , ingilozi kaSomnini yazibonakalisa kuJosefa ngebhudango eGibhide ,
40002020	yathi : “ Vuka , uthathe umntwana nonina , ubuyele enarheni yakwa-Israyeli ngombana labo egade balinga ukubulala umntwana baphangalele . ”
40002021	Yeke wavuka , wathatha umntwana nonina , babuyela enarheni yakwa-Israyeli .
40002022	Kodwana kwathi bona uJosefa ezwe bonyana u-Aritjhilawosi uthethe isihlalo sakayise uHerode eJudiya , wesaba ukuya lapho . Sele ayeleliswe ebhudangweni , waya esifundeni seGalile ,
40002023	wayokuhlala edorobheni okuthiwa yiNazaretha . Yeke-ke okwatjhiwo baphorofidi kwazaliseka nabasithi : “ Uzakubizwa bona umNazaretha . ”
40003001	Emihleni leyo kwavela uJwanisi uMbhabhadisi atjhumayela erhalawumbeni leJudiya
40003002	asithi : “ Phendukani ngombana umbuso wezulu ubandamele ! ”
40003003	UJwanisi lo , nguye umphorofidi u-Isaya akhuluma ngaye nasithi : “ Ilizwi lorhuwelela erhalawumbeni lithi : Lungisani indlela yeKosi , yenzeleni imizila enqophileko ! ”
40003004	Izambatho zakaJwanisi bezenziwe ngoboya bekamela ; bekazibophe ngebhande lesikhumba edinini , ukugoma kwakhe kuziintethe neliju lemmangweni .
40003005	Abantu beza kuye bavela eJerusalema , kilo loke iJudiya nakiso soke isifunda seJordani ;
40003006	babika izono zabo , wababhabhadisa ngeJordani .
40003007	Kwathi nabona abaFarisi nabaSadusi abanengi basiza kuye bona bazokubhajadiswa , wathi kibo : “ Nina nzalo yeenyoka , ngubani onilemukise bona nibalekele ilaka elizako na ?
40003008	Vezani iinthelo ezikhomba ukuphenduka .
40003009	Ningadlumbani bona ningazitjela nithi , ‘ Sino-Abrahamu njengobabethu ’ . Ngambala ngiyanitjela bona uZimu angavusela u-Abrahamu abantwana ngamatje la !
40003010	Izembe sele lisemrajini wemithi , omunye nomunye umuthi ongatheli iinthelo ezihle uzakuquntulwa , uphoswe ngemlilweni .
40003011	Nginibhabhadisa ngamanzi malungana nokuphenduka , kodwana emva kwami kuzokuza onamandla khulu kunami , engingasililitho bonyana ngingathinta amapatlagwanakhe . Yena-ke uzonibhabhadisa ngoMoya oCwengileko nangomlilo .
40003012	Unesibhulo sakhe abhulisisa ngaso eselelweni . Uzakubuthelela ikoroyi yakhe ngesilulwini sakhe , kodwana uzakutjhisa iinhluba ngemlilweni ongacimiko ! ”
40003013	UJesu wavela eGalile weza eJordani kobana azokubhajadiswa nguJwanisi .
40003014	Kodwana uJwanisi walinga ukumkhandela , wathi : “ Kufanele bonyana ngibhajadiswe nguwe , kodwana wena uza kimi na ? ”
40003015	Nje-ke uJesu wamphendula wathi : “ Vuma okwagadesi , kusilungele bonyana sikwenze lokhu ukuze kuzaliseke koke ukulunga . ” Yeke uJwanisi wavuma .
40003016	Kwathi msinyana bona uJesu abhajadiswe , waphuma ngemanzini . Khonokho izulu lavuleka , wabona uMoya kaZimu wehla njengezuba , wahlala phezu kwakhe .
40003017	Yeke ilizwi lavela ezulwini lisithi : “ Le yiNdodanami engiyithandako nengithokozileko ngayo . ”
40004001	Yeke uMoya wadosela uJesu erhalawumbeni bona ayokulingwa nguSathana .
40004002	Ngemva kobana azile ukudla amalanga amatjhumi amane nobusuku bakhona , walamba .
40004003	Yeke umlingi weza kuye wathi : “ Nangabe uyiNdodana kaZimu , tjela amatje la bona aphenduke isikwa . ”
40004004	Kodwana uJesu waphendula wathi : “ Kutloliwe kwathiwa , “ ‘ Umuntu akaphili ngesikwa kwaphela kodwana ngelinye nelinye ilizwi eliphuma emlonyeni kaZimu . ’ ”
40004005	Yeke uSathana wathatha uJesu wamusa edorobheni elicwengileko , wamjamisa esiqongolweni sethempeli ;
40004006	wathi kuye : “ Nangabe uyiNdodana kaZimu , ziphosele phasi ngombana kutloliwe kwathiwa , “ ‘ UZimu uzakuyala iingilozi zakhe ngawe ; zizakukhakhuna ngezandla zazo , ukuze iinyawo zakho zingabetheki ematjeni . ’ ”
40004007	UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Godu kutloliwe kwathiwa , ‘ Ungamlingi uSomnini uZimakho . ’ ”
40004008	Godu uSathana wathatha uJesu wamusa esiqongolweni sentaba , wamkhombisa yoke imibuso yephasi nobuphaziphazi bayo ,
40004009	wathi kuye : “ Koke lokhu ngizakunikela khona , nange ungaguqa ungilotjhe . ”
40004010	Yeke uJesu waphendula wathi : “ Suka , Sathana ngombana kutloliwe kwathiwa , “ ‘ Lotjha uSomnini uZimakho ukhothamele yena kwaphela . ’ ”
40004011	Nje-ke uSathana wamsukela ; iingilozi zeza zamsiza .
40004012	Kwathi bonyana uJesu ezwe bona uJwanisi ufakwe ngesikhungweni , wabuyela eGalile .
40004013	Wasuka eNazaretha , wayokuhlala eKapernawumi , emzini ohlanu kwelwandle leGalile , enarheni yakwaZabuloni neyakwaNafitali .
40004014	Lokhu kwenzeka khona kuzakuzaliseka okwakhulunywa mphorofidi u-Isaya nasithi :
40004015	“ Narha yakwaZabuloni , nawe narha yakwaNaftali , endleleni eya elwandle , ngaphetjheya kweJordani , Galile labatjhili !
40004016	Abantu abahlezi ebumnyameni babone umkhanyo omkhulu , nakilabo abahlezi enarheni yethunzi lokufa ukukhanya kufikile . ”
40004017	Ukusuka ngesikhatheso , uJesu wathoma ukutjhumayela wathi : “ Phendukani ngombana umbuso wezulu ubandamele ! ”
40004018	Kwathi uJesu asakhamba eqadi kwelwandle leGalile , wabona izelamani ezimbili , uSimoni ebekuthiwa nguPitrosi nomfowabo u-Andrisi . Begade baphosela inede ngelwandle ngombana gade bababambi beenhlambi .
40004019	Yeke uJesu wathi kibo : “ Yizani , ngilandelani ! Ngizanenza ababambi babantu . ”
40004020	Khonokho basukela amanedabo bamlandela .
40004021	Wakhamba godu wabona izelamani ezinye ezimbili , uJakopo umsa kaZebediya nomfowabo uJwanisi . Bebangemkhunjini noyise uZebediya , balungisa amanedabo . UJesu wababiza ,
40004022	khonokho basukela umkhumbi noyise , bamlandela .
40004023	UJesu wadabula iGalile , afundisa ngemasinagogini , atjhumayela ivangeli lombuso , apholisa ebebaphethwe malwelwe ahlukeneko kanye nezifo .
40004024	Iindaba ngaye zanda kiyo yoke iSiriya , abantu baletha kuye boke ebebagula ; baphethwe malwelwe amanengi ahlukeneko nobuhlungu : abantu abanamadimoni , isithunthwana nabakhubazekileko . Boke uJesu wabapholisa .
40004025	Iinqubuthu ezikulu zamlandela zisuka eGalile eDekapolisi , eJerusalema , eJudiya nenarheni engaphetjheya kweJordani .
40005001	Kwathi lokha uJesu nabona iinqubuthu , wenyukela entabeni . Sele ahlezi phasi , abafundi bakhe beza kuye .
40005002	Yeke wathoma ukubafundisa wathi :
40005003	“ Babusisiwe abaswelako emmoyeni ngombana umbuso wezulu ungewabo .
40005004	Babusisiwe abalilako ngombana bazakududuzwa .
40005005	Babusisiwe abamnene ngombana bazakugoma ilifa lephasi .
40005006	Babusisiwe abalambele bomele ukulunga ngombana bazakusuthiswa .
40005007	Babusisiwe abanesirhawu ngombana bazakurhawukelwa .
40005008	Babusisiwe abahlanzekileko eenhliziyweni ngombana bazombona uZimu .
40005009	Babusisiwe abalamulako ngombana kuzakuthiwa bantwana bakaZimu .
40005010	Babusisiwe abazunywa ngebanga lokulunga ngombana umbuso wezulu ungewabo .
40005011	“ Nibusisiwe lokha nabanithukako , banizuma bebakhulume koke okumbi ngani ngebanga lami .
40005012	Thabani nithokoze ngombana umvuzo wenu mkhulu ezulwini . Nabaphorofidi ababakhona ngaphambi kwenu babazuma ngayo indlela le . ”
40005013	“ Nina nilitswayi lephasi , kodwana itswayi nasele liqwatjhile , ubutswayi balo bungabuyiselwa njani na ? Alisenamsebenzi , kwaphela selilungele ukulahlelwa ngaphandle , abantu baligadange .
40005014	“ Nina nimkhanyo wephasi . Umuzi owakhiwe entabeni angekhe wafihleka .
40005015	Akakho othi angakhanyisa isibani asibeke ngaphasi kwesitja , kodwana usibeka phezu kwesitja lapha sizakukhanyisela khona woke ongekumbeni .
40005016	Ngokunjalo akukhanye ukukhanya kwenu phambi kwabantu ukuze babone imisebenzenu emihle , badumise uYihlo osezulwini . ”
40005017	“ Ningadlumbani bonyana ngizele ukuzokuchitha umthetho namkha abaphorofidi . Angikazeli ukuzokuchitha , kodwana ngizele ukuzokugcwalisa .
40005018	Ngambala ngiyanitjela bona kungakadluli izulu nephasi , akunaledere nalinye , ngitjho nesiqetjhana segama esizokudlula emthethweni bekupheliswe koke .
40005019	Yeke , nanyana ngubani owephula ngitjho nomncani wemiyalo le bese afundise nabanye ukwenza njalo , uzakubizwa bona mncani embusweni wezulu . Kodwana nanyana ngubani oyenzako abe ayifundise , uzakubizwa bona mkhulu embusweni wezulu
40005020	ngombana ngiyanitjela bonyana nakube ukulunga kwenu akudluli kwabafundisi bomthetho nabaFarisi , anisoze nangena embusweni wezulu . ”
40005021	“ Nizwile bona abantu ekadeni batjelwa kwathiwa , ‘ Ungabulali ; ngiloyo naloyo obulalako uzokugwetjwa . ’
40005022	Kodwana kwanjesi ngithi kini ngiloyo naloyo othukuthelela umfowabo uzokugwetjwa . Godu nanyana ngubani othi kumfowabo , ‘ Nto ndina ! ’ , uzokudoselwa ebandla . Godu nothi kumfowabo , ‘ Sidlhadlha ndina ! ’ , uzokuba sengozini yokuphoselwa emlilweni wesirhogo .
40005023	Yeke lokha nawuletha umnikelwakho e-aldarini , khonapho bese uyakhumbula bona umfowenu unamavundo nawe ,
40005024	tjhiya umnikelwakho lapho phambi kwe-aldari , ukhambe khonokho uyokubuyisana naye bese uyabuya-ke uzokunikela umnikelwakho .
40005025	“ Rhaba ulungise indaba naloyo okulwisako nisesendleleni yokuya ebandla , nakungasinjalo uzakunikela ezandleni zomgwebi , yena akunikele ezandleni zabalindi , uphoselwe ngesikhungweni .
40005026	Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe uzakubhadla ngapho kufikela bewukhokhe ngitjho nopenyanakho wokugcina . ”
40005027	“ Nizwile bona abantu ekadeni batjelwa kwathiwa , ‘ Ungahlobongi . ’
40005028	Kodwana ngiyanitjela bona nanyana ngubani oqala umfazi amkhanuke sele ahlobonge naye ngehliziywenakhe .
40005029	Nakube ilihlo lakho langesigomeni likwenza wone , ligobhodlhe ulilahle ! Kungcono khulu ukulahlekelwa ngesinye sezitho zakho zomzimba kunobanyana umzimbakho woke uphoselwe ngesirhogweni .
40005030	Nangabe isandla sakho sangesigomeni sikwenza bona wone , siqunte usilahle ! Kungcono khulu ukulahlekelwa sisandla sakho kunobanyana umzimbakho woke uphoselwe ngesirhogweni . ”
40005031	“ Godu kwathiwa , ‘ Nanyana ngubani otlhalana nomkakhe kufanele amnikele incwadi yesahlukaniso . ’
40005032	Kodwana ngithi kini nanyana ngubani otlhala umkakhe ngaphandle kweenzathu zokuhlobonga , umbangela bona ahlobonge begodu nanyana ngubani othatha umfazi otlhaliweko uyahlobonga . ”
40005033	“ Nizwile bona abantu ekadeni batjelwa kwathiwa , ‘ Ungafungi ngamanga , kodwana yenza iimfungo owazenza kuSomnini . ’
40005034	Kodwana ngiyanitjela bona ningafungi nakanye , kungabi ngezulu ngombana lisihlalo sobukhosi sakaZimu ,
40005035	namkha ngephasi ngombana lisinabelo seenyawo zakhe , namkha ngeJerusalema ngombana lilidorobho leKosi ekulu .
40005036	Ungafungi ngehlokwakho ngombana angekhe watjhugulula ngitjho nasinye isihlutjhwana sibe mhlophe namkha sibe nzima .
40005037	Kwaphela yithi , ‘ Iye , iye ’ namkha , ‘ Awa , awa ’ . Okudlula lokhu kuvela komumbi . ”
40005038	“ Nizwile bona kwathiwa , ‘ Ilihlo ngelihlo , izinyo ngezinyo . ’
40005039	Kodwana kwanjesi ngithi kini : Ningajamelani nesikhohlakali . Umuntu nakuwahla emhlathini wangesigomeni , mnikele nomunye umhlathi .
40005040	Nakube kukhona ofuna ukukudosela ebandla kobana akwemuke isambatho sakho , mnikele nesinye .
40005041	Okukatelela bona ukhambe naye ikhilomitha elilodwa , khamba naye amakhilomitha amabili .
40005042	Yipha woke umuntu okubawa okuthileko , ungabagodleli ababoleka kuwe . ”
40005043	“ Nizwile bona kwathiwa , ‘ Thanda umuntu womphakathi uzonde isitha sakho . ’
40005044	Kodwana manjesi ngithi kini : Thandani izitha zenu , nithandazele labo abanizumako ,
40005045	ukuze nibe bantwana bakaYihlo osezulwini ngombana wenza ilanga lakhe liphumele abambi nabalungileko , anise nezulu kabalungileko nabakhohlakeleko .
40005046	Yeke nanithanda labo abanithandako , ninomvuzo bani na ? Angithi nabathelisi benza njalo ?
40005047	Godu nanibingelela abafowenu kwaphela , nizakuthi nibaphala ngani abanye abantu na ? Angithi nabatjhili bayakwenza lokho na ?
40005048	Yeke yibani ngabapheleleko njengombana noYihlo osezulwini aphelele ! ”
40006001	“ Yelelani bona ningenzi izenzo zenu zokulunga phambi kwabantu kobana banibuke ngombana nanenza njalo , angekhe nawufumana umvuzo wenu ovela kuYihlo osezulwini .
40006002	“ Nje-ke lokha nanipha abadududu , ningamemezeli ngeemporompita njengombana kwenza abazenzisi ngemasinagogini neendledlaneni ukuze bahlonitjhwe babantu . Ngiqinisile ngiyanitjela bona sele bamukele umvuzwabo ngokupheleleko .
40006003	Kodwana lokha nawupha abadududu , ungavumeli kobana isincele sakho sazi lokho okwenziwa sisidla sakho
40006004	ukuze umnikelwakho ube sekusithekeni . Ngaleyondlela uYihlo obona ekusithekeni uzakuvuza . ”
40006005	“ Lokha nawuthandazako , ungabi njengabazenzisi ngombana bathanda ukuthandaza bajamile ngemasinagogini nemajikeni weendledlana ukuze babonwe babantu . Ngiqinisile ngiyanitjela bona sele bawufumene umvuzwabo ngokupheleleko .

40006021	ngombana lapha kunomnothwakho khona nehliziywakho ilapho . ”
40006022	“ Ilihlo lisibani somzimba . Nakube amehlwakho alungile , umzimbakho woke uzakuba nokukhanya .
40006023	Kodwana nakube amehlwakho mambi , umzimbakho woke uzakwembathwa bumnyama . Yeke nangabe umkhanyo ngaphakathi kwakho ubumnyama , maye bungangani ubumnyamobo ! ”
40006024	“ Akakho ongasebenzela abaphathi ababili . Uzakuzonda omunye athande omunye namkha azinikele ngokupheleleko komunye bese unyaza omunye . Anikwazi-ke ukulotjha uZimu khibe ngapha nilotjhana noMamoni . ”
40006025	“ Ngalokho-ke ngiyanitjela , ningakhathazeki ngepilwenu bona nizogomani namkha nizokuselani . Ningakhathazeki nangemizimbenu bona nizokwembathani . Kghani ipilo ayikaqakatheki khulu ukwedlula ukudla na ? Nomzimba awukaqakatheki khulu kunezambatho na ?
40006026	Qalani , iinyoni zomkayi azitjali , azivuni namkha zibeke ngeenlulwini . Kodwana uYihlo osezulwini uyazondla . Alo , nina anikaqakatheki khulu kuneenyoni na ?
40006027	Ngubani-ke phakathi kwenu ongangezelela i-awara linye epilwenakhe ngokukhathazeka na ?
40006028	“ Kubayini nikhathazeke ngezambatho na ? Qalani bona amakhwa wommango amila njani ; akasebenzi namkha aphothe intambo .
40006029	Kodwana ngiyanitjela bonyana ngitjho noSolomoni kibo boke ubuphaziphazi bakhe azange akhe embathe njengamanye wawo .

40006031	“ Yeke ningathomi nikhathazeke bese nithi , ‘ Alo sizogomani nje ? ’ namkha , ‘ Sizokuselani ? ’ namkha , ‘ Sizokwembathani ? ’

40006034	Yeke ningakhathazeki ngelingomuso ngombana ilingomuso lizakukhathalela kwalo . Elinye nelinye ilanga lineenkathazo zalo ezaneleko . ”
40007001	“ Ningagwebi abanye , nakungasinjalo nani nizokugwetjwa
40007002	ngombana indlela enigweba ngayo abanye nani nizokugwetjwa ngayo .
40007003	“ Kubayini ukghona ukubona itserana engelihlweni lakamfowenu , kodwana uhlulwe kubona isigodo esingelihlweni lakho na ?
40007004	Ungatjho njani kumfowenu uthi , ‘ Angikhuphe itserana engelihlweni lakho , ’ khisibe wena unesigodokazi ngelihlweni lakho na ?
40007005	Wena mzenzisi ndina ! Thoma ukhuphe isigodokazi esingelihlweni lakho qangi , nje-ke uzakghona ukubona kuhle ukuze ukhuphe itserana engelihlweni lomfowenu .
40007006	“ Ninganikeli izinja okucwengileko , ningaphoseli amatjenu aligugu ezavukazaneni . Nanenza njalo , zizawagadangela ngeenyawo bese ziyajika zinidabudabula iinquqwana . ”
40007007	“ Bawani nizakuphiwa ; funani nizakufumana ; kokodani nizakuvulelwa
40007008	ngombana loyo naloyo obawako uzakuphiwa , ofunako uzakufumana , nokokodako uzakuvulelwa .
40007009	Ngubani phakathi kwenu ongathi umntwanakhe nabawa isikwa , amuphe ilitje na ?
40007010	Namkha kuthi nabawa ihlambi amuphe inyoka na ?
40007011	Nakube-ke nina , ngitjho nanyana nikhohlakele kangaka nje , nikwazi ukupha abantwabenu izipho ezihle , kangangani-ke uYihlo osezulwini ! Uzabapha izipho ezihle khulu labo abambawako .
40007012	“ Yeke kikho koke , yenza kabanye lokho ongathanda bonyana bakwenze kuwe ngombana lokhu ngokutjhiwo mthetho nabaphorofidi . ”
40007013	“ Ngenani ngesango elincani ngombana isango eliya ekubhujisweni likhulu nendlela yakhona ibanzi begodu banengi abakhamba ngayo .
40007014	Kodwana isango eliya ekuphileni lincani nendlela yakhona imkghotho begodu balibinzana abayifumanako . ”
40007015	“ Yelelani abaphorofidi bamanga . Beza kini bembethe njengezimvu kodwana ngaphakathi khisibe baziimpisi ezirhiribidelako .
40007016	Nizababona ngeenthelo zabo . Abantu bayawakha amadiribe emeveni namkha amakhiwani emthini womunga na ?
40007017	Ngokunjalo omunye nomunye umuthi omuhle uthela iinthelo ezihle , kodwana umuthi omumbi uthela iinthelo ezimbi .

40007021	“ Akusuye woke othi kimi , ‘ Kosi , Kosi ’ ozakungena embusweni wezulwini , kodwana kwaphela loyo owenza intando kaBaba osezulwini .
40007022	Mhlokho abanengi bazakuthi kimi , ‘ Kosi , Kosi , azange siphorofide ebizweni lakho besaqotjha amadimoni ngalo ibizo lakho senza neemangaliso ezinengi na ? ’
40007023	Yeke ngizabatjela emehlweni ngithi kibo , ‘ Azange khenginazi . Sukani kimapha , nina nkhohlakali ndina ! ’ ”
40007024	“ Yeke nanyana ngubani ozwa amezwami la , awenze , unjengomuntu ohlakaniphileko owakha indlwakhe phezu kwedwala .
40007025	Izulu lawuluka , imilambo yaphuphuma , ummoya waphephetha ngamandla phezu kwendlu leyo . Kodwana azange iwe ngombana yakhiwe phezu kwedwala .
40007026	“ Kodwana nanyana ngubani ozwa amezwami la , angawenzi , unjengomuntu osidlhadlha owakha indlwakhe phezu kwetjhwabatjhwaba .
40007027	Izulu lawuluka , imilambo yaphuphuma , ummoya waphephetha ngamandla phezu kwendlu leyo , nje-ke yawa . Kwaba kukhulu ukuwa kwayo ! ”
40007028	Kwathi bona uJesu aqede ukukhuluma izintwezi , isiqubuthu sarareka ngendlela afundisa ngayo

40008001	Kwathi uJesu selehlile entabeni , isiqubuthu esikhulu samlandela .
40008002	Indoda enekhwekhwe yeza kuye , yafese yaguqa phambi kwakhe , yathi kuye : “ Kosi , nawuthandako ungangihlambulula . ”

40009001	UJesu wangena ngemkhunjini , wayamela ngaphetjheya kwelwandle waya edorobheni lekhabo .

40009019	Yeke uJesu wasikima wamlandela nabafundi bakhe bakhamba naye .
40009020	Khonapho umfazi obekaphopha iingazi iminyaka elitjhumi nambili weza ngemva koJesu , wafika wakghwatha umphetho wesambatho sakhe .

40010001	UJesu wabizela abafundi bakhe abalitjhumi nambili kuye , wabanikela amandla wokuqotjha imimoya emimbi nokwelapha woke amalwelwe nezifo .
40010002	Naka amabizo wabapostoli abalitjhumi nambili : Wokuthoma nguSimoni okuthiwa nguPitrosi nomfowabo u-Andrisi ; uJakopo nomfowabo uJwanisi , amadodana kaZebediya ;
40010003	uFlebhe noBharitholomeyusi , uTomasi noMatewu umthelisi ; uJakopo umsa ka-Alfiyosi , uThadiyosi ;

40010006	Ngangcono niye ezimvini ezilahlekileko zakwa-Israyeli .
40010007	Ekukhambeni kwenu , tjhumayelani umlayezo lo , ‘ Umbuso wezulu ubandamele ! ’
40010008	Pholisani abagulako , nivuse abafileko , nihlambulule labo abaphethwe likhwekhwe , niqotjhe amadimoni . Namukeliswe ngesihle , yeke nani yiphani ngesihle .
40010009	Ningaphathi igolide , isiliva namkha ikoporo emabhandenenu .
40010010	Ningaphathi imbada yokukhombela ekhambeni lenu , esinye isambatho , amapatlagwana namkha intonga ngombana isisebenzi kufanele sinikelwe esikuhlongako .
40010011	“ Nanyana kungaba ngiliphi idorobho namkha umuzi eningena kiwo , funani umuntu owazisako , nihlale kwakhe bekube kumhlana nikhambako .
40010012	Akuthi naningena emzini , nilotjhise .
40010013	Nangabe abantu ekhayenelo bayanamukela , ukuthula kwenu akuhlale lapho ; kodwana nabanganamukeliko , ukuthula kwenu akubuyele kini .
40010014	Nakube anamukeleki namezwenu akalalelwa , yenithintithe ithuli eenyaweni zenu , niphume ekhayenelo namkha emzini lowo .
40010015	Ngiqinisile ngiyanitjela bona kuzokuba ngcono enarheni yeSodoma neGomora ngomhla wokuphela kunomuzi lowo . ”

41003026	NoSathana nakube uziphikisa yena ngokwakhe begodu wehlukene phakathi , angeze ajama nesiphetho sakhe sifikile .
41003027	“ Emanyeni akakho umuntu ongangena emzini wetsitsirimba afese athathe ipahlayo ngaphandle kobana athome ngokuyibopha qangi , kukhona angadleleza ikumbayo .
41003028	“ Kwamambala ngiyanitjela bona zoke izono kanye neenhlamba zabantu bazakulitjalelwa zona .
41003029	Kodwana nanyana ngubani ohlambalaza uMoya oCwengileko angekhe alitjalelwa , unomlandu wokona kwamlibe . ”
41003030	UJesu watjho njalo ngombana bebasithi : “ Unommoya omumbi . ”
41003031	Yeke unina nabafowabo kaJesu bafika bajama ngaphandle , bathumela othileko ngaphakathi bona ayombiza .
41003032	Bekabungelelwe siqubuthu , abantu bathi kuye : “ Unyoko nabafowenu babawa ukukubona ngaphandle . ”
41003033	UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Ngubani umma nabafowethu na ? ”
41003034	Waqala labo ebebahlezi bambungelele wathi : “ Nangu umma nabafowethu !
41003035	Nanyana ngubani owenza intando kaZimu ungumfowethu , nodadwethu nomma . ”
41004001	Godu uJesu wathoma ukufundisa elwandle , isiqubuthu ebesimbungelele besisikhulu kangangombana wangena ngemkhunjini wahlala ngakiwo ngaphandle kwelwandle . Boke abantu bebagege neligu eduze kwamanzi .
41004002	Wafundisa izinto ezinengi ngemifanekiso ; ekufundiseni kwakhe wathi :
41004003	“ Lalelani ! Kwaphuma umtjali wayokutjala .
41004004	Kwathi nakarhatjha imbewu , enye yawela endleleni , iinyoni zafika zayigobola .
41004005	Enye yawela eendaweni ezinamatje lapha bekunganaqulwani enengi khona . Yamila masinyana ngombana iqulwani beyiyincani .
41004006	Kodwana kwathi nakuphuma ilanga , iintjalo zatjha bezatjhwaba ngombana bezinganamirabhu .
41004007	Enye imbewu yawela hlangana nameva , akhula aminyanisa iintjalo , ngalokho azange zithele .
41004008	Khonapho enye yawela equlwanini ehle . Yamila , yakhula yabe yathela , yabuyelela ngamatjhumi amathathu , amatjhumi asithandathu ngitjho nangekhulu . ”
41004009	Yeke uJesu wathi : “ Oneendlebe akezwe ! ”
41004010	Kwathi nasele ayedwa , abalitjhumi nambili kanye nabanye ebebanaye bambuza ngemifanekiso le .
41004011	Wathi kibo : “ Nina ninikelwe ifihlo yombuso kaZimu , kodwana kilabo abangaphandle , yoke into kibo itjhiwo ngemifanekiso
41004012	ukuze “ bahlale babona kodwana bangabonisisi , bahlale basizwa kodwana bangezwisisi , nakungasinjalo , bangatjhuguluka , balitjalelwe . ”
41004013	UJesu wababuza wathi : “ Aniwuzwisisi umfanekiso lo na ? Alo-ke nizayizwisisa njani eminye imifanekiso na ?
41004014	Umtjali utjala ilizwi .
41004015	Abanye abantu banjengembewu esendleleni , lokha nakutjalwa ilizwi . Bathi bangalizwa , uSathana afike alithathe ilizwi elitjelwe kibo .
41004016	Abanye banjengembewu etjalwe eendaweni ezinamatje , bezwa ilizwi , balamukele ngethabo .
41004017	Kodwana njengombana banganamirabhu , babambelela isikhatjhana nje kwaphela . Nakufika iintjhijilo nokuzunywa , barhirika msinyana .
41004018	Khonapho abanye banjengembewu etjalwe hlangana nameva . Bezwa ilizwi ,
41004019	kodwana iinhlupheko zobuphilobu nokukhohliswa lithando lobugwili kanye neenkanuko zezinto ezinye , kuyafika kubhibhe ilizwi , kulenze lingatheli .
41004020	Abanye banjengembewu etjalwe ehlabathini ehle . Bayalizwa ilizwi , balamukele , bathele iinthelo ezibuyelelwe ngamatjhumi amathathu , ngamatjhumi asithandathu ngitjho nangekhulu . ”
41004021	UJesu wababuza wathi : “ Nibeka isibani ngaphasi kwesitja namkha ngaphasi kombhede na ? Azakhe nisibeke phezu kwesitja saso na ?
41004022	Ngambala nanyana yini efihlekileko izakuvela emkhanyweni , nalokho okusithekileko kuzakwambulwa .
41004023	Nakukhona oneendlebe , akezwe ! ”
41004024	Waraga wathi kibo : “ Yelelani kuhle lokho enikuzwako ! Isilinganiso enahlulela ngaso abanye , nani nizakwahlulelwa ngaso , ngitjho nangaphezulu .
41004025	Onelitho uzakwengezelwa , loyo onganalitho , uzakwemukwa nalokho anakho . ”
41004026	UJesu godu wathi : “ Umbuso kaZimu unje : Umuntu urhatjha imbewu esimini .
41004027	Ubusuku nemini , nanyana uyalala namkha uyavuka , imbewu yona iyahluma beyikhule , ije angazi bonyana kwenzeka bunjani lokho .
41004028	Iqulwani ngokwayo iveza ikoroyi , kuthoma kube lihlanga , kube litjhakazo bese kuba siqwambi esipheleleko .
41004029	Nasele ikoroyi ivuthiwe , uyigweba ngesegere ngombana sekusikhathi sokuvuna . ”
41004030	UJesu wabuza wathi : “ Umbuso kaZimu ungafaniswa nani na ? Singawuhlathulula ngamuphi umfanekiso na ?
41004031	Ufana nembewu yesinapu encancani kiyo yoke imihlobo yembewu etjalwa equlwanini .
41004032	Kodwana nasele itjelwe , ikhula ibe sitjalo esikhulu kinazo zoke esimini , sibe neempande ezikulu , iinyoni zomkayi zikhosele emthunzinaso . ”
41004033	UJesu wakhuluma ilizwi kibo ngemifanekiso eminengi efana nale ngendlela ebebangazwisisa ngayo .
41004034	Akhange atjho ilitho kibo ngaphandle kokusebenzisa imifanekiso . Kodwana kwathi nasele ayedwa nabafundi bakhe , wabahlathululela koke .
41004035	Mhlokho nakuhlwako wathi ebafundini bakhe : “ Nambani siyameleni ngaphetjheya . ”
41004036	Batjhiya isiqubuthu bakhamba naye solo angemkhunjini . Neminye imikhumbi yakhamba nabo .
41004037	Kwavuka isiwuruwuru esikhulu namaza angena ngemkhunjini , wapheze wazala amanzi .
41004038	UJesu gade angemkhunjinapho alele emfotjhofotjhweni emsamo . Abafundi bamvusa bathi kuye : “ Mfundisi , awutjhiswa bona siyaminza na ? ”
41004039	Wavuka , wakhalimela isiwuruwuru namaza wathi : “ Thula uthi du ! ” Yeke isiwuruwuru sarhobha , sakanye sathula du .
41004040	Alo-ke wathi ebafundini bakhe : “ Nethuswe yini kangaka na ? Nisenakho ukukholwa nje na ? ”
41004041	Bathuka khulu bebabuzana bathi : “ Kanti ngubani umuntu lo na ? Ulalelwa ngitjho nangani mumoya nelwandle ! ”
41005001	UJesu nabafundi bakhe bayamela ngaphetjheya kwelwandle , enarheni yamaGerasene .
41005002	Kwathi lokha uJesu nehla ngemkhunjini , wahlangatjezwa mumuntu onommoya omumbi avela emathuneni .
41005003	Umuntu loyo ubegade ahlala emathunenapho begodu bekungasenamuntu okghona ukumbopha ngitjho nangeenketani .
41005004	Ngeenkhathi zoke ubegade ahlala abotjhwe izandla neenyawo , kodwana begade adabula iinketani abe ephule neensimbi abekabotjhwe ngazo iinyawo . Gade kungekho omhlulako ngamandla .
41005005	Ubusuku nemini gade azulazula hlangana namathuna neentatjana , aphele arhuwelele azisike nangamatje .
41005006	Kwathi nakabona uJesu kudanyana naye , wagijima wafese wawa ngamadolo ngaphambi kwakhe .
41005007	Warhuwelela ngelizwi elikhulu wathi : “ Ngikutjhisa ngani wena Jesu Ndodana kaZimu ongoPhezulu na ? Funga ngoZimu bonyana awuzukungihlunguphaza ! ”

41005010	Waphikelela ngokurabhela uJesu bona angabaqotjhi enarheni le .
41005011	Umhlambi omkhulu wezavukazana gade udla hlanu kwentatjana .
41005012	Amadimoni arabhela uJesu athi : “ Sithumela ezavukazaneni , usivumele singene kizo . ”
41005013	Wawavumela , aphuma-ke endodeni leyo angena ezavukazaneni . Umhlambi woke , ongaba zizavukazana eziziinkulungwana ezimbili , wagijimela emehlelweni wesebe , wadlhumukela ngelwandle , wacwila !
41005014	Abelusi bezavukazana babaleka , babika isigesi ngedorobheni nemaphandleni . Abantu baphuma bazokubona okwenzekileko .
41005015	Kwathi nabafika kuJesu , babona indoda ebegade ingenwe liwoma lamadimoni , ihlezi lapho , yembethe begodu seyibuyelwe mkhumbulo , yeke besaba .
41005016	Labo ababonileko batjela abantu bona kwenzekeni endodeni engenwe mimoya emimbi , babatjela nangezavukazana .
41005017	Yeke abantu babawa uJesu bona akhambe enarhenabo .
41005018	Kwathi uJesu nangena ngemkhunjini , umuntu obegade angenwe madimoni wakhombela ukukhamba naye .
41005019	UJesu azange amvumele kodwana wathi kuye : “ Khamba uye ekhaya emndeninakho ufese ubatjele bona kungangani okwenzelwe nguSomnini nokobana ukurhawukele kangangani . ”
41005020	Yakhamba-ke indoda leyo beyathoma ukubika iindabezo eDekapolisi , kobana kungangani ekwenzelwe nguJesu . Boke barareka khulu .
41005021	Kwathi bona uJesu godu ayamele ngaphetjheya kwelwandle ngomkhumbi , wabungelelwa siqubuthu esikhulu eqadi kwelwandle .
41005022	Yeke omunye wabaphathi besinagogi ebekuthiwa nguJayirosi weza lapho . Wathi nakabona uJesu , wawela eenyaweni zakhe ,
41005023	wamrabhela khulu wathi : “ Indodakazami encani iyahlongakala . Akhese uze uzoyibeka izandla ukuze iphole beyiphile ! ”
41005024	Yeke uJesu wakhamba naye . Isiqubuthu esikhulu samlandela sisunduzelana kuye .
41005025	Bekunomfazi ogade aphopha iingazi , sele kuminyaka elitjhumi nambili anjalo .
41005026	Wagula khulu akhamba iinyanga ezinengi , waphelelwa ngikho koke agade anakho . Kodwana kunobana aphole , ukugula kwarhagala .
41005027	Kwathi bona ezwe ngoJesu , weza ngemva kwakhe hlangana nesiqubuthu wafese wakghwatha isambatho sakhe ,
41005028	ngombana ubegade azitjele wathi : “ Nange ngingasengikghwathe nje isambatho sakhe kwaphela , ngizokuphola . ”
41005029	Khonokho ukuphopha kwakhawuka , wazizwa emzimbenakhe bona utjhaphulukile emtlhagwenakhe .
41005030	Msinyazana uJesu walemuka bona kunamandla aphumileko kuye , waphendukela ngesiqubuthwini wathi : “ Ngubani othinte isambatho sami ? ”

41005032	Kodwana uJesu waragela phambili waqala ngapha nangapha ukubona bonyana ngubani omthintileko .
41005033	Yeke umfazi loyo , ngokwazi bonyana kwenzekeni kuye , weza wafese wawela eenyaweni zakaJesu , athuthumela ngokwesaba ; wamtjela loke iqiniso .
41005034	UJesu wathi kuye : “ Ndodakazi , ukukholwa kwakho kukusindisile . Khamba ngokuthula , utjhaphuluke eenhlungwini zakho . ”
41005035	Kwathi uJesu asakhuluma njalo , kwafika amadoda athileko abuya kwaJayirosi umphathi wesinagogi athi kuye : “ Indodakazakho ihlongakele , usamtshwenyelani umfundisi na ? ”
41005036	UJesu akhange ayelele abakutjhoko , wathi kumphathi wesinagogi : “ Ungesabi , kholwa nje kwaphela . ”
41005037	Akhange avumele namunye bona akhambe naye , ngaphandle koPitrosi , uJakopo nomfowabo uJwanisi .
41005038	Kuthe nabafika emzini womphathi wesinagogi , uJesu wabona isiphithiphithi sabantu balila barhahlawula .
41005039	Wangena wathi kibo : “ Siphithiphithi sani lesi kanye nokurhahlawula okungaka na ? Umntwana akakahlongakali kodwana ulele . ”
41005040	Kodwana bamhleka . Wabakhuphela ngaphandle , wathatha uyise lomntwana nonina kanye nabafundi eze nabo , bangena ngapha kunomntwana khona .
41005041	Wambamba ngesandla wathi kuye : “ Thalitha kumi ! ” Nakutjhugululwako kutjho bona “ Mntazanyana , ngithi kuwe , sikima ! ”
41005042	Khonokho umntazana wasikima wakhambakhamba . Gade aneminyaka elitjhumi nambili . Abantu barareka khulu ngalokho .
41005043	UJesu wabadosa ngendlebe bona bangatjeli noyedwa ngalokho okwenzekileko . Godu wabayala bona baphe umntazanyana loyo okugonywako .
41006001	UJesu wasuka lapho wabuyela edorobheni lekhabo alandelwa bafundi bakhe .
41006002	Ngelanga leSabatha wathoma ukufundisa ngesinagogini . Abanengi abamuzwako barareka bathi : “ Indoda le , ikuthathaphi koke lokhu na ? Buhlakani obungangani lobu aphiwe bona , qala bewenza nemikarisomraro !
41006003	Kanti akusimbazi lo na ? Angithi yindodana kaMariya nomfowabo kaJakopo , uJosisi , uJudasi noSimoni ? Abodadwabo bahlala nathi lapha ! ” Yeke bakhubeka ngaye .
41006004	UJesu wathi kibo : “ Kusedorobheni lekhabo , hlangana neenhlobo zakhe nangakwabo kwaphela lapha umphorofidi angahlonitjhwa khona . ”
41006005	Azange enze namunye umkarisomraro lapho ngaphandle kokubeka izandla eengulanini ezimbalwa azipholise .
41006006	Wararwa kungakholwa kwabo . Yeke uJesu wakhambakhamba lapho , wangena umuzi nomzana , afundisa .
41006007	Wabizela kuye abafundi abalitjhumi nambili , wabathuma ngababili . Wabanikela amandla phezu kwemimoya emimbi .
41006008	Wabayala wathi : “ Ningaphathi ilitho ekhambeni lenu , ngaphandle kwedondolo . Ningaphathi isikwa , imbada ngitjho nemali ngeenkhwanyeni zenu .
41006009	Fakani amapatlagwana , kodwana ningaphathi izambatho ezinye ngaphandle kwenizembetheko .
41006010	Njalo lokha naningena emzini , hlalani kiwapho bekube kumhlana nisukako edorobhenelo .
41006011	Nakube kunalapha ningamukelekiko khona , namkha lapha ningalalelwako khona , thintithani ithuli eenyaweni zenu nikhambe . Lokho kuzakuba bufakazi obujamelene nabo . ”
41006012	Bakhamba-ke bayokutjhumayela bona abantu batjhuguluke .
41006013	Baqotjha amadimoni amanengi , bazesa abanengi abagulako ngamafutha we-oliva , babapholisa .
41006014	Ibizo lakaJesu laduma kangangombana ikosi uHerode yezwa ngalokho . Abanye bebathi : “ UJwanisi uMbhabhadisi uvusiwe kabafileko , ngikho akghona ukwenza imikarisomraro nje . ”
41006015	Abanye bathi : “ Ngu-Eliya . ” Godu abanye bathi : “ Umphorofidi njengomunye wabaphorofidi bekadeni . ”
41006016	Kodwana kwathi lokha uHerode nezwa lokho , wathi : “ Baba-ke ! UJwanisi yena lo engamqunta ihloko , uvukileko kabafileko ! ”
41006017	UHerode ngokwakhe wakhupha umyalo bona kubanjwe uJwanisi , wabotjhwa bewafakwa ngesikhungweni . Lokho ubegade akwenze ngebanga lakaHerodiya umkaFlebhe , umfowabo amngenako .
41006018	UJwanisi bekathe kuHerode : “ Akusimthetho bona ungathatha umkamfowenu ! ”
41006019	Ngalokho uHerodiya wabambela uJwanisi amavundo , wafuna ukumbulala . Kodwana wabhalelwa
41006020	ngombana uHerode ubegade esaba uJwanisi begodu amvikela ngokwazi bona uyindoda elungileko necwengileko . Yeke bekuthi uHerode nezwa uJwanisi akhuluma , arareke khulu kodwana ubegade athanda ukumlalela .
41006021	Ekugcineni uHerodiya wafumana ithuba lakhe . Bekumhlana welanga lokubelethwa kwakaHerode . Wenzela iinkhulu zombuso , iinduna zepi nabosaziwako beGalile umgidi .
41006022	Kwathi lokha indodakazi kaHerodiya nayingena , igida , yathokozisa uHerode nabasesidlweni naye . Nje-ke ikosi yathi emntazaneni : “ Nawungangibawa nanyana yini oyifunako , ngingakunikela yona . ”
41006023	Wayithembisa ngesifungo wathi : “ Nanyana yini oyibawako ngizakupha yona , ngitjho nesiquntu sombuswami . ”
41006024	Waphuma waya kunina wafese wathi : “ Ngibaweni na ? ” Waphendula wathi : “ Bawa ihloko kaJwanisi uMbhabhadisi . ”
41006025	Khonokho wabuyela ekosini ngebelo , wafika wathi : “ Ngifuna bona unginikele ihloko kaJwanisi uMbhabhadisi ngesitja , khona nje . ”
41006026	Ikosi yezwa ubuhlungu khulu , kodwana ngebanga lesifungo sayo kanye nabayeni abasesidlweni nayo , akhange ithande ukulandulela umntazana lo .
41006027	Yeke yayala khonokho umbulali kobana eze nehloko kaJwanisi . Umuntu loyo wakhamba-ke , wafese waqunta uJwanisi ihloko angesikhungweni ,
41006028	wayiletha ngesitja . Wayinikela umntazana , yena wayidlulisela kunina .
41006029	Kwathi bona abafundi bakaJwanisi bezwe lokho , beza , bathatha umzimbakhe bawubulunga ngethuneni .
41006030	Abapostoli babuthana kuJesu , bambikela koke abakwenzileko nabakufundisileko .
41006031	Yeke , ngebanga lokobana bekunabantu abanengi ebebasehla benyuka , abafundaba bebatlhoga nethuba lokugoma , uJesu wathi kibo : “ Nambani sikhambeni sodwa siyeni endaweni ethulileko lapha singaphumula khona . ”
41006032	Bakhamba-ke ngomkhumbi , baya endaweni ethulileko .
41006033	Kodwana inengi labantu elababonako nabakhambako labazi bona bobani , alo-ke laphuma kiyo yoke imizana lagijima ngeenyawo belayokufika lapho phambi kwabo .
41006034	UJesu wathi nahlika emkhunjini , wabona isiqubuthu esikhulu , wasirhawukela ngombana gade sifana nezimvu ezingenamelusi . Nje-ke wathoma wasifundisa okunengi .
41006035	Ngesikhatheso besele kuhlwile , abafundi bakhe batjhidela kuye , bathi : “ Indawo le ikude nemizi , kanti nokuhlwa sekuhlwile .
41006036	Tjela abantwaba bakhambe ukuze baye emzini nemizaneni eseduze bazithengele okugonywako . ”
41006037	Kodwana waphendula wathi : “ Banikeleni nina okugonywako . ” Bamphendula bathi : “ Lokho kungathatha umrholo womuntu weenyanga ezibunane ! Alo , sizakusebenzisa imali enengi kangaka esikweni siphe abantwaba bona bagome na ? ”
41006038	UJesu wababuza wathi : “ Ninezikwa ezingaki na ? Khambani niyokuqala . ” Kwathi bona babone , bathi kuye : “ Zihlanu neenhlambi ezimbili . ”
41006039	UJesu wabayala bona bahlalise boke abantu emgwengweni ngeenqhema .
41006040	Nje-ke bahlala phasi ngeenqhema zabalikhulu nezabamatjhumi amahlanu .
41006041	UJesu wathatha izikwa ezihlanu neenhlambi ezimbili , waqala ezulwini , wathokoza bewahlephula izikwa . Wanikela abafundi bakhe bona bahlukanisele abantu . Godu wabahlukanisela iinhlambi ezimbili boke njalo .
41006042	Boke bagoma basutha ,
41006043	abafundi babuthelela bazalisa iinqwebu ezilitjhumi nambili ngeentshutshuru ezasalako zezikwa neenhlambi .
41006044	Isibalo samadoda agomako saba ziinkulungwana ezihlanu .
41006045	Khonokho uJesu wayala abafundi bakhe bona bangene ngemkhunjini bamtjhiye baye eBhethe-Sayida , yena wasala atjela abantu bona bakhambe .
41006046	Kuthe bona ahlukane nabo , watjhinga entabeni wayokuthandaza .
41006047	Kwathi nakurhwalalako , umkhumbi wabe uphakathi kwelwandle , yena gade asese senarheni .
41006048	Wabona abafundi badosa emhlweni ngokuthayisa umkhumbi ngebanga lokobana ummoya bewubakhandela . Ekuseni ngomlindo wesine , weza kibo akhamba phezu kwelwandle . Gade asele azokudlula ngakibo ,
41006049	kodwana kwathi nabambonako njalo akhamba phezu kwelwandle , badlumbana bona sipuku . Barhuwelela ,
41006050	ngombana boke bambona , yeke bethuka . Khonokho uJesu wakhuluma nabo wathi : “ Qinani isibindi . Ngimi , ningesabi . ”
41006051	Yeke wangena ngemkhunjinabo , ummoya wathula . Bathi dlemelele
41006052	ngebanga lokobana bebasamangazwe yindaba yezikwa ngombana iinhliziyo zabo bezingakghoni ukwamukela .
41006053	Kwathi sele bayamele ngaphetjheya , bafika eGenezaretha , babopha umkhumbi wabo lapho .
41006054	Nasele baphumile ngemkhunjini , abantu balemuka bona nguJesu .
41006055	Bagijima bagidizela soke isifundeso , baletha boke abagulako babathwele ngemikghadi , babasa nanyana kukuphi lapha bezwa bona uya ngakhona .
41006056	Kuphi nakuphi lapha afika khona , emizaneni , emizini nemaphandleni , bakhuphela abagulako ematatawini . Bamrabhela bona abavumele bakghwathe nje kwaphela umphetho wengubakhe . Nje-ke boke abayikghwathako baphola .
41007001	AbaFarisi kanye nabanye abafundisi bomthetho ebebavela eJerusalema , babungelela uJesu .
41007002	Khonapho babona abanye babafundi bakhe bagoma ngezandla ezingakahlambuluki okutjho ezingakahlanjwa .
41007003	AbaFarisi nawo woke amaJuda abagomi bangakahlambululi izandla zabo , ngokwenza njalo balonda isiko labokhokho .
41007004	Nababuya etatawini lokuthengisela , abagomi bangakahlambi . Godu kukhona amasiko amanengi abawatjhejako njengokuhlanza iinkapho , iimbiza nezitja zekoporo .
41007005	Yeke abaFarisi nabafundisi bomthetho babuza uJesu bathi : “ Kubayini abafundi bakho bangaphili ngokwesiko labokhokho kodwana bagoma ngezandla ezingakahlanjwa na ? ”
41007006	UJesu waphendula wathi : “ U-Isaya bekaqinisile lokha naphorofida ngani bazenzisi ndina njengombana kutloliwe kwathiwa , “ ‘ Abantwaba bangidumisa ngeembhena zabo , kodwana iinhliziyo zabo zikude nami .
41007007	Bangidumisa ngelize , iimfundiso zabo zimithetho yabantu . ’
41007008	“ Nilahle imiyalo kaZimu nadzimelela emasikweni wabantu . ”
41007009	Godu wathi kibo : “ Ninendledlana ethileko yokuphayilela eqadi imiyalo kaZimu ukuze nilonde amasikwenu !
41007010	Angithi uMosi wathi , ‘ Hlonipha uyihlo nonyoko . ’ Godu wathi , ‘ Owethuka uyise namkha unina akabulawe . ’
41007011	Kodwana nifundisa bona umuntu nakathi kuyise namkha kunina , ‘ Nanyana ngiliphi isizo enginisize ngalo liyiKorbana ’ ( okutjho isipho esehlukaniselwe uZimu ) ,
41007012	nje-ke anisamlisi bona enzele uyise namkha unina nanyana yini akufunako .
41007013	Ngaleyondlela nilenza libe lilize ilizwi lakaZimu ngamasikwenu eniwafundisako . Kunengi okufana nalokhu enikwenzako . ”
41007014	Godu uJesu wabizela isiqubuthu kuye , wathi : “ Yeningilalele noke nizwisise lokhu .
41007015	Akunalitho elingaphandle komuntu elingamenza abe ngosilapheleko nalingena ngaphakathi kwakhe . Kodwana ngokuphuma ngaphakathi kwakhe okumenza abe ngosilapheleko .
41007016	Oneendlebe akezwe ! ”
41007017	Ngemva kobana uJesu asukile esiqubuthwini bewangena ngekumbeni , abafundi bakhe bambuza ngomfanekiso lo .
41007018	Wababuza wathi : “ Kanti nani anizwisisi na ? Aniboni bona akunalitho elibuya ngaphandle elingena emuntwini bese limenza abe ngosilapheleko na ?
41007019	Iye ngombana akuyi ngehliziyweni kodwana kuya ngesiswini sakhe , kusuke lapho-ke kuphumele ngaphandle komzimbakhe . ” Ngokutjho njalo , uJesu bekatjho bona koke okugonywako kuhlambulukile .
41007020	Waraga wathi : “ Okuphuma ngemuntwini ngikho okumenza abe ‘ ngosilapheleko ’ .
41007021	Ngaphakathi kwehliziyo yomuntu kuvela imikhumbulo emimbi okutjho ukulalana okuthuweleleko , ubusela , ukubulala , ukuhlobonga ,
41007022	ukuba marhamaru , umkhumbulo wokwenza ubumbi , ikohliso , ukungabi nesimilo , umona , ukululaza , ukuzigabisa nobudlhayela .
41007023	Boke ubusathanobu buvela ngaphakathi begodu ngibo-ke obenza umuntu abe ‘ ngosilapheleko ’ . ”
41007024	UJesu wasuka lapho waya endaweni yeTirosi . Wangena ngekumbeni angafuni bona kube khona owaziko ukuthi ulapho , kodwana azange akghone ukubhaca .
41007025	Emanyeni kwathi bona unina lomntazana obegade angenwe mimoya emimbi ezwe ngoJesu , waphoseka eenyaweni zakhe .
41007026	Umfazi lo begade amuGirigi owabelethelwa eSiriya-Funisiya . Warabhela uJesu bona aqotjhe idimoni endodakazinakhe .
41007027	Kodwana uJesu wathi kuye : “ Akugome abantwana qangi banele ngombana akusikuhle ukuthatha isikwa sabantwana usiphosele izinja . ”
41007028	Yena wamphendula wathi : “ Iye Kosi , nokho izinja nazo ngaphasi kwetafulapho zidla iintshutshuru eziwe nakugoma abantwana . ”
41007029	UJesu wathi kuye : “ Ngebanga lependulwakho leyo , khamba uye ekhaya ; idimoni liphumile endodakazinakho . ”
41007030	Waya ekhaya , wafumana umntwanakhe alele embhedeni , idimoni sele liphumile kuye .
41007031	Yeke uJesu wasuka endaweni yeTirosi , wadlula eTsidoni , wehlela elwandle leGalile waya esifundeni seDekapolisi .
41007032	Lapho abantu baletha kuye isithulu esingakghoni ukukhuluma kuhle , bamrabhela bona asibeke izandla .
41007033	Emva kobana asidosele eqadi , kude nesiqubuthu , uJesu wahloma iminwakhe ngeendlebeni zaso . Wakhafula wakghwatha ilimu laso .
41007034	Waqala ezulwini , wadosa ummoya khulu wathi kiso : “ Efatha , ” okutjho bona “ Vuleka . ”
41007035	Khonapho iindlebe zaso zavuleka , ilimu laso lararuluka besathoma ukukhuluma kuhle .
41007036	UJesu wabayala bona bangatjeli noyedwa . Kodwana kwathi nakalokho abatjela njalo , bona baphikelela ukukhuluma ngakho .
41007037	Abantu barareka khulu , bathi : “ Koke ukwenze kuhle . Wenza ngitjho nabangezwako bona bezwe , nabangakhulumiko bakhulume . ”
41008001	Emihleni leyo , kwabuthana esinye isiqubuthu godu . Njengombana besinganalitho lokugoma , uJesu wabizela abafundi bakhe kuye wathi :
41008002	“ Abantwaba ngiyabarhawukela , sele kumalanga amathathu basoloko banami begodu bangagomi litho .
41008003	Nangingabathumela emakhaya ngendlala , bangatsirimezeka endleleni . Abanye babo babuya kude . ”
41008004	Abafundi bakhe bathi kuye : “ Kodwana kukuphi lapha umuntu angafumana khona isikwa esaneleko sokubondla njengombana sikude nemizi nje na ? ”

41008006	Wayala isiqubuthu bona sihlale phasi . Kwathi bona athathe izikwa ezilikhomba bewathokoza , wazihlephula , wanikela abafundi bakhe kobana baphe abantu ; yeke benza njalo .

41008020	Wathi : “ Lokha nangihlephula izikwa ezilikhomba ngipha iinkulungwana ezine zabantu , nazalisa iinqwebu ezingaki ngeentshutshuru ezasalako na ? ” Bathi kuye : “ Ezilikhomba . ”
41008021	Wababuza wathi : “ Alo , soloko anilemuki na ? ”
41008022	Bafika eBhethe-Sayida , abantu abathileko baletha kuye indoda esiphofu , bamrabhela bona ayikghwathe .
41008023	Wabamba indoda esiphofu ngesandla waphumela nayo ngaphandle komuzi . Kuthe bona ayikhafulele ngemehlweni , wayibeka izandla . Wayibuza wathi : “ Kukhona okubonako na ? ”
41008024	Yaphakamisa amehlo yathi : “ Ngibona abantu , bafana nemithi , bayakhambakhamba . ”

41009037	“ Nanyana ngubani owamukela omunye wabantwana abancanaba ebizweni lami , wamukela mina , begodu nanyana ngubani owamukela mina akamukeli mina kodwana wamukela ongithumileko . ”

41009044	Lapho isibungu sakhona asifi nomlilo awucimi .
41009045	Nakube inyawo lakho likwenza wenze isono , liquntule . Kungcono ukungena epilweni urholophele , kunobanyana uphoswe ngesirhogweni neenyawo zombili .

41009047	Nakube ilihlo lakho likwenza wenze isono , likhuphe . Kungcono ukungena embusweni kaZimu unelihlo elilodwa , kunobanyana uphoswe ngesirhogweni unamehlo amabili .

41014001	Nje-ke besele kumalanga amabili kwaphela bona kube liPhasika kanye nomnyanya wesiKwa esinganaNgumelo . Abaphristi abakhulu nabafundisi bomthetho bebathiya amaqhinga wokubamba uJesu ngesidu , bambulale .

42008001	Ngemva kwalokho uJesu wakhamba wadabula hlangana nedorobho nomuzi atjhumayela iindaba ezimnandi ngombuso kaZimu . Abalitjhumi nambili gade bakhamba naye ,

42008019	Unina nabafowabo kaJesu beza bazombona , kodwana babhalelwa kufika kuye ngebanga lesiqubuthu .

43001046	UNathaniyeli wabuza wathi : “ Kukhona okulungileko okungavela eNazaretha na ? ” UFlebhe waphendula wathi : “ Yiza uzokubona ! ”

43002001	Ngelanga lesithathu kwaba nobukhazi eKana leGalile , unina lakaJesu akhona naye lapho .
43002002	UJesu nabafundi bakhe gade bamenyiwe ebukhazinobo .
43002003	Kwathi bona iwayini liphele , unina lakaJesu wathi kuye : “ Abasenalo iwayini . ”
43002004	UJesu wamphendula wathi : “ Umma angakhathazeki ngokuqalene nami , isikhathi sami asikafiki . ”
43002005	Yeke unina wathi eencekwini : “ Yenzani nanyana yini akutjhoko . ”
43002006	Bekurheme lapho imijeka yamanzi emithandathu , ibekwe ngekwesiko lesiJuda lokuzihlambulula . Ngamunye gade ungamumatha amalitha angapheze abe likhulu .
43002007	UJesu wathi eencekwini : “ Zalisani imijeka le ngamanzi . ” Bayizalisa , yaphuphuma .
43002008	Wathi kizo : “ Khelelani-ke niyokunikela usomnyanya . ” Mbala bamkhelela .
43002009	Kwathi lokha usomnyanya nakandipha amanzi ebesele aphenduke iwayini , azange azi bona iwayini leli livelaphi . Kodwana iinceku ezakhelela amanzi zazi bonyana libuyaphi ; yeke wabiza umkhwenyani .
43002010	Wathi kuye : “ Woke umuntu ukhupha iwayini elimnandi qangi , kuthi nakube abathekeli abaneli ngokusela , kukhutjhwe itlwembu . Kodwana wena usalokho ukhupha iwayini elimnandi bekube kunje ! ”
43002011	UJesu wenza isibonakaliso sakhe sokuthoma eKana engeGalile lapha abonakalisa khona iphazimulwakhe , abafundi bakhe bamkholwa .
43002012	Ngemva kwalokho , uJesu nonina , abafowabo nabafundi bakhe baya eKapernawumi , bahlala lapho amalangana .
43002013	Isikhathi somnyanya wePhasika besesitjhidele , yeke uJesu waya eJerusalema .
43002014	Lapho wafumana abantu ngethempelini bathengisa iinkomo , izimvu namazuba ; nabatlharulula imali bahlezi eentafuleni zabo .
43002015	Yeke wenza isibebhu ngeentambo wabaqotjha boke ngethempelini , kanye nezimvu neenkomo ; wapewula iintafula zabatlharululi bemali warhatjha imali yabo .
43002016	Watjela labo abathengisa amazuba wathi : “ Asuseni lapha ! Lisani ukwenza ikumba kaBaba indawo yokuthengisela ! ”
43002017	Abafundi bakhe bakhumbula bona umtlolo uthi : “ Ukutjhisakalela indlwakho kungidlile . ”

43002020	Ambuza athi : “ Uzalakha godu ngamalanga amathathu na ? Kuthethe iminyaka ematjhumi amane nesithandathu ukulakha ithempeli . ”

43002022	Kwathi bona avuke kabafileko , abafundi bakhe bakhumbula bona ubasitjho lokhu , bayikholwa imitlolo ecwengileko nalokho uJesu akutjhwileko .

43002025	Bekungakatlhogeki bona omunye angakhe amtjele ngabo ngombana yena bekagade asazi okungeenhliziyweni zabo .
43003001	Bekukhona ebaFarisini umuntu ekuthiwa nguNikhodemusi , yena ubesikhulu samaJuda .

43003003	UJesu wamphendula wathi : “ Kwamambala ngiqinisile ngithi : Akakho noyedwa ozakubona umbuso kaZimu ngaphandle kobanyana abelethwe butjha . ”

43003005	UJesu wamphendula wathi : “ Kwamambala ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe : Akakho noyedwa ozakungena embusweni kaZimu ngaphandle kobana abelethwe ngamanzi nangoMoya .

43003007	Ungarareki ngombana ngithe kuwe kufanele ubelethwe butjha .
43003008	Ummoya uvunguza ngapha ufuna ngakhona ; uzwa ukuphephetha kwawo , kodwana awazi lapha uvela khona nalapha uya khona . Kunjalo kiloyo naloyo obelethwa nguMoya . ”
43003009	UNikhodemusi wabuza wathi : “ Lokhu kungenzeka njani na ? ”
43003010	UJesu wamphendula wathi : “ Wena umfundisi wakwa-Israyeli , kodwana awukwazi lokhu na ?
43003011	Kwamambala ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe : Sifakaza ngalokho esikwaziko , sibike lokho esikubonileko , khonapho nina bantu anamukeli ubufakazi bethu .
43003012	Ngikhulume nani mayelana nezinto zephaseli kodwana anikholwa ; alo-ke ningakholwa njani nanginitjela ngezinto zezulwini na ?
43003013	Akakho okhe waya ezulwini ngaphandle kwaloyo owehla avela ezulwini , iNdodana yoMuntu .
43003014	“ Njengombana uMosi waphakamisa inyoka erhalawumbeni , njalo-ke neNdodana yoMuntu kufanele iphakanyiswe ,
43003015	ukuze kuthi loyo okholwa kiyo abe nepilo engapheliko .
43003016	Mbala uZimu walithanda kangaka iphasi , wabe wanikela ngeNdodanakhe ebelethwe yodwa , khona kuzakuthi loyo okholwa kiyo angabhubhi , kodwana abe nepilo engapheliko .
43003017	Iye , akakathumeli iNdodanakhe bona izokugweba iphasi , kodwana kobana iphasi lisindiswe ngayo .
43003018	“ Loyo oyikholwako , akagwetjwa ; kodwana loyo ongakholwako , ugwetjiwe ngombana azange akholwe eNdodaneni kaZimu ekukuphela kwayo .
43003019	Isigwebo singilokhu : Ukukhanya kufikile ephasini , kodwana abantu bakhetha ubumnyama kunomkhanyo ngombana izenzo zabo zimbi .
43003020	Woke umuntu owenza okumbi , uwuhloyile umkhanyo , akezi emkhanyweni ngombana wesaba bona izenzo zakhe ezimbi zizakudaluleka .
43003021	Kodwana loyo owenza iqiniso , uyavela emkhanyweni khona kuzakubonakala bonyana izenzo zakhe zenziwe kuZimu . ”
43003022	Ngemva kwalokho uJesu nabafundi bakhe baya enarheni yeJudiya . Lapho wahlala isikhatjhana nabo , abhabhadisa .
43003023	UJwanisi naye bekabhabhadisa nge-Ayinoni , eduze neSalima ngombana lapho bekunamanzi amanengi . Abantu beza kuye bona babhajadiswe .
43003024	Lokhu bekungaphambi kobanyana uJwanisi avalelwe ngesikhungweni .

43003026	Baya kuJwanisi , bafika bathi : “ Mfundisi , umuntu obekanawe ngaphetjheya kweJordani , ngitjho loyo ogade ufakaza ngaye , qala uyabhabhadisa , begodu boke baya kuye ! ”
43003027	UJwanisi waphendula wathi : “ Akakho ongaba nento ngaphandle kobanyana uZimu amuphe ivela ezulwini .

43003029	Onomlobokazi umyeni ; kodwana umngani womkhwenyani ojama amlalele , uyathaba nakezwa ilizwi lomkhwenyani . Yeke ithabo lami seliphelele .
43003030	Kufanele yena akhule , mina nginciphe . ”
43003031	“ Ovela ngehla , ungehla kwabo boke . Loyo ongowephasi ngewephasinapha , begodu ukhuluma ngezephasi . Kodwana loyo ovela ezulwini ungaphezu kwakho koke .
43003032	Ufakaza lokho akubonileko nakuzwileko , kodwana akakho noyedwa owamukela ubufakazi bakhe .

43003036	Loyo okholwako eNdodaneni unokuphila okungapheliko ; kodwana ongakholwa eNdodaneni ngekhe akubona ukuphila , kodwana uzakuhlala ngaphasi kobukhali bakaZimu . ”
43004001	AbaFarisi bezwa bona uJesu uzuze bewabhabhadisa abafundi abanengi kunoJwanisi .
43004002	Eqinisweni , uJesu azange akhe abhabhadise kodwana bekubhabhadisa abafundi bakhe .
43004003	Yeke wasuka eJudiya wabuyela eGalile .
43004004	Bekufanele bona adlule eSamariya .

43004006	Umthombo kaJakopo gade ulapho , nje-ke uJesu sele adiniwe ekhambeni lakhe , wahlala phasi eqadi komthombo ; bekusemini ekulu .

43004008	Abafundi bakhe bebasaye ngemzini ukuyokuthenga ukudla .
43004009	Umfazi womSamariya wathi : “ Wena umJuda , mina ngimSamariya , alo-ke ungangibawa njani amanzi wokusela na ? ” AmaJuda akadlelani namaSamariya .
43004010	UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Ingathana bewazi isipho sakaZimu , nokobana ngubani othi kuwe , ‘ Ngiseza ’ bewuzambawa , yena ubazakupha amanzi wokuphila . ”

43004015	Umfazi wathi : “ Mnimzana , ngipha amanzi lawo ukuze ngingasoma namkha ngibuye lapha ngizokukhelela . ”

43004018	ngombana bewunamadoda amahlanu , naleyo ohlala nayo nje , akusingeyakho . Yeke ungitjele iqiniso . ”

43004023	Kodwana isikhathi siyeza , begodu sebesifikile , lapha abathandazako bazakuthandaza uBaba ngommoya nangeqiniso ngombana uBaba uthanda abamlotjha njalo .

43004027	Khonokho abafundi bakhe bafika . Barareka ngokukhuluma kwakhe nomfazi . Kodwana akakho owathi kuye , “ Ufunani na ? ” namkha , “ Ukhulumelani naye na ? ”
43004028	Yeke umfazi wasukela umjekakhe lapho wabuyela ngemzini , wathi ebantwini :
43004029	“ Yizani nizokubona umuntu ongitjele koke engakhe ngakwenza . Angaba nguKrestu na ? ”
43004030	Baphuma ngemzini baya kuJesu .
43004031	Kusenjalo abafundi bamncenga bathi : “ Mfundisi , akhe ugome ! ”
43004032	Kodwana waphendula wathi : “ Nginokudla engikugomako eningazi ilitho ngakho . ”
43004033	Yeke abafundi babuzana bathi : “ Kghani omunye umlethele ukudla na ? ”
43004034	UJesu wathi kibo : “ Ukudla kwami kukwenza intando yongithumileko nokuqeda umsebenzakhe .
43004035	Azakhe niphele nitjho nithi , ‘ Kusele iinyanga ezine bona kuvunwe ! ’ Kodwana ngithi kini qalani mazombe , amasimu sele alungele ukuvunwa .
43004036	Ovunako sele amukeliswa umvuzo begodu ubuthelela iinthelo zokuphila okungapheliko ukuze otjalileko novunako bathabe boke .
43004037	Ngokunjalo siliqiniso isitjho esithi , ‘ Omunye uyatjala , omunye uyavuna . ’
43004038	Nginithume bona niyokuvuna lapha ningasebenzi khona , abanye balimile , nina nizakuzuza emsebenzinabo . ”
43004039	AmaSamariya amanengi ngemzini akholwa kuye ngebanga lobufakazi bomfazi obuthi : “ Ungitjele koke engakhe ngakwenza . ”
43004040	Yeke kwathi abantu beSamariya nabeza kuye , bambawa bona ahlale nabo ; nje-ke wahlala lapho amalanga amabili .
43004041	Abanengi godu bakholwa ngomlayezwakhe .
43004042	Bathi emfazini : “ Siyakholwa gadesi , ingasingalokho okutjhwileko ngombana nathi ngokwethu simzwile , besiyazi bona nguye uMsindisi wephasi . ”

43004044	ngombana yena ngokwakhe wathi : “ Umphorofidi akahlonitjhwa endaweni yekhabo . ”

43004054	Leso-ke simangaliso sesibili uJesu asenzako ukusuka eJudiya ukuya eGalile .
43005001	Ngemva kwalokho , uJesu wakhuphukela eJerusalema emnyanyeni wamaJuda .

43005004	ngombana ingilozi kaSomnini bephele ingene ngesizibeni izamazise amanzi , kuthi wokuthomo ongena ngemanzini asinde kunanyana ngisiphi isifo anaso .

43005008	UJesu wathi kiso : “ Sikima , uthathe umsemakho ukhambe . ”

43005010	Yeke amaJuda athi emuntwini opholisiweko : “ Namhlanjesi liSabatha , kuphambene nomthetho wethu bona ungaphatha umsemakho . ”
43005011	Waphendula wathi : “ Umuntu ongipholisileko uthe , ‘ Thatha umsemakho ukhambe . ’ ”

43005018	Ngokutjho lokho kwarhagalisa amaJuda bona afune ukumbulala ingasingombana wephule iSabatha kwaphela , kodwana ngombana ubize uZimu ngoyise , ngebangelo uzenze bona alingane noZimu .
43005019	Yeke uJesu waphendula wathi : “ Kwamambala ngiqinisile ngithi kini : INdodana angekhe yenza ilitho ngokwayo , yenza lokho ebone uYise akwenza . Okwenziwa nguYise , neNdodana iyakwenza
43005020	ngombana uYise uyayithanda iNdodana , uyitjengisa koke akwenzako yena . Uzayitjengisa ngitjho nemisebenzi emikhulu kunale ukuze nimangale .
43005021	Iye , njengombana uYise avusa abafileko bona baphile godu , nayo iNdodana iphilisa labo ethanda bona baphile .
43005022	UYise ngokwakhe akagwebi muntu kodwana unikele koke ukugweba eNdodaneni ,
43005023	ukuze boke bahloniphe iNdodana njengombana bahlonipha uYise . Ngiloyo naloyo ongahloniphi iNdodana akamhloniphi noYise oyithumileko .
43005024	“ Kwamambala ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Ozwa amezwami akholwe kongithumileko , unokuphila okungapheliko . Angekhe agwetjwa , kodwana udlulile ekufeni , usekuphileni .
43005025	Kwamambala ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Isikhathi siyeza , nanje sesifikile , lapho abafileko bazakuzwa ilizwi leNdodana kaZimu , labo abazalizwa bazakuphila .
43005026	Njengombana uYise anokuphila ngokwakhe , ngokunjalo unikele neNdodana bona ibe nokuphila ngokwayo .
43005027	Begodu uyinikele igunya lokugweba ngombana iyiNdodana yoMuntu .
43005028	Ningarareki ngalokhu ; siyeza isikhathi lapha boke abasemalibeni bazalizwa ilizwi layo ,
43005029	bavuke ; labo abenze okulungileko bazakuvukela ekuphileni ; abenze okumbi bavukele ekulahlweni . ”
43005030	“ Angekhe ngenza ilitho ngokwami ; ngigweba ngapha uZimu atjho ngakhona nokugweba kwami kungikho ngombana angiphikeleli ukwenza intando yami kodwana intando yongithumileko .
43005031	“ Nangizifakazela ngokwami , khona ubufakazi bami abusilo iqiniso .
43005032	Ukhona omunye ofakaza ngami , godu ngiyazi bona akutjhoko ngami kuliqiniso .
43005033	Nathumela kuJwanisi iinthunywa , yena walifakazela iqiniso .
43005034	Ayisikukobanyana ngifuna ubufakazi bomuntu ; ngitjho lokhu khona nizakuphuluka .
43005035	UJwanisi bekanjengesibani , sivutha sikhanyisa , navuma isikhatjhana ukuzitika ngomkhanyo wakhe .
43005036	Nginobufakazi obukhulu kunebukaJwanisi . Imisebenzi uBaba anginikele bona ngiyiphelelise , ekungileyo engiyenzako , iyafakazela bona mbala uBaba ungithumile .

43006001	Isikhatjhana ngemva kwalokho , uJesu wayamela ngaphetjheya kwelwandle leGalile , laphakhunye kuthiwa lilwandle leThibheriyasi .

43008033	Bamphendula bathi : “ Siziinzukulwana zaka-Abrahamu , azange khesibe makhoboka wamuntu . Alo-ke utjho ukuthini nawuthi sizakutjhaphululwa na ? ”
43008034	UJesu wathi kibo : “ Kwamambala ngiqinisile ngithi : Woke owonako ulikhoboka lesono .
43008035	Ikhoboka alinayo indawo yesiphelani emndenini , kodwana indodana ingeyomndeni nini nanini .
43008036	Lokha iNdodana nayinitjhaphululako nizabe nitjhaphulukile kwamambala .
43008037	Ngiyazi bona niziinzukulwana zaka-Abrahamu . Kodwana nilinga ukungibulala ngombana ilizwi lami alinandawo kini .
43008038	Nginitjela lokho engikubone kuBaba , kodwana nina nenza lokho uyihlo anitjele khona . ”
43008039	Bamphendula bathi : “ Ubaba wethu ngu-Abrahamu . ” UJesu wabaphendula wathi : “ Nangabe benibantwana baka-Abrahamu , ngabe nenza lokho u-Abrahamu gade akwenza .
43008040	Njengombana nifuna ukungibulala mina muntu onitjele iqiniso engilizwe kuZimu , kodwana u-Abrahamu azange akhe akwenze okufana nalokhu .
43008041	Nenza lokho ubaba wenu akwenzako . ” Bamphendula bathi : “ Asisibo abantwana bokonakala , sinoBaba oyedwa , nguZimu ngokwakhe . ”
43008042	UJesu wathi kibo : “ Nangabe kwamambala uZimu bekanguBaba wenu , benizangithanda ngombana ngibuya kuZimu , nje-ke ngilapha . Angikazizeli ngeyami intando , kodwana yena ungithumile .
43008043	Kubayini ningazwisisi engikutjhoko na ? Kungombana aniwuzwa umlayezwami .
43008044	Nibantwana bakayihlo uSathana , nithanda ukwenza iinkanuko zakayihlo . Kusukela ekuthomeni bekambulali , azange akhabe neqiniso ngombana akukho iqiniso kuye . Nakaleya amanga , ukhuluma lokho okuyimvelo yakhe ngombana ungusomalakazi noyise wamanga .
43008045	Kodwana ngombana mina nginitjela iqiniso , aningikholwa .
43008046	Kukhona phakathi kwenu ongafakaza bona nginomlandu wesono na ? Alo-ke nangabe nginitjela iqiniso , kubayini ningakholwa na ?
43008047	OngewakaZimu ulalela amezwi kaZimu . Isizathu sokobana ningalaleli kungoba anisibo bakaZimu . ”
43008048	AmaJuda amphendula athi : “ Utjho bona besingakaqinisi lokha sithi wena umSamariya begodu unedimoni na ? ”
43008049	UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Anginadimoni , ngihlonipha uBaba ; kodwana nina niyangilulaza .
43008050	Angizifuneli mina idumo lami , kodwana kukhona olifunako nogwebako .
43008051	Kwamambala ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Olonda ifundiswami angeze afa . ”
43008052	Bathi kuye : “ Kwanjesi khona sesineqiniso bona unedimoni . U-Abrahamu wafa nabaphorofidi bafa , nanyana kunjalo uthi loyo olonda ifundiswakho angeze ezwa ngitjho ukufa .
43008053	Wena umkhulu kunobaba wethu u-Abrahamu na ? Yena walala , ngokunjalo nabaphorofidi . Alo , wena udlumbana bona ungubani na ? ”
43008054	UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Nangabe bengingazidumisa mina , idumo lami lingaba lilize . UBaba , ngitjho loyo enimthatha njengoZimenu , nguye ongidumisako .
43008055	Azange khenimazi , kodwana mina ngiyamazi . Ngathana bengingathi angimazi , bengingaba ngusomanga njengani . Kodwana ngiyamazi , begodu ngiyalihlonipha ilizwi lakhe .
43008056	Uyihlomkhulu u-Abrahamu wakuthabela ukubona ilanga lami , iye , walibona bewathaba . ”
43008057	Bathi kuye : “ Abe awunayo neminyaka ematjhumi amahlanu . Alo , sewumbone nini u-Abrahamu ? ”

43008059	Yeke badobha amatje bona bamkhande , kodwana uJesu wazifihla waphuma ngethempelini wakhamba .
43009001	Kwathi uJesu asakhamba , wabona umuntu owabelethwa asiphofu .
43009002	Abafundi bakhe bambuza bathi : “ Mfundisi , ngubani owonileko , mumuntu lo namkha babelethi bakhe ukuze abelethwe asiphofu na ? ”
43009003	UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Akhange kone yena namkha ababelethi . Lokhu kwenzeka khona amandla kaZimu azakubonakala ngaye .
43009004	Ikani kusemini , kufanele sisebenze umsebenzi waloyo ongithumileko . Ubusuku buyeza lapha kungekhe kwasebenza muntu khona .
43009005	Ikani ngisesephasini , ngimkhanyo wephasi . ”
43009006	Ngemva kobana atjho lokhu , wakhafulela equlwanini wabhica idaka ngamathe , walininda emehlweni womuntu loyo .
43009007	Wathi kuye : “ Khamba uyokuhlamba ngesizibeni seSilowama . ” ( Ibizweli litjho ukuthi Thunyiwe ) . Yeke wakhamba wayokuhlamba , wabuya sele abona .
43009008	Abomakhelwana bakhe nabantu abambona nakhombelako ngaphambi kwalokhu , bathi : “ Akusuye umuntu lo ogade aphele ahlale phasi akhombele na ? ”
43009009	Abanye bathi : “ Nguye , ” kodwana abanye bathi : “ Awa , akasuye ; uzifanela naye kwaphela . ” Yeke umuntu ngokwakhe wathi : “ Nginguye . ”
43009010	Bathanda ukwazi bathi : “ Kwenzeke njani bona amehlwakho avuleke ? ”
43009011	Waphendula wathi : “ Umuntu okuthiwa nguJesu wabhica idaka , walininda emehlwenami wathi , ‘ Khamba uye eSilowama uyokuhlamba khona . ’ Yeke ngaya ngahlamba , ngase ngiyabona . ”
43009012	Bambuza bathi : “ Alo , uphi umuntu loyo na ? ” Waphendula wathi : “ Angazi . ”
43009013	Yeke umuntu ogade angaboni loyo , bamusa ebaFarisini .
43009014	Mhlana uJesu enza idaka amphophulula , bekungeSabatha .
43009015	AbaFarisi bambuza godu umuntu loyo bona waphophuluka njani . Wabatjela wathi : “ Waninda idaka emehlwenami ; ngahlamba ngase ngiyabona . ”
43009016	Abanye babaFarisi bathi : “ Umuntu loyo akaveli kuZimu ngombana akalilondi iSabatha . ” Kodwana abanye bathi : “ Kungenzeka njani isoni senze iimangaliso ezinje na ? ” Ngalokho kwaba nokuhlukana phakathi kwabo .
43009017	Ekugcineni bambuza obekaphophele , bathi : “ Alo-ke wena uthini ngaye njengombana avule amehlwakho nje ? ” Waphendula wathi : “ Umphorofidi . ”
43009018	AmaJuda akhange akholwe bona bekasiphofu manjesi selabona , kufikela babiza khona ababelethi bomuntu loyo .
43009019	Bababuza bathi : “ Yindodana yenu le na ? Nithi yabelethwa isiphofu ; nje-ke kwenzeke njani bonyana kwanjesi ibone na ? ”
43009020	Ababelethi bakhe baphendula bathi : “ Siyazi bona yindodana yethu , besiyazi bona yabelethwa isiphofu .
43009021	Kodwana bonyana kuze bunjani ikghone ukubona nokobana iphophululwe ngubani , thina asazi . Ibuzeni , ikhulile ingakghona ukuziphendulela ! ”
43009022	Ababelethi bayo batjho lokhu ngombana gade besaba amaJuda , ngebanga lokobana amaJuda besele enze isiqunto bona nanyana ngubani ovuma bona uJesu unguKrestu uzakurijwa ngesinagogini .
43009023	Kungebangelo ababelethi bayo bathi : “ Ikhulile , buzani yona . ”
43009024	Kwesibili godu bambiza umuntu owabelethwa asiphofu , bathi kuye : “ Funga phambi koZimu bona uzakhuluma iqiniso ! Siyazi thina bona umuntu lo sisoni . ”
43009025	Waphendula wathi : “ Ukuthi sisoni namkha akasiso , lokho angikwazi . Kunye engikwaziko kukobana bengisiphofu , manjesi sengiyabona . ”
43009026	Bambuza bathi : “ Ukwenzeni na ? Ukuphophulule njani na ? ”
43009027	Waphendula wathi : “ Senginitjelile , kodwana anifuni ukuzwa . Yini enifuna ukukuzwa godu na ? Nani nifuna ukuba bafundi bakhe na ? ”
43009028	Bamtemeleja ngamagama bathi : “ Nguwe omfundi womrhali loyo ! Thina sibafundi bakaMosi !
43009029	Siyazi bona uZimu wakhuluma noMosi , kodwana nakumrhali loyo , asazi bona uvelaphi ! ”
43009030	Umuntu loyo waphendula wathi : “ Lokho kuyinto erarako ! Abe anazi bona uvelaphi , nanyana kunjalo mina ungiphophulule !
43009031	Siyazi bona uZimu akazilaleli izoni kodwana ulalela loyo omlotjhako enze intando yakhe .
43009032	Kwakade azange khekuzwakale bona kukhona owakhe waphophulula obelethwe asiphofu .
43009033	Nakube umuntu lo bekangaveli kuZimu , bengekhe enza ilitho . ”
43009034	Bamphendula bathi : “ Wena watlujuzwa ngesonweni usabelethwa ; alo , ungalinga ukufundisa thina na ? ” Bamribha ngesinagogini .
43009035	UJesu wezwa bonyana umuntu loyo urijiwe , nje-ke kwathi nakamfumanako wathi : “ Uyakholwa eNdodaneni yoMuntu na ? ”
43009036	Umuntu loyo wathi : “ Nomzana , ingubani yona na ? Ngitjele khona ngizakukholwa kiyo ! ”

43009038	Wathi : “ Ngiyakholwa , Kosi ! ” Waguqa phambi koJesu .
43009039	UJesu wathi : “ Ngize ephasinapha ukuzokugweba kobana iimphofu zibone , kuthi labo ababonakho baphophale . ”
43009040	Abanye abaFarisi egade banaye lapho nabamuzwa atjho lokhu , bambuza bathi : “ Uthini ? Utjho bona nathi siphophele na ? ”
43009041	UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Nakube beniziimphofu , beningekhe nibe nomlandu wesono ; kodwana njengombana nithi niyabona , umlandu wenu uhlezi . ”
43010001	“ Kwamambala ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Umuntu ongangeni esibayeni sezimvu ngesango , kodwana ongena ngokweqa ngenye indlela , ulisela nomdlelezeli .
43010002	Umuntu ongena ngesango ngumelusi wezimvu .
43010003	Umlindisango uyamvulela isango nezimvu zakhe ziyalilalela ilizwi lakhe . Ubiza izimvu zakhe ngamabizo azirholele ngaphandle .
43010004	Nasele akhuphele zoke zakhe ngaphandle , ukhamba phambi kwazo , izimvu zakhe zimlandele ngombana ziyalazi ilizwi lakhe .
43010005	Kodwana angekhe zamlandela ezingamaziko ; kunalokho zizambalekela loyo ngombana azilazi ilizwi lotjhili . ”
43010006	UJesu wabatjela umfanekiso lo , kodwana azange bamlemuke bona bekathini kibo .
43010007	Yeke uJesu wathi godu : “ Kwamambala ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Ngilisango lezimvu .
43010008	Boke abafika ngaphambi kwami masela nabadlelezeli , ngalokho izimvu azange zabalalela .
43010009	Mina ngilisango . Ongena ngami uzakusinda ; uzakungena aphume afumane idlelo .
43010010	Isela liza kwaphela kobana lizokweba , libulale belirhayile . Mina ngize bona zibe nokuphila zibe nakho kuphuphume .
43010011	“ Mina ngingumelusi olungileko . Umelusi olungileko udela ukuphila kwakhe ngebanga lezimvu zakhe .
43010012	Oqatjhiweko akasuye umelusi omninizimvu . Uthi nakabona ipisi isiza , asukele izimvu abaleke . Yeke ipisi isahlela umhlambi iwuhlakaze .
43010013	Umuntu oqatjhiweko uyabaleka ngombana uqatjhiwe , begodu akanandaba nezimvu .
43010014	“ Mina ngingumelusi olungileko , ngiyazazi izimvu zami nazo ziyangazi ;
43010015	njengombana uBaba uyangazi , nami ngiyamazi uBaba ; ngidela ukuphila kwami ngebanga lezimvu .
43010016	Nginazo nezinye izimvu ezingasizo zesibayesi . Nazo kufanele ngizilethe . Nazo zizalizwa ilizwi lami , kube mhlambi owodwa nomelusi oyedwa .
43010017	“ UBaba uyangithanda ngombana nginikela ipilwami ukuze ngiyifumane godu .
43010018	Akakho namunye ongangimuka ipilwami . Ngiyinikela mina ngokuthanda kwami . Nginawo amandla wokuyinikela , nginawo amandla wokuyizuza godu . Umyalo lowo ngiwamukele kuBaba . ”
43010019	Ngamezwi lawo amaJuda ahlukana phakathi godu .
43010020	Abanengi bawo gade basithi : “ Unedimoni ! Uyahlanya ! Nimlalelelani na ? ”
43010021	Kodwana abanye bebasithi : “ Lawa akusiwo amezwi womuntu onedimoni . Idimoni lingaphophulula abaphopheleko na ? ”

43010023	uJesu wakhambakhamba ngemathurini kaSolomoni ngethempelini .

43010027	Izimvu zami zizwa ilizwi lami . Ngiyazazi , nazo ziyangilandela .
43010028	Ngizipha ipilo engapheliko , angekhe zabhubha . Akakho ongazihlwitha esandleni sami .
43010029	UBaba ongiphe zona mkhulu kunakho koke , akakho ongazihlwitha esandleni sakaBaba .
43010030	Mina noBaba simunye . ”
43010031	Godu amaJuda adobha amatje kobana amkhande .
43010032	UJesu wathi kiwo : “ Nginitjengise iimangaliso ezinengi nezikulu ezivela kuBaba . Alo , ezintwenezo ngiyiphi-ke into enifuna ukungikhandela yona na ? ”
43010033	Bamphendula bathi : “ Akusingebanga lento nayinye yalezi esenza sikukhande , kodwana kungebanga lokuhlambalaza ngombana umumuntu nje , nalapho uzenza uZimu ! ”
43010034	UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Kanti akukatlolwa emthethweni wekhenu ukuthi , ‘ Ngathi , nina nibozinyana . ’ na ?

43010038	Kodwana nangabe ngiyayenza , nanyana ningakholwa mina , okungasenani-ke kholwani izenzo , khona nizakwazi benizwisise bonyana uBaba ukimi nami ngikuye . ”
43010039	Godu balinga ukumbamba , kodwana waphunyuka ezandleni zabo .
43010040	Yeke uJesu wabuyela emuva ngaphetjheya kweJordani , endaweni lapha uJwanisi gade abhabhadisela khona , wahlala lapho .

43010042	Abanengi lapho bakholwa kuJesu .
43011001	Umuntu okuthiwa nguLazaru begade agula . Yena bekungeweBhethaniya , umuzi wekhabo lakaMariya nodadwabo uMarta .
43011002	UMariya ogade agulelwa ngumnakwabo lo , ngiloyo owathela iKosi ngamakha eenyaweni bewazisula ngeenhluthu zakhe .
43011003	Nje-ke abodadwabo bathumela ilizwi kuJesu bathi : “ Kosi , loyo omthandako uyagula . ”

43011005	UJesu bekathanda uMarta nodadwabo kanye noLazaru .

43011010	Kodwana okhamba ebusuku uyakhutjwa ngombana akanawo umkhanyo . ”

43013001	Bekungaphambi komnyanya wePhasika , uJesu asazi bona isikhathi sakhe sesifikile sokutjhiya iphaseli aye kuYise . Bekabathandile ekungebakhe abasephasinapha , wabathanda bekwaba sekupheleni .

43014001	“ Iinhliziyo zenu azingakhathazeki . Kholwani kuZimu , nikholwe nakimi .
