43016001	“ Lokho ngikukhulume kini ukuze ningakhubeki .
43016002	Nizakuqotjhwa ngemasinagogini , kodwana kuzakufika isikhathi lapha nanyana ngubani onibulalako azakudlumbana bona usebenzela uZimu .
43016003	Lokhu bazakwenza kini ngombana bangamazi uBaba nami .
43016004	Kodwana ngikhulume lokhu kini ukuze kuthi isikhathi sabo nasifikako , nikhumbule bona nganitjela izintwezi . “ Azange nginitjele lokhu ekuthomeni ngombana gade nginani .
43016005	Nje-ke kwanjesi ngiya kuye ongithumileko kodwana akakho noyedwa ongibuzako bona ngiyaphi .
43016006	Yeke njengombana sengikhulume izintwezi , iinhliziyo zenu zembethwe lisizi .
43016007	Kodwana nginitjela iqiniso nangithi kunilungele bonyana ngikhambe ; nangingakhambiko , uMsizi angekhe eza kini . Kodwana nangikhambako , ngizamthumela kini .
43016008	Begodu nakafikako yena , uzakwembulela iphasi mayelana nesono nokulunga nokugweba :
43016009	Mayelana nesono ngombana bangakholwa kimi ;
43016010	mayelana nokulunga ngombana ngiya kuBaba angekhe nisangibona ;
43016011	mayelana nokugweba ngombana umbusi wephaseli selagwetjiwe .
43016012	“ Ngisenokunengi engifuna ukunitjela khona , kodwana angekhe nikwazi ukukuthwala kwanjesi .
43016013	Kodwana kuzakuthi lokha uMoya weqiniso nasele afikile , uzanidosela kilo loke iqiniso ngombana akakazokukhuluma okungekwakhe , kodwana uzakukhuluma lokho akuzwako , anibikele nangalokho okuzako .
43016014	Uyongiphazimulisa ngombana uzokuthatha okwami anazise khona .
43016015	Koke uBaba anakho kungekwami , ngikho lokhu ngithe uzakuthatha kokwami anibekele khona . ”
43016016	“ Kuzakuba sikhatjhana ningangiboni ; kuthi isikhatjhana ningibone godu . ”
43016017	Abanye babafundi bakhe babuzana bathi : “ Utjho ukuthini nakathi , ‘ Kuzakuba sikhatjhana ningangiboni ; kuthi isikhatjhana ningibone godu ’ nokuthi , ‘ Ngombana ngiya kuBaba ’ na ? ”
43016018	Ngalokho bebabuza basithi : “ Kutjho ukuthini ukuthi isikhatjhana na ? Asazi thina bona ukhuluma ngani ! ”
43016019	UJesu bekasazi bona bafuna ukumbuza , yeke wathi kibo : “ Nibuzana bona ngitjho ukuthini nangithi , ‘ Kuzakuba sikhatjhana ningangiboni ; kuthi isikhatjhana ningibone godu ? ’
43016020	Kwamambala ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Nizakulila nibibitheke , kodwana iphasi lizakuthaba . Nina nizakuba lisizi kodwana isizi lenu lizakuphenduka ukuthaba .
43016021	Umfazi nasele atjhidele ukubeletha , uzwa iinhlungu ngombana isikhathi sakhe vane sesifikile ; kodwana umntwana nasele abelethiwe akasakhumbuli ubuhlungu ngombana sekubelethwe umntwana ephasini .
43016022	Kunjalo-ke nangani : Kwanjesi nilisizi , kodwana ngizakubuye nginibone godu , ihliziywenu ithabe ; nethabelo angekhe lathathwa mumuntu kini .
43016023	“ Mhlokho angekhe nabawa ilitho kimi . Kwamambala ngiqinisile ngithi kini : UBaba uzanipha nanyana yini enizayibawa ngebizo lami .
43016024	Kufikela njesi anikabawi ilitho ebizweni lami . Bawani nizakuphiwa khona kuzakuzala ithabo lenu . ”
43016025	“ Ngikhulume kini ngemifanekiso . Siyeza isikhathi lapha ngingasazukukhuluma ngemifanekiso , kodwana ngizakukhuluma ngoBaba kukhanye .
43016026	Mhlokho nizakubawa ebizweni lami , angitjho bona ngiyonibawela mina kuBaba .
43016027	Ngombana uBaba ngekwakhe uyanithanda ngombana nani ningithandile benakholwa bona ngivela kuZimu .
43016028	Ngavela kuBaba , ngeza ephasinapha ; kwanjesi ngitjhiya iphasi ngiya kuBaba . ”
43016029	Yeke abafundi bakhe bathi kuye : “ Kwanjesi sewukhuluma kuzwakale ingasi ngokufanekisa .
43016030	Siyazi kwanjesi bonyana wazi koke , awufuni omunye ongakubuza imibuzo . Lokhu kusenza sikholwe bona uvela kuZimu . ”
43016031	UJesu wabaphendula wathi : “ Niyakholwa kwanjesi na ?
43016032	Isikhathi siyeza , sebesilapha , lapha noke nje nizakurhatjheka khona , omunye nomunye aye kwakhe mina ngisale ngingedwa . Nokho angisingedwa ngombana uBaba unami .
43016033	Nginitjele izintwezi , khona nizakuba nokuthula kimi . Ephasinapha nizakuhlupheka , kodwana yibani nesibindi iphasi ngilahlulile ! ”
43017001	Kuthe bona uJesu aqede ukukhuluma lokhu , waqala phezulu ezulwini wathi : “ Baba , isikhathi sesifikile ; phazimulisa iNdodanakho khona iNdodana izakukuphazimulisa .
43017002	Uyinikele amandla phezu kwawo woke umuntu , khona izakunikela ukuphila okungapheliko kibo boke obaphe yona .
43017003	Ukuphila okungapheliko ngilokho bona bazi wena wedwa Zimu weqiniso nokwazi uJesu Krestu , omthumileko .
43017004	Ngikuphazimulisile ephasini ngokuqeda umsebenzi onginikele wona bona ngiwenze .
43017005	Kwanjesi Baba , ngiphazimulise phambi kwakho ngephazimulo egade nginayo kuwe iphasi lingakabi ukubakhona .
43017006	“ Ngilazisile ibizo lakho kilabo ongiphe bona ephasini . Bebavele bangebakho wangipha bona ; begodu balilondile ilizwi lakho .
43017007	Nje-ke bayazi bona koke ongiphe khona kuvela kuwe .
43017008	Ngibaphe umlayezo onginikele wona , bawamukela . Bayazi ngeqiniso bonyana ngivela kuwe , begodu bayakholwa bona ungithumile .
43017009	“ Ngiyabathandazela . Angithandazeli iphasi , kodwana labo ongiphe bona ngombana ngebakho .
43017010	Koke enginakho ngekwakho nokwakho koke ngekwami . Nje-ke iphazimulwami ibonakaliswe ngabo .
43017011	Kwanjesi angisesekho ephasini , kodwana bona basesephasini mina sengiza kuwe . Ngalokho Baba oCwengileko , balonde ebizweni lakho , iye , ibizo owangipha lona , khona bazakuba munye njengami nawe .
43017012	Lokha nangisesenabo ngibavikele bengabalonda ngebizo lakho owangipha lona . Akakho noyedwa wabo owalahlekako ngaphandle kwaloyo ebekufanele bona alahleke , khona kuzakuzaliseka imitlolo .
43017013	“ Kwanjesi sengisiza kuwe , kodwana ngikhuluma lokhu ngisesephasinapha khona bazakuba nethabo lami elipheleleko ngaphakathi kwabo .
43017014	Ngibanikele ilizwi lakho , iphasi labahloya ngombana abasese ngebephasi njengombana nami ngingasi ngewephasi .
43017015	Angikubawi bona ubasuse ephasinapha , kodwana bona ubavikele komumbi .
43017016	Abasingebephasi njengombana nami ngingasingewephasi .
43017017	Bacwengise ngeqiniso ; ilizwi lakho liliqiniso .
43017018	Njengombana ungithumele ephasini , nami ngibathumela ephasini .
43017019	Ngebanga labo ngiyazicwengisa , khona nabo bazakucwengiswa ngeqiniso .
43017020	“ Angithandazeli bona kwaphela , kodwana ngithandazela nalabo abazakukholwa kimi ngebanga lomlayezwabo ,
43017021	kobana boke njalo babe munye njengombana nawe Baba ukimi nami ngikuwe . Kwanga nabo bangaba kithi khona iphasi lizakukholwa bona ungithumile .
43017022	Ngibaphe iphazimulo owanginikela yona khona bazakuba munye njengombana simunye :
43017023	Mina ngikibo , wena ukimi . Nje-ke bazakuba munye ngokupheleleko ukuze iphasi lazi bona ungithumile begodu ubathandile njengombana ungithandile mina .
43017024	“ Baba , bengithanda bonyana labo ongiphe bona babe nami lapha ngikhona , khona bazakubona iphazimulwami . Iye , iphazimulo ongiphe yona ngombana wangithanda iphasi lingakabi ukubakhona .
43017025	Baba olungileko , iphasi akhange likwazi kodwana mina ngikwazile begodu laba bayazi bona ungithumile .
43017026	Ibizo lakho ngilazisile kibo , ngizasolo ngiraga ngokwenza njalo ukuze ithando onalo kimi libe nakibo nokobana nami ngibe kibo . ”
43018001	Ngemva kobana uJesu selathandazile , wakhamba nabafundi bakhe wayamela ngaphetjheya komlanjana iKedroni endaweni lapha bekunesimu khona . Yena nabafundi bakhe bangena kiyo .
43018002	UJudasi owamkhaphelako gade ayazi indawo leyo ngombana kanengi uJesu gade ahlanganela lapho nabafundi bakhe .
43018003	Yeke uJudasi weza esimini , akhamba namabutho wamajoni nezinye zeenkhulu zabaphristi abakhulu nabaFarisi . Bebahlomile baphethe iinhlothi ezivutako , iimbani neenkhali .
43018004	UJesu selasazi koke okuzokwenzeka kuye waphuma waya kibo wababuza wathi : “ Nifuna bani na ? ”
43018005	Bamphendula bathi : “ UJesu weNazaretha . ” UJesu wathi kibo : “ Nginguye . ” UJudasi owamkhaphelako gade ajame nabo lapho .
43018006	Lokha uJesu nasithi kibo , “ Nginguye ” babuyela sinyovana baduleka phasi .
43018007	UJesu wababuza godu wathi : “ Nifuna bani na ? ” Baphendula bathi : “ UJesu weNazaretha . ”
43018008	UJesu wabaphendula wathi : “ Senginitjelile bona nginguye , yeke nangabe nifuna mina , abanye laba abakhambe-ke . ”
43018009	Lokhu bekukuzaliseka kwelizwi alitjhwileko lokuthi : “ Angikalahlekelwa nangoyedwa kilabo ongiphe bona . ”
43018010	USimoni Pitrosi ogade anesabula , wayirhwatjhula wasusa indlebe yangesigomeni yekhoboka lomphristi omkhulu . Ibizo lekhobokelo bekunguMalirhusi .
43018011	Yeke uJesu wathi kuPitrosi : “ Buyisela isabulakho endawenayo ! Kanti angizuyisela ikapho engiyinikelwe nguBaba na ? ”
43018012	Yeke ibutho lamajoni neenduna zalo kanye neenkhulu zamaJuda babamba uJesu bambopha ;
43018013	bamusa qangi ku-Anasi ogade ongumkhwe kaKhayafasi obegade amphristi omkhulu umnyaka lowo .
43018014	Nguye uKhayafasi owaluleka amaJuda bonyana bekungaba ngcono kufe umuntu oyedwa afele boke abantu .
43018015	USimoni Pitrosi nomunye umfundi bebalandela uJesu . Ngebanga lokobana umfundi loyo gade aziwa mphristi omkhulu , wangena noJesu ngesirhodlweni somphristi omkhulu ,
43018016	uPitrosi yena wasala ngaphandle esangweni . Umfundi obegade asaziwa mphristi omkhulu loyo wabuyela ngaphandle , wakhuluma nomntazana omlindi esangweni , wangenisa uPitrosi .
43018017	Umntazana omlindisango loyo wathi kuPitrosi : “ Angithi nawe ungomunye wabafundi bomuntu loya na ? ” UPitrosi wamphendula wathi : “ Angisinguye . ”
43018018	Gade kumakhaza , yeke iinceku neenkhulu gade ziphembe umlilo ziwuragelele , zisotha . UPitrosi naye bekajame nabo , azothisa .
43018019	Umphristi omkhulu wabuza uJesu ngabafundi bakhe nangefundiso yakhe .
43018020	UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Ephasini bephele ngikhulume emtarini . Ngafundisa ngemasinagogini nangethempelini , lapha woke amaJuda ahlanganela khona . Azange khengitjho ilitho ngasese .
43018021	Alo-ke ubuzelani kimi na ? Buza labo abangizwileko , ngineqiniso bayazi engikutjhwileko . ”
43018022	Kuthe bona uJesu atjho lokhu , omunye weenkhulu wamwahla ngepama bewathi kuye : “ Leyo yindlela yokuphendula umphristi omkhulu na ? ”
43018023	UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Nangabe kukhona okumbi engikukhulumileko , veza ubufakazi balokho . Kodwana nangabe ngikhulume iqiniso , alo , ungibethelani na ? ”
43018024	Yeke u-Anasi wamthumela kumphristi omkhulu uKhayafasi , asoloko abotjhiwe njalo .
43018025	Kuthe uPitrosi asajame azothisa njalo , bambuza bathi : “ Awusingomunye wabafundi bomuntu loya na ? ” Yena walandula wathi : “ Awa , angisinguye . ”
43018026	Omunye weenceku zomphristi omkhulu , obekasihlobo somuntu uPitrosi amsusa indlebe , wambuza wathi : “ Azange khengikubone unaye esimini na ? ”
43018027	Godu uPitrosi wabuye walandula ; nje-ke khonokho umkukurumbu walila .
43018028	Nje-ke bakhupha uJesu kuKhayafasi bamusa esigodlweni sombusi wamaRoma . Bekusekuseni ngondi , kodwana bona akhange bangene esigodlwenapho ngombana bebafuna ukuhlala bahlanzekile , khona bazakukghona ukugoma iPhasika .
43018029	Yeke uPilatu waya kibo ngaphandle wababuza wathi : “ Umuntu lo nimthwesa umlandu bani na ? ”
43018030	Ipendulwabo yathi : “ Besingekhe samletha kuwe nakube azange enze umlandu . ”
43018031	UPilatu wathi kibo : “ Yeke nina ngokwenu mthatheni niyomgweba ngokomthetho wenu . ” AmaJuda aphendula athi : “ Asikavunyelwa ukubulala umuntu . ”
43018032	Lokhu kwenzeka ukuze kuzaliseke amezwi akhulunywa nguJesu lokha nabonisa indlela azokufa ngayo .
43018033	Nje-ke uPilatu wabuyela ngesigodlweni , wabiza uJesu wambuza wathi : “ Uyikosi yamaJuda na ? ”
43018034	UJesu wambuza wathi : “ Umbuzo lo uvela kuwe , namkha uzwe ngabanye abakutjele ngami na ? ”
43018035	UPilatu waphendula wathi : “ Udlumbana bona ngiliJuda na ? Angitjho babantu bekhenu nabaphristi abakhulu abakuthumele kimi . Wenzeni na ? ”
43018036	UJesu wathi : “ Umbuswami awusiwo wephaseli ; nangabe bewunjalo , iinceku zami gade zizokulwa zivimbele bona ngingabanjwa maJuda . Kodwana umbuswami akusiwo walapha . ”
43018037	UPilatu wambuza wathi : “ Alo-ke uyikosi na ? ” UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Utjho khona , ngiyikosi , kuhlekuhle ngabelethelwa lokho begodu kungalokho ngeza ephasinapha ukuze ngifakaze iqiniso . Ngabelethwa , ngeza ephasinapha ukuzokukhuluma ngeqiniso . Boke abaseqinisweni bayalilalela ilizwi lami . ”
43018038	UPilatu wambuza wathi : “ Alo-ke liyini iqiniso na ? ” Ngalokho uPilatu waphuma wabuyela kumaJuda wafese wathi : “ Angisifumani isizathu sokumthwesa umlandu .
43018039	Kodwana ngesiko eninalo , phele njalo nginithukululele isibotjhwa ngesikhathi sePhasika . Nifuna bona nginithukululele ikosi yamaJuda na ? ”
43018040	Bamphendula ngetjhada elikhulu bathi : “ Awa , ingasiyena ! Sifuna uBharabhasi ! ” UBharabhasi bekasigebengu .
43019001	Yeke uPilatu wathatha uJesu wayala bona abethwe .
43019002	Amajoni aluka isihlohlo sameva amthwesa sona ; amembesa iphuraphura ebubende .
43019003	Anande eza kuye athi : “ Ngwenyama , kosi yamaJuda ! ” Amwahla .
43019004	UPilatu waphuma godu waya emaJudeni wathi : “ Qalani , ngimkhuphela kini kobana nazi bonyana angisifumani isizathu sokumbeka umlandu . ”
43019005	Yeke uJesu waphuma , athwele isihlohlo sameva embethe nephuraphura ebubende . UPilatu wathi kibo : “ Nangu-ke umuntu loyo ! ”
43019006	Kwathi bona abaphristi abakhulu neenkhulu bambone , barhuwelela bathi : “ Mbethele ! Mbethele ! ” UPilatu wathi kibo : “ Mthatheni nina nimbethele ngombana mina angifumani umlandu kuye . ”
43019007	AmaJuda amphendula athi : “ Sinomthetho thina , nje-ke ngokuya ngomthetho lowo , kufanele afe ngombana uthe uyiNdodana kaZimu . ”
43019008	Kuthe lokha uPilatu nakezwa lokhu , kwaba kukhona esaba khulu .
43019009	Wabuyela godu ngesigodlweni , wabuza uJesu wathi : “ Ubuyaphi na ? ” Kodwana uJesu akhange amphendule .
43019010	UPilatu wathi kuye : “ Awufuni ukukhuluma nami na ? Awazi bona nginamandla wokukuthukulula newokukubethela na ? ”
43019011	UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Bewungekhe waba namandla kimi nangabe bewungakawaphiwa avela phezulu . Yeke loyo onginikele kuwe unomlandu wesono esikhulu . ”
43019012	Ukusukela lapha , uPilatu walinga ukufumana indlela yokuthukulula uJesu , kodwana amaJuda arhuwelela athi : “ Nawungamthukulula , kungatjho bona awusimngani wombusi omkhulu ! Loyo ozitjhaya sakosi , urarana nombusi omkhulu ! ”
43019013	Kuthe lokha uPilatu nakezwa amezwi la , wakhuphela uJesu ngaphandle , wahlala esihlalweni somgwebi endaweni okuthiwa yiGabatha ngesiHebheru .
43019014	Bekulilanga lokulungiselela iPhasika , kusemini ekulu , uPilatu wathi emaJudeni : “ Nasi ikosenu ! ”
43019015	Barhuwelela bathi : “ Msuse ! Msuse ! Mbethele esiphambanweni ! ” UPilatu wababuza wathi : “ Nifuna bona ngibethele ikosenu na ? ” Abaphristi baphendula bathi : “ Asinayo ikosi ngaphandle kombusi omkhulu ! ”
43019016	Yeke wamnikela kibo bona abethelwe . Bamthatha-ke uJesu bakhamba naye .
43019017	Waphuma azitjathele isiphambano sakhe , waya endaweni ekuthiwa yiKhakhayi , ( ebizwa ngesiHebheru bona yiGolgotha . )
43019018	Lapho-ke bambethela khona anamadoda amanye amabili , enye ngesigomeni enye ngesinceleni , aphahla uJesu .
43019019	UPilatu bekatlole isaziso , wasiphanyeka esiphambanweni . Sifundeka bunje : “ UJesu weNazaretha , ikosi yamaJuda . ”
43019020	AmaJuda amanengi asifunda isazisweso ngombana indawo lapha uJesu abethelwa khona beyingasikude nedorobho . Isaziso besitlolwe ngesiHebheru , ngesiLathini nangesiGirigi .
43019021	Abaphristi abakhulu bathi kuPilatu : “ Ungatloli uthi , ‘ Ikosi yamaJuda , ’ kodwana uthi , ‘ Uthe uyikosi yamaJuda . ’ ”
43019022	UPilatu waphendula wathi : “ Lokho engikutlolileko ngikutlolile . ”
43019023	Sele amajoni abethele uJesu , athatha izambatho zakhe azahlukanisa izabelo ezine , omunye nomunye waba nesabelo kwasala iphuraphura . Iphuraphura leyo beyinganamthungo kodwana beyelukiwe kusuka ehla ukuya enzasi .
43019024	Amajoni athi kelinye nelinye : “ Asingayidabuli , kodwana asiyenzeleni ifumbe sibone bona ngubani ezakuba ngeyakhe . ” Lokhu kwenzeka khona kuzazaliseka imitlolo ethi : “ Babelana iimpahla zami zokwembatha , benzelana ifumbe ngesambatho sami . ” Lokhu ngilokho amabutho akwenzileko .
43019025	Hlanu kwesiphambano sakaJesu bekujame unina nodadwabo lakanina , uMariya umkaKlopasi noMariya Magdalina .
43019026	Kwathi lokha uJesu nakabona unina nomfundi egade amthanda ajame hlanu komma loyo , wathi kunina : “ Mma , naso indodanakho ! ”
43019027	Godu wathi emfundini : “ Nango ummakho . ” Kusuka lapho umfundi loyo wamthatha wamusa emzinakhe .
43019028	Emva kwalokhu uJesu sele asazi bona koke sekuphethekile , nokobana kuzakuzaliseka umtlolo , wathi : “ Ngomile . ”
43019029	Bekukhona isitja lapho sizele isibharha , nje-ke batjheba umtjhofotjhofana ngakiso , bawuhlomela elithini lehisophi , balisa emlonyenakhe .
43019030	Kwathi bona uJesu amukele isibharha , wathi : “ Sekuphethekile ! ” Wakhothamisa ihloko , wafa .
43019031	Bekulilanga lokulungiselela begodu nelanga elilandelako bekuzokuba liSabatha elikhethekileko . Nje-ke ngebanga lokobana amaJuda bekangafuni bona iindumbu ziliselelwe esiphambanweni ngeSabatha , abawa uPilatu bona abavumele bephule imilenze yamadoda abethelweko , behlise neendumbu zabo .
43019032	Yeke amajoni eza , ephula imilenze yendoda yokuthoma neyesibili egade ibethelwe noJesu .
43019033	Kodwana kwathi lokha nafika kuJesu , amfumana sele afile . Yeke azange asaphula imilenzakhe .
43019034	Kunalokho omunye wamajoni wagwaza ihlangothi lakhe ngomkhonto , khonokho kwaphuma iingazi namanzi .
43019035	Loyo owabona lokhu kusenzeka ufakazile , nobufakazi bakhe buliqiniso , begodu uyazi bona ufakaza iqiniso .
43019036	Lokhu kwenzeka khona kuzakuzaliseka imitlolo ethi : “ Alikho nalinye ithambo lakhe elizakwephulwa . ”
43019037	Kukhona omunye umtlolo othi : “ Abantu bazamqala loyo abamgwazileko . ”
43019038	Ngemva kwalokho , uJosefa we-Arimathiya , ogade amlandeli kaJesu ngasese ngombana esaba amaJuda , wabawa isidumbu sakaJesu kuPilatu . UPilatu wamvumela , yeke uJosefa wakhamba wayokususa isidumbu .
43019039	Bekaphekelelwa nguNikhodemusi , umuntu owakhe weza azokubona uJesu ebusuku . UNikhodemusi lo , gade eze aphethe amakhilogramu amatjhumi amathathu weenthako zamakha wemire nomarobazibukhali .
43019040	Amadoda amabili la awuthatha umzimba kaJesu awuphuthela ngetjhila lelineni awuzesa ngamakha njengendlela yesiko lamaJuda lokungcwaba .
43019041	Endaweni lapho uJesu bekabethelwe khona esiphambanweni bekukhona isimu ; ngesiminapho bekukhona ithuna elitjha elingazange khelibulungele .
43019042	Njengombana bekulilanga lokuzilungiselela kwamaJuda mayelana neSabatha , nethuna liseduze , bathuna umzimba kaJesu lapho .
43020001	Ekuseni ngelanga lokuthoma leveke , kusesenzima ngondi , uMariya Magdalina waya ethuneni , wafumana ilitje ebelivale umnyango wethuna ligediwe .
43020002	Nje-ke wagijimela kuSimoni Pitrosi nemfundini ogade athandwa nguJesu , wafese wathi : “ IKosi bayithethe ngethuneni , asazi bona bayibekephi ! ”
43020003	Yeke uPitrosi nomfundi omunye baya ethuneni .
43020004	Bobabili njalo gade bagijima , kodwana umfundi lo watjhiya uPitrosi ngebelo wafika ethuneni maqangi .
43020005	Wahlola , wabona itjhila lelineni ebebamphuthele ngalo , akhange angene .
43020006	Nje-ke uSimoni Pitrosi obegade amlandela ngemuva wafika walunga poro ngethuneni . Wabona itjhila lelineni ebebamphuthele ngalo lilele lapho ,
43020007	netjhila ebebambophe ngalo ehloko , lilodwa eqadi lisongiwe .
43020008	Yeke umfundi lo , owafika ethuneni qangi , naye wangena ; wabona , wakholwa .
43020009	Bebasengakazwisisi imitlolo ethi kumele avuke kabafileko .
43020010	Yeke abafundabo babuyela emakhaya .
43020011	Kodwana uMariya bekajame ethuneni alila . Asalila njalo , wakhothama wahlola ngethuneni ;
43020012	qala wabona iingilozi ezimbili lapho zembethe okumhlophe , zihlezi lapho bekunomzimba kaJesu , enye ngehlokweni enye ngeenyaweni .
43020013	Zambuza zathi : “ Mma , ulilelani na ? ” Waphendula wathi : “ Bathethe iKosami , nje-ke angazi bona bayibekephi ! ”
43020014	Sekatjhwile lokho watjhuguluka waqala , wabona uJesu ajame lapho ; kodwana akhange azi bona nguJesu .
43020015	UJesu wambuza wathi : “ Mma , ulilelani na ? Ngubani omfunako na ? ” Wadlumbana bona mlimisimu , wathi kuye : “ Nangabe umthethe , Mnimzana , ngitjela lapha umuse khona ngizakuya ngiyomthatha . ”
43020016	UJesu wathi kuye : “ Mariya ! ” UMariya watjhidela kuye warhuwelela ngesiHebheru wathi : “ Rabuni ! ” ( okutjho bona “ mfundisi ” ) .
43020017	UJesu wathi : “ Ungangibambi ngombana angikayi kuBaba . Kodwana khamba uye kubazalwana bami ubatjele uthi , ‘ Ngibuyela kuBaba onguYihlo wenu noZimami onguZimenu . ’ ”
43020018	Yeke uMariya Magdalina wakhamba wayokutjela abafundi wathi : “ Ngiyibonile iKosi ! ” Watjho nokobana itheni kuye .
43020019	Kusihlwa ngelanga lokuthoma leveke , abafundi bandawonye neminyango ivaliwe ngokwesaba amaJuda , uJesu wafika wazokujama hlangana nabo , wathi : “ Ukuthula akube nani ! ”
43020020	Ngemva kobana atjho lokho , wabatjengisa izandla nehlangothi lakhe . Abafundi bathaba kwamambala lokha nababona iKosi .
43020021	Godu uJesu wathi kibo : “ Ukuthula akube nani ! Njengombana uBaba angithumile mina , nami ngiyanithuma nina . ”
43020022	Kwathi bona atjho lokho , wabaphefumulela wathi : “ Yamukelani uMoya oCwengileko .
43020023	Nanilibalela abantu izono zabo , zizakulitjalelwa ; naningabalibaleliko , azizukulitjalelwa . ”
43020024	Nje-ke uTomasi , obizwa bona nguDidimosi nongomunye wabafundi abalitjhumi nambili , bekangekho ebafundini lokha uJesu nafikako .
43020025	Yeke abafundi abanye bamtjela bathi : “ Siyibonile iKosi ! ” Kodwana uTomasi wathi kibo : “ Ngaphandle kobana ngibone amanceba weempikiri ezandleni zayo , ngifake umunwami lapha bekuneempikiri khona , nesandla sami ehlangothini layo , angeze ngakholwa . ”
43020026	Ngemva kweveke abafundi bebahlangane ngendlini godu , noTomasi anabo . Nanyana iminyango beyihluthulelwe , uJesu weza wajama hlangana nabo wathi : “ Ukuthula akube nani ! ”
43020027	Yeke wathi kuTomasi : “ Faka umunwakho lapha , qala izandla zami . Yelula isandla sakho usifake ehlangothini lami . Lisa ukuzaza , ukholwe . ”
43020028	UTomasi wamphendula wathi : “ Kosami , Zimami ! ”
43020029	UJesu wathi kuye : “ Ukholwa ngombana ungibona na ? Babusisiwe labo abathi bangakaboni nokho bakholwe . ”
43020030	UJesu wenza nezinye iimangaliso ezinengi phambi kwabafundi bakhe ezingakatlolwa encwadini le .
43020031	Kodwana lokhu kutloliwe khona nizakukholwa bona uJesu unguKrestu , iNdodana kaZimu , nokuthi ngokukholwa kuye nibe nokuphila .
43021001	Ngemva kwalokho , uJesu wazibonakalisa godu ebafundini bakhe elwandle leThibheriyasi . Wazibonakalisa ngendlela le :
43021002	USimoni Pitrosi , uTomasi obizwa bona nguDidumosi noNathaniyeli ovela eKana eseGalile , amadodana kaZebediya nabanye abafundi bebandawonye .
43021003	USimoni Pitrosi wathi kibo : “ Ngisayokuthiya iinhlambi . ” Baphendula bathi : “ Sizokukhamba nawe . ” Nje-ke bakhamba ngomkhumbi , kodwana ubusukobo akhange babambe ilitho .
43021004	Kuthe sekusile , uJesu wajama eligwini , kodwana abafundi azange balemuke bona nguJesu .
43021005	Yeke wababuza wathi : “ Bantwana bakwethu , anikabambi ilitho na ? ” Bamphendula bathi : “ Awa . ”
43021006	Wathi kibo : “ Phoselani inede yenu ngesigomeni somkhumbi nizakubamba . ” Yeke bayiphosela , babhalelwa kuyidosa ngebanga lobunengi beenhlambi .
43021007	Nje-ke umfundi ogade athandwa nguJesu wathi kuPitrosi : “ YiKosi ! ” Kwathi uPitrosi bona ezwe bonyana yiKosi , wambatha isambatho sakhe ngombana gade selahlubule , weqela ngemanzini .
43021008	Abanye abafundi beza ngomkhumbi , badosa inede ezele iinhlambi ngombana bebangasikude neligu , bekungaba mamitha amatjhumi alithoba .
43021009	Kwathi bona bafike eligwini , babona lapho umlilo wamalahle kukhona phezu kwawo ihlambi nesikwa .
43021010	UJesu wathi kibo : “ Lethani ezinye zeenhlambi enisanda ukuzibamba . ”
43021011	USimoni Pitrosi wakhwela wadosela inede eligwini izele iinhlambi ezikulu ebegade zilikhulu namatjhumi amahlanu nantathu sezizoke ; ngitjho nanyana gade zizinengi kangako , inede azange irathuke .
43021012	UJesu wathi kibo : “ Yizani nizokugoma . ” Akakho noyedwa wabafundi owakhe walokotha ukumbuza bona : “ Ungubani na ? ” Gade basazi bona yiKosi .
43021013	Yeke uJesu wabandamela kibo wafese wathatha isikwa wabanikela , wenza njalo godu nangeenhlambi .
43021014	Lokhu-ke gade sele ingekwesithathu uJesu azibonakalisa ebafundini bakhe ngemva kobana selavukile kabafileko .
43021015	Ngemva kobana sebadlile , uJesu wathi kuSimoni Pitrosi : “ Simoni msa kaJwanisi , mbala ungithanda ukudlula laba na ? ” Yena wathi : “ Iye , Kosi , uyazi bona ngiyakuthanda . ” UJesu wathi kuye : “ Yondla iimvana zami . ”
43021016	Godu uJesu wathi kuye : “ Simoni msa kaJwanisi , mbala uyangithanda na ? ” Waphendula wathi : “ Iye , Kosi , uyazi bona ngiyakuthanda . ” UJesu wathi kuye : “ Lusa izimvu zami . ”
43021017	Kwesithathu wathi kuye : “ Simoni msa kaJwanisi , uyangithanda na ? ” UPitrosi wadabuka ngombana uJesu wambuza kwesithathu asithi : “ Uyangithanda na ? ” Yeke wathi kuJesu : “ Kosi , wazi koke ; uyazi bona ngiyakuthanda ! ” UJesu wathi kuye : “ Yondla izimvu zami .
43021018	Kwamambala ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe : Nawusemutjha bephele ubhince uye nanyana kukuphi lapha uthanda khona . Kodwana nasele uluphele , uzakuthabulula izandla zakho omunye akwembese akuse lapha ungafuni ukuya khona . ”
43021019	Ngokutjho lokhu , uJesu bekatjengisa indlela uPitrosi azakufa ngayo alethe iphazimulo kuZimu . Yeke uJesu wathi kuye : “ Ngilandela ! ”
43021020	UPitrosi watjhuguluka wabona umfundi ogade athandwa nguJesu abalandela . Lo ngiloyo ebekazigudle ngoJesu ngephasika nowabuza wathi : “ Kosi , ngubani ozokuthengisa na ? ”
43021021	Kwathi bona uPitrosi ambone , wabuza wathi : “ Kosi , uthini ngaye na ? ”
43021022	UJesu wamphendula wathi : “ Nangifuna bona aphile kufikela mhlana ngibuyako , kukutshwenya ngani lokho na ? Wena ngilandela ! ”
43021023	Yeke iindaba zarhatjheka hlangana nabalandeli bakaJesu bona umfundi lo angekhe afa . Kodwana uJesu akhange atjho bona akazukufa , kwaphela wathi : “ Nangifuna bona aphile kufikela mhlana ngibuyako , kukutshwenya ngani lokho ? ”
43021024	Nguye umfundi lo owafakaza ngezintwezi , bewazitlola phasi ; begodu siyazi bona ubufakazi bakhe buliqiniso .
43021025	Zinengi ezinye izinto uJesu azenzako . Ngathana bezitlolwe ngazinye , ngitjho nephasi loke belingekhe lakghona ukulonda iincwadi ebezingatlolwa .
44001001	Indaba yokuthoma Theyofilusi , ngatlola ngazo zoke izinto uJesu athoma ukuzenza nokuzifundisa ,
44001002	kufikela mhlana enyuselwa ezulwini , emva kobana ayale ngoMoya oCwengileko abapostoli abakhethileko .
44001003	Wazibonakalisa kibo aphilile ngemva kokuhlupheka kwakhe , wabakhombisa ngeendlela ezinengi eziliqiniso bona uyaphila . Wabonakala kibo esikhathini esimalanga amatjhumi amane , akhuluma ngombuso kaZimu .

44001009	Emva kokutjho lokho , wenyuselwa ezulwini bamqalile ; ilifu lamsusa emehlwenabo .
44001010	Basasoloko baqhusululele amehlwabo phezulu , yena enyuka , khonokho kwabonakala kujame hlanu kwabo amadoda amabili embethe ezimhlophe ,

44002041	Labo abamukela umlayezwakhe , babhajadiswa . Mhlokho kwangezeleleka pheze iinkulungwana ezintathu zabantu .

44002047	adumisa uZimu begodu athatjelwa babantu boke . Nje-ke imihla ngemihla uSomnini wangezelela ebandleni labo abasindiswako .
44003001	Ngelinye ilanga uPitrosi noJwanisi baya ngethempelini kusikhathi sokuthandaza ngesimbi yesithathu malangantambama .
44003002	Khonapho kwalethwa indoda ebegade isirhole kwekubelethweni kwayo . Indoda leyo beyigugwa imihla ngemihla ibekwa esangweni lethempeli ebekuthiwa lisango uMuhle kobana izozibawela izipho ebantwini ebebangena ngethempelinapho .

44003011	Kuthe umuntu loyo asanamathele kuPitrosi noJwanisi njalo , boke abantu ngokurareka bagijimela kibo endaweni ebizwa bona lithuri lakaSolomoni .

44003013	UZimu ka-Abrahamu , ka-Isaka noJakopo , uZimu wabokhokho bethu , uphazimulise uJesu incekwakhe . Iye , loyo nina enamkhaphela bona abulawe , namlandula phambi koPilatu , ngitjho nanyana besele aqede ngokuthi uyamthukulula .
44003014	Nina nalandula oCwengileko noLungileko ngaphezu kwalokho nabawa bona nithukululelwe umbulali .
44003015	Nabulala umsunguli wepilo . Kodwana uZimu wamvusa kabafileko , ekuyinto esibofakazi bayo thina .
44003016	Ngokukholwa ebizweni lakhe , iye , ibizo lakhe ngokwalo , ngilo elenze umuntu lo waqina . Yena enimbonako nenimaziko lo ; ukukholwa okuza ngoJesu , kumnikele ukuphiliswa okupheleleko lokhu njengombana nani noke nibona .
44003017	“ Nje-ke bafowethu , ngiyazi bona nenza lokhu ngokungazi njengombana kwenza abaniphetheko .

44003021	okufanele izulu limamukele bekufike isikhathi lapha uZimu enza khona zoke izinto butjha , njengombana athembisa ekadeni ngabaphorofidi bakhe abacwengileko .

44003024	“ Mbala boke abaphorofidi kusukela kuSamyela nabalandelako , nabo boke abakhulumako , bamemezela ngamalanga wanamhlanjesi .
44003025	Nina niziinzukulwana zabaphorofidi nabesivumelwano uZimu asenza naboyihlo , njengombana wathi ku-Abrahamu , ‘ Zoke iinkoro zephasi zizakukhanukela ukubusiswa njengeenzukulwana zakho . ’
44003026	Yeke lokha uZimu avusa incekwakhe , wayithumela kokuthoma kini kobana inibusise ngokunitjhugulula eendleleni zenu zobukhohlakali . ”
44004001	Kuthe uPitrosi noJwanisi basakhuluma nabantu njalo , abaphristi nomphathi wabalindithempeli nabaSadusi beza kibo ,

44004003	Nje-ke bababamba babadlhunya ngesikhungweni kufikela ngakusasa ngombana gade sekuhlwile .
44004004	Kodwana abanengi abawuzwako umlayezo bakholwa ; inani lamadoda landa lafika pheze eenkulungwaneni ezihlanu .

44004010	akwazeke kini namhlanje nebantwini boke bakwa-Israyeli bona umuntu lo ujame phambi kwenwapha athabulukile aphilile ngamandla webizo lakaJesu Krestu weNazaretha , loyo enambethelako esiphambanweni , uZimu wamvusa kabafileko .
44004011	“ Yena lilitje eladelwa babakhi esele libe ngeliqakathekileko ejikeni .

44004017	Kodwana ukuze senze indaba le ingarhatjheki ukuya phambili ebantwini , asibakhalimeleni abantwaba bona bangasathomi godu bakhulume nanyana kubani ngebizweli . ”

44004031	Kuthe sebathandazile , indawo ebebahlanganele kiyo yadedemela . Boke bazaliswa ngoMoya oCwengileko bakhuluma ilizwi lakaZimu ngesibindi .

44004037	wathengisa indawakhe , waletha imali wafese wayibeka eenyaweni zabapostoli .
44005001	Indoda ibizo layo elingu-Ananiyasi nomkayo uSafira , yathengisa ingcenye yendawo ,
44005002	yagodla enye imali nomkayo anokwazi okupheleleko ngalokho . Yaletha yoke eseleko yafese yayibeka eenyaweni zabapostoli .
44005003	Nje-ke uPitrosi wathi kiyo : “ Ananiyasi , kuze njani bona uvumele uSathana azalise ihliziywakho kobana ukhulume amanga kuMoya oCwengileko , uzitjhiyele enye imali kileyo oyizuzileko ngendawo na ?
44005004	Kanti ungakayithengisi bekungasingeyakho na ? Nangemva kobana seyithengisiwe imali beyingekho kanti elawulwenakho na ? Alo-ke , kuyini ekwenze bona ucabange ukwenza into enje na ? Awukakhulumi amanga ebantwini kodwana kuZimu ! ”
44005005	Kuthe bona u-Ananiyasi ezwe lokho , waduleka phasi , wafa . Ukwesaba okukhulu kwehlela boke abezwe okwenzekileko .
44005006	Nje-ke amasokana angena , aphuthela umzimbakhe , amkhupha ayombulunga .

44005010	Khonokho waduleka phasi ngeenyaweni zakhe , wafa . Kuthe lokha amasokana nangenako amfumana afile , amthwala ayombulunga eqadi kwendodakhe .

44005016	Iinqubuthu zabantu zavela kiyo yoke imizi ezombeleze iJerusalema , zaletha abagulako nalabo egade banemimoya emimbi ; boke bapholiswa .

44005019	Kodwana phakathi kobusuku ingilozi kaSomnini yavula iminyango yesikhungo , yabakhuphela ngaphandle yathi kibo :

44006001	Kwathi lokha inani labafundi nalisiya lisanda , kwaba khona ukukhalala hlangana namaJuda akhuluma isiGirigi ngamaJuda akhuluma isiHebheru ngombana athi abahlolokazi bawo abatjhejwa ekwabelweni kwangamalanga .

44006005	Ilizwi leli lanelisa woke umphakathi . Yeke , bakhetha uStefani , indoda egade izele uMoya oCwengileko nokukholwa , uFlebhe , uProrhoro , uNikanori , uTimoni , uPharimenasi noNikolawu ovela e-Anthiyorhiya owatjhugululelwa ebuJudeni .

44007008	Yeke wenza naye isivumelwano sokusoka . Nje-ke u-Abrahamu waba nguyise ka-Isaka bewamsoka anamalanga abunane abelethiwe . U-Isaka yena wabeletha uJakopo , uJakopo waba ngubaba wabokhokho abalitjhumi nambili .

44007019	Yona yaphatha abantu bekhethu ngelunya , yakatelela abokhokho bona balahle amasana wabo ukuze angaphili .
44007020	UMosi wabelethwa ngesikhatheso , amntwana omuhle phambi kwakaZimu . Waba ngaphasi kwetjhejo lendlu kayise iinyanga ezintathu .

44007024	Wabona omunye aphethwe kumbi mGibhide , wavikela umuntu ophethwe kumbi loyo , wambuyiselela ngokubulala umGibhide .
44007025	Ngokwenza njalo wadlumbana bona abantu bekhabo bazakulemuka bonyana uZimu bekasebenzisa yena ekubathukululeni , kodwana akhange bakulemuke lokho .
44007026	Ngakusasa godu wabona ama-Israyeli amabili asilwa wodwa , walinga ukuwalamula ngokuthi athi , ‘ Madoda , nibomfo nina ; alo kubayini niphathane kumbi nje ? ’
44007027	Kodwana loyo ogade aphethe omunye kumbi wasunduza uMosi wathi , ‘ Ubekwe ngubani bonyana ube mbusi nomgwebi phezu kwethu ?
44007028	Kghani ucabanga ukungibulala nami njengomGibhide ombuleleko izolo ? ’
44007029	Kuthe bona uMosi ezwe lokho , wabalekela eMidiyana , lapho ahlala khona njengesikhonzi bewaba namadodana amabili .
44007030	“ Emva kweminyaka ematjhumi amane , kwabonakala ingilozi kuMosi iselangabini lomlilo esithukghwaneni esivuthako erhalawumbeni eduze nentaba yeSinayi .
44007031	Kwathi lokha nakabona lokhu , warareka ngakubonako . Asatjhidela bona aqale aseduze , wezwa ilizwi lakaSomnini lithi ,
44007032	‘ NginguZimu wabokhokho bakho , uZimu ka-Abrahamu , ka-Isaka noJakopo . ’ UMosi wadedemela ngevalo wabhalelwa nakuqala .
44007033	Nje-ke uSomnini wathi kuye , ‘ Hlubula amapatlagwanakho ngombana lapha ujame khonapho yindawo ecwengileko .
44007034	Ngambala ngibonile amatlhuwiso wabantu bami eGibhide . Ngisizwile isililo sabo ; ngalokho ngehlile kobana ngibasindise . Nje-ke yewuze , ngizokuthuma eGibhide . ’
44007035	“ Nguye kanye yena Mosi loyo ebamdela ngamezwi wokuthi , ‘ Ubekwe ngubani bonyana ube mbusi nomgwebi ? ’ Yena loyo bekathunyelwe nguZimu ngesandla sengilozi eyabonakala kuye esithukghwaneni bona abembusi nomsindisi .
44007036	Wabakhupha eGibhide , iye , wenza iimangaliso neembonakaliso eGibhide , elwandle lomGaba kanye nerhalawumbeni iminyaka ematjhumi amane .
44007037	Nguye uMosi loyo owatjela ama-Israyeli wathi , ‘ UZimu uzanivusela phakathi kwabafowenu umphorofidi onjengami . ’
44007038	Nguye loyo ogade asehlanganweni erhalawumbeni kanye nengilozi eyakhuluma kuye nakibokhokho bethu entabeni yeSinayi . Wamukela amezwi aphilako wakaZimu bona awadlulisele kithi .
44007039	“ Kodwana abokhokho bethu akhange bavume ukumlalela . Kunalokho bamkhaphela ngeqadi nangeenhliziyo zabo babuyela eGibhide
44007040	bebathi ku-Aroni , ‘ Sikima usenzele abozinyana abazasikhokhela ngombana nakhu uMosi okunguye owasikhupha enarheni yeGibhide asazi bonyana kwenzekeni ngaye . ’
44007041	Kwaba kulokha nabenza isithombe sekonyana , baletha imihlabelo kiso benama ngemisenzi yezandla zabo .
44007042	Kodwana uZimu wabafulathela , wabaliselela bona balotjhe umkhambathi womkayi njengombana kutloliwe encwadini yabaphorofidi ukuthi , ‘ Ngakhe nganiyala bonyana ningilethele imihlabelo neminikelo eminyakeni ematjhumi amane eniyihlezi erhalawumbeni , nina ndlu yakwa-Israyeli na ?
44007043	Niphakamise ithempedlana lakaMoleki nekwekwezi yakazinyanenu uRefani okumifanekiso yeenthombe enayenzako kobana niyilotjhe . Yeke ngizonithumela ekuthunjweni ngaphetjheya kweBhabheli . ’
44007044	“ Abokhokho bethu babanethaberinakeli lobufakazi hlangana nabo erhalawumbeni . Belenziwe njengombana uZimu gade akhombise uMosi , ngokuya ngomfanekiso awubonako .
44007045	Bangena nalo bakhamba noJotjhuwa lokha nabathumba inarha yezizwe uZimu aziqotjhako ngaphambi kwabo . Ithaberinakelelo laba senarheni leyo bekwaba sesikhathini sakaDavida ,
44007046	owamukela umusa ebusweni bakaZimu bewabawa bonyana akhele uZimu kaJakopo indlu .
44007047	Kodwana nguSolomoni owamakhela indlu .
44007048	“ Nokho uZimu ongoPhezulu akahlali ngendlini eyakhiwe babantu , njengombana umphorofidi asitjho ,
44007049	“ ‘ Izulu sihlalo sami sobukhosi , iphasi lisinabelo seenyawo zami . Alo , yikumba bani-ke enizangakhela yona , indawami yokuphumula ibe yini ?
44007050	Kanti akusisisandla sami esenze koke lokho na ? ’
44007051	“ Nina bontanyana , abaneenhliziyo neendlebe ezingakasokwa , ninjengaboyihlo ! Ngesikhathi soke nijamelana noMoya oCwengileko !
44007052	Nitjho bona ukhona umphorofidi abokhokho benu abangakhange khebamphathe kumbi na ? Angithi babulala ngitjho nalabo abamemezela ngokuza koLungileko . Nje-ke nina nimkhaphele benambulala .
44007053	Angitjho ngini enamukela umthetho owalethwa ngomyalo weengilozi , kodwana akhange kheniwulalele ? ”
44007054	Kuthe bona bezwe lokho bavutha ngelaka , bamgugudela amazinyo ngokubila .
44007055	Kodwana uStefani azele uMoya oCwengileko , waqala phezulu ezulwini wabona iphazimulo kaZimu noJesu ajame ngesigomeni sakaZimu .
44007056	Wathi : “ Qalani ! Ngibona izulu livuleka neNdodana yoMuntu ijame ngesigomeni sakaZimu ! ”
44007057	Ngalokho bavala iindlebe zabo bamemeza , batheleka boke .
44007058	Bamrhudulela ngaphandle kwedorobho , bathoma ukumkhanda ngamatje . Abofakazi babeka izambatho zabo eenyaweni zesokana elinguSawula .
44007059	Basamkhanda ngamatje njalo , uStefani wathandaza asithi : “ Kosi Jesu , yamukela ummoyami . ”
44007060	Waguqa phasi warhuwelela wathi : “ Kosi ! Ungabali isonwesi phezu kwabo . ” Sele atjhwile lokhu , walala ubuthongo besiphelani .
44008001	USawula wavumelana nabo ngokubulawa kwakaStefani . Khona mhlokho ibandla eJerusalema lathoma ukuzunywa . Boke bahlakazeka emazweni weJudiya neSamariya , kwasala abapostoli kwaphela .
44008002	Amadoda ebegade esaba uZimu ambulunga uStefani , abe amzilela ngokulila okukhulu .
44008003	Kodwana uSawula warhayila ibandla , akhamba angena indlu ngendlu arhurhubisa amadoda nabafazi , abadlhunya ngesikhungweni .
44008004	Labo ebegade bahlakazekile batjhumayela ilizwi lapha bakhamba khona .
44008005	UFlebhe wehlela edorobheni leSamariya watjhumayela khona uKrestu .
44008006	Iinqubuthu zabantu zalalelisisa uFlebhe ngahliziyonye ; iye , bezizwa begodu zibona iimbonakaliso azenzako .
44008007	Kabanengi imimoya emimbi beyiphuma ngokulila okukhulu , abafe ihlangothi nabaziinrhole bapholiswa .
44008008	Ngalokho kwaba khona ukuthaba okukhulu eSamariya .
44008009	Edorobheni lelo bekunendoda , ibizo layo elinguSimoni , okwathi eenkhathini warara amaSamariya ngemilingo ; wazikhuluma bona yena mkhulu .
44008010	Boke abantu , okutjho abaphezulu nabaphasi , bebamlalelisisa , barhuwelela basithi : “ Umuntu lo umamandla kaZimu , aziwa bona mamandla amakhulu . ”
44008011	Bamnamathela ngombana gade sele abarare isikhathi eside ngemilingo yakhe .
44008012	Kodwana kuthe nabakholwa umlayezo kaFlebhe ngeendaba ezimnandi zombuso kaZimu nebizo lakaJesu Krestu , kwabhajadiswa amadoda kanye nabafazi .
44008013	USimoni naye wakholwa bewabhajadiswa . Walandela uFlebhe kiyo yoke indawo , ararwa ziimbonakaliso neemangaliso ezikulu ebegade azibona .
44008014	Lokha abapostoli eJerusalema nabezwa bona abantu beSamariya sebalamukele ilizwi lakaZimu , bathumela uPitrosi noJwanisi kibo .
44008015	Kuthe bona bafike , bathandazela bona bamukele uMoya oCwengileko
44008016	ngombana uMoya oCwengileko bekangakehleli nakoyedwa wabo ; kodwana bebabhajadiswe kwaphela ebizweni leKosi uJesu .
44008017	Yeke uPitrosi noJwanisi bababeka izandla , bamukela uMoya oCwengileko .
44008018	Kuthe bona uSimoni abone bonyana uMoya bekamukelwa ngokubekwa bapostoli izandla , waletha imali ,
44008019	wathi : “ Nginikelani nami amandla la , khona kuzakuthi woke engimbeka izandla , amukele uMoya oCwengileko . ”
44008020	Kodwana uPitrosi wamphendula wathi : “ Kwanga ungabhubha nemadlanakho leyo ngombana ucabanga bona ungathenga isipho sakaZimu ngemali !
44008021	Awunangcenye namkha isabelo emsebenzini lo ngombana ihliziywakho ayikalungi phambi kwakaZimu .
44008022	Nje-ke phenduka ebukhohlakalini bakho uthandaze uZimu bona akulibalele . Mhlamunye uzakukulibalela emicabangweni enje yehliziyo
44008023	ngombana ngiyabona bonyana usenyongweni ebabako nemakhamandeleni wesono . ”
44008024	Nje-ke uSimoni waphendula wathi : “ Yeningithandazele kuZimu kobana koke enikutjhwileko kungangehleli . ”
44008025	Emva kobana banikele ubufakazi bebatjhumayela ilizwi leKosi , uPitrosi noJwanisi babuyela eJerusalema , bakhamba batjhumayela ivangeli emizaneni eminengi yeSamariya .
44008026	Nje-ke ingilozi kaZimu yathi kuFlebhe : “ Iya ngesewula endleleni enganabantu , eyehla ukusuka eJerusalema itjhinga eGaza . ”
44008027	Yeke uFlebhe wathoma ikhambo lakhe . Endleleni wahlangana nomphakulwa weTopiya obekasikhulu esiqakathekileko esiphethe amagugu wendlu yendlovukazi yeTopiya . Indoda le beyiye ukuyokulotjha eJerusalema .
44008028	Nje-ke sele ibuyela ekhaya , beyihlezi ekaranenayo ifunda incwadi yomphorofidi u-Isaya .
44008029	UMoya wathi kuFlebhe : “ Tjhidela ekaraneni leyo ukhambe nayo . ”
44008030	Mbala uFlebhe wagijimela ekaraneni , wezwa indoda leyo ifunda incwadi yomphorofidi u-Isaya , wabuza wathi : “ Uyakuzwa lokho okufundako na ? ”
44008031	Yona yathi : “ Ngingakuzwa njani , ngaphandle kobana kube khona ongihlathululelako na ? ” Nje-ke yabawa uFlebhe bona akhwele ahlale hlanu kwayo .
44008032	Indima yomtlolo egade ifundwa mphakulwa ngile : “ Njengemvu esiwa ekuhlatjweni nanjengemvana ethulileko phambi komrhunayo , ngaleyondlela azange ivule umlomayo .
44008033	Ekuthotjisweni kwayo yadinywa ubulungiswa . Ngubani ongahlathulula isizukulwana sayo ? Mbala , ipilwayo yasuswa ephasini . ”
44008034	Umphakulwa wabuza uFlebhe wathi : “ Akhese ungitjele , umphorofidi ukhuluma ngobani , uzitjho yena namkha omunye ? ”
44008035	UFlebhe wathoma ukukhuluma ngendimana le yemitlolo wamtjela ivangeli ngoJesu .
44008036	Basakhamba endleleni , bafika endaweni lapha bekunamanzi khona , umphakulwa wathi : “ Qala naka amanzi , ngingakhandelwa yini bona ngingabhajadiswa na ? ”
44008037	UFlebhe wathi kuye : “ Ungabhajadiswa nawukholwa ngehliziywakho yoke . ” Yena waphendula wathi : “ Ngiyakholwa bona uJesu Krestu yiNdodana kaZimu . ”
44008038	Umphakulwa wayala bonyana ikarana ijame . Nje-ke uFlebhe nomphakulwa behlela ngemanzini , uFlebhe wambhabhadisa .
44008039	Kuthe bona baphume ngemanzini , uMoya kaSomnini wahlutha uFlebhe . Umphakulwa akhange abe asambona godu ; yeke-ke waraga ngendlelakhe , athabile .
44008040	UFlebhe wazifunyana asele ase-Atjhidodi , waraga njalo atjhumayela ivangeli emizaneni yoke bewafika eKhesariya .
44009001	USawula waphikelela ngokusongela ukubulala abafundi bakaJesu , waya kumphristi omkhulu
44009002	wayokubawa iincwadi zokuya esinagogini eDamaseku , khona kuzakuthi nafumana nanyana ngubani weNdlela leyo kungaba madoda namkha abafazi , ababuyisele eJerusalema babotjhiwe .
44009003	Asakhamba njalo atjhidele eDamaseku , khonokho umkhanyo ovela ezulwini wabaneka kuye mahlangothi woke .
44009004	Waduleka phasi , wezwa ilizwi lisithi kuye : “ Sawula , Sawula , ungizumelani na ? ”
44009005	Wabuza wathi : “ Ungubani wena , Kosi , na ? ” Ilizwi lathi : “ NginguJesu ozumana naye .
44009006	Nje-ke vuka , uye ngedorobheni ; uzakutjelwa bona wenzeni . ”
44009007	Amadoda agade akhamba noSawula ajama lapho akakamele ; ezwa ilizwi kodwana akhange abone muntu .
44009008	USawula wasikima , kodwana kwathi nanyana amehlwakhe bekavulekile , akhange abone ilitho . Yeke bambamba ngesandla bamngenisa ngeDamaseku .
44009009	Amalanga amathathu bekangaboni , angagomi begodu angaseli ilitho .

44009013	Kodwana u-Ananiyasi waphendula wathi : “ Kosi , ngizwe imibiko eminengi ngendoda leyo , nangazo zoke izinto ezimbi ezenzileko ngabacwengileko bakho eJerusalema .
44009014	Yona yeza ngegunya labaphristi abakhulu bona ibophe boke abantu abathandaza ebizweni lakho . ”
44009015	Kodwana iKosi yathi kuye : “ Khamba ngombana nguye osisitja sami esikhethiweko sokuphatha ibizo lami ebantwini abatjhili , emakhosini nebantwini bakwa-Israyeli .
44009016	Begodu ngizamtjengisa bona kufuze ahlupheke kangangani ngebanga lebizo lami . ”
44009017	Yeke u-Ananiyasi waya endlini leyo wafese wangena kiyo . Wabeka uSawula izandla , wathi : “ Mfowethu Sawula , iKosi uJesu eyazibonakalisa kuwe usendleleni usiza lapha , ingithume kobana ubuye ubone bewuzaliswe ngoMoya oCwengileko . ”
44009018	Khonokho into enjengepepha yasuka emehlweni kaSawula , wabuye wabona godu . Wasikima , wabhajadiswa .
44009019	Kwathi selagomile , amandlakhe abuya . Wahlala amalangana ambalwa nabafundi eDamaseku .
44009020	Masinyana wathoma ukutjhumayela emasinagogini bona uJesu uyiNdodana kaZimu .
44009021	Boke abamzwako barareka bathi : “ Kanti lo akasiyo indoda eyabanga isiphithiphithi eJerusalema ngalabo abathandaza ebizweneli na ? Angithi ize lapha kobana izobabamba ibase ebaphristini abakhulu baziimbotjhwa ? ”
44009022	Ukuya ngokuya uSawula wakhula emandleni , wamangaza amaJuda ahlala eDamaseku ngokubonisa bona uJesu unguKrestu .
44009023	Ekukhambeni kwesikhathi , amaJuda abopha izungu lokumbulala .
44009024	USawula wabazi ubukhwebetjhana babo . Ubusuku nemini bamlalela emasangweni wedorobho kobana bambulale .
44009025	Kodwana abafundi bakhe bamthatha ngobusuku bamehlisa ngesiqwebu ngetjhuba elisemthangaleni .
44009026	Kwathi lokha nakabuyela eJerusalema walinga ukuzihlanganisa nabafundi , kodwana boke bamesaba bangakholwa bona mbala umfundi .
44009027	UBharinabhasi weza wamthatha wamusa ebapostolini . Wabahlathululela bona uSawula wayibona njani iKosi endleleni , nokobana iKosi yakhuluma njani naye . Wabatjela nokobana uSawula waba nesibindi esingangani ngokutjhumayela ngebizo lakaJesu eDamaseku .
44009028	Alo-ke , uSawula wahlala nabo wakhamba yoke indawo eJerusalema , akhuluma ngesibindi ebizweni leKosi .
44009029	Wakhuluma waphikisana namaJuda akhuluma isiGirigi , kodwana balinga ukumbulala .
44009030	Kuthe bona abazalwana bezwe ngalokhu , bamthatha bamehlisela eKhesariya bamthumela eTarsusi .
44009031	Yeke-ke ibandla laba nokuthula kilo loke iJudiya , iGalile neSamariya . Lakheka , landa ngokuqiniswa nguMoya oCwengileko , lakhamba ngokwesaba iKosi .
44009032	UPitrosi asakhamba kizo zoke iindawo , wathekela nabacwengileko ngeLida .
44009033	Lapho wahlangana nendoda engu-Ayeniya , egade ife ihlangothi iminyaka ebunane ilele ingakwazi ukuvuka phasi .

44009036	NgeJopa bekukhona umfundikazi , ibizo lakhe elinguThabitha , nakutjhugululwako ngesiGirigi kutjho uDorkasi . Gade azinikele ukwenza okulungileko asiza nabadududu .
