44009038	IJopa gade ingasikude neLida ; nje-ke kuthe bona abafundi bezwe bonyana uPitrosi ungeLida , bathumela kuye amadoda amabili nomlayezo othi : “ Siyakuncenga yewuze msinyana kithi . ”
44009039	UPitrosi wasikima wakhamba nabo . Nafikako , bamusa ngelawini elingehla . Boke abahlolokazi bamzomba , balila bamkhombisa izambatho neempahla ezinye uDorkasi azithunga asaphila nabo .
44009040	UPitrosi wabakhuphela boke ngaphandle kwelawu ; nje-ke waguqa phasi wathandaza , waphendukela ngesidunjini wathi : “ Thabitha , vuka ! ” Wavula amehlo wakhe wabona uPitrosi , wathabuluka wahlala .
44009041	UPitrosi wamsiza ngokumsikimisa , wabiza abacwengileko nabahlolokazi wabanikela yena sele aphila .
44009042	Lokhu kwazeka kiyo yoke iJopa , abanengi bakholwa eKosini .
44009043	UPitrosi wahlala ngeJopa amalanga amanengi nomtjhukiinkhumba uSimoni .
44010001	EKhesariya bekukhona indoda , ibizo layo linguKorneliyasi umphathimabutho ebekuthiwa mabutho weTariyana .
44010002	Yena nomndenakhe bekubabantu abesaba uZimu nabazinikeleko kuye . Gade abela abadududu , ahlala njalo athandaza uZimu .
44010003	Kwathi langelinye ngesimbi yesithathu malangantambama waba nombono . Ngokucacileko wabona ingilozi kaZimu ifika kuye isithi : “ Korneliyasi ! ”
44010004	Yena wayiqala ngokuyesaba , wabuza wathi : “ Kosi , kwenze njani ? ” Ingilozi yaphendula yathi : “ Imithandazwakho nokwabela kwakho abadududu kwenyukele kuZimu njengesikhumbuzo .
44010005	Nje-ke , thumela amadoda eJopa ayokubiza uSimoni ekuthiwa nguPitrosi .
44010006	Yena uhlala kwaSimoni umtjhukiinkhumba onendlu hlanu kwelwandle . ”
44010007	Kwathi lokha ingilozi egade ikhuluma naye nasele ikhambile , uKorneliyasi wabiza iinsebenzi zakhe ezimbili nejoni elesaba uZimu egade limelusa .
44010008	Wabatjela koke ekwenzekileko bewabathuma eJopa .
44010009	Ngakusasa basesesendleleni , sele batjhidele edorobheni , uPitrosi wenyukela phezu kwephahla lekumba wayokuthandaza kusemini ekulu .
44010010	Walamba bewakhanuka kobana angadla . Nje-ke kwathi ukudla kusalungiswa waba semmoyeni .
44010011	Wabona izulu livuleka , kwaba nento eyehlako injengetjhila elikhulu lehliselwa phasi ngeentsutsungu zalo zozine .
44010012	Ngaphakathi kwalo bekukhona imihlobohlobo yazo zoke iimbandana ezineenyawo ezine , iimphili ezikhakhabako neenyoni zomkayi .
44010013	Nje-ke ilizwi lathi kuye : “ Pitrosi , vuka , uhlabe , ugome ! ”
44010014	Kodwana uPitrosi wathi : “ Awa , Kosi ngombana azange khengigome okusilapheleko namkha okungakahlambuluki . ”
44010015	Ilizwi lakhuluma naye godu , lathi : “ Lokho uZimu akuhlambululileko ungakubizi bona kusilaphele . ”
44010016	Lokho kwenzeka amahlandla amathathu , yeke itjhilelo lathathwa khonokho labuyiselwa ezulwini .
44010017	UPitrosi asararekile bona umbono utjho ukuthini , amadoda athunywe nguKorneliyasi sele afunyene indlu kaSimoni bona ikuphi , ajama esangweni layo .
44010018	Arhuwelela , abuza bona kungabe ukhona umyeni lapha , ibizo lakhe elinguSimoni Pitrosi na ?
44010019	Kuthe uPitrosi asazindla ngombono lowo , uMoya oCwengileko wathi kuye : “ Qala , kunamadoda amathathu afuna ukukubona !
44010020	Sikima , wehle uye kiwo ! Ungazazi ukukhamba nawo ngombana athunyelwe ngimi . ”
44010021	Yeke uPitrosi wehla waya kiwo , wafika wathi : “ Nginguye enimfunako . Alo , nize ngani ? ”
44010022	Aphendula athi : “ Umphathimabutho , uKorneliyasi usithumile . Uyindoda eqotho eyesaba uZimu begodu ukhulunywa kuhle esizweni soke samaJuda . Uyalwe yingilozi ecwengileko bona akumemele emzinakhe ukuze ezwe bonyana umphathele ndaba bani . ”
44010023	UPitrosi wawabawa bona angene ngendlini ; wahlala nawo ubusukobo . Ngakusasa wakhamba nawo ; nabanye abazalwana beJopa bakhamba naye .
44010024	Ngelanga elilandelako wafika eKhesariya , lapha uKorneliyasi gade abalindele khona begodu gade ameme iinhlobo nabangani bakhe abakhulu .
44010025	UPitrosi asangena endlini , uKorneliyasi wamhlangabeza wahloma ihloko phasi eenyaweni zakhe ngokumhlonipha .
44010026	Kodwana uPitrosi wamphakamisa wathi kuye : “ Sikima , nami ngimumuntu nje . ”
44010027	Asakhuluma naye njalo , wangena ngendlini , wafumana kuhlangene abantu abanengi .
44010028	Wathi kibo : “ Nani ngokwenu niyazi bona kuphambene nomthetho wethu kobana umJuda ahlanganyele namkha athekele wesinye isizwe . Kodwana uZimu ungibonisile bona ngingathi umuntu othileko usilaphele namkha akakahlambuluki .
44010029	Nje-ke kungalokho kuthe nangibizwako ngeza ngaphandle kokuzaza . Alo-ke , ngingabuza bona kubayini ningibizile na ? ”
44010030	UKorneliyasi waphendula wathi : “ Amalanga amane adlulileko , bengithandaza ngingendlinami ngesikhathesi , ngesimbi yesithathu malangantambama : Khonokho kwajama phambi kwami indoda yembethe izambatho eziphazimako .
44010031	Yathi kimi , ‘ Korneliyasi ! UZimu uwuzwile umthandazwakho bewakhumbula nokwabela kwakho izipho kwabadududu .
44010032	Nje-ke , thumela eJopa , uyokubiza uSimoni ekuthiwa nguPitrosi . Yena umyeni emzini kaSimoni umtjhukiinkhumba , ohlala hlanu kwelwandle . ’
44010033	Yeke ngathumela bona bayokubiza msinyana ; wenze kuhle wafika . Soke sesilapha phambi koZimu , sesilindele ukuzwa koke uZimu akuyale bona usitjele khona . ”
44010034	UPitrosi wathoma ukukhuluma , wathi : “ Sekuyangikhanyela bona uZimu akakhethi ubuso .
44010035	Kodwana omesabako enze okulungileko nanyana angewasiphi isizwe uyamukeleka kuye .
44010036	Niyawazi umlayezo uZimu awuthumela ebantwini bakwa-Israyeli , akhuluma ivangeli lokuthula eliza ngoJesu Krestu oyiKosi yabo boke .
44010037	Niyakwazi bona kwenzekeni kilo loke iJudiya , kusukela eGalile ngemva kombhabhadiso owatjhunyayelwa nguJwanisi ;
44010038	kobana uZimu wajamisa uJesu weNazaretha ngoMoya oCwengileko namandla , wakhamba yoke indawo enza okuhle , apholisa boke egade bangaphasi kwamandla kaSathana ngombana uZimu gade anaye .
44010039	Sibofakazi bakho koke akwenzileko elizweni lamaJuda neJerusalema . Bambulala ngokumphanyeka esiphambanweni ,
44010040	kodwana uZimu wamvusa kabafileko ngelanga lesithathu , wenza bona abonwe ,
44010041	ingasingibo boke abantu , kodwana abonwe ngithi uZimu asikhetha njengabofakazi . Iye , thina esadla besasela naye emva kokuvuka kwakhe kabafileko .
44010042	Wasiyala bona sitjhumayele ebantwini besifakaze bona nguye uZimu amkhethileko bona abe mgwebi wabaphilako nabafileko .
44010043	Boke abaphorofidi bafakaza ngaye bona woke okholwa kuye wamukeliswa ukulitjalelwa kwezono ngebizo lakhe . ”
44010044	Kwathi uPitrosi asakhuluma amezwi la , uMoya oCwengileko wehlela phezu kwabo boke egade balalele umlayezo .
44010045	Amakholwa asokiweko nebegade eze noPitrosi , arareka khulu ngombana isipho sakaMoya oCwengileko besithelwe naphezu kwabatjhili .
44010046	Babezwa bakhuluma ngeenlimi ezitjhili badumisa uZimu . Nje-ke uPitrosi wathi :
44010047	“ Ukhona ongakhandela bona abantwaba babhajadiswe ngamanzi na ? Nabo bamukele uMoya oCwengileko njengathi . ”
44010048	Yeke wathi ababhajadiswe ebizweni lakaJesu Krestu . Bambawa bona ahlale nabo amalangana .
44011001	Abapostoli nabazalwana kilo loke iJudiya bezwa bona nabatjhili sebamukele ilizwi lakaZimu .
44011002	Nje-ke kwathi bona uPitrosi aye eJerusalema , labo ebegade bafuna ukusoka abatjhili bamsola ,
44011003	bathi : “ Wena uye emzini wabatjhili abangakasoki , wagoma nabo ! ”
44011004	UPitrosi wathoma ukubahlathululela koke njengombana kwenzekile , wathi :
44011005	“ Bengithandaza , ngisedorobheni leJopa , khonapho ngehlelwa siyezi ngabona umbono . Ngabona into efana netjhila isehliselwa phasi ngeentsutsungu zayo ezine ivela ezulwini ; yehlela lapha ngikhona .
44011006	Ngaqalisisa ngaphakathi kwayo , ngabona iinlwana zephasi ezineenyawo ezine , iimbandana , iimphili ezikhakhabako neenyoni zomkayi .
44011007	Ngezwa ilizwi lithi kimi , ‘ Pitrosi , vuka , uhlabe , ugome ! ’
44011008	Kodwana ngaphendula ngathi , ‘ Awa Kosi , akunalitho elisilapheleko namkha elingakahlambuluki elakhe langena ngemlonyenami . ’
44011009	Ilizwi elivela ezulwini lakhuluma kwesibili lathi , ‘ Lokho uZimu akuhlambululileko , ungakubizi bona kungokusilapheleko . ’
44011010	Lokho kwenzeka amahlandla amathathu , nje-ke koke kwabuyiselwa ezulwini godu .
44011011	Khonokho amadoda amathathu agade avela eKhesariya athunywe kimi , afikela ngendlini ebengihlala kiyo .
44011012	UMoya oCwengileko wangitjela bona ngikhambe nawo ngaphandle kokuzaza . Abazalwana abasithandathu laba bakhamba nami nje-ke soke sangena ngendlini yendoda leyo .
44011013	Yona yasitjela bona yabona njani ingilozi egade ijame endlinayo isithi , ‘ Thumela umuntu eJopa ayokubiza uSimoni okuthiwa nguPitrosi .
44011014	Uzokulethela umlayezo ozakusindisa wena nomndenakho woke . ’
44011015	Kwathi ngisathoma ukukhuluma , uMoya oCwengileko wehlela phezu kwabo , njengombana wehlela phezu kwethu ekuthomeni .
44011016	Alo-ke ngakhumbula lokho iKosi eyakutjhoko nayithi , ‘ UJwanisi wabhabhadisa ngamanzi , kodwana nina nizakubhajadiswa ngoMoya oCwengileko . ’
44011017	Nje-ke , nakube uZimu wabapha isipho njengombana apha thina esakholwa kuJesu Krestu ; alo-ke , bengingubani mina bona bengingaliya uZimu ? ”
44011018	Kwathi bona bezwe lokho , balisa ukusola , badumisa uZimu basithi : “ Yeke uZimu selabaphile abatjhili ithuba lokutjhugulukela ekuphileni ! ”
44011019	Labo abahlakazeka ngebanga lokuhlutjhwa okwathoma ngemva kokufa kwakaStefani , bafika ngitjho eFunisiya , eSayipurasi ne-Anthiyorhiya , barhatjha umlayezo emaJudeni kwaphela .
44011020	Kodwana phakathi kwawo bekumadoda avela eSayipurasi neSirene , wona aya e-Anthiyorhiya ayokhuluma ilizwi nemaGirigini awatjela ivangeli ngeKosi uJesu .
44011021	Amandla weKosi gade anamadoda lawo nenani elikhulu labantu lakholwa latjhugulukela eKosini .
44011022	Iindaba ngalokho zafika eendlebeni zebandla eJerusalema , yeke bathumela uBharinabhasi e-Anthiyorhiya .
44011023	Kwathi lokha nakafikako abona umusa kaZimu , wathaba kwamambala bewabakhuthaza boke bonyana bathembeke eKosini ngokudzimelela ngeenhliziyo zabo zoke .
44011024	Bekuyindoda elungileko , izele uMoya oCwengileko nokukholwa ; abantu abanengi bazinikela eKosini .
44011025	Yeke uBharinabhasi waya eTarsusi ukuyokufuna uSawula .
44011026	Kwathi bona amfunyane , wamusa e-Anthiyorhiya . Nje-ke umnyaka woke bahlanganyela nebandla bafundisa abantu abanengi . Kwaba se-Anthiyorhiya lapha abafundi babizwa khona kokuthoma bona maKrestu .
44011027	Ngesikhatheso kwehla abanye babaphorofidi basuka eJerusalema baya e-Anthiyorhiya .
44011028	Omunye wabo okuthiwa ngu-Agabhusi , wasikima wathukula ngoMoya oCwengileko bona kuzakuba khona indlala ekulu kilo loke iphasi . Kwamambala yaba khona ngesikhathi sokubusa kombusi omkhulu uKlawudiyusi .
44011029	Abafundi omunye nomunye ngokukghona kwakhe waqunta ukusiza abazalwana abahlala eJudiya .
44011030	Lokho bakwenza ngokuthumela izipho zabo ebaphathini ngoBharinabhasi noSawula .
44012001	Ngesikhatheso uHerode ikosi wabamba amanye amalunga webandla kobana awahlukumeze .
44012002	Wabulala uJakopo , umnakwabo kaJwanisi , ngesabula .
44012003	Nakabona bonyana lokhu kuwakarile amaJuda , waraga wabopha noPitrosi . Lokho kwenzeka ngesikhathi somnyanya wesiKwa esinganaNgumelo .
44012004	Ngemva kokumbopha wamdlhunya ngesikhungweni , wamnikela ngaphasi kweenqhema ezine , sisinye sinamajoni amane ; bekaneqhinga lokumkhuphela phambi kwabantu emva kwePhasika .
44012005	Yeke uPitrosi wagcinwa ngesikhungweni , kodwana ibandla lamthandazela ngesineke kuZimu .
44012006	Kuthe khona ngabo ubusukobo phambi kobana uHerode akhuphele uPitrosi phambi kwabantu , uPitrosi bekalele hlangana namajoni amabili , abotjhwe ngeenketani ezimbili , begodu kukhona nabalindisango ababili emsebenzini .
44012007	Khonokho kwabonakala ingilozi yeKosi bekwaba khona ukukhanya ngaphakathi kwesikhungo . Yapasula uPitrosi ehlangothini , yamvusa yathi : “ Vuka ! Yenza msinyana ! ” Khonokho iinketani zakhithika ezandleni zakaPitrosi .
44012008	Nje-ke ingilozi yathi kuye : “ Thekeleza ufake amapatlagwanakho . ” UPitrosi wenza njalo . Ingilozi yathi kuye godu : “ Yembatha isambatho sakho ungilandele . ”
44012009	UPitrosi wayilandela , baphuma ngesikhungweni . Kodwana akhange azi bona ingilozi leyo ekwenzako gade ingikho na ; wadlumbana bona gade abona umbono .
44012010	Badlula esiqhemini sabalindi bokuthoma nabesesibili bebafika esangweni lesimbi elivulekela ngedorobheni . Isango lazivulekela ngokwalo , baphuma . Sebadlule indledlana yaba yinye , khonapho ingilozi yamtjhiya uPitrosi .
44012011	Yeke uPitrosi sele asangulukile wathi : “ Kwanje ngiyazi bona ngambala uZimu uthumele ingilozakhe kobana ingisindise emandleni kaHerode nakizo zoke izinto amaJuda agade alindele bona zizokwenzeka . ”
44012012	Sekumkhanyele lokho , waya emzini wakaMariya , unina lakaJwanisi godu okuthiwa nguMarkosi , lapha bekuhlangene khona abantu abanengi bathandaza .
44012013	UPitrosi wakokoda emnyango wangaphandle , incekukazi uRoda weza azokuhlola bona ngubani .
44012014	Kuthe lokha nakalemukako bona lilizwi lakaPitrosi , wathaba kwamambala bewagijima wabuyela emuva angakavuli , warhuwelela wathi , “ UPitrosi ujame ngaphandle emnyango ! ”
44012015	Bona bathi : “ Uyarhapha ! ” Kodwana nalokhu aphikelele bona liqiniso , bathi : “ Yingilozakhe . ”
44012016	UPitrosi waphikelela akokoda . Kuthe bona bavule umnyango bambone , barareka kwamambala .
44012017	Watjengisa ngesandla bona bathule , nje-ke wabahlathululela bona iKosi imkhuphe njani ngesikhungweni , bewathi : “ Tjelani uJakopo nabazalwana ngalokhu . ” Wakhamba waya kenye indawo .
44012018	Ngakusasa , kwaba khona ukuphithizela hlangana namajoni afuna ukwazi bonyana kwenzekeni ngoPitrosi .
44012019	Emva kobana uHerode akhuphe umlayezo bona afunwe kodwana angafunyaneki , waphenyisisa abalindi bewayala bona babulawe . Emva kwalokho uHerode wasuka eJudiya waya eKhesariya , wahlala lapho isikhatjhana .
44012020	UHerode wasilingeka khulu ngabantu beTirosi neTsidoni ; bona baya kuye basiqubutjhwana ukuyombona . Sele bazuze uBhulastusi obegade ayinceku ethembekileko yekosi bona abe ngakibo , babawa ukuthula ngombana inarha yekhabo beyifumana ukudla okuvela enarheni yekosi uHerode .
44012021	Ngelanga elibekiweko uHerode wembatha isambatho sakhe sobukhosi wahlala esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi , wethula ikulumo ebantwini .
44012022	Barhuwelela bathi : “ Akusimumuntu okhulumako , kodwana nguzimu ! ”
44012023	Msinyazana ngebanga lokobana uHerode angakhange adumise uZimu , ingilozi kaSomnini yamdula phasi , bewadliwa ziimpethu , wafa .
44012024	Kodwana ilizwi lakaZimu laragela phambi ngokwanda nokwenaba .
44012025	UBharinabhasi noSawula baqeda ikhambo labo , babuyela eJerusalema , bathatha noJwanisi okuthiwa nguMarkosi .
44013001	Ebandleni elise-Anthiyorhiya bekukhona abaphorofidi nabafundisi okutjho uBharinabhasi , uSimiyoni okuthiwa nguNigeri , uLukiyusi weSirene , uManayeni , owakhula noHerode umtetrarerhesi noSawula .
44013002	Kuthe basadumisa iKosi bazilile , uMoya oCwengileko wathi : “ Ngahlukaniselani uBharinabhasi banoSawula kobana baye emsebenzini engibabizele wona . ”
44013003	Emva kobana bazile ukudla bathandaza , bababeka izandla .
44013004	UBharinabhasi noSawula , bathunywa nguMoya oCwengileko baya eSelukiya , bathaya kusuka lapho basiya eSayipurasi .
44013005	Kuthe bona bafike eSalamisi , batjhumayela ilizwi lakaZimu ngesinagogini lamaJuda . UJwanisi bekanabo azobasiza .
44013006	Bakhamba badabula soke isihlengele bebafika ePhafosi . Lapha-ke bahlangana nomJuda ongusomlingo nomphorofidi wamanga okuthiwa nguBhari-Jesu .
44013007	Yena bekazihlanganise nombusi wesihlengeleni , uSerigiyusi Powula , obekayindoda ehlakaniphileko . Umbusi loyo wabiza uBharinabhasi noSawula ngombana bekafuna ukuzwa ilizwi lakaZimu .
44013008	Kodwana u-Elimasi , ibizo lakhe ngesiGirigi elitjho bona ngusomlingo , walinga ukuphambukisa umbusi ekukholweni .
44013009	Yeke uSawula ogade aziwa bona nguPowula , azele uMoya oCwengileko ; waqala usomlingo eenhlonzeni wathi :
44013010	“ Wena ndodana kaSathana ! Usisitha sayo yoke into elungileko . Uzele yoke imihlobo yamano amambi , ulinga njalo ukuphendula iqiniso leKosi ulenze amanga !
44013011	Isandla sakaZimu sizokwehlela phezu kwakho khona nje ; uzakuba siphofu , awuzukubona umkhanyo welanga isikhathi esithileko . ” Khonokho wembeswa yikungu nobumnyama , wakhamba aphumbutha afuna umuntu ongamdosa ngesandla .
44013012	Kuthe lokha umbusi nakabona okwenzekileko wakholwa begodu bekararwe ngilokho akufunde ngeKosi .
44013013	UPowula nabalandeli bakhe bathaya kusukela ePhafosi ukuya ePherge ngePhamfiliya , lapha uJwanisi Markosi abatjhiya khona wabuyela emva eJerusalema .
44013014	Kusukela ePherge bakhamba bafika e-Anthiyorhiya esePhisidiya . NgeSabatha baya ngesinagogini bahlala phasi .
44013015	Emva kokufunda umthetho kaMosi nemitlolo yabaphorofidi , abaphathi besinagogi baphosa ilizwi ngakibo bathi : “ Bafowethu , nakube kukhona umlayezo wokukhuthaza ebantwini , sibawa nikhulume . ”
44013016	UPowula wasikima waphakamisa isandla wathi : “ Ma-Israyeli nani bakosozizwe enesabe uZimu , ngilalelani !
44013017	UZimu wabantu bakwa-Israyeli laba wakhetha abokhokho bethu , bewabenza isizwe esikhulu ngesikhathi basahlezi njengeenkhonzi eGibhide . Nje-ke wabakhupha enarheni leyo ngamandla amakhulu .
44013018	Wababekezelela baserhalawumbeni iminyaka ematjhumi amane .
44013019	Warhayila izizwe ezilikhomba enarheni yeKanana , wanikela inarha leyo abantu bakhe bona ibe lilifa labo .
44013020	Koke lokho kwathatha pheze iminyaka emakhulu amane namatjhumi amahlanu . “ Emva kwalokho wabanikela abagwebi kufikela ngesikhathi somphorofidi uSamyela .
44013021	Nje-ke abantu babawa ikosi , uZimu wabanikela uSawula umsa kaKhitjhi , wekoro yakwaBhenjamini , owabusa iminyaka ematjhumi amane .
44013022	“ Emva kokususa uSawula , uZimu wabeka uDavida bona abe yikosabo bewafakaza ngaye wathi , ‘ Ngifunyene uDavida indodana kaJese , umuntu wehliziywami , uzakwenza koke engifuna bona akwenze . ’
44013023	Esizukulwaneni sakhe uZimu wavusela u-Israyeli uMsindisi uJesu njengombana athembisa .
44013024	“ Kodwana ngaphambi kokuza kwakaJesu , uJwanisi watjhumayela ukuphenduka nombhabhadiso kibo boke bakwa-Israyeli .
44013025	Ekuphetheni kwakhe umsebenzi , uJwanisi wathi ebantwini : ‘ Nicabanga bona ngingubani na ? Angisinguye enimlindileko . Kodwana qalani , uyeza ngemva kwami , loyo engingakafaneli ukutjhaphulula amapatlagwanakhe . ’
44013026	“ Nje-ke bafowethu , nzukulwana zaka-Abrahamu nani enesaba uZimu , umlayezo wesindiso lo uthunyelwe kithi .
44013027	Abantu beJerusalema nabarholi babo akhange bamazi uJesu ; nje-ke ngokumlahla bazalisa amezwi wabaphorofidi afundwa njalo ngeSabatha .
44013028	Nanyana bangazange bafunyane isizathu sokumgwebela ukufa , babawa uPilatu bona abulawe .
44013029	“ Sele benze koke ebekutlolwe ngaye , bamphanyula esiphambanweni bambulunga ngelibeni .
44013030	Kodwana uZimu wamvusa kabafileko .
44013031	Amalanga amanengi wabonwa ngilabo agade akhamba nabo kusukela eGalile ukuya eJerusalema . Labo-ke ngibo esele babe bofakazi ebantwini bekhethu .
44013032	“ Thina sinitjela ivangeli : Lokho uZimu akuthembisa abokhokho bethu ,
44013033	ukuzalisile kithi , thina nzukulwana zabo ngokuvusa uJesu , njengombana kutloliwe eRhubeni lesibili bona , “ ‘ Wena uyiNdodanami ; namhlanje ngiyakuvuselela . ’
44013034	“ Indaba yokuthi wamvusa kabafileko kobana angabuyi abole , kukhulunywe emezwini la , ‘ Ngizaninikela iimbusiso ezicwengileko zamambala engazithembisa uDavida . ’
44013035	“ Njengombana asitjho kenye indimana asithi , ‘ Angekhe uvumele othembekileko wakho abone ithuna . ’
44013036	“ Emva kokobana uDavida aqede ukukhonza esizukulwaneni sakhe ngokwehloso kaZimu , walala ; wabulungwa kiboyisemkhulu , wabola .
44013037	Kodwana loyo uZimu amvusa kabafileko akhange abone ukubola .
44013038	“ Ngalokho bafowethu , ngithanda nazi bona kungebanga lakaJesu ukuthethelelwa kwezono kumenyezelwa kini .
44013039	Ngaye woke okholwako ulungisiswa kikho koke egade ningekhe nalungisiswa ngakho ngomthetho kaMosi .
44013040	Nje-ke yelelani , bona lokho abaphorofidi abakutjhwileko kungenzeki kini .
44013041	Bathi , “ ‘ Qalani nina nyefuli ndina , nizitjhejisise nikakamale benikhungatheke ngombana kunento engizayenza emihleni yenu ; eningazukuyikholwa nanyana sele niyitjelwa . ’ ”
44013042	Kuthe uPowula noBharinabhasi basaphuma ngesinagogini , abantu babawa bona baragele phambili ngeendabezi ngeSabatha elilandelako .
44013043	Nje-ke kwathi bona ikonzo iphume , amaJuda amanengi nalabo abesaba uZimu abatjhugulukele ebuJudeni balandela uPowula noBharinabhasi . Labo-ke bakhuthazwa ngokuragela phambili emseni kaZimu .
44013044	NgeSabatha elilandelako , pheze woke umuntu edorobheni weza ukuzokulalela ilizwi leKosi .
44013045	Kwathi bona amaJuda abone isiqubuthu esikhulu azala umona abe anyefula lokho uPowula agade akutjhoko .
44013046	Nje-ke uPowula noBharinabhasi bawaphendula ngesibindi bathi : “ Bekufanele bona ilizwi lakaZimu litjhunyayelwe kini qangi . Kodwana njengombana nililahlile benazibona ningakafaneli ipilo engapheliko , yelelani , sesiphendukela kabatjhili
44013047	ngombana nakhu uSomnini asiyale ngakho , “ ‘ Ngikubeka bona ube mkhanyo ezizweni ukuze ulethe isindiso emikhawulweni yephasi . ’ ”
44013048	Kuthe abatjhili bona bezwe lokhu , bathaba tle , badumisa ilizwi leKosi . Boke labo abakhethe ukuphila okungapheliko baba makholwa .
44013049	Ilizwi leKosi lenaba kizo zoke iimfunda .
44013050	Kodwana amaJuda atjitjizela abafazi abesaba uZimu nabanesithunzi kanye namadoda aziinkhulu edorobheni kobana badunge uPowula noBharinabhasi , babaqotjhe esifundeni sabo .
44013051	Nje-ke bona babahloboka abantu balapho bathintitha iinyawo zabo , bakhamba baya e-Ikhoniyo .
44013052	Abafundi nge-Anthiyorhiya bebazele uMoya oCwengileko , bathabile .
44014001	E-Ikhoniyo , uPowula noBharinabhasi baya ngesinagogini lamaJuda njengokuvamileko . Lapho bakhuluma kangangobana inani elikhulu lamaJuda nabatjhili lakholwa .
44014002	Kodwana amaJuda lawo agade ala ukukholwa ahlohlozela abatjhili abenza babe nehliziyo embi ebazalwaneni .
44014003	Nokho uPowula noBharinabhasi bahlala lapho isikhathi eside , bakhuluma ngesibindi ngeKosi , eyafakazela ilizwi lomusa wayo ngokubanikela amandla wokwenza iimbonakaliso neemangaliso .
44014004	Abantu bedorobho lelo bebahlukene kabili ; abanye banyula amaJuda , abanye banyula abapostoli .
44014005	Kwathi lokha abatjhili , amaJuda kanye nabarholi bakhona nabasongela ukubalimaza nokubakhanda ngamatje ,
44014006	bakulemuka lokho , yeke babalekela emadorobheni weLikhawoniya okuyiListra neDerbe neendaweni eziseduze .
44014007	Lapho baragela phambili nokutjhumayela ivangeli .
44014008	Bekukhona indoda ehlala eListra iinyawo zayo bezirholophele , isirhole kwekubelethweni kwayo ingazange ikhe ikhambe .
44014009	Yona beyisoloko ilalele uPowula nakakhulumako . Nje-ke uPowula wayiqala poro , wayibona bona iyakholwa bonyana ingaphuluka .
44014010	Wathi ngelizwi elikhulu : “ Sikima , ujame thwi ngeenyawo zakho ! ” Indoda yeqa , yathoma ukukhambakhamba .
44014011	Kwathi bona isiqubuthu sibone bonyana uPowula wenzeni , sathoma ukurhuwelela ngelimi lesiLikhawoniya sathi : “ Abozimu bafane nabantu behlela kithi ! ”
44014012	Bathiya uBharinabhasi ibizo bona nguZewusi uPowula bathi nguHerimesi ngombana nguye ogade asikhulumi .
44014013	Umphristi kasingazimu uZewusi , ogade anethempeli ngaphandle kwedorobho , waletha iinkunzi namakhwa esangweni ledorobho . Yena nesiqubuthu bebafuna ukwenzela abapostoli imihlabelo .
44014014	Kodwana kuthe bona abapostoli , uBharinabhasi noPowula , bezwe ngalokho , badabula izambatho zabo bagijimela hlangana nesiqubuthu barhuwelela ,
44014015	bathi : “ Madoda ! Nikwenzelani lokhu na ? Nathi sibabantu njengani nje ! Silapha ukuzokutjhumayela ivangeli , ukunitjhugulula ezintwenezi ezililize , nitjhugulukele kuZimu ophilako , owadala izulu nephasi nelwandle nakho koke okukilo .
44014016	Esikhathini esadlulako wavumela zoke izizwe bona zikhambe ngeendlela zazo .
44014017	Kodwana akhange aliselele bona kungabi nobufakazi ngezinto ezihle azenzako : Waninisela izulu elivela ezulwini wanipha nesikhathi esinomnotho somnyaka nenala yokudla bewazalisa iinhliziyo zenu ngokwenama . ”
44014018	Ngitjho nangawo amezwi la abapostoli babhalelwa ukusola isiqubuthu bona singabenzeli umhlabelo .
44014019	Nje-ke kuthe amanye amaJuda avela e-Anthiyorhiya ne-Ikhoniyo nasele athumbele isiqubuthu esikhulu ngakiwo , akhanda uPowula ngamatje , amrhurhubisela ngaphandle kwedorobho , adlumbana bona ufile .
44014020	Kodwana kuthe bona abafundi bamzombe , wavuka wabuyela emva edorobheni . Ngelanga elilandelako yena noBharinabhasi baya eDerbe .
44014021	UPowula noBharinabhasi batjhumayela ivangeli ngeDerbe , bazuza abafundi abanengi . Nje-ke babuyela eListra , e-Ikhoniyo ne-Anthiyorhiya ,
44014022	baqinisa bebakhuthaza abafundi bona baragele phambili ngokukholwa , bathi : “ Kufuze sidlule ebunzimeni obunengi ngaphambi kobana singene embusweni kaZimu . ”
44014023	Kelinye nelinye ibandla bazikhethela abaphathi ; ngomthandazo nokuzila babanikela kuZimu , ogade babeke ithemba labo kuye .
44014024	Sele badabule iPhisidiya , bafika ePhamfiliya ;
44014025	kwathi sele batjhumayele ilizwi ePherge , behlela e-Athaliya .
44014026	Ukusuka lapho bathayela emuva e-Anthiyorhiya , lapha bebanikelwe khona emseni kaZimu ngomsebenzi esebawuqedileko .
44014027	Nabafika e-Anthiyorhiya , babuthelela ibandla ndawonye balibikela koke uZimu akwenzileko ngabo , nokuthi wavula njani indlela bona abatjhili bakholwe .
44014028	Bahlala lapho isikhathi eside nabafundi .
44015001	Kwehla abathileko bavela eJudiya , bafundisa abazalwana , bathi : “ Ngaphandle kobana nisokwe njengombana umthetho kaMosi usitjho , angekhe nasindiswa . ”
44015002	Kwaba khona ukuphambana nokuphikisana phakathi kwabo noPowula banoBharinabhasi . Nje-ke kwaquntwa bona uPowula noBharinabhasi nabanye abafundi baye eJerusalema bayokubonana nabapostoli nabaphathi ngendaba le .
44015003	Ibandla labathumela bona bakhambe , nje-ke basadabula iFunisiya neSamariya , babika bona abatjhili batjhugulukele njani kuZimu . Iindabezi zaletha ithabo elikhulu ebazalwaneni boke .
44015004	Kuthe bona bafike eJerusalema , bamukelwa libandla , abapostoli nabaphathi . Bababikela koke uZimu akwenzileko ngabo .
44015005	Kodwana amanye amakholwa ebegade asesiqhemeni sabaFarisi , asikima athi : “ Abatjhili kufanele basokwe bebatjelwe bona bahloniphe umthetho kaMosi . ”
44015006	Abapostoli nabaphathi bahlangana ukuhlolisisa indaba le .
44015007	Emva kokuphikisana isikhathi eside , uPitrosi wasikima wathi : “ Bafowethu , niyazi kusukela kade bona uZimu wangikhetha hlangana nani ukutjhumayela umlayezo wevangeli kabatjhili ngomlomami , khona bazakuzwa bebakholwe .
44015008	UZimu owazi ihliziyo , wabonisa bona nabo uyabamukela ngokubanikela uMoya oCwengileko njengombana enza kithi .
44015009	Akhange akhe enze umehluko hlangana nathi nabo , wahlambulula iinhliziyo zabo ngokukholwa .
44015010	Alo-ke kungani nifuna ukulinga uZimu ngokuthwesa abafundi umthwalo esingakghoni ukuwuthwala thina namkha abokhokho bethu na ?
44015011	Nje-ke thina siyakholwa bona kungomusa weKosethu uJesu kobana sisindiswe ; nabo ngokunjalo . ”
44015012	Isiqubuthu soke sathula du salalela uBharinabhasi noPowula ebebasibikela ngeembonakaliso nangeemangaliso uZimu azenzileko ngabo hlangana nabatjhili .
44015013	Kuthe bona baqede ukukhuluma , uJakopo wathi ; “ Bafowethu , ngilalelani !
44015014	USimoni usihlathululele bona ekuthomeni uZimu bekanetjisakalo kangangani ngokuthatha kabatjhili isizwe esibizwa ngebizo lakhe .
44015015	Amezwi wabaphorofidi avumelana poro nalokhu , njengombana kutloliwe kwathiwa ,
44015016	“ ‘ Mhlokho ngizakuvuselela itende lakaDavida eliwileko . Ngilungise iindawo zalo ezonakeleko , ngibuyisele isithunzi salo , ngilakhe libe njengombana gade linjalo phambilini
44015017	ukuze imisalela yabantu ifune uSomnini ngitjho nabo boke abatjhili ababizwa ngebizo lami . Kutjho uSomnini , owenza izintwezi
44015018	ebezazeka ekadeni . ’
44015019	“ Ngalokho kumkhumbulwami bona singabakhathazi abatjhili abatjhugulukela kuZimu .
44015020	Endaweni yalokhu , asibatloleleni incwadi sibatjele bona batjhide emanyaleni weenthombe , batjhide ebungwadleni , bangadli isilwana esikghanyiweko kanye nobubende
44015021	ngombana eenkhathini zaphambilini umthetho kaMosi utjhunyayelwe kiwo woke amadorobho begodu bewafundwa ngemasinagogini woke amaSabatha . ”
44015022	Yeke abapostoli nabaphathi kanye nebandla loke , baqunta ukukhetha amadoda athileko , bawathume e-Anthiyorhiya noPowula noBharinabhasi . Bakhetha uJudasi , okuthiwa nguBharisabhasi noSilasi okumadoda amabili agade abarholi hlangana nabazalwana .
44015023	Bathumela ngabo incwadi elandelako ethi :
44015024	Sizwile bona amanye amadoda wangekhethu asuka lapha ngaphandle kokulayelwa ngithi afese aniwurubaja abe ahlukumeza umkhumbulwenu ngamezwi .
44015025	Yeke sizwene soke bonyana sikhethe iinthunywa sizithumele kini kanye nabangani bethu esibathandako , uBharinabhasi noPowula ,
44015026	amadoda adele ubuphilo bawo ngebanga lebizo leKosethu uJesu Krestu .
44015027	Yeke , sithumela uJudasi noSilasi , abazakufakaza esikutlolileko ngomlomo .
44015028	Nje-ke kubonakele kukuhle kuMoya oCwengileko nakithi kobana singanidisibezi ngalitho ngaphandle kwalokhu okufaneleko , kokuthi :
44015029	Tjhidani ekudleni okuhlatjelwe iinthombe , ekudleni ububende nokukghanyiweko , nitjhide nebungwadleni . Naningenzi izintwenzi , nizabe nenza kuhle . Salani kuhle .
44015030	Sebalayelisiwe , bakhamba , behlela e-Anthiyorhiya lapha babuthelela ndawonye ibandla balinikela incwadi .
44015031	Mbala abantu bayifunda incwadi , bathokoza ngomlayezo okhuthazako .
44015032	UJudasi noSilasi nabo egade babaphorofidi , bakhuluma okunengi okukhuthazako nokuqinisa abazalwana .
44015033	Emva kokuhlala isikhatjhana lapho , abazalwana babaphekelela ngesibusiso sokuthula . Nje-ke babuyela kilabo egade babathumile .
44015034	Kodwana uSilasi wacabanga ukuhlala lapho .
44015035	UPowula noBharinabhasi basala e-Anthiyorhiya , bafundisa batjhumayela ilizwi leKosi bakanye nabanye abanengi .
44015036	Ngemva kwamalanga athileko uPowula wathi kuBharinabhasi : “ Asibuyele emuva sithekele abazalwana kiyo yoke imizi lapha sakhe satjhumayela khona ilizwi leKosi , besibone nokuthi baraga njani . ”
44015037	UBharinabhasi bekafuna kukhanjwe noJwanisi okuthiwa nguMarkosi ,
44015038	kodwana uPowula wabona kungasikuhle bona bakhambe naye ngombana wabahlubuka basePhamfiliya , wangasaragela phambili nokusebenza nabo .
44015039	Kwavuka ukuphikisana phakathi kwabo , bebahlukana . UBharinabhasi wathatha uMarkosi bathaya baya eSayipurasi ,
44015040	kodwana uPowula sele anikelwe bazalwana emseni weKosi , wakhetha uSilasi wakhamba .
44015041	Wadlula eSiriya neSilisiya , aqinisa amabandla .
44016001	UPowula wafika eDerbe neListra , lapha bekuhlala khona umfundi ekuthiwa nguThimothi ; unina amJuda okholiweko , kodwana uyise amGirigi .
44016002	Abazalwana beListra ne-Ikhoniyo bebambuka .
44016003	UPowula bekafuna ukuthatha uThimothi akhambe naye , yeke wamsokisa ngebanga lamaJuda ahlala endaweni leyo ngombana boke bebasazi bona uyise liGirigi .
44016004	Lokha nabalokhu bakhamba umuzi nomuzi bebanande bakhuluma bona kufuze kulondwe iimphetho ezathathwa bapostoli nabaphathi eJerusalema .
44016005	Yeke amabandla aqiniswa ekukholweni akhula malanga woke .
44016006	UPowula noThimothi badabula isifunda seFrigiya neGalatiya , ngombana uMoya oCwengileko wabakhandela ukutjhumayela e-Asiya .
44016007	Kuthe bona bafike emkhawulweni weMusiya , balinga ukuya endaweni yeBhithiniya , kodwana nalapho uMoya wakaJesu akhange abavumele .
44016008	Alo-ke bakhamba badabula eMusiya behlela eTrowasi .
44016009	Phakathi kobusuku uPowula waba nombono wendoda yeMasedoniya egade ijamile imncenga ithi : “ Akhese uze eMasedoniya hle , uzosisiza ! ”
44016010	Kuthe bona uPowula abone umbono lo , sazilungiselela msinyana ukuya eMasedoniya , sikholwa bona uZimu usibizele ukuyokutjhumayela ivangeli kibo .
44016011	Sasuka eTrowasi ngomkhumbi sathayela poro eSamothirake , ngelanga elilandelako saya eNeyapoli .
44016012	Kusuka lapho saya eFilipi okulidorobho eliqakathekileko esifundeneso seMasedoniya eliphasi kombuso weRoma . Sahlala amalangana edorobheneli .
44016013	Ngelanga leSabatha saphumela ngaphandle kwesango ledorobho saya ngemlanjeni , lapha besilindele ukufunyana khona indawo yokuthandaza . Sahlala phasi sakhuluma nabafazi egade bahlangene lapho .
44016014	Omunye wabagade balalele bekungumma obizwa bona nguLidiya , amthengisi wezambatho ezibubende edorobheni leThiyathira . Gade alotjha uZimu ; nje uZimu wavula ihliziywakhe bona ilalelisise lokho uPowula akutjhoko .
44016015	Kuthe bona yena nomndenakhe babhajadiswe , wasimemela endlinakhe wathi : “ Naningithatha njengomuntu okholwa yiKosi , yizani nizokuhlala kwami . ” Yeke wasitomatomela bona sihlale .
44016016	Langelinye nasiya endaweni yokuthandaza , sahlangatjezwa likhobokakazi ebelinommoya wobungoma . Belenzela abaninilo imali enengi ngokubhula kwalo .
44016017	Lalandela uPowula nathi , lirhuwelela lithi : “ Amadoda la aziinsebenzi zakaZimu ongoPhezulu ; banibikela indlela yokusindiswa ! ”
44016018	Lakwenza lokhu amalanga amanengi , kufikela lapho uPowula wabe wanyenya khona waphendukela kilo , wathi emmoyeni : “ Ebizweni lakaJesu Krestu ngiyakuyala bona uphume kuye ! ” Khonokho ummoya wobungoma waphuma kuye .
44016019	Kuthe bona abaninilo babone bona ithuba lokwenza imali ngalo alisekho , babamba uPowula noSilasi babadosela etatawini kobana baqalane nabomthetho .
44016020	Babaletha phambi kwabagwebi bathi : “ Amadoda la amaJuda , begodu abanga ihlangahlangano edorobheni lekhethu
44016021	ngokufundisa amasiko aphikisana nomthetho wethu thina esimaRoma bona siyamukele besiyenze . ”
44016022	Isiqubuthu saba semdibini wokusahlela uPowula noSilasi ; abagwebi bayala bona bahlutjuliswe bebarithwe .
44016023	Ngemva kokudulwa kabuhlungu badlhunywa ngesikhungweni , kwathiwa umphathisikhungo ababeke ilihlo elibukhali .
44016024	Ngemva kokwamukela umyalo lo , umphathisikhungo wabadlhunya ngesikhungweni esingaphakathi , wabopha iinyawo zabo hlangana neengaqa ezibudisi zeengodo .
44016025	Phakathi kobusuku uPowula noSilasi bebathandaza bavuma iingoma badumisa uZimu , ezinye iimbotjhwa zibalalele .
44016026	Khonokho kwaba khona ukusikinyeka okukhulu kwephasi kangangobana kwadengezela iinsekelo zesikhungo . Khonapho zoke iimvalo zesikhungo zavuleka , iimbopho zatjhaphuluka kizo zoke iimbotjhwa .
44016027	Umphathisikhungo wavuka , kwathi bona abone iimvalo zesikhungo zivulekile , warhwatjha isabulakhe wafuna ukuzibulala ngombana wadlumbana bona zoke iimbotjhwa zibalekile .
44016028	Kodwana uPowula warhuwelela wathi : “ Ungazikhubazi ngombana soke sisesekhona . ”
44016029	Umphathisikhungo wathi akukhanyiswe , wangena agijima waguqa phambi kweenyawo zakaPowula noSilasi aqhaqhazela .
44016030	Nje-ke waya nabo ngaphandle wababuza wathi : “ Banimzana , kufuze ngenzeni ukuze ngisindiswe na ? ”

44016032	Yeke batjhumayela ilizwi leKosi kuye nakibo boke ebebasendlinakhe .
44016033	Ngalo i-awara lobusukwelo umphathisikhungo wabathatha wabahlambisa amanceba ; nje-ke kwathi khonokho yena nawo woke umndenakhe babhajadiswa .
44016034	Sekabangenise ngendlinakhe , wabapha ukudla . Yena nomndenakhe bebanethabo ngombana gade sebakholwe kuZimu .
44016035	Ngelanga elilandelako ngamasa abagwebi bathumela amapholisa kumphathisikhungo nomyalo othi : “ Thukululani amadoda lawo . ”

44016037	Kodwana uPowula wathi emapholiseni : “ Basibetha phambi kwabantu ngaphandle kokusigweba , basidlhunya ngesikhungweni , thina esizizakhamuzi zombuso weRoma . Manjesi bafuna ukusibuyisela emva ngasese na ? Awa ! Iinkhulu azize ngokwazo kobana zizosikhupha . ”
44016038	Amapholisa athula amezwi la eenkhulwini . Kwathi bona zizwe bonyana uPowula noSilasi bebazizakhamuzi zombuso weRoma , zesaba .
44016039	Zeza kibo zazokuncancabeza . Zabakhupha ngesikhungweni , zababawa bona bakhambe edorobheni .
44016040	Emva kobana uPowula noSilasi baphume ngesikhungweni , baya endlini kaLidiya , lapha bahlangana khona nabazalwana . Kuthe sebabakhuthazile , bakhamba .
44017001	Kuthe uPowula noSilasi sebadabule e-Amfipolisi ne-Apoloniya , bafika eThesalonika , lapha bekukhona isinagogi lamaJuda .

44017004	Amanye amaJuda akholwa abe alandela uPowula noSilasi . Senza njalo nesiqubuthu esikhulu samaGirigi ebegade esaba uZimu kanye nabafazi abanesithunzi abangasibancani ngesibalo .
44017005	Kodwana amaJuda aba nomona , abuthelela etatawini isiqhema sabolova abumba isitlamu kobana avuse umguruguru edorobheni . Isitlameso sasahlela indlu kaJasoni , sazumana noPowula noSilasi kobana sibakhuphele phambi kwewoma labantu .
44017006	Kuthe amaJuda nakangabafumaniko , adosela uJasoni nabanye abazalwana phambi kweenkhulu zedorobho , arhuwelela athi : “ Amadoda la enze umonakalo iphaseli loke nje , njesi sele afike nalapha .
44017007	UJasoni ubamukele endlinakhe . Boke baphula imithetho yombusi omkhulu , ngokuthi batjho kukhona enye ikosi , ibizo layo nguJesu . ”
44017008	Ngokuzwa lokho isitlamu neenkhulu zedorobho zavungama .

44017010	Kuthe bona kurhwaqele , abazalwana bathumela uPowula noSilasi eBheriya . Ekufikeni kwabo lapho baya ngesinagogini lamaJuda .
44017011	Abantu balapho bebakhanyelwe khulu kunabantu beThesalonika ; nje-ke bamukela ilizwi ngokuzimisela okukhulu begodu bahlolisisa imitlolo malanga woke kobana zinjalo izintwezo na .

44017014	Khonokho abazalwana bathumela uPowula eligwini lelwandle kodwana uSilasi noThimothi basala .
44017015	Amadoda abekakhamba noPowula amphekelela amfikisa e-Athene ; abuyela emuva nomlayezo othi uSilasi noThimothi kufuze bamlandele msinyazana .
44017016	Kwathi uPowula , asabalindele e-Athene , wadana kwamambala ukubona idorobho lizele iinthombe zabosingazimu .
44017017	Yeke waphikisana namaJuda namaGirigi esaba uZimu ngesinagogini . Wenza njalo woke amalanga nebantwini ebebafunyaneka ematatawini .
44017018	Godu nezinye izazi zama-Ephikuru namaSitoyika zaphikisana naye . Abanye bathi : “ Ongazizwako lo uzama ukuthini na ? ” Abanye baphawula bathi : “ Kwangathi utjhumayela abosingazimu abatjhili . ” Lokhu bakutjho ngombana bekatjhumayela ivangeli ngoJesu nokuvuka kwabafileko .
44017019	Nje-ke bamthatha bamusa phambi kwehlangano ye-Areyophagusi bathi : “ Ungakhese usihlathululele bona iyini ifundiso etja oyikhulumako le ?
44017020	Izinto ozikhulumakwezi , ziyasirara thina ; yeke besithanda ukuzazi bona zitjho ukuthini . ”
44017021	( Woke ama-Athene nabaqhamuki abahlala lapho bebangazilibazisi ngalitho ngaphandle kokukhuluma nokuzwa izinto ezitja . )
44017022	Nje-ke uPowula wasikima phambi kwehlangano ye-Areyophagusi wathi : “ Madoda we-Athene , ngiyabona bonyana nikholwe khulu ngazo zoke iindlela .
44017023	Kuthe nangikhambakhambako ngiqala eendaweni lapha nithandazela khona , ngifumene kujame i-aldari litlolwe lathi , ‘ NgelakaZimu ongaziwako . ’ Nje-ke lokho enikukhonza ningakwazi , ngikho engikutjhumayelako kini .
44017024	UZimu obumbe iphasi nakho koke okukilo , oyiKosi yezulu nephasi , akahlali ngemathempelini akhiwe babantu .
44017025	Begodu akakhonzwa ngezandla zabantu inga udinga ilitho ngombana nguye opha koke okuphilako ipilo , umphefumulo nezinto zoke .
44017026	Ngomuntu oyedwa wadala zoke izizwe kobana zihlale ebusweni balo loke iphasi . Wazibeka iinkhathi zokuphila kwazo waziquntela nemikhawulo lapha zizakuhlala khona .
44017027	Wakwenza lokho ukuze zimfune , mhlamunye zingamfunyana lokha nazimfunako , nanyana angasikude ngitjho nakubani wethu .
44017028	Ngaye siyaphila , siyakhambakhamba begodu sikhona , njengombana abanye beembongi zenu batjhwile bona , “ ‘ Nathi siziinzukulwana zakhe . ’
44017029	“ Yeke , njengombana siziinzukulwana zakaZimu , asikafaneli sidlumbane bonyana ubuZimu bufana negolide namkha isiliva nanyana ilitje eliqandulwe ngobuhlakani nelwazi lomuntu obhubhako .
44017030	Ngalokho uZimu wathalalisa iinkhathi zokungazi , kodwana kwanjesi uyayala bonyana kuphi nakuphi abantu boke baphenduke
44017031	ngombana sele abeke ilanga azokugweba ngalo iphasi ngokulunga ngaloyo amkhethileko . Ngalokho ukukhombisile ngokwenza isiqiniseko sokumvusa kabafileko . ”
44017032	Kuthe nabezwa ngokuvuka kwabafileko , abanye bamtshima , kodwana abanye bathi : “ Sizakubuya sikulalele godu ngalokho . ”
44017033	Yeke uPowula wabasukela , wakhamba .
44017034	Kodwana abanye babo bamnamathela babamakholwa , sekubalwa nomAreyophagusi uDiyonisiyosi nomfazi okuthiwa nguDamarisi nabanye kanye nabo .
44018001	Ngemva kwalokho uPowula wasuka e-Athene waya eKorinte .
44018002	Lapho wafunyana umJuda ekuthiwa ngu-Akhwila obelethwa ePontusi , ogade aqeda ukubuya eTariyana nomkakhe uPrisila ngombana umbusi uKlawudiyusi bekayale woke amaJuda bona asuke eRoma . UPowula waya kibo .

44018015	Kodwana njengombana kukuphikisana ngamezwi namabizo nangomthetho wenu , kulungiseni ngokwenu lokho . Angithandi ukuba mgwebi weendabezi ! ”

44019035	Kodwana kuthe lokha usosiba wedorobho nasele athulise isiqubuthu , wathi : “ Zakhamuzi ze-Efesu ! Angithi woke uyazi bona idorobho le-Efesu lilibulungelo lethempeli laka-Aritemisi omkhulu nesithombe esakhithika sivela ezulwini .

44019041	Emva kokutjho lokhu , waqeda umhlangano .
44020001	Emva kobana ukuguruzela kuphele , uPowula wabizela abafundi ndawonye . Kuthe sele abakhuthaze ngamezwi , wabalayelisa wakhamba waya eMasedoniya .

44021001	Kwathi sesihlukene nabo sathaya sanqomba eKhose , ngakusasa safika eRodosi . Ukusuka lapho saya ePatara .

44021005	Kodwana kuthe bona amalanga wethu lapho aphele , sasuka bona siragele phambili nekhambo lethu . Boke abafundi , abomkabo nabantwababo basiphekelela besaphumela ngaphandle kwedorobho . Lapho-ke saguqa eligwini lelwandle sathandaza .

44021011	Weza kithi wathatha ibhande lakaPowula , wazibopha ngalo iinyawo nezandla , wathi : “ Nakhu okutjhiwo nguMoya oCwengileko , ‘ Ngayo indlela le , umninibhandeli uzokubotjhwa maJuda ngeJerusalema , amkhaphele kabatjhili . ’ ”

44021019	Sele ababingelele , wabika koke ngakunye uZimu agade akwenze hlangana nabatjhili ngomsebenzakhe .
44021020	Kuthe bona bezwe lokho , badumisa uZimu . Nje-ke bathi kuPowula : “ Uyabona mfowethu bonyana kuneenkulungwana ezinengi kangangani hlangana namaJuda ezimakholwa , begodu zoke zitjhisakalela umthetho .
44021021	Manje zitjeliwe ngawe bona wena ufundisa woke amaJuda ahlala eenarheni zabatjhili bona alise umthetho kaMosi ; uwatjelile bonyana angasoki abantwana bawo begodu bangalandeli amasiko .
44021022	Alo , sizokwenza njani na ? Nanyana kunjani azokuzwa bonyana ufikile ,
44021023	yeke yenza lokho esikutjela khona : Kunamadoda amane lapha azibophe ngesifungo ,
44021024	nje-ke khambisana nawo uhlanganele nawo esikweni lokuhlanjululwa ukhuphe iindleko zokugudwa kweenhloko zawo . Ngendlela le boke bazakwazi bona akukho iqiniso kilokho abatjelwe ngawe ngakho , kodwana bazakwazi bona nawe uphila njengaloyo ogcina umthetho kaMosi .
44021025	“ Nakungabatjhili esele bamakholwa , sibathumele incwadi nesimiso sethu sokobana abatjhide kokuhlatjelwe abosingazimu , ebubendeni , kokukghanyiweko nebufebeni . ”
44021026	Ngomuso uPowula wathatha amadoda lawo , kwathi sele azihlambululile , wangena nawo ngethempelini , wabika emtarini ukupheleliswa kwamalanga wehlambuluko lokha kuzakwenziwa umhlabelo womunye nomunye wabo .
44021027	Kuthe amalanga alikhomba nakaya ngekupheleni , amaJuda we-Asiya agade abone uPowula ngethempelini atjitjizela isiqubuthu . Abamba uPowula ,
44021028	arhuwelela athi : “ Ma-Israyeli , sizani ! Lo , mumuntu okhamba yoke indawo afundisa omunye nomunye , okuphambene nabantu bekhethu , umthetho nendawo le . Ngaphandle kwalokho sele angenise namaGirigi ngethempelini , yeke usilaphaze indawo ecwengileko le ! ”
44021029	Ngebanga lokobana bebabone uTrofimusi we-Efesu anoPowula ngedorobheni , badlumbana bona uPowula bekamngenise ngethempelini .
44021030	Nje-ke idorobho loke laphithizela nabantu beza bagijimela ndawonye ; babamba uPowula bamrhudulela ngaphandle kwethempeli kwavalwa neminyango khonokho .
44021031	Kuthe basathi balinga ukumbulala , kwafika ilizwi enduneni yebutho bona loke iJerusalema liyavungazela .
44021032	Khonokho yathatha amajoni nabaphathimabutho ; yarhaba yehlela kibo . Kuthe bona abantu babone induna yebutho namajoni , balisa ukubetha uPowula .
44021033	Induna yafese yambamba yathi akabotjhwe ngeenketani ezimbili ; yabuza bona ungubani nokobana wenzeni .
44021034	Abanye hlangana nesiqubuthu barhuwelela into yinye , abanye okhunye . Kwathi ngebanga lokobana ingakhange ikghone ukuzwisisa kuhle ngebanga lokuvungazela , yakanye yayala bona asiwe ekampeni yamajoni .
44021035	Kwathi uPowula sele afike emiqaqadweni , umguruguru wesiqubuthu wadlanga ngamandla kangangoba kwafuneka bona athwalwe majoni .
44021036	Isiqubuthu ebesilandela ngemva kwawo besisoloko sirhuwelela sithi : “ Akasisusele thina ! ”
44021037	Kuthe sele bazomngenisa ngekampeni yamajoni , wathi enduneni : “ Ngingaba nengingakutjhoko kuwe na ? ” Induna yamphendula yathi : “ Kanti uyasazi isiGirigi na ?
44021038	Nakunjalo , alo , awusimrhali loya womGibhide okhe wathi mhlapha nje walinga ukuvukela umbuso ngokubutha ababulali abaziinkulungwana ezine waya nabo erhalawumbeni ? ”
44021039	UPowula waphendula wathi : “ Mina ngimJuda odabuka eTarsusi yeSilisiya , ngisisakhamuzi sedorobho eliqakathekileko . Yeke ngiyakubawa , akhe ungivumele ngikhulume ebantwinaba . ”
44021040	Sele afunyene imvumo , uPowula wajama phezu komqaqado waphakamisela abantu isandla . Kuthe bona bathule , wakhuluma nabo ngesiHebheru , wathi :
44022001	“ Bafowethu nabobaba , kwanjesi akhese nilalele ukuzivikela kwami kini ! ”
44022002	Kwathi bona bamuzwe bonyana ukhuluma nabo ngesiHebheru , bathulisisa . Nje-ke wathi :
44022003	“ Kokwakho mina ngimJuda , ngabelethelwa eTarsusi yeSilisiya , kodwana ngakhulela khona edorobhenelo eenyaweni zakaGamaliyeli , ngafundiswa ngokutjhubileko ngokuya ngomthetho wabokhokho , ngitjhisakalela uZimu njengombana nani noke ninjalo namhlanje .
44022004	Abanengi egade bakhamba ngeNdlela le ngabazuma bekwaba sekufeni . Bengibopha amadoda nabafazi ngibaphosa ngesikhungweni ,
44022005	njengombana nomphristi omkhulu nomkhandlu woke wabaphathi bangaba nobufakazi ngami . Ngamukela incwadi evela kibo itlolelwe abafowethu okumaJuda weDamaseku ; ngaya lapho kobana ngiyokubopha , ngibalethe eJerusalema bona bazokuhlunguphazwa .
44022006	“ Ngisatjhitjhinga njalo ngitjhidele eDamaseku , pheze emini ekulu , kwehla ezulwini umkhanyo omkhulu wamanyaza kimi mazombe .
44022007	Ngawela phasi ngezwa ilizwi lisithi kimi , ‘ Sawula , Sawula ! Ungizumelani na ? ’
44022008	Ngabuza ngathi , ‘ Ungubani wena , Kosi , na ? ’ Yathi kimi , ‘ NginguJesu weNazaretha lo ozumana naye . ’
44022009	“ Abantu ebenginabo bakubona ukukhanya , kodwana akhange balizwe ilizwi laloyo ogade akhuluma nami .
44022010	Ngabuza ngathi , ‘ Alo-ke ngingenzani , Kosi , na ? ’ IKosi yathi kimi , ‘ Vuka ukhambe uye ngeDamaseku , lapho-ke uzafese uzwe koke obekelwe bona ukwenze . ’
44022011	Njengombana bengingasaboni ngebanga lomkhanyo , labo ebebanami bangibamba ngesandla bangisa ngeDamaseku .
44022012	“ Umuntu ekuthiwa ngu-Ananiyasi , indoda egade ilandela umthetho ngokupheleleko nekhulunywa kuhle maJuda ahlala lapho ,
44022013	yeza kimi yajama hlanu kwami yathi , ‘ Mfowethu Sawula , buya ubone godu ! ’ Khonokho ngabona godu bengayiqala .
44022014	Yathi kimi , ‘ UZimu wabokhokho ukhethe wena bona wazi intando yakhe , ubone oLungileko wakhe bewuzwe iphimbo lomlomakhe ;
44022015	ngalokho uzakuba ngufakazakhe kibo boke abantu ngokubonileko nokuzwileko .
44022016	Alo , usalindeleni ? Sikima ubhajadiswe , kuhlanjwe izono zakho ngokubiza ibizo lakhe ! ’
44022017	“ Kwathi sele ngibuyele eJerusalema , ngisathandaza ngethempelini , ngaba nesiyezi ,
44022018	ngabona iKosi ikhuluma nami isithi , ‘ Rhaba uphume msinyana eJerusalema ngombana abazubamukela ubufakazi bakho ngami . ’
44022019	Nje-ke ngathi , ‘ Kosi , bayazi ngokwabo bona kelinye nelinye isinagogi bengibopha , ngibethe boke ebebagade bakholwa kuwe .
44022020	Godu lokha iingazi zakaStefani ufakazakho nazithulukako , gade ngijame mina ngokwami lapho , ngivumelana begodu ngiqale nezambatho zalabo abambulalako . ’
44022021	Yathi kimi , ‘ Khamba ngombana ngizokuthumela kude kabatjhili . ’ ”
44022022	Abantu bebalokhu balalele uPowula bekwaba semagameni lawo ; emva kwalokho , bathoma ukurhuwelela bathi : “ Msuseni onje ephasini ngombana akakafaneli ukuphila ! ”
44022023	Kwathi basarhuwelela njalo , badabula izambatho zabo , bavusa nethuli ,
44022024	induna yebutho yayala bona alethwe ngekampeni yamajoni ; yahlongoza bona akahlolisiswe ngokurithwa khona kuzakwazeka bona itjhada elingakeli libangwe yini ngaye .
44022025	Kuthe basambhambalalisa bona bamrithe , uPowula wathi kumphathimabutho ebekajame lapho : “ Kumthetho yini bona nirithe isakhamuzi sombuso weRoma singakabi ukulahlwa licala na ? ”
44022026	Kuthe bona umphathimabutho ezwe lokho , walunga enduneni yebutho wathi kiyo : “ Uzokwenzani ngomuntu lo ? Usisakhamuzi sombuso weRoma ! ”
44022027	Yeke induna yeza kuPowula yambuza yathi : “ Akhese ungitjele , kanti wena usisakhamuzi sombuso weRoma na ? ” Yena wathi : “ Iye . ”
44022028	Induna yathi : “ Kwangibiza imali enengi mina ukufunyana ilungelwelo . ” UPowula waphendula wathi : “ Mina-ke ngisisakhamuzi ngokubelethwa . ”
44022029	Khonokho labo egade kumele bamhlole bamkghaduka , induna nayo yangenwa livalo ngombana yalemuka bona uPowula sisakhamuzi sombuso weRoma nokobana beyimbophile .
44022030	Ngebanga lokobana induna beyifuna ukwazi bona yini into amaJuda amsola ngayo uPowula , ngelanga elilandelako yamthukulula beyayala abaphristi abakhulu nesigungu sabarholi bamaJuda soke bona khebahlangane . Yeke yathatha uPowula yamjamisa phambi kwabo .
44023001	UPowula waqala thwi phezu kwamadoda wesigungu sabarholi bamaJuda , wathi kiwo : “ Bafowethu , ngiphile phambi kwakaZimu ngonembeza omsulwa bekube nanamhlanjesi . ”
44023002	Nje-ke umphristi omkhulu u-Ananiyasi wayala agade bajame hlanu kwakhe bona bamwahle umlomo lo .
44023003	Ngalokhu uPowula wathi kuye : “ UZimu uzokuwahla wena ozenza msulwa ! Uhlalele ukugweba mina ngomthetho , khisibe wena uyawephula ngokuthi bangibethe ! ”
44023004	Abagade bajame hlanu kwakhe bathi : “ Wena , uthuka umphristi omkhulu kaZimu na ? ”
44023005	UPowula waphendula wathi : “ Bafowethu , bengingazi bona mphristi omkhulu . Mbala kutloliwe kwathiwa , ‘ Ungathuwelelisi umphathi wabantu bakho . ’ ”
44023006	Kuthe bona uPowula abone bonyana abanye babaSadusi nokuthi abanye babaFarisi , warhuwelela esigungwini wathi : “ Bafowethu , ngimFarisi oyindodana yabaFarisi . Nje-ke lapha ngimangalelwe ngendaba yokuthi nginethemba lokobanyana abafileko bazokuvuka . ”
44023007	Kuthe bona atjho lokho , kwathoma ukuphikisana phakathi kwabaFarisi nabaSadusi , ihlangano yahlukana phakathi
44023008	ngombana abaSadusi bebathi akukho ukuvuka kwabafileko , begodu azikho iingilozi nemimoya ; kodwana abaFarisi bebakholelwa kikho kokuthathu .
44023009	Itjhada laba likhulu bekwasikima abanye abafundisi bomthetho babaFarisi baphikisa ngamandla , bathi : “ Asiboni ilitho elimbi endodeni le ! Kuzokuthiwani nakube ummoya namkha ingilozi , ikhulume kuye na ? ”
44023010	Lokha ukuphikisana kwabo nakuba namandla , induna yebutho beyesaba bona bazamtlebhula imitletlana uPowula . Yeke yayala amajoni bona ehle , afese amdzwebule ngekani amuse ekampeni yamajoni .
44023011	Kwathi ebusuku iKosi yajama hlanu kwakaPowula , yathi : “ Yiba nesibindi ! Njengombana ufakaze ngami eJerusalema , kufuze wenze njalo neRoma . ”
44023012	Kuthe sekusile amaJuda azibumba isicathana abe azibopha ngesifungo kobana angagomi namkha asele nanyana yini angakabulali uPowula .
44023013	Labo ebebazibumbe isicathana bebeqile ematjhumini amane .
44023014	Bona baya ebaphristini abakhulu nebaphathini , bathi : “ Sesizibophe ngesifungo bona angekhe sagoma ilitho singakabulali uPowula .
44023015	Manje , nina nesigungu sabarholi bamaJuda thumelani ilizwi enduneni yebutho bona ithumele uPowula ehle eze kini , nizitjhaye sengathi nifuna ukwazisisa kuhle ngaye . Nje-ke thina sesilungele ukumsusa angakafiki . ”
44023016	Kodwana indodana kadadwabo lakaPowula yezwa ngendumba le , nje-ke yakhamba yangena ngekampeni yamajoni yabikela uPowula ngalokhu .
44023017	Yeke uPowula wabiza omunye wabaphathimabutho wathi kuye : “ Thatha isokaneli ulise enduneni , kukhona elizakutjho kiyo . ”
44023018	Umphathimabutho walithatha , walisa enduneni , wafese wathi : “ Isibotjhwa uPowula ungibizile wathi ngilethe isokaneli kuwe ngombana kukhona elifuna ukukutjho kuwe . ”
44023019	Induna yalibamba ngesandla yatjhidela nalo eqadi , yalibuza yathi : “ Yini le ofuna ukungibikela yona ? ”
44023020	Lona lathi : “ AmaJuda avumelene bona azokubawa bonyana uthumele uPowula ehle eze esigungwini sababarholi bamaJuda kusasa , kubengathi bafuna ukwazi kabanzi ngaye .
44023021	Kodwana ungabalaleli ngombana phakathi kwawo kukhona amadoda angaphezu kwamatjhumi amane azabe abhaqile amlindele . Azibophe ngesifungo sokobana angekhe agoma namkha asela angakambulali . Kwanjesi nje , sele ajame ngehlelo , alindele kwaphela imvumo yakho . ”
44023022	Nje-ke induna yathi : “ Ungatjeli noyedwa bona lokhu sewungazisile . ” Yalilisa lakhamba .
44023023	Yabiza abaphathimabutho ababili , yathi kibo : “ Zilungiseleleni ukukhamba namhlanje ngesimbi yethoba kusihlwa , niye eKhesariya namajoni amakhulu amabili , abakhweli beenjomani abamatjhumi alikhomba nabaphathi bemikhonto abamakhulu amabili .
44023024	Begodu nikelani noPowula ezinye iinjomani kobana akhwele , nimfikise aphephile kumbusi uFeliksi . ”
44023025	Nje-ke induna yatlola incwadi efundeka ngendlela le :
44023026	“ Mina Klawudiyusi Lisiya , ngilotjhisa kuwe Feliksi Mbusi ohloniphekileko .
44023027	AmaJuda abamba indoda le , kwathi sele athi ayayiqedelela ngafika nebutho ngayisindisa ngombana ngilemukile nokobana isisakhamuzi sombuso weRoma .
44023028	Njengombana bengifuna ukwazi icala abamthwese lona , ngamletha esigungwini sabarholi bamaJuda .
44023029	Ngafumana bona bayimangalele ngomlandu malungana nomthetho wabo ; kunganalitho elenza ifanele ukubulawa namkha ukuphoswa ngesikhungweni .
44023030	Kuthe sekudaluliwe kimi bona kukhona ubukhwebetjhana ngendoda leyo , ngathi angiyithumele kuwe msinyana . Ngibatjelile nabamangaleli bayo bona nabo abendlale indaba yabo phambi kwakho ngayo . ”
44023031	Nje-ke amajoni njengokuyalwa kwawo , athatha uPowula ebusuku amusa e-Antipatrisi .
44023032	Ngelanga elilandelako abakhweli beenjomani baragela phambili naye , amanye amajoni abuyela emuva ekampeni yamajoni .
44023033	Kuthe nabafika eKhesariya , banikela umbusi incwadi , bethula noPowula phambi kwakhe .
44023034	Umbusi wafunda incwadi , wabuza uPowula bona ubuya kisiphi isifunda . Kuthe bonyana afumane bona uvela eSilisiya ,
44023035	wathi kuye : “ Ngizokulalela indabakho nasele kufike abamangaleli bakho . ” Yeke wayala bona aqalwe esigodlweni sakaHerode .
44024001	Ngemva kwamalanga amahlanu umphristi omkhulu u-Ananiyasi wehla weza nabaphathi negqwetha uTertulusi , bafese bendlala indababo ngoPowula phambi kombusi uFeliksi .
44024002	Kuthe bona uPowula abizwe , uTertulusi wathoma ukumbeka icala wathi : “ Sibe nokuthula isikhathi eside ngawe begodu ukuthuthuka kube kunengi esizwenesi ngebanga lokuhlakanipha kwakho .
44024003	Lokho-ke , Feliksi odumileko , sikwamukela ngeendlela zoke endaweni zoke begodu siyathokoza .
44024004	Angifuni ukuba siqedamlozi , yeke , ngibawa ngobuntu bakho ukhe usilalele kafitjhani .
44024005	Indoda le siyifumane imumuntu oyipehli nebanga ukuhlubuka phakathi kwamaJuda ephasini loke , begodu imrholi wesiqhema ekuthiwa maNazaretha .
44024006	Yalinga ngitjho nokusilaphaza ithempeli , nje-ke sayibopha .
44024007	Kodwana kwafika induna uLisiya yayidzwebula ngamandla ezandleni zethu ,
44024008	yabe yayala bona beze nayo kuwe kobana nawe ngokwakho uzoyihlola ngalokho esiyimangalele ngakho . ”
44024009	AmaJuda nawo akufakazela lokho ngokugandelela bona koke kunjalo .
44024010	Kwathi uPowula sele akhonjwe mbusi bona akhulume , waphendula wathi : “ Ngebanga lokobana ngiyazi bona sekuminyaka eminengi umgwebi esizwenesi ngalokho ngiziphendulela ngithabile .
44024011	Njengombana nawe ungazibonela nje , akukapheli ngitjho amalanga alitjhumi nambili ngikhuphukele eJerusalema kobana ngiyokuthandaza .
44024012	Akhange bangifumane ngiphikisana namunye ngethempelini namkha ngidunga abantu ngesinagogini namkha kukuphi edorobheni .
44024013	Begodu angekhe bakulethela ubufakazi bezinto abangithwesa umlandu ngazo njenganje .
44024014	Kodwana nakhu engikuvumako kuwe kobana ngesaba uZimu wabokhokho bami ngokulandela iNdlela leyo abathi kuqhema , godu ngiyakholwa kizo zoke izinto ezitlolwe emthethweni neencwadini zabaphorofidi .
44024015	Nginalo ithemba kuZimu , iye , ithemba nabo abalamukelako lokobana kuzakuba khona ukuvuka kwabafileko kwabo boke abalungileko nabangakalungi .
44024016	Yeke ngalinga ngamandlami woke bona ngibe nomkhumbulo otsengileko phambi koZimu nabantu .
44024017	“ Nje-ke emva kweminyaka embalwa ngeza bona ngilethe izipho ebantwini bekhethu nokobana ngizokwenza imihlabelo .
44024018	Bengihlambulukile ngihlobile ngesikhathi bangifumana ngingetempeleni ngenza lokhu . Bekungekho isiqubuthu sabantu kimi kungekho nokuvungama .
44024019	Kodwana bekukhona amaJuda wesifundeni se-Asiya , wona-ke gade afanele abe khona azongithwesa umlandu phambi kwakho , nakube kukhona abanakho ngami .
44024020	Namkha bona laba , abakhulume bonyana ngiwuphi umlandu abawufumana kimi lokha nabe ngijame phambi kwesigungu sababarholi bamaJuda ;
44024021	ngaphandle kwento eyodwa engiyitjhwileko nangijame phambi kwabo ngathi , ‘ Namhlanje ngimangalelwe ngendaba yokuvuka kwabafileko . ’ ”
44024022	Nje-ke uFeliksi owakhe watjelwa kuhle ngeNdlela le , waqeda ikulumo le ngokuphawula wathi : “ Ngizakuba nequnto lendaba le lokha induna uLisiya nasele yehlile yafika . ”
44024023	Wayala umphathimabutho bona amlonde ngesikhungweni , kodwana amvumele athukuluke angakhandeli nabangani bakhe bona bamnikele itjhejo alifunako .
44024024	Ngemva kwamalanga uFeliksi weza nomkakhe uDrusila obegade amJuda . Wabiza uPowula wamlalela lokha nakhuluma ngokukholwa kuKrestu Jesu .
44024025	UPowula asakhuluma ngokulunga , ukuzibamba nokuza kwelanga lokugwetjwa , uFeliksi wafikelwa kukwesaba wathi : “ Okwanje ungakhamba , ngizakubiza godu nanginesikhathi . ”
44024026	Khonapho bekanethemba bona uPowula uzamfumbathisa . Ngesizathwesi bekanande ambiza bona akhulume naye .
44024027	Sekudlule iminyaka emibili , uPorkiyusi Festusi wangena esikhundleni sakaFeliksi njengombusi . Ngebanga lokobana uFeliksi afuna ukuthabisa amaJuda , walisa uPowula ngesikhungweni .
44025001	Amalanga amathathu emva kobana uFestusi afike esifundeni , wakhuphuka asuka eKhesariya waya eJerusalema ,
44025002	lapha abaphristi abakhulu nabarholi bamaJuda bathwesa khona uPowula umlandu . Bancenga
44025003	uFestusi ngokuzibawela umusa bona uPowula alethwe eJerusalema . Bakwenza lokho ngokujamelene noPowula ngombana bebanobukhwebetjhana bokumlalela endleleni bambulale .
44025004	UFestusi wabaphendula ngokuthi uPowula sibotjhwa esilondwe eKhesariya , nokuthi msinyana nje yena ngokwakhe usophe ukuya lapho .
44025005	Wathi : “ Nje-ke , akuthi labo abanegunya phakathi kwenu behle nami , begodu nakube kukhona okuyisolo ngendoda leyo , abayithwese umlandu . ”
44025006	Sele ahlezi nabo amalanga abunane ukuya kalitjhumi , wabuyela eKhesariya . Ngelanga elilandelako wahlala esihlalweni sokugweba , wayala bona uPowula alethwe .
44025007	Kwathi bona uPowula afike , amaJuda avela eJerusalema amzomba athoma ukumrhwayela ngemilandu ebudisi angeze aba nobufakazi ngayo .
44025008	Kodwana uPowula wazivikela , wathi : “ Angikenzi ilitho elimbi malungana nomthetho wamaJuda nethempeli namkha kumbusi omkhulu . ”
44025009	Kodwana uFestusi afuna ukuthabisa amaJuda , wabuza uPowula wathi : “ Uzakuthanda ukukhuphukela eJerusalema bona uyokugwetjwa khona phambi kwami ngemilandu othweswe yona le na ? ”
44025010	UPowula wathi : “ Ngijame phambi kwebandla lombusi omkhulu , lapha kufuze ngigwetjwe khona . Angikenzi ilitho elimbi emaJudeni , njengombana nawe usazi kuhle .
44025011	Nangabe ngonile ngenza okumbi okungabangela bona ngigwetjelwe ukufa , angizami ukuphepha ukufa ; kodwana nangabe akunalitho emilandwini abangibeka yona , akakho ongangibuyisela kibo . Ngidlulisela umlandu kumbusi omkhulu . ”
44025012	Kuthe bona uFestusi avunge nabaluleki bakhe , waphendula wathi : “ Udlulisele umlandu kumbusi omkhulu , yeke uzokuya kumbusi omkhulu . ”
44025013	Ngemva kwesikhathi ikosi u-Agripa noBherinike beza eKhesariya bazokwamukela uFestusi .
44025014	Njengombana bebanamalangana bahlezi lapho , uFestusi wabendlalela indaba kaPowula , wathi : “ Kukhona lapha umuntu owatjhiywa nguFeliksi asibotjhwa .
44025015	Kwathi lokha ngiye eJerusalema , abaphristi abakhulu nabaphathi bamaJuda bamthwesa umlandu , bangibawa bona ngimbone umlandu .
44025016	Kodwana ngabatjela bona akusiwo umkhuba wamaRoma ukubona umuntu umlandu angazange akhe abonane ubuso nobuso nabamangaleli bakhe , aphiwe nethuba lokuziphendulela ngomlandu abamthwese wona .
44025017	Kuthe bona bahlangane lapha , akhange bengisariyada . Ngelanga elilandelako ngahlala endawenami yokugweba ngathi bamngenise .
44025018	Abamthwesa umlandu nabasikimako , akhange bamthwese umlandu loyo ebengilindele bona bazamthwesa wona .
44025019	Koke abakubekako kuphikisana naye ngokukholwa kwabo nangomuntu okuthiwa nguJesu , owafako , uPowula akhuluma ngaye bona uyaphila .
44025020	Kuthe ngisararekile bona indaba le ngingayiphenyisisa njani , ngambuza bona angathanda ukuya eJerusalema kobana ayokugwetjwa lapho ngalokho athweswe khona na .
44025021	Kodwana kuthe lokha uPowula abawa bona alondwe ngesikhungweni bekube kulokha umbusi omkhulu aqunta khona , ngayala bona ahlale aqaliwe bengimthumele kumbusi omkhulu loyo . ”
44025022	U-Agripa wathi kuFestusi : “ Indoda leyo ngifuna ukuyizwa ngokwami . ” UFestusi wathi : “ Uzayizwa kusasa . ”
44025023	Nje-ke ngelanga elilandelako u-Agripa noBherinike bafika ngevunulo yakanokutjho . Bangena ngerhubheni neenduna zamajoni kanye namadoda adumileko wedorobho . Nje-ke uFestusi wayala bona uPowula angeniswe .
44025024	UFestusi wathi : “ Ngwenyama Agripa nani noke enilapha nathi , niyayibona indoda le , woke umphakathi wamaJuda uyimangalele kimi eJerusalema nalapha , urhuwelela bona ayikafaneli ukube isaphila .
44025025	Kodwana ngifunyene bona ayikenzi ilitho elifanele bona ife ; kuthe lokha nayidlulisela umlandu kumbusi omkhulu , ngahlosa bona ngiyithumele .
44025026	Kodwana anginalitho elidarhileko ngayo engingatlolela umbusi omkhulu ngalo . Yeke ngiyilethe phambi kwenu noke , khulukhulu phambi kwakho Ngwenyama Agripa ! Khona kuzakuthi ngemva kokuyihlola , kube nento engingayitlola ngayo
44025027	ngombana ngibona kwanga kukutlhoga umkhumbulo kimi ukuthumela isibotjhwa ngingakuphawuli lokho esimangalelwe ngakho . ”
44026001	U-Agripa wathi kuPowula : “ Unalo ilungelo lokuzikhulumela . ” UPowula waphakamisa isandla sakhe wathoma ukuzivikela wathi :
44026002	“ Kosi Agripa ! Namhlanjesi ngizithatha njengomuntu onetjhudu bona ngibe nokuzivikela phambi kwakho ngazo zoke izinto amaJuda angithwesa umlandu ngazo ,
44026003	khulukhulu ngombana wazi woke amasiko wamaJuda neempikiswano zawo . Yeke ngiyakubawa , bona ungilalele ngesineke .
44026004	“ Woke amaJuda ayayazi ipilwami kusukela ngisemncani ; iye , ipilo engayiphila kusukela ekuthomeni hlangana nabantu bekhethu nangeJerusalema .
44026005	Sekusikhathi eside bangazi begodu nabafuna ukufakaza bangatjho bona bengiphila njengelunga lesiqhema esiqinileko ekolweni yekhethu , ngiphila njengomFarisi .
44026006	Alo-ke manjesi ngijame lapha bona ngigwetjwe ngebanga lethemba lesithembiso uZimu asenza kibokhokho ;
44026007	iye , isithembiso izizwe zekhethu ezilitjhumi nambili ebezithemba ukusifikelela , njengombana zilotjha imini nobusuku . Kungalo ithembeli , wena ohloniphekileko , ngimangalelwe maJuda !
44026008	Alo , kubangelwa yini bona nanyana ngubani wenu afunyane kulikhuni ukukholwa ukuthi uZimu uyabavusa abafileko na ?
44026009	“ Nami ngokwami ngikholisekile bona bekufanele ngenze okunengi okuphambene nebizo lakaJesu weNazaretha .
44026010	Kwakhona ngikho lokho engakwenza eJerusalema . Ngemvumo engayamukela ivela ebaphristini abakhulu ngaphosela abacwengileko abanengi ngesikhungweni . Kwathi nalokha agwetjwa intambo , nami ngakusekele lokho .
44026011	Ngeenkhathi ezinengi ngibahlunguphazele ngemasinagogini , ngilinga ukubakatelela bona bahlambalaze . Bengifutheke khulu ngabo kangangobana bengibalandelela nakwamanye amadorobho wabatjhili .
44026012	“ Ngiso isizathweso esangenza bona ngiye eDamaseku ngegunya elivela ebaphristini abakhulu .
44026013	Kwathi emini ekulu ngisesendleleni , wena ohloniphekileko , ngabona umkhanyo omkhulu kunelanga uphazima , wangizombeleza nalabo ebengikhamba nabo .
44026014	Soke sawela phasi , ngezwa ilizwi lisithi kimi ngesiHebheru , ‘ Sawula , Sawula , ungizumelani na ? Kunzima kuwe ukurarha itlobo yesitlhorholojakomo . ’
44026015	Ngabuza ngathi : ‘ Ungubani , wena Kosi na ? ’ IKosi yathi : ‘ NginguJesu , ozumana naye .
44026016	Nje-ke , sikima ujame ngeenyawo zakho . Ngibonakele kuwe ngebanga lokobana ngizokukhetha ube sisebenzi nofakazi ngezinto ozibonileko ngami nangalokho engizakutjengisa khona .
44026017	Ngizokuphephisa ebantwini bekhenu nakwabatjhili engikuthumela kibo
44026018	bona uvule amehlwabo khona bazakusuka ebumnyameni beze ekukhanyeni ; basuke emandleni kaSathana beze kuZimu ukuze bamukele ukulitjalelwa kwezono , babe nesabelo phakathi kwabacwengisiweko ngokukholwa . ’
44026019	“ Ngalokho , kosi Agripa , akhange ngibe lihlongandlebe ngombono ovela ezulwini .
44026020	Kodwana ngathoma ukumemezela kabaseDamaseku , kwaba seJerusalema nakiyo inarha yeJudiya ngitjho nakwabatjhili bonyana baphenduke ezonweni babuyele kuZimu , benze imisebenzi ekhambisana nokuphenduka .
44026021	Kungebangelo amaJuda angidzwebule ngethempelini alinge ukungibulala .
44026022	Kodwana uZimu ungisize bekwaba kunamhlanjesi , kungakho ngijame lapha ngifakaza kabancani nakabakhulu . Angikhulumi okhunye ngaphandle kwalokho abaphorofidi noMosi abakutjhwileko bona kuzokwenzeka :
44026023	UKrestu kufuze ahlupheke , nokuthi njengombana angewokuthoma ukuvuka kabafileko , uzakumemezela ukukhanya ebantwini bekhethu nakabatjhili . ”
44026024	Kuthe uPowula asazivikela njalo , uFestusi wamrhuwelela wathi : “ Powula , uyahlanya na ! Ukufunda khulu kuyakuhlanyisa ! ”
44026025	UPowula waphendula wathi : “ Angihlanyi , mhlonipheki Festusi , kodwana ngikhuluma iqiniso ngokuzizwisisa !
44026026	Eqinisweni ikosi u-Agripa iyazi ngeendabezi , kiyo ngikhuluma ngesibindi , ngokwazi bonyana ayikho neyodwa yezintwezi engizizwako kiyo ngombana izintwezi akhange zenzeke emsithelweni .
44026027	Kosi Agripa , uyabakholwa abaphorofidi na ? Ngiyazi bona uyabakholwa ! ”
44026028	U-Agripa wathi kuPowula : “ Ucabanga bona msinyana kangaka ungangiphendula umKrestu na ? ”
44026029	UPowula wamphendula wathi : “ Namkha kumsinyana nanyana kungasinjalo , ngithandaza kuZimu bonyana kungabi nguwe wedwa , kodwana nabo boke abalaleleko namhlanje , sengathi bangaba ngilokhu engingikho , ngaphandle kweenketanezi ! ”
44026030	Yeke ikosi yasikima nombusi noBherinike kanye nabo boke ebebahlezi nayo .
44026031	Kuthe bona basuke lapho bathi komunye nomunye : “ Umuntu lo akakenzi ilitho bona angabe abulawe namkha afakwe ngesikhungweni . ”

44027001	Kwathi bonyana kuquntwe bona kufuze sithayele eTariyana , basa uPowula nezinye iimbotjhwa kuJuliyasi umphathimabutho wombusi .
44027002	Sakhwela umkhumbi we-Adramitheno , ogade sewulungele ukusuka uye eligwini lelwandle e-Asiya , sathaya sakhamba siphekelelwa ngu-Aristarirhusi weMasedoniya ovela eThesalonika .
44027003	Ngelanga elilandelako safika eTsidoni ; uJuliyasi waphatha uPowula kuhle , wamvumela bona ayokubona abangani bakhe , bamnikela lokho akufunako .

44027007	Sathaya kancani amalanga amanengi ngobudisi obukhulu ukufika malungana neKinidu . Ummoya gade uphambene nathi ; yeke , sathayela ngehlangothini elivikeliweko lesihlengeleni seKrete malungana neSalimone .

44027010	wathi : “ Madoda , ngiyabona ikhambo lethu lizokuba nengozi nomonakalo omkhulu , kungabi ngowepahla nomkhumbi kwaphela kodwana nepilwethu isengozini . ”
44027011	Kodwana umphathimabutho walalela umpathimkhumbi nomninimkhumbi kunokulalela lokho okutjhiwo nguPowula .
44027012	Njengombana iligu bekungasiyo indawo elungele ukuhlala ebusika , inengi labona kungcono ukusuka lapho liye elwandle , lilinge ukufika eFinikisi , kuhlalwe khona ubusika boke . Leli bekuliligu leKrete eliqale esewula-tjingalanga netlhagu-tjingalanga .

44027014	Kodwana khonokho kwavunguza ummoya ovela ngetlhagwini-pumalanga ebekuthiwa yi-Ewurakiloni , waphephetha wehla ukusukela enarheni .
44027015	Ummoya wadudula umkhumbi wangasakghona ukujika uqalane nawo , yeke sawulisa bona usunduzwe mumoya .
44027016	Sesibalekele endaweni evikelekileko yesihlengele esincani ekuthiwa yiKhawuda , saphumelela kanzima ukulawula umkhunjana wokusindisa .
44027017	Sele bawukhwezile bathatha iintambo bawubophelela emkhunjini , besaba bona bangahle baphephukele emgwedlweni wetjhwabatjhwaba yeSiritisi ; ngalokho behlisa iinlawulamkhumbi ; umkhumbi wasunduzwa mumoya .
44027018	Isivunguvungu sawunawunana nathi , kwathi ngakusasa balahlela intundu yomkhumbi ngemanzini .

44027020	Kuthe lokha nasele kuphele amalanga amanengi , ilanga neenkwekwezi kungasabonakali , nommoya udlangile ngokuvunguza , salahlekelwa ngilo loke ithemba lokusinda .
44027021	Ngemva kobana amadoda ahlezi isikhathi eside anganakudla , uPowula wajama phakathi kwawo wathi : “ Madoda , ngathana ningilalele sangasuka eKrete , ngabe niwuphephile woke umonakalo lo nokulahlekelwa okungaka .
44027022	Nje-ke ngibawa bona niqine idolo ngombana akakho noyedwa wenu ozakulahlekelwa yipilo ; mkhumbi kwaphela ozakonakala .
44027023	Ebusuku bayizolo kuze ingilozi kaZimu engingowakhe nengimlotjhako yajama ngakimi ,
44027024	yathi , ‘ Ungesabi , Powula ngombana kufanele ujame phambi kombusi omkhulu ; begodu qala , uZimu ukuphephisele boke othaya nabo . ’
44027025	Yeke madoda , qinani idolo ngombana ngikholwa kuZimu bona kuzakuba njengombana ngitjeliwe .
44027026	Kodwana sizakuphetjhulelwa kesinye isihlengele . ”
44027027	Ngobusuku belanga letjhumi nane , sisaphetjhulwa mumoya ekweyameni ilwandle le-Adriya , pheze phakathi kobusuku , abathayi badlumbana bona sesitjhidele esebeni .
44027028	Nje-ke baphosa intambo yokulinganisa ukutjhinga , bafumana bona kumamitha amatjhumi amathathu nekhomba ngemva kokuthuthuka kancani babuyelela godu baphosa , bafumana kumamitha amatjhumi amabili nekhomba .
44027029	Ngokubethwa livalo bona umkhumbi ungahle utjhinge ngemadwaleni , behlisa ama-ankera amane ngemva komkhumbi bathandaza bona kuse .
44027030	Kwathi lokha abathayi nabalinga ukweqa ngemkhunjini , sele behlise umkhunjana ngelwandle batjhaya sengathi bayokubeka ama-ankerabo ngaphambi komkhumbi .
44027031	Nje-ke uPowula wathi emphathimabuthweni nemajonini : “ Nangabe abathayi laba abahlali ngemkhunjini , angekhe nakwazi ukusinda . ”

44027035	Bona aqede ukutjho lokho , wathatha isikwa wathokoza kuZimu phambi kwabo boke , wasihlephula wathoma ukugoma .

44027039	Kuthe bona kuse , akhange babone isebe , kodwana babona iligu elinetjhwabatjhwaba , bahlela bona bakhuphele umkhumbi khona nabe bekungakghonakala .
44027040	Yeke baquntula iintambo ezibambe ama-ankera , bawatjhiya ngemanzini . Kwathi khonokho batjhaphulula neentambo ebegade zibambe amaphini amabili amakhulu ebebanqophisa ngawo umkhumbi . Baphakamisa iseyila elikhulu eliphambili emkhunjini , baya eligwini .
44027041	Kodwana umkhumbi wabetha phezu komqoqo wetjhwabatjhwaba wabhajwa ngemanzini ; ipumulo yomkhumbi yabambeka yabhalelwa kutjhida , isidunu sona saphulwa mamaza saba ziinquqwana .
44027042	Amajoni aluka iqhinga lokubulala zoke iimbotjhwa , khona zingazukghona ukududa zibaleke .
44027043	Kodwana ngokufisa ukusindisa uPowula , umphathimabutho wawakhalimela bona angakwenzi lokho . Wayala woke amadoda akghona ukududa bona eqe qangi adudele eligwini .
44027044	Aseleko bekazokulandela , abambelele phezu kwamapulanka nanyana phezu kwezinye iinqezwana eziphukileko emkhunjini . Ngendlela le , woke afika eligwini aphephile .
44028001	Emva kobana sisindile , sezwa bona isihlengelo besibizwa bona yiMalta .
44028002	Abantu balapho basibonisa isisa esingakavami . Njengombana besele lizokuna begodu kumakhaza , baphemba umlilo basihlalisa khona .
44028003	UPowula wabuthelela iinkuni , kwathi lokha nakazibeka phezu komlilo , kwaphuma inyoka ngebanga lokutjhisa , yanamathela esandleni sakhe .
44028004	Kwathi lokha abantu balapho nababona inyoka ilembelele esandleni sakaPowula bathi omunye komunye : “ Umuntu lo ufuze ukuba mbulali , kuthi nanyana asinde elwandle , uDike akakamvumeli bona aphile . ”
44028005	Kodwana yena wathintithela inyoka leyo ngemlilweni angakalimali ndawo .
44028006	Bebalindele bona uzavuvuka namkha aduleke phasi afe ; kodwana ngemva kokulindela isikhathi eside angenzeki ilitho , batjhugulula imikhumbulwabo , bathi unguzimu .
44028007	Mlenzana nalapho bekukhona indawo yendoda emrholi wesihlengeleneso ekuthiwa nguPhubhliyusi . Yena wasamukela ngommoya omuhle , sahlala amalanga amathathu sibathekeli bakhe .
44028008	Uyise lakaPhubhliyusi gade alele agula aphethwe mgomani nendeni . UPowula waya kuye wathandaza , wambeka izandla wampholisa .
44028009	Kuthe bona kwenzeke lokho , boke abantu abagulako besihlengeleni beza bapholiswa .
44028010	Basihlonipha ngeendlela ezinengi bekwathi nasele sikhamba balayitjha koke ebegade sikuhlonga ekhambeni lethu .
44028011	Emva kweenyanga ezintathu sathaya ngomkhumbi owaqeda ubusika boke ngesihlengeleni ; bewungowe-Alekzandriya , uneenthombe zabosingazimu uKastori noPoluksi epumulwenawo .
44028012	Safika eSirakusa , sahlala lapho amalanga amathathu .

44028015	Abazalwana beRoma sele bezwile ngathi , beza bazosihlangabeza . Abanye beza ngendlela ekuthiwa yi-Apiyusi ukufikela eForumi Apiyi kwathi abanye bafika ekumbeni yeenkhambi ebekuthiwa yiTiresi Taverinoni Kuthe bona uPowula ababone , wathokoza uZimu bewaqina idolo .

44028017	Ngemva kwamalanga amathathu uPowula wabiza abarholi bamaJuda wendawo bona bahlangane . Kwathi bona bahlangane , wathi kibo : “ Bafowethu ! Nanyana ngingakenzi ilitho elimbi ebantwini bekhethu nemasikweni esawafumana kibobamkhulu , ngabotjhwa ngeJerusalema , nganikelwa emaRomeni .

44028020	Kungebangeli ngibawe ukubonana nani , ngikhulumisane nani . Mbala , ngebanga lethemba laka-Israyeli ngibotjhwe ngeenketanezi . ”

44028026	‘ Khamba uye esizwenesi ufese uthi : “ ‘ Nizokuzwa kodwana ningazwisisi ; nizokubona kodwana ningatjheji .

45001001	Incwadi le ivela kimi mina Powula , inceku kaKrestu Jesu , owabizelwa ekubeni mpostoli , wahlukaniselwa ivangeli lakaZimu .
45001002	Ivangeli lelo walethembisa ngaphambilini ngabaphorofidi bakhe emitlolweni ecwengileko .
45001003	Iye , ivangeli elimayelana neNdodanakhe eyaba sizukulwana sakaDavida ngokwenyama ,
45001004	begodu yatjhunyayelwa ngamandla bona iyiNdodana kaZimu ukuya ngokoMoya wobucwenga ngokuvuswa kwayo ekufeni : uJesu Krestu iKosethu ,
45001005	esamukela ngaye isisa nobupostoli ukuletha ukulalela ukukholwa hlangana nabatjhili ngebanga lebizo lakhe ,

45001007	Kibo boke abathandekako kuZimu abaseRoma , ababizelwe ekubeni ngabacwengileko : Akube kini umusa nokuthula okuvela kuZimu uBaba wethu neKosini uJesu Krestu .
45001008	Kokuthoma , ngithokoza uZimami ngoJesu Krestu ngani noke ngombana ukukholwa kwenu kutjhunyayelwa ephasini loke .
45001009	UZimu engimlotjha ngommoyami nengitjhumayela ivangeli leNdodanakhe , ungufakazami bonyana ngihlala nginikhumbula njalo emthandazwenami ,
45001010	ngibawa bonyana entandwenakhe uZimu , ngigcine ngiphumelele ukuza kini .
45001011	Ngihlulukela ukunibona ukuze ngabelane nani ezinye zezipho zakaMoya , nginiqinise ,

45001013	Angithandi bazalwana bona ningabi nelwazi lokobana bengifuna kangangani ukuza kini ( kodwana bengiseze ngiqabelwa ukwenza njalo bekube nje ) ukuze ngizuze isivuno phakathi kwenu njengombana ngenzile phakathi kwabo boke abatjhili .
45001014	Nginesibopho kumaGirigi nakabatjhili , kabahlakaniphileko nabanganalwazi ,
