45001018	Ubukhali bakaZimu bubonakala buvela ezulwini , behlela phezu kwakho koke okungakhambisani noZimu kanye nobukhohlakali balabo abavimba iqiniso ngokonakala kwabo .
45001019	Okwazekako ngoZimu kuyakhanya kibo ngombana uZimu ubavezele khona .
45001020	Soloko kwangesikhathi sokudalwa kwephasi , amandlakhe angapheliko kanye nemvelo yakhe yobuZimu , nanyana ingabonakali ngokwayo , phezu kobana ikhona , beyiseze izwisiswa begodu ibonwa ezintweni azidalileko . Ngalokho-ke abantu abanabo ubusithelo ,
45001021	ngombana nanyana bebaseze bamazi uZimu , azange bebamhloniphe namkha bamthokoze , kodwana babe nemikhumbulo engatjho ilitho , neengqondo zabo ezingazisiko zafiphala .
45001022	Bazitjela bona bahlakaniphile , ngalokho baba ziindlhayela .
45001023	Banana iphazimulo kaZimu ongabhubhiko ngemifanekiso emfuziselo wabatu ababhubhako namkha yeenyoni namkha yeenlwana ezinemilenze emine namkha yeenrhurhubi .
45001024	Nje-ke uZimu wabanikela eenkanukweni zeenhliziyo zabo , emanyaleni nekuhlazisaneni ngemizimbabo
45001025	ngombana banana iqiniso ngoZimu kobana bazuze amala , balotjha bebasebenzela okudaliweko kunoMdali , okunguye okufanele adunyiswe ngokungapheliko . Amen .
45001026	Ngebangelo-ke , uZimu wabanikela ekutjhisakaleni okuhlazisako . Abafazi bakhona balisa indlela yemvelo yamabhayi bangena kokungasiyimvelo ,
45001027	ngokunjalo namadoda wakhona alisa indlela yemvelo yokuya emabhayini nomfazi , afuthelana ngokukhanukana wona . Amadoda enza ubuhlola namanye amadoda , ngalokho azamukelisa ngokwawo isibetho esifanele ubuhlola bawo .
45001028	Njengombana abantwabo bangazange bakhathalele ukumazi uZimu , yeke uZimu wabanikela emikhumbulweni eyonakeleko nezintweni ekungakameli zenziwe .
45001029	Bebazele ngayo yoke imihlobo yobukhohlakali , ubumbi , ubumarhamaru nezondo . Bazele ngomona , ukubulala , ukuphikisana , ikohliso , ubuqili , ihlebo ,
45001030	ubugongodi , ukuhloya uZimu , ukuthukana , ukuzikhakhazisa , ukuzazi , ukusungula ubumbi , ukungalaleli ababelethi ,
45001031	iye , baziindlhadlha , abakholwa , abananhliziyo begodu bafe ivalo .
45001032	Bayasazi isimiso sakaZimu sokobana labo abenza izinto ezinjalo bafanelwa kukufa , khonapho abazenzi kwaphela , kodwana bakwakwazela nalabo abazenzako .
45002001	Yeke awunalo izaba , nanyana ungaba ngubani , wena ogweba abanye ; nawugweba omunye umuntu uzilahla wena ngombana uthi ugweba abanye nje khibe nawe wenza yona into abayenzako leyo .
45002002	Siyazi bona isigwebo sakaZimu kilabo abenza izinto ezinjalo singokweqiniso .
45002003	Alo-ke wena , nanyana ungaba ngubani , udlumbana bona nawugweba labo abenza okunjalo khonapho khibe nawe uyakwenza lokho , uzakuphunyurha esigwebeni sakaZimu na ?
45002004	Kghani unyaza umusa omkhulu kaZimu nokunyamezela kwakhe okubanzi na ? Awuboni bonyana uZimu unomusa ngombana uhlose bona utjhuguluke na ?
45002005	Kodwana ngobulikhuni bakho nangehliziyo engatjhugulukiko , uzikghubelelela itukuthelo ngelanga lelaka elizako lokha ukugweba okulungileko kwakaZimu nakwembulwako .
45002006	Uzakuvuza omunye nomunye ngokwemisebenzakhe :
45002007	Labo abaphikelele njalo ukwenza okulungileko , barhuluphele iphazimulo nedumo nokungabhubhi ; uzobapha ukuphila okungapheliko .
45002008	Kodwana labo abazifunela kwabo nabangalaleli iqiniso , balalela ukukhohlakala , bazokwehlelwa lilaka netukuthelo .
45002009	Kuzokuba khona isizi neenhlungu kibo boke abenza ubumbi ; kuzokuthoma ngomJuda kulandele umGirigi ,
45002010	kodwana kibo boke abenza okulungileko , kuzokuba khona iphazimulo , idumo nokuthula ; kuthome ngomJuda kulandele umGirigi
45002011	ngombana uZimu akakhethi ubuso .
45002012	Boke abone bangaphandle komthetho , bazokubhujiswa bangaphandle komthetho ; nabo boke abone bangaphasi komthetho , bazokugwetjwa ngomthetho .
45002013	Yeke akusibo abezwa umthetho abangabalungileko phambi kwakaZimu , kodwana ngabenza okutjhiwo mthetho , labo-ke ngibo abazokulungisiswa .
45002014	Lokha abatjhili , abanganawo umthetho , nabaphetha okutjhiwo mthetho ngaphandle kokuyalwa , labo-ke , nanyana banganawo umthetho , bamthetho ngokwabo .
45002015	Bayakhombisa bonyana lokho okufunwa mthetho kutlolwe ngeenhliziyweni zabo , okufakazelwa ngunembeza wabo , nemikhumbulo yabo evuthako iyabalahla namkha ibahlambulule
45002016	ngelanga , ukuya ngokwevangeli lami , mhlana uZimu azokugweba ngalo imicabango efihlakeleko yabo boke , ngoJesu Krestu .
45002017	Wena-ke ozibiza ngomJuda bese uthembela emthethweni bewuzigqaje ngokuba nobudlelwano noZimu ,
45002018	wazi intandwakhe bewuqunte nokobana ngikuphi okulungileko ngombana wena ukhamba ngomthetho ;
45002019	begodu unesiqiniseko sokobana umhlahli wesiphofu , umkhanyo walabo abasebumnyameni ;
45002020	umyali weendlhayela , umfundisi wabantwana , unalo loke ilwazi lomthetho neqiniso ,
45002021	alo-ke , wena ofundisa abanye , kubayini ungazifundisi wena na ? Utjhumayela ngokujamelana nokweba khibe ngapha wena uyeba na ?
45002022	Wena ojamelene nokuhlobonga , uyahlobonga na ? Wena onyenya abosingazimu , udlelezelelani amathempeli ?
45002023	Wena ozigqaja ngomthetho , uhlubukelani uZimu ngokwephula umthetho na ?
45002024	Iye , kutloliwe kwathiwa : “ Ibizo lakaZimu liyahlanjalazwa phakathi kwabatjhili ngebanga lakho . ”
45002025	Ukusoka kunobubhadekelo nakube uphetha umthetho , kodwana nawephula umthetho , ukusoka kwakho semlunga ungakasoki .
45002026	Yeke nakube labo abangakasoki baphetha okufunwa mthetho , ukungasoki kwabo akuzukuthathwa njengokusoka na ?
45002027	Ngalokho-ke abangakasoki enyameni kodwana abaphetha umthetho bazonilahla nina eninomthetho otloliweko begodu ninokusokwa kodwana nibe nephula umthetho .
45002028	Umuntu akabi mJuda ngokubonakala ngaphandle , ngokunjalo nokusoka kwamambala akusikho okubonakalako nokwangaphandle .
45002029	Kodwana umuntu uba mJuda ngaphakathi , ngokunjalo nokusoka kwamambala ngokwehliziyo , kuyinto kaMoya , akusingokwenyama . Umuntu onjalo ufunyana idumo kuZimu , ingasi ebantwini .
45003001	Kusiza ngani ukuba mJuda namkha kuqakatheke ngani ukusoka na ?
45003002	Kusiza khulu ngazo zoke iindlela . Kokuthoma amaJuda aphathiswe umlayezo kaZimu .
45003003	Alo , kwenzakalani nakube abanye azange bathembeke na ? Ukungakholwa kwabo kuzakwenza bona ukwethembeka kwakaZimu kube lilize na ?
45003004	Nakanye ! Nanyana woke umuntu amleyimala , uZimu yena uneqiniso njengombana kutloliwe kwathiwa : “ Ukuze uhlanjululwe emezwinakho , uhlule ekugwebeni kwakho . ”
45003005	Kodwana nangabe ukungalungi kwethu kubonakalisa ukulunga kwakaZimu , sizokuthini na ? Sithi uZimu akakalungi nasihlunguphaza ngetukuthelo na ? ( Ngikhuluma ngendlela yabantu ) .
45003006	Nakanye ! Nabegade kunjalo , uZimu ubezaligweba njani iphasi na ?
45003007	Kodwana nakube ngamangami iqiniso lakaZimu landisa iphazimulwakhe , ngisabekelwani-ke umlandu wokuba sisoni na ?
45003008	Kungebanga lani-ke singathi : “ Asenzeni okumbi ukuze kuvele okuhle ” na ? Iye , sitjho njalo njengombana abantu abathileko nabasithukako bathi sitjho njalo . Abantwabo , ukulahlwa kwabo kubafanele .
45003009	Alo-ke sizakuthini na ? Sizakuthi singcono kunabanye na ? Awa , nakanye , ngombana sele sibamangalele boke labo ngokuthi bangaphasi kwamandla wesono , okutjho umJuda nomGirigi ,
45003010	njengombana kutloliwe kwathiwa : “ Akakho olungileko , ngitjho noyedwa tere .
45003011	Akakho noyedwa olemukako , akakho noyedwa ofuna uZimu .
45003012	Boke baphambukile , baphenduke baba msuqwa ndawonye . Akakho okhombisa isisa , akakho ngitjho noyedwa tere .
45003013	Imiphimbo yabo imaliba avulekileko ; basebenzisa amalimabo ukukhohlisa . Isihlungu seenyoka singaphasi kweembhena zabo .
45003014	Imilomo yabo izele ukwethukana nobumunyu .
45003015	Iinyawo zabo zimsinyana ekuthululeni iingazi .
45003016	Icucu nesizi kusendlelenabo ,
45003017	indlela yokuthula abayazi .
45003018	Ukwesaba uZimu akukho emehlwenabo . ”
45003019	Gadesi sele sisazi bona nanyana yini etjhiwo mthetho , imalungana nalabo abangaphasi komthetho ukuze yoke imilomo ithuliswe , nephasi loke libe nokuziphendulela kuZimu .
45003020	Akunamuntu ozakulungisiswa phambi kwakhe ngemisebenzi etjhiwo mthetho ngombana emthethweni kuvela ilwazi lesono .
45003021	Kodwana kwanjesi , ngaphandle komthetho , ukulunga kwakaZimu sele kwembuliwe , begodu kufakazelwa mthetho nabaphorofidi ,
45003022	ukulunga kwakaZimu ngokukholwa kuJesu Krestu kibo boke abakholwako . Nje-ke akunamehluko ,
45003023	ngombana boke bonile , batlhayelelwa yiphazimulo kaZimu .
45003024	Kodwana kwanjesi sele balungisiswa ngomusakhe njengesipho ngokuhlengwa okukuKrestu Jesu ,
45003025	uZimu anikela ngaye njengomhlabelo wesono ngeengazi zakhe , ngokukholwa . Wakwenza lokho ukubonisa ukulunga kwakhe ngombana ngokubekezela kwakhe kobuZimu , azange abale izono ezenziwe phambilini .
45003026	Lokho bekukubonisa kilesikhathi bonyana yena ngokwakhe ulungile begodu ulungisisa loyo okholwa kuJesu .
45003027	Alo-ke kuphi ukuzigqaja na ? Akubalwa nokubalwa . Ngamuphi umthetho na ? Ngomthetho wemisebenzi ? Awa , kodwana ngomthetho wokukholwa .
45003028	Thina esiyiphetheko ngethi umuntu ulungisiswa ngokukholwa ngaphandle kwemisebenzi etjhiwo mthetho .
45003029	Kghani uZimu lo nguZimu wamaJuda kwaphela na ? Akasuye nowabatjhili na ? Iye , nabatjhili unguZimabo ,
45003030	ngombana uZimu munye ; begodu uzokulungisisa abasokileko ngeenzathu zokukholwa nabangakasoki ngakho ukukholwa lokho .
45003031	Alo-ke , ingabe siyawulahla umthetho ngebanga lokukholwa lokhu na ? Nakanye ! Kodwana esikhundleni salokho siyawuhlonipha umthetho .
45004001	Alo , sizakuthi yini ezuzwe ngu-Abrahamu ukhokho wethu ngokwenyama na ?
45004002	Yeke nangabe u-Abrahamu walungisiswa ngemisebenzi , khona-ke unakho angazigqaja ngakho kodwana ingasi phambi kwakaZimu .
45004003	Umtlolo uthini na ? Kanti awuthi : “ U-Abrahamu wakholwa uZimu , nje-ke kwabalelwa kuye njengokulunga . ”
45004004	Nje-ke kiloyo osebenzako , umrholo awuthathwa njengesipho kodwana kuyinto eyifanelo yakhe .
45004005	Kodwana kiloyo othi ngaphandle kwemisebenzi athembele kiloyo olungisisa abangakalungi , ukukholwa okunjalo kubalelwa bona kukulunga .
45004006	Ngokunjalo uDavida ukhuluma ngokubusiseka kwalabo uZimu ababalele ukulunga ngaphandle kwemisebenzi wathi :
45004007	“ Babusisiwe labo abalitjalelwe iimphambeko zabo , abazono zabo ziditjizesiwe .
45004008	Ubusisiwe loyo uSomnini angeze asambalela isono . ”
45004009	Alo kghani isibusiswesi siphezu kwabasokileko kwaphela namkha naphezu kwabangakasoki na ? Thina sithi : Ukukholwa kwabalelwa u-Abrahamu njengokulunga .
45004010	Alo-ke lokhu kwabalelwa njani kuye na ? Bekungaphambi kobana asoke namkha ngemva kokusoka na ? Bekungasi ngemva kokusoka kwakhe kodwana bekungaphambili .
45004011	Wamukela itshwayo lokusoka njengesigibo sokulunga abe nakho ngokukholwa lokha nangakabi ukusoka . Ihloso bekukumenza ukhokho wabo boke abakholwa ngaphandle kobana basokwe , ngalokho-ke kwabalelwa kibo ukulunga .
45004012	Yeke unguyise wabasokileko , iye , abangakasoki kwaphela kodwana ababuye balandele isibonelo sokukholwa ukhokho wethu u-Abrahamu aba nakho ngaphambi kobana asokwe .
45004013	Isithembiso sokobana uzokuzuza iphasi azange size ku-Abrahamu namkha eenzukulwaneni zakhe ngomthetho kodwana seza ngokulunga okuza ngokukholwa .
45004014	Nakube ngabanamathela emthethweni abazokuba ziindlalifa , khona-ke ukukholwa kulilize nesithembiso sidududu .
45004015	Umthetho ubanga itukuthelo , kodwana lapha kunganamthetho khona , nokweqa akukho .
45004016	Ngalokho-ke sekuya ngokukholwa ukuze isithembiso sinzinze emseni besiqinisekiswe kizo zoke iinzukulwana zakhe , ingasi kwaphela labo abanamathele emthethweni kodwana nakilabo abahlanganyela ukukholwa kwaka-Abrahamu ( ngombana ungubaba wethu soke ,
45004017	njengombana kutloliwe kwathiwa : “ Ngikwenze uyise wezizwe ezinengi . ” ) phambi koZimu amkholwako , onikela abafileko ipilo abe abize izinto ezingekho kobana zibe khona .
45004018	Kwathi kunganathemba , yena waba nethemba , wakholwa bona uzokuba , “ nguyise wezizwe ezinengi , ” njengombana kwatjhiwo kuye kwathiwa : “ Sizakuba njalo-ke isizukulwana sakho . ”
45004019	Azange abe buthakathaka ekukholweni lokha naqala umzimbakhe ebesele sewufana newofileko ( ngombana besele pheze aneminyaka elikhulu ubudala ) iye , nalokha nacabanga bona uSara uyinyumba .
45004020	Akunasiqabo esamenza bona azaze isithembiso sakaZimu , kodwana waqina amandla ekukholweni kwakhe , wadumisa uZimu ,
45004021	anesiqiniseko ngokuzeleko bonyana uZimu unamandla wokwenza lokho akuthembisileko .
45004022	Ngalokho-ke ukukholwa kwakhe “ kwabalelwa kuye njengokulunga . ”
45004023	Nje-ke amezwi athi : “ Kwabalelwa kuye ” , ayengakatlolelwa yena yedwa ,
45004024	kodwana thina soke . Kuzakubalelwa kithi thina esikholwa kuye owavusa uJesu iKosethu ekufeni ,
45004025	owanikelwa ekufeni ngebanga leemphambeko zethu bewavuswa mayelana nokulungisiswa kwethu .
45005001	Yeke njengombana sesilungisiswe ngokukholwa , sinokuthula noZimu ngeKosethu uJesu Krestu ,
45005002	esifunyene ngayo ubungeno emseni lo esidzimelele kiwo begodu siyazigqaja ethembeni lethu lokuhlanganyela ephazimulweni kaZimu .
45005003	Akusikho lokho kwaphela , kodwana godu siyazigqaja ekuhluphekeni kwethu , sisazi bonyana ukuhlupheka kuveza ukubekezela ,
45005004	ukubekezela kuveza ukuziphatha , ukuziphatha kuveza ithemba ,
45005005	yeke ithemba alisidanisi ngombana ithando lakaZimu lithelwe ngeenhliziyweni zethu ngoMoya oCwengileko esinikelwe yena .
45005006	Sathi sisesebuthakathaka , ngesikhathi esifaneleko uKrestu wafela abangakalungi .
45005007	Ngambala , akukavami bona umuntu afele olungisisiweko , nanyana mhlambe kwenzeka bona umuntu angahle afele olungileko .
45005008	Kodwana uZimu ubonise ithando lakhe kithi ngendlela yokobana sithe sisesezizoni , uKrestu wasifela .
45005009	Khulukhulu-ke kwanjesi , njengombana sele silungisisiwe ngeengazi zakhe , sizakusindiswa ngaye elakeni lakaZimu .
45005010	Nakube kwathi sisesezizitha , senziwa bona sibuyisane noZimu ngokufa kweNdodanakhe , kangangani-ke kwanjesi nasele sibuyisene naye , sizakusindiswa ngepilwakhe .
45005011	Kodwana ngaphezu kwalokho , sibuye sizigqaje kuZimu ngeKosethu uJesu Krestu , ngayo esamukele ukubuyisana .
45005012	Yeke njengombana isono seza ephasini ngomuntu munye , ukufa kwangena ngesono , ngaleyondlela ukufa kwadlulela kibo boke abantu ngombana boke bonile .
45005013	Isono besivele sikhona ephasinapha umthetho ungakabikhona , kodwana isono asibalelwa nakube umthetho awukho .
45005014	Khonapho ukufa kwaba namandla ukusukela ku-Adamu ukuya kuMosi , ngitjho naphezu kwalabo izono zabo ebezingafani nesiphambeko saka-Adamu omfuziselo waloyo obekazokuza .
45005015	Kodwana isipho somusa asifani nesiphambeko . Nakube abanengi bafa ngebanga lesiphambeko somuntu oyedwa , wavama kangangani-ke umusa kaZimu kanye nesipho somusa esavela ngomuntu oyedwa , okunguJesu Krestu , phezu kwabanengi .
45005016	Godu isipho somusa asifani nomphumela wesono somuntu munye ; ngombana isigwebo eseza ngebanga lesiphambeko somuntu munye saletha ukulahlwa , kodwana isipho somusa eseza ngebanga leemphambeko zabanengi , saletha ukulungisiswa .
45005017	Nakube , ngebanga lesiphambeko somuntu oyedwa , ukufa kwabusa ngaye oyedwa loyo , bazokuba namandla kangangani-ke labo abazakwamukela umusa omkhulu kanye nesipho somusa sokulunga phezu kwepilo ngomuntu oyedwa , onguJesu Krestu .
45005018	Yeke njengombana isiphambeko somuntu oyedwa sarholela ekulahlweni kwabo boke , ngokunjalo-ke isenzo sokulunga somuntu oyedwa sirholela ekulungisisweni kanye nekuphileni kwabo boke .
45005019	Njengombana ngokungalaleli komuntu oyedwa abantu abanengi baba zizoni , ngokunjalo-ke ngokulalela komuntu oyedwa , abanengi bazakwenziwa abalungileko .
45005020	Kodwana umthetho wabekwa , ngaleyondlela ukuphambeka kwanda , nokho lapha kwande khona isono , nomusa uba kangako
45005021	ukuze kuthi njengombana isono sabusa ngokufa , ngokunjalo-ke nomusa ubusa ngokulungisiswa okurholela ekuphileni okungapheliko ngoJesu Krestu iKosethu .
45006001	Alo-ke sizakuthini na ? Kufanele sirage siphile esonweni ukuze kuvame umusa na ?
45006002	Nakanye ! Thina esesafa esonweni , singaraga njani siphile kiso na ?
45006003	Kghani anazi bonyana soke thina esabhabhadiselwa kuKrestu Jesu , sabhabhadiselwa ekufeni kwakhe na ?
45006004	Nje-ke sabulungwa kanye naye ngokubhabhadiselwa ekufeni ukuze kuthi njengombana uKrestu avuswa ekufeni ngephazimulo kaBaba , ngokunjalo nathi sikhambe epilweni etja .
45006005	Nangabe besihlanganiswe naye ekufeni kwakhe , ngambala sizokuhlanganiswa naye nekuvukeni kwakhe .
45006006	Siyazi bona umuntu wethu omdala wabethelwa naye esiphambanweni ukuze kuthi umzimba wesono ulahlwe , singabe sisaba makhoboka wesono
45006007	ngombana nanyana ngubani ofileko , ukhululiwe emandleni wesono .
45006008	Kodwana nakube sife noKrestu , siyakholwa bonyana sizokuphila naye .
45006009	Siyazi bonyana njengombana uKrestu avuswa kabafileko , angekhe abuye afe godu , nokufa akusenawo amandla phezu kwakhe .
45006010	Ukufa akufako , wakufela esonweni kwaba kanye ; kodwana ukuphila akuphilako , ukuphila kuZimu .
45006011	Ngokunjalo-ke nani kufanele nizithathe njengabafileko mayelana nesono , kodwana niphile kuZimu ngoKrestu Jesu .
45006012	Nje-ke ningasavumeli isono bona sibuye sibuse imizimba yenu ebhubhako besinenze bona nithobele iinkanuko zayo .
45006013	Ningabe nisanikela izitho zenu zomzimba esonweni kobana sizisebenzise njengeensetjenziswa zobukhohlakali , kodwana zinikeleni kuZimu njengalabo ababuyiswe ekufeni basiwa ekuphileni , ninikele izitho zemizimba yenu kuZimu njengeensetjenziswa zokulunga .
45006014	Ngaleyondlela isono angeze sabusa phezu kwenu njengombana ningasingaphasi komthetho kodwana ningaphasi komusa .
45006015	Alo sizakuthini na ? Sizakona ngombana batjho asisingaphasi komthetho kodwana singaphasi komusa na ? Nakanye !
45006016	Kghani anazi bona lokha nanizinikela kinanyana ngubani njengamakhoboka alalelako , niba makhoboka waloyo enimthobelako na ? Ningaba makhoboka wesono esirholela ekufeni namkha nibe makhoboka wokulalela okurholela ekulungisisweni .
45006017	Kodwana akadunyiswe uZimu kobana nina enakhe naba makhoboka wesono , sele ningabalalelako ukuthoma ehliziyweni ukuya endleleni yesifundo enamukeliswa sona ,
45006018	nokobana nikhululiwe esonweni , naba makhoboka wokulunga .
45006019	Ngikhuluma ngendlela ejayelekileko ngebanga lobuthakathaka benyama yenu . Njengombana nakhe nanikela izitho zenu njengamakhoboka wokusilapheleko esiphambekweni esikhulu khulu , nje-ke nikelani izitho zenu njengamakhoboka wokulunga kikho ukucwengiswa .
45006020	Lokha nanisesemakhoboka wesono , benitjhaphulukile mayelana nokulunga .
45006021	Alo , nazuzani nje ngezinto esele nineenhloni ngazo namhlanjesi na ? Isiphetho sezintwezo kukufa .
45006022	Kodwana gadesi njengombana sele nikhululiwe esonweni benaba makhoboka kaZimu nje , umvuzo eniwufunyanako kucwengiswa . Isiphetho salokho kuphila okungapheliko .
45006023	Umvuzo wesono kukufa ; kodwana isipho somusa kaZimu sikuphila okungapheliko ngoKrestu Jesu iKosethu .
45007001	Bazalwana , ngikhuluma nalabo abazi umthetho ; kghani anazi bonyana umthetho uba sibopho phezu komuntu , kwaphela umuntu loyo nasaphilako na ?
45007002	Ngaleyondlela umfazi ngokomthetho ubopheleleke endodenakhe qobana isaphila ; kodwana yahlongakala , uyatjhatjhululwa emthethweni omayelana nendodakhe .
45007003	Ekhabo lakhona , uzakubizwa bona sihlobongi nakube wenda kenye indoda khisibe yakhe isaphila . Kodwana nasele indodakhe ihlongakele , utjhaphulukile emthethweni lowo , nje-ke nakube wenda kenye indoda , akabi sihlobongi .
45007004	Nakini-ke kunjalo , bazalwana ; nafa emthethweni ngomzimba kaKrestu ukuze nibe ngewomunye , loyo owavuswa ekufeni ukuze sithelele uZimu iinthelo .
45007005	Lokha nabesisaphila enyameni , iinkanuko zethu zokona , ebezivuswa mthetho , bezisebenza ezithweni zethu kobana sithele iinthelo zokufa .
45007006	Kodwana kwanjesi sitjhatjhululiwe emthethweni , safa kilokho ebekusibophile ukuze sibe makhoboka angasi ngaphasi komthetho wakade otloliweko kodwana angaphasi kwepilo etja yakaMoya .
45007007	Alo-ke sizakuthini na ? Kghani sizakuthi umthetho usisono ? Awa , nakanye ! Nokho nagade kungasi ngebanga lomthetho , bengingekhe ngasazi isono . Bengingekhe ngazi bona kuyini ukukhanuka nabethana umthetho akhange uthi : “ Ungakhanuki . ”
45007008	Kodwana isono safunyana ithuba ngomyalo , saveza kimi yoke imihlobo yekanuko . Ngaphandle komthetho , isono sife ukufa .
45007009	Ngakhe ngaphila ngaphandle komthetho . Kodwana kwathi nakufika umyalo , isono savuka ,
45007010	yeke ngafa . Kwathi wona umyalo lowo obewufanele ungilethele ukuphila , wabonakala ukukufa kimi
45007011	ngombana isono safunyana ithuba ngomyalo , sangilutha , bekwathi ngawo sangibulala .
45007012	Nje-ke umthetho ucwengile nomyalo ucwengile , ulungile begodu muhle .
45007013	Alo , kutjho bona lokho okuhle kwaletha ukufa kimi na ? Awa , nakanye ! Kwaba sisono esangena nokufa kimi ngokusebenzisa okuhle ukuze isono sibonakaliswe sisisono , begodu kuthi ngomyalo sibe sisono sakosono .
45007014	Siyazi bona umthetho ungewokommoya , kodwana mina ngingowenyama , ngathengiselwa ebukhobokeni ngaphasi kwesono .
45007015	Angizipheleli ngombana angenzi lokho engikuthandako , kodwana ngenza kanye lokho engingakufuniko .
45007016	Nje-ke , nakube ngenza lokho engingakufuniko , kutjho bona ngiyavuma bonyana umthetho muhle .
45007017	Emanyeni akusesengimi owenza lokho , kodwana ngikwenziswa sisono esikimi
45007018	ngombana ngiyazi bona akunalitho elilungileko elihlala ngaphakathi kwami , lokho kusemvelwenami yenyama . Ngingathanda ukwenza okuhle kodwana ngiyabhalelwa bona ngikwenze
45007019	ngombana angenzi okuhle engithanda ukukwenza , kodwana okumbi engingafuni ukukwenza , ngiyakwenza .
45007020	Nangabe ngenza lokho engingathandi ukukwenza , khona-ke angizipheleli , ngenziswa sisono esihlala ngaphakathi kwami .
45007021	Ngalokho-ke ngikufunyana kumthetho ongibusako wokobana nangifuna ukwenza okuhle , ubumbi bungilalele eduze .
45007022	Emanyeni ngithatjiswa mthetho kaZimu ngaphakathi kwami ,
45007023	kodwana ngibona ezithweni zami kunomthetho omunye olwisana nomthetho womkhumbulwami , ungenza ngibe likhoboka lomthetho wesono ohlala ngaphakathi kwezitho zami .
45007024	Maye mina ngilisizi ! Ngubani ozongikhulula kilomzimba wokufa na ?
45007025	Akathokozwe uZimu ngoJesu Krestu iKosethu ! Nje-ke ngomkhumbulwami ngilikhoboka emthethweni kaZimu , kodwana ngenyama yami ngilikhoboka emthethweni wesono .
45008001	Yeke akusekho ukulahlwa kilabo abakuKrestu Jesu
45008002	ngombana umthetho kaMoya wokuphila okuKrestu Jesu , ukukhululile emthethweni wesono newokufa .
45008003	Lokho umthetho ogade unganamandla wokukwenza ngebanga lokwenziwa buthakathaka yimvelo yesono , uZimu wakwenza ngokuthumela iNdodanakhe ngobujamo bomuntu wokona kobana ibe mhlabelo wehlambululo
45008004	ukuze okulungileko okufunwa mthetho kuzaliseke kithi , thina esingakhambi ngokwenyama kodwana ngokoMoya .
45008005	Labo abaphila ngokwenyama babeka imikhumbulwabo ezintweni zenyama , kodwana abaphila ngokukaMoya babeka imikhumbulwabo kokukaMoya .
45008006	Ukubeka umkhumbulo kokwenyama kukukufa , kodwana ukubeka umkhumbulo kokukaMoya kukuphila kanye nokuthula .
45008007	Ngesizathweso-ke umkhumbulo osenyameni ulinaba kuZimu ; awuthobeli umthetho kaZimu , ngambala angekhe wakghona ukuwuthobela .
45008008	Labo ababuswa yinyama angekhe bamthokozisa uZimu .
45008009	Kodwana nina anisisenyameni , nikuMoya ngombana uMoya kaZimu uhlala ngaphakathi kwenu . Umuntu onganaye uMoya kaKrestu akasuye wakaKrestu .
45008010	Kodwana nangabe uKrestu ungaphakathi kwenu , nanyana umzimba wenu ufile ngebanga lesono , ummoya wenu unokuphila ngebanga lokulunga .
45008011	Nangabe uMoya waloyo owavusa uJesu ekufeni , uphila ngaphakathi kwenu , loyo owavusa uKrestu ekufeni uzokunikela imizimba yenu ebhubhako ukuphila , ngaye uMoya ohlala ngaphakathi kwenu .
45008012	Nje-ke bazalwana , sinesibopho kodwana ingasi enyameni kobana singabe siphile ngokufuna kwayo .
45008013	Ngitjho ngombana naniphila ngokwenyama , nizokufa ; kodwana naniphila ngokoMoya , nibulala izenzo ezimbi zomzimba , nizokuphila
45008014	ngombana labo abarholwa nguMoya kaZimu , babantwana bakaZimu .
45008015	Azange namukeliswe ummoya onenza bona nibe makhoboka godu benesabe , kodwana namukele uMoya onenza nibe bantwana bakaZimu . Yeke ngaye siyabiza sithi : “ Aba , Baba ! ”
45008016	UMoya ngokwakhe ufakazela ummoya wethu bonyana sibantwana bakaZimu .
45008017	Nje-ke nakube sibantwana , kutjho bona siziindlalifa , iye , iindlalifa zakaZimu begodu siziindlalifa kanye noKrestu nakube ngambala sihlanganyela eenhluphekweni zakhe ukuze sihlanganyele naye ephazimulwenakhe .
45008018	Ngiyaqinisa bonyana iinhlupheko zesikhathesi azisililitho nazilinganiswa nephazimulo esizokwambulelwa yona .
45008019	Indalo ilindele ngetjisakalo yokulabalabela bona abantwana bakaZimu babonakaliswe .
45008020	Yeke indalo yenziwa into enganamsebenzi , ingasi ngokwentando yayo , kodwana ngokwentando yaloyo oyenze yaba njalo , ngethemba
45008021	lokobana indalo leyo ngokwayo izokutjhatjhululwa ekubotjhweni kwayo , ibole bese ilethwa ekululekweni ephazimulako yabantwana bakaZimu .
45008022	Siyazi bona yoke indalo beyiquma inemirhelo bekube kunjesi ;
45008023	begodu ingasi indalo kwaphela , kodwana nathi ngokwethu , thina esineenthelo zokuthoma zakaMoya , sibubulela ngaphakathi khibe silindele ngetjisakalo ukwenziwa abantwana bakaZimu , okukuhlengwa kwemizimba yethu .
45008024	Ngitjho ngombana sasindiswa ethembeni . Kodwana ithemba elibonwako akusilo ithemba ngombana ngubani onethemba ngento asele anayo na ?
45008025	Kodwana nasinethemba ngalokho esingakakuboni , sikulindela ngokunyamezela .
45008026	Ngokunjalo uMoya uyasisiza ebuthakathakeni bethu ngombana asikwazi ekumele sikuthandazele . Kodwana uMoya ngokwakhe usithandazela ngokububula okungekhe kwahlathululwa ngamezwi .
45008027	UZimu ohlola iinhliziyo , uyakwazi okusemkhumbulweni kaMoya ngombana uMoya uthandazela abacwengileko ngokwentando kaZimu .
45008028	Siyazi bonyana kilabo abathanda uZimu , wenza bona koke kuhlangane bekubakhambele kuhle , iye , labo ababizwe ngokweminqopho yakhe .
45008029	Labo uZimu abazi ngaphambilini , wabakhethela bona bafane nesibumbeko seNdodanakhe ukuze ibe lizibulo emndenini omkhulu .
45008030	Labo abakhetha ngaphambilini , godu wababiza , nalabo ababizileko godu wabalungisisa , nalabo abalungisisako godu wabaphazimulisa .
45008031	Alo sizakuthini ngezintwezi na ? Nakube uZimu ujame ngakithi , ngubani-ke ongajamelana nathi na ?
45008032	Yena ongazange agodle iNdodanakhe , kodwana wayinikela ngebanga lethu soke , akazukusinikela koke ngayo na ?
45008033	Ngubani ongamangalela abakhethiweko bakaZimu na ? NguZimu olungisisako .
45008034	Ngubani olahla ngomlandu na ? NguKrestu Jesu owafako , iye , owavuswa ekufeni , ohlezi ngesigomeni sakaZimu nosincengelako .
45008035	Ngubani ongasihlukanisa nethando lakaKrestu na ? Kghani ingaba kutlhaga , ziinkathazo , kuzunywa , yindlala , kutlhoga izambatho , yingozi namkha yisabula na ?
45008036	Njengombana kutloliwe kwathiwa : “ Ngebanga lakho sibulawa imihla yoke , sesesifana nezimvu zokuhlatjwa . ”
45008037	Kodwana kikho koke lokho singaphezu kwabahluli ngaye owasithandako .
45008038	Nje-ke ngineqiniso lokobana akunalitho , nanyana kungaba kukufa , kuphila , ziingilozi , babusi , zizinto ezikhona , zizinto ezizakubakhona , mibuso ,
45008039	kuphakama , kuzika , nanyana kungaba yini edaliweko ezasihlukanisa nethando lakaZimu kuKrestu Jesu iKosethu .
45009001	Ngikhuluma iqiniso kuKrestu , angirhwayi amanga ; nonembezami uyakuqinisa lokho ngoMoya oCwengileko ,
45009002	nangisithi nginokudabuka okukhulu nobuhlungu obungapheliko ehliziyweni yami .
45009003	Ngitjho ngombana bengingafisa bona mina ngokwami ngithukwe bengijutjwe kuKrestu ngebanga labazalwana bami , iye iinhlobo zami ngenyama .
45009004	Bona bama-Israyeli , baphiwe ukwenziwa abantwana bakaZimu , iphazimulo , iimvumelwano , ukunikelwa umthetho , ukulotjha kanye neenthembiso .
45009005	Bayinzalo yabokhokho lapha kuvela khona uMesiya ngokwenyama , ongikho koke , obusiswe nguZimu isiphelani . Amen .
45009006	Akusingathi ilizwi lakaZimu lihlulekile ngombana akusiwo woke ama-Israyeli angewakwa-Israyeli mbala .
45009007	Begodu akusibo boke abantwana baka-Abrahamu abaziinzukulwana zakhe zamambala , kodwana “ iinzukulwana zakho zizokuthiyelelwa ngo-Isaka . ”
45009008	Lokhu kutjho bonyana abantwana bakaZimu akusibo benyama kodwana bantwana besithembiso ababalelwa eenzukulwaneni
45009009	ngombana nakhu okwatjhiwo sithembiso : “ Ngesikhathi esifaneleko , ngaso lesisikhathi ngizakubuya , begodu noSara uzabe sele anendodana . ”
45009010	Akugcini lapho kwaphela , nakuRabega kwenzeka soneso lokha nagade azithwele abantwana bendoda yinye , engukhokho wethu u-Isaka .
45009011	Khonapho kwathi bangakabelethwa namkha benze nanyana yini ehle namkha embi ( ukuze umnqopho kaZimu wokukhetha uragele phambili
45009012	ingasi ngokwemisebenzi kodwana ngokubizwa kwakhe ) uRabega watjelwa kwathiwa : “ Omkhulu uzakukhothamela omncani ” ,
45009013	njengombana umtlolo uthi : “ UJakopo ngamthanda , kodwana u-Esewu ngamlahla . ”
45009014	Alo , sizakuthini na ? Sizakuthi uZimu akakalungi ? Awa , nakanye !
45009015	Angithi wathi kuMosi : “ Ngizokurhawukela engimrhawukelako , ngizwele engimzwelako . ”
45009016	Yeke akuyi ngentando yomuntu namkha ngamandlakhe , kodwana kuya ngomusa kaZimu
45009017	ngombana umtlolo uthi kuFaro : “ Ngakwenyusela khona lokhu kobana ngiveze amandlami ngawe nokobana ibizo lami libatjazwe kilo loke iphasi . ”
45009018	Yeke urhawukela afuna ukumrhawukela , enze bukhuni afuna ukumenza bukhuni .
45009019	Wena-ke uzakuthi kimi : “ Alo-ke , usasolelani na ? Ngubani ongajamelana nentando yakhe na ? ”
45009020	Kodwana ungubani-ke wena kobana ungaphendulana noZimu na ? Okubunjiweko kungatjho njani kumbumbi ukuthi : “ Ungibumbeleni ngaba nje na ? ”
45009021	Umbumbi akanalo ilungelo phezu komdaka na ? Angithi ngawo umdaka lowo angabumba isitja esikhethekileko godu enze esinye esingakakhetheki ?
45009022	Sizakwazi ngani nakube uZimu , ngokuthanda ukubonisa ubukhali bakhe kanye nokwazisa amandlakhe , ubekezelele khulu ngesineke izitja afanele azithukuthelele , ezibekelwe ukubhujiswa na ?
45009023	Sizakwazi ngani bona mhlambe wenze lokho ukuze kuthi lezo azibekele umusa , iye lezo azilungiselele umusa phambilini , azazise umnono wephazimulwakhe ayilungiselela zona na ?
45009024	Iye , kufaka ngitjho nathi asibizileko , ingasi hlangana namaJuda kwaphela kodwana naphakathi kwabatjhili .
45009025	Kunjengobana asitjho kuHosiya : “ Abantu ebekungasibo bami , ngizababiza bona ngebami , naloyo obekangathandeki ngithi ‘ unguthandiwe ’ . ” “ ‘ Anisibo abantu bami , ’ lapho bazakubizwa bona babantwana bakaZimu ophilako . ”
45009026	“ Nendaweni lapho kwathiwa kibo , “ ‘ Anisibo abantu bami , ’ lapho bazakubizwa bona babantwana bakaZimu ophilako . ”
45009027	U-Isaya umemezela ngo-Israyeli uthi : “ Nanyana isibalo sama-Israyeli besingangetjhwabatjhwaba yelwandle , misalela kwaphela ezakusindiswa .
45009028	Ngombana uSomnini uzosiphetha isigwebo sakhe ephasinapha ngokurhaba nangokuphelelisa . ”
45009029	Kunjengombana u-Isaya atjhwile ngaphambilini ukuthi : “ Nakube uSomnini uMninimandla woke ubengakasitjhiyeli isizukulwana , besizokuba njengeSodoma , sifane neGomora . ”
45009030	Alo , sizakuthini na ? Abatjhili abangazange batjhabatjhekele ukulungisiswa , bakufumene , okutjho ukulungisiswa ngokukholwa ,
45009031	kodwana ama-Israyeli ebegade atjhabatjhekela ukulungisiswa ngomthetho , azange aphumelele ukuthobela umthetho lowo .
45009032	Ngebanga lani na ? Ngebanga lokobana angazange akutjhabatjhekele ngokukholwa kodwana kwaba inga kungokwezenzo zawo . Akhutjwa elitjeni elisikhubekiso ,
45009033	njengombana kutlolwe kwathiwa : “ Qalani , ngibeka eZiyoni , ilitje elizokwenza abantu bakhubeke , idwala elizobenza bawe , nje-ke loyo okholwa kuye , angeze ajabhiswa . ”
45010001	Bazalwana bami , isifiso sehliziywami kanye nomthandazwami kuZimu kukobana ama-Israyeli asindiswe .
45010002	Ngingafakaza bonyana anetjisakalo ngoZimu , kodwana akanawo umkhanyo .
45010003	Ngokungayeleli kwawo ukulunga okuvela kuZimu , afuna ukuzenzela kwawo , azange azinikele ekulungeni kwakaZimu .
45010004	Isiphetho somthetho nguKrestu ukuze kube nokulungisiswa kwabo boke abakholwako .
45010005	UMosi uhlathulula ukulunga okuza ngomthetho bunje : “ Umuntu owenza izintwezi uzokuphila ngazo . ”
45010006	Kodwana ukulunga okuvela ngokukholwa kuthi : “ Ungadlumbani uthi , ‘ Ngubani ozakwenyukela ezulwini na ? ’ ” ( okutjho bona ayokwewula uKrestu ) ,
45010007	“ namkha udlumbane uthi , ‘ Ngubani ozakwehlela kabafileko na ? ’ ” ( okutjho bona ayokwenyusa uKrestu ekufeni ) .
45010008	Kodwana kuthini na ? Kuthi : “ Ilizwi lihlanu kwakho , lingemlonyenakho nangehliziywenakho . ” Iye , ilizwi lokukholwa esilitjhumayelako .
45010009	Lokha nawuvuma ngomlomakho bona uJesu uyiKosi , bewukholwe ngehliziywakho bona uZimu wamvusa kabafileko , uzokusindiswa
45010010	ngombana ukholwa ngehliziyo , ulungisiswe ; uvume ngomlomo , usindiswe .
45010011	Umtlolo uthi : “ Loyo okholwa kuye akasoze arhubutjhwa . ”
45010012	Akunamehluko phakathi komJuda nomGirigi ngombana uSomnini unguSomnini wabo boke begodu unesisa kibo boke ababiza ibizo lakhe .
45010013	Nje-ke : “ Boke ababiza ibizo lakaSomnini bazokusindiswa . ”
45010014	Kodwana bangambiza njani nabangazange bakholwe kuye na ? Begodu bangakholwa njani kuye nabangazange khebezwe ngaye na ? Godu bazakuzwa njani ngaphandle kobana kube khona otjhumayela ngaye na ?
45010015	Bazokutjhumayela njani ngaye nakube abakathunywa na ? Njengombana kutloliwe kwathiwa : “ Maye zithandeka kangangani iinyawo zalabo abaletha iindaba ezimnandi ! ”
45010016	Kodwana akusibo boke abalalele umlayezwethu ngombana u-Isaya wathi : “ Somnini , ngubani okholwe umlayezwethu na ? ”
45010017	Nje-ke , ukukholwa kuvela ngokuzwa nokuzwa kuvela elizwini lakaKrestu .
45010018	Kodwana ngiyabuza-ke : Abakezwa na ? Mbala bezwile ngombana , “ Amaphimbo wabo azwakele ephasini loke ; namezwabo emaphethelweni womhlaba . ”
45010019	Godu ngiyabuza ngithi : “ U-Israyeli akakazwisisi na ? ” Kokuthoma uMosi uthi : “ Ngizonivusela isikhwele ngalabo abangasiso isizwe , nginithukuthelise ngesizwe esisidlhadlha . ”
45010020	U-Isaya ukhuluma ngesibindi uthi : “ Ngifunyenwe ngabangazange bangifune , ngaziveza kabangazange bangibawe . ”
45010021	Kodwana ngo-Israyeli uthi : “ Imini yoke ngilulele izandla zami ebantwini abangalaleliko nabanekani . ”
45011001	Nje-ke ngiyabuza ngithi : UZimu ulahle abantu bakhe na ? Awa , nakanye . Mina ngokwami ngimIsrayeli , isizukulwana saka-Abrahamu , ilunga lekoro kaBhenjamini .
45011002	UZimu akakalahli abantu bakhe ebekaseze abazi kwaphambilini . Anazi bona umtlolo uthini ngo-Elija na ? Angithi wamangalela ama-Israyeli kuZimu ngokuthi :
45011003	“ Somnini , babulele abaphorofidi bakho , bagiriza nama-aldarakho ; sekusele mina ngedwa , nje-ke bazumana nepilwami . ”
45011004	Kodwana yathini ipendulo kaZimu kuye na ? Angithi yathi : “ Ngizibulungele abaziinkulungwana ezilikhomba abangazange bakhothamele uBhali . ”
45011005	Kusesenjalo nanamhlanjesi , kunemisalela ekhethwe ngomusa .
45011006	Kodwana nakube kungomusa , khona-ke akusese ngenca yemisebenzi , nakungasinjalo umusa awusazokuba mumusa .
45011007	Alo , sizakuthini na ? U-Israyeli wahluleka ukufumana lokho ebegade akufuna . Abakhethiweko bona bakufumana , kodwana inengi lenziwa laba likhuni ,
45011008	njengombana kutloliwe kwathiwa : “ UZimu wabanikela ummoya wobuthongo , amehlo angaboniko neendlebe ezingezwako bekube kunamhlanjesi . ”
45011009	NoDavida uthi : “ Itafula labo alibe sisifu nesirarejo , iye , isiqabo nesikhubekiso kibo !
45011010	Amehlwabo akafiphazwe ukuze angaboni , imihlana yabo ayihlale ibhesile . ”
45011011	Godu ngabuza ngathi : Bakhutjiwe bebabhusukela phasi na ? Awa , nakanye ! Kodwana ngokukhutjwa kwabo , ukusindiswa kuze kabatjhili ukuze kuvuselwe u-Israyeli isikhwele .
45011012	Kodwana nakube ukuphambeka kwabo kumnono wephasini , nokuhlulwa kwabo kumnono kabatjhili , uzakuba ngangani-ke umnono ozakulethwa kupheleliswa kwabo !
45011013	Ngikhuluma nani nina abatjhili . Njengombana ngimpostoli wabatjhili nje , ngiyawazisa umsebenzi lo ,
45011014	ukuze ngivusele abantu bekhethu isikhwele , ngalokho ngisindise abanye babo .
45011015	Nakube ukulahlwa kwabo kukubuyisana kwabantu bephasi noZimu , kuzokuba yini-ke ukwamukelwa kwabo na ? Kghani kuzakuba kuphila kwabafileko na ?
45011016	Nakube ingcenye yehlama enikelwe njengesilumo icwengile , khona-ke ihlama yoke icwengile ; nakube umrabhu ucwengile , khona-ke neengala zicwengile .
45011017	Kodwana nakube iingala ezithileko bezephuliwe , kwathi wena olihlumela le-oliva yemmangweni , wahlonyelelwa esikhundleni sazo , wahlanganyela emrajini onothileko womuthi we-oliva ,

46001002	kilo ibandla lakaZimu eKorinte , kilabo abacwengisiweko kuKrestu Jesu bebabizelwa ekucwengeni , bakanye nabo boke abakizo zoke iindawo , ababiza ibizo leKosi uJesu Krestu oyiKosabo neyethu :
46001003	Akube kini umusa nokuthula okuvela kuZimu uBaba neKosini uJesu Krestu .
46001004	Ngihlala ngimthokoza uZimu ngani ngebanga lomusa wakhe eninikelwe wona kuKrestu Jesu ,
46001005	ukuze kuthi ezintweni zoke ninjinge ngokwekulumo nangelwazi lenu loke
46001006	ngombana ubufakazi bethu ngoKrestu baqiniswa kini .
46001007	Ngalokho azange nitlhayelelwe ngitjho nangesisodwa isipho sakaMoya ekulindeni kwenu ngokuncama ukubonakaliswa kweKosi uJesu Krestu .
46001008	IKosi izoniqinisa bekube sekupheleni ukuze ningabi nomlandu ngelanga leKosi yethu uJesu Krestu .
46001009	Uthembekile uZimu owanibizela ebudlelwaneni neNdodana yakhe , uJesu Krestu iKosi yethu .
46001010	Ngiyanirabhela bazalwana ngebizo leKosi yethu uJesu Krestu bona noke nivumelane ukuze kungabikhona ukwahlukana phakathi kwenu . Bumbanani ngokupheleleko ngomkhumbulo munye nangombono munye .
46001011	Ngitjho ngombana bazalwana bami , ngibikelwe yindlu kaRhilowesi bona kukhona ukunghwarana phakathi kwenu .
46001012	Kuthiwa omunye nomunye wenu ukhuluma kwakhe uthi : “ Mina ngingewakaPowula ” , omunye athi : “ Mina ngingewaka-Apholo ” , omunye athi : “ Mina ngingewakaKhefasi ” , omunye athi : “ Mina ngingewakaKrestu ” .
46001013	Kghani uKrestu lo sele ahlukaniswe phakathi na ? UPowula wakhe wanifela esiphambanweni ? Nabhajadiswa ebizweni lakaPowula na ?
46001014	Nanje ngiyamthokoza uZimu ngombana azange ngibhabhadise namunye wenu ngaphandle kwakaKrisposi noGayusi .
46001015	Ngalokho akungabikhona noyedwa ozahle asithi batjho wabhajadiswa ebizweni lami .
46001016	Iye , ngabhabhadisa nomndeni kaStefana , ngaphezu kwalokho-ke angikhumbuli ngibhabhadisana nabanye abantu .
46001017	UKrestu azange angithume bona ngizokubhabhadisa kodwana bona ngitjhumayele ivangeli , ingasi ngamezwi wokuhlakanipha kwabantu ukuze isiphambano sakaKrestu singakghuthulwa amandla waso .
46001018	Umlayezo wesiphambano ubudlhadlha kilabo ababhubhako , kodwana kithi esisindiswako umamandla kaZimu .
46001019	Ngitjho ngombana umtlolo uthi : “ Ukuhlakanipha kwezazi ngizokutjhabalalisa , ngidide ukulemuka kwabahlakaniphileko . ”
46001020	Alo , siphike-ke isihlakaniphi na ? Siphi isazimthetho ? Uphi umazizoke walesisikhathi na ? UZimu akakenzi ukuhlakanipha kwephaseli kwaba budlhadlha na ?
46001021	Njengombana ekuhlakanipheni kwakaZimu , iphasi ngokuhlakanipha kwalo alizange limazi , yeke kwamthabisa uZimu bona kuthi ngobudlhadlha obutjhunyayelwako asindise labo abakholwako .
46001022	AmaJuda afuna iimbonakaliso zemikarisomraro , amaGirigi wona afuna ukuhlakanipha ,
46001023	nanyana kunjalo thina sitjhumayela uKrestu abethelwe esiphambanweni ; okusiqabo emaJudeni nobudlhadlha kabatjhili ,
46001024	kodwana kilabo uZimu ababizileko , abamaJuda namaGirigi , sitjhumayela uKrestu omamandla kaZimu nokuhlakanipha kwakaZimu .
46001025	Ubudlhadlha bakaZimu buhlakaniphile kunokwazi kwabantu nobuthakathaka bakaZimu bunamandla kunamandla wabantu .
46001026	Khumbulani bona beninjani nanibizwako bazalwana . Inengi lenu beningakahlakaniphi ukuya ngokwesilinganiso sabantu ; beningasibanengi ebenikwazi ukukhuluma , beningasibanengi ebenibelethelwe ekuhloniphekeni .
46001027	UZimu wakhetha izinto ezibonakala zibudlhadlha emehlweni wephasi ukuhlazisa abahlakaniphileko ; uZimu wakhetha izinto zephaseli ezibuthakathaka ukuhlazisa abanamandla .
46001028	Iye , wakhetha lokho okuqalelwa phasi kwephaseli nokunyazekako , wakhetha nalokho okungekho ukuze achithe okukhona .
46001029	Ngalokho-ke akungabikhona noyedwa ozazigqaja phambi kwakhe .
46001030	Kungebanga lakhe kobana nibe kuKrestu Jesu kithi obe kuhlakanipha okuvela kuZimu , okutjho ukulunga kwethu , ukucwenga kanye nokuhlengwa kwethu
46001031	njengombana kutloliwe kwathiwa : “ Akuthi loyo ozikhakhazisako , azikhakhazise eKosini . ”
46002001	Lokha nangifika kini bazalwana , azange ngize ngobugagu bokukhuluma namkha ngokuhlakanipha nangimemezela ubufakazi bakaZimu kini
46002002	ngombana ngaqunta ukungazi ilitho ngaphandle kwakaJesu Krestu , iye , yena abethelwe esiphambanweni .
46002003	Ngize kini ngobuthakathaka nangokwesaba kanye nangokuqhaqhazela okukhulu .
46002004	Umlayezwami kanye nokutjhumayela kwami bekungasi ngamezwi wokuhlakanipha nayengako , kodwana bekuveza amandla kaMoya
46002005	ukuze ukukholwa kwenu kungadzimeleli ekuhlakanipheni kwabantu kodwana emandleni kaZimu .
46002006	Nokho-ke siyawukhuluma umlayezo wokuhlakanipha nasiphakathi kwabakhulileko , kodwana ingasi ukuhlakanipha kwephaseli namkha kwababusi besikhathesi , abazakubhubha baphele .
46002007	Awa , sikhuluma ukuhlakanipha okufihlakeleko kwakaZimu . Iye , ukuhlakanipha ebekufihliwe nalokho uZimu akubekele iphazimulwethu ngaphambi kokuthoma kwesikhathi .
46002008	Akakho ebabusini besikhathini lesi okulemukileko lokho ngombana nakube bebakulemukile , bebangekhe babethele iKosi yephazimulo .
46002009	Kodwana kutloliwe kwathiwa : “ Akunalihlo elakubonako , akunandlebe eyakuzwako , akunamkhumbulo owakubambako lokho uZimu akulungiselele labo abamthandako . ”
46002010	Ngalokho uZimu ukwambulile lokho kithi ngoMoyakhe .
46002011	Ngubani hlangana nabantu owazi imikhumbulo yomuntu ngaphandle kommoya womuntu ongaphakathi kwakhe na ? Ngokunjalo-ke , akunamuntu owazi imizindlo kaZimu ngaphandle kwakaMoya kaZimu .
46002012	Asikamukeli ummoya wephasi kodwana samukele uMoya obuya kuZimu ukuze sizwisise lokho uZimu asiphe khona ngesihle .
46002013	Ngilokho-ke esikukhulumako , kungasi ngamezwi esiwafundiswe ngokuhlakanipha komuntu kodwana ngamezwi esiwafundiswe nguMoya , sizwakalisa iqiniso ngamezwi kaMoya .
46002014	Umuntu onganaMoya akamukeli izinto ezivela kuMoya kaZimu ngombana zibudlhadlha kuye . Angeze azizwisise ngombana zizwisiswa ngokukaMoya .
46002015	Umuntu kaMoya uhlolisisa koke kodwana yena ngokwakhe akakhambi ngokuhlolwa babantu .
46002016	Ngitjho ngombana umtlolo uthi : “ Ngubani owakhe wazi umkhumbulo kaSomnini kobana angabe amfundise na ? ”
46003001	Eqinisweni bazalwana , bengingekhe ngakhuluma nani njengabantu bakaMoya , kodwana bengizakukhuluma nani njengabantu benyama , iye , abasesemasana kuKrestu .
46003002	Nganondla ngebisi , ingasi ngokudla okuqinileko ngombana beningakakulungeli . Iye , nanje anikakulungeli
46003003	ngombana nisesebabantu benyama . Ngitjho ngombana nakhu kusesekhona umona nokucabana phakathi kwenu . Anisibo benyama naninjalo na ? Anikaziphathi njengabantu abangakakhetheki na ?
46003004	Angithi omunye uthi : “ Mina ngingewakaPowula . ” Omunye athi : “ Mina ngingewaka-Apholo . ” Alo , anisibabantu abangakakhetheki naninjalo ?
46003005	Ubegade ayini-ke u-Apholo loyo ? UPowula yena uyini nje ? Angithi sebaziinceku nje enakholwa ngazo kwaphela njengombana iKosi yabapha ngamunye umsebenzabo !
46003006	Mina ngatjala imbewu , u-Apholo wayisezela , kodwana nguZimu owayikhulisako .
46003007	Nje-ke bobabili , otjalako nosezelako abasililitho kodwana nguZimu yedwa okhulisako .
46003008	Umuntu otjalako nosezelako banomnqopho munye , omunye nomunye uzokuvuzwa ukuya ngokomsebenzakhe .
46003009	Thina sisebenza ndawonye singebakaZimu , nina niyisimu kaZimu begodu nimumakho kaZimu .
46003010	Ngomusa uZimu angiphe wona , ngabeka isisekelo njengomakhi onekghono , nje-ke kukhona othileko owakhela phezu kwaso . Kodwana omunye nomunye kumele ayelele bona wakha njani .
46003011	Ngitjho ngombana akekho omunye ongabeka isisekelo ngaphandle kwaloyo osele asibekile , okunguJesu Krestu .
46003012	Nakube kukhona umuntu owakha phezu kwesisekelwesi , asebenzise igolide , isiliva , amatje abizako , iingodo , utjani namkha iinhlanga ,
46003013	umsebenzakhe uzokubonakaliswa ngalokho ongikho ngombana ilanga elikhethekileko lizowudalula . Uzokwambulwa ngomlilo begodu umlilo uzokuzizinya ubunjalo bomsebenzi womuntu .
46003014	Nangabe umsebenzi womuntu owakhelwe esisekelweni uyadzimelela , uzakwamukeliswa umvuzo .
46003015	Nakube uyatjha , uzakuloba ; nokho yena ngokwakhe uzakusinda kodwana abe njengomuntu ophunyurhe emalangabini .
46003016	Kghani anazi bona nina nilithempeli lakaZimu nokobana uMoya kaZimu uhlala ngaphakathi kwenu na ?
46003017	Loyo ochitha ithempeli lakaZimu , uZimu uzomchitha ngombana ithempeli lakaZimu licwengile .
46003018	Ningazikhohlisi . Nakube nanyana ngubani wenu udlumbana bona uhlakaniphile ngokwesilinganiso sesikhathesi , kumele abe sidlhadlha ukuze abe ngohlakaniphileko .
46003019	Ngitjho ngombana ukuhlakanipha kwephaseli kubudlhadlha phambi kwakaZimu ngombana kutloliwe kwathiwa : “ Ubamba abahlakaniphileko ebuqilini babo . ”
46003020	Umtlolo godu ubuye uthi : “ USomnini uyazi bona imikhumbulo yabahlakaniphileko ililize . ”
46003021	Yeke , akungasabakhona ukuzigqaja ngomuntu ngombana koke kungekwenu
46003022	nanyana kungaba nguPowula , u-Apholo , uKhefasi namkha iphasi , ukuphila , ukufa , isikhathi sanje namkha esizako ; koke kungekwenu .
46003023	Kodwana nina ningebakaKrestu noKrestu ungewakaZimu .
46004001	Kufanele kwazeke bona thina siziinceku zakaKrestu eziphathiswe iimfihlakalo zakaZimu .
46004002	Yeke kuyadingeka bona labo abaphathisiweko babonakalise ukuthembeka kwabo .
46004003	Kodwana kimi kuyinto encani bona ngingagwetjwa ngini namkha libandla labantu ; iye , nami ngokwami angizigwebi .
46004004	Unembeza wami akanaso isazela , nokho lokho akungenzi bona ngibe msulwa . YiKosi engigwebako .
46004005	Ngalokho-ke ningagwebi ilitho kungakafiki isikhathi , lindani bekufike iKosi . Yona izokuveza emkhanyweni koke okufihlwe ebumnyameni beyembule neenhloso zeenhliziyo zabantu . Ngesikhatheso uZimu uzokwamukelisa omunye nomunye ukuthokozwa okumfaneleko .
46004006	Nje-ke bazalwana , ngiqalise izintwezi kimi no-Apholo ngebanga lenu ukuze nifunde kithi lokho okutjhiwo sisitjho esithi : “ Ningaphambuki kilokho okutloliweko . ” Ngalokho-ke anisoze nakhetha umuntu oyedwa hlangana nabanye bese nizikhakhazisa ngaye .
46004007	Kanti ngubani onenza nehluke phakathi kwabanye na ? Yini eninakho eningazange nikwamukeliswe na ? Khona-ke nakube nikwamukele , kubayini nizigqaje kube ngathi anikamukeliswa na ?
46004008	Konjephana seniyasutha ! Senaba ziinjinga ! Senaba makhosi , iye ngaphandle kwethu ! Maye ngifisa kangangani bona thana sele nimakhosi ukuze sibe makhosi kanye nani !
46004009	Ngitjho ngombana kubonakala inga uZimu thina bapostoli usibeke embukisweni ekugcineni komlandelande njengabantu abagwetjelwe ukufa ekundleni . Senziwe amabono wephasi loke , weengilozi ngitjho newabantu .
46004010	Thina sesesiziindlhayela zakaKrestu , kodwana nina niziinhlakaniphi kuKrestu ! Thina sibuthakathaka , kodwana nina ninamandla ! Niyahlonitjhwa , thina siyanyazwa !
46004011	Bekube ngalesisikhathi siyalamba besibulawe mrhawu , simaratha , siphethwe kumbi , sibozulani ,
46004012	sisebenza nzima ngezandla zethu . Nasithukiwako siyabusisa ; nasizunywako siyakubekezelela lokho ;
46004013	nasiphudlhelwako siphendula ngokuthobeka . Bekube nje , siphenduke ifucufucu yephasi , iinzibi zelizwe .
46004014	Anginitloleli lokhu ngombana ngifuna ukuniphathisa iinhloni , kodwana ngifuna ukuniyelelisa njengabantwana bami engibathandako .
46004015	Sengitjho nanyana nineenkulungwana ezilitjhumi zabaluleki kuKrestu , aninabobaba abanengi ngombana kuKrestu Jesu mina ngibe nguyihlo ngevangeli .
46004016	Nje-ke ngiyanirabhela bona ningilingise .
46004017	Kungalokho nginithumela indodanami uThimothi engimthandako nothembekileko eKosini . Uzonikhumbuza ikambo yokuphila kwami kuKrestu Jesu evumelana nalokho engikufundisako kizo zoke iindawo emabandleni woke .
46004018	Abanye benu sele bazikhukhumeza inga angeze bengiseza kini .
46004019	Kanti-ke nangabe iKosi ivuma , ngizokuza msinyana . Nje-ke ekufikeni kwami , angizukufunyana kwaphela bona abantu abazikhukhumezako laba bakhuluma kangangani , kodwana ngizokufunyana nokobana banaliphi igunya .
46004020	Ngitjho ngombana umbuso kaZimu awusikukhuluma kodwana umamandla .
46004021	Alo , ninyula kuphi na ? Ngifike kini ngiphethe iswazi , namkha ngize ngethando nangommoya ophasi na ?
46005001	Eqinisweni kubikiwe bonyana kukhona ukuziphatha kumbi ngokwamabhayi phakathi kwenu , begodu okumhlobo ongenzekiko ngitjho naphakathi kwabarhedeni . Indoda ingena emabhayini nomkayise !
46005002	Kodwana ngapha nina niyazigqaja ! Bekungakameli bona niphathwe ziinhloni , beningasaba nobudlelwano nomuntu owenze lokhu na ?
46005003	Nanyana ngingekho kini siqu sami kodwana nginani ngommoya begodu sele ngimgwebile loyo owenze lokho njengombana bengizakwenza njalo nabegade ngiphakathi kwenu .
46005004	Lokha nanihlangene ebizweni leKosi uJesu , nami ngibekhona ngommoya , namandla weKosi uJesu abe khona ,
46005005	nikelani indoda leyo kuSathana ukuze kubhujiswe imvelo yesono bese ummoyayo ubulungeke ngelanga leKosi .
46005006	Ukuzikhukhumeza kwenu akukalungi . Anazi bonyana isibiliso esincani sibilisa yoke ihlama na ?
46005007	Lahlani isibiliso esidala ukuze nibe yihlama etja enganasibiliso , njengombana ninjalo , ngombana uKrestu oyimvana yethu yePhasika wenziwe umhlabelo .
46005008	Ngalokho-ke asibulungeni umnyanya lo , kungabi ngesibiliso esidala , ekusibiliso seswili nokukhohlakala , kodwana kube sisikwa esinganasibiliso , isikwa sobuqotho neqiniso .
46005009	Encwadini enganitlolela yona nganikhalima bonyana ningajayelani nabantu abaziphatha kumbi ngokwamabhayi .
46005010	Angikhulumi ngabangakholwako abaziphethe kumbi , abamarhamaru , ababogalajana nabalotjha abosingazimu ngombana nange kunjalo bekuzakufuneka bonyana nisuke ephasinapha .
46005011	Kodwana gadesi nginitlolela bonyana ningahlanganyeli nananyana ngubani ozibiza ngomzalwana kodwana khibe uziphethe kumbi ngokwamabhayi , omarhamaru , olotjha abosingazimu , othukanako , osidakwa noneswili . Nakungonjalo ningalingi nigome naye .
46005012	Nginandabani nokugweba labo abangaphandle kwebandla na ? Akukameli nigwebe abangebandleni na ?
46005013	UZimu uzabagweba labo abangaphandle . Angithi umtlolo uthi : “ Qotjhani umuntu okhohlakeleko phakathi kwenu . ”
46006001	Nangabe omunye wenu unombango nomunye , vane athathe umbango lowo awuse kabangakholwako esikhundleni sokobana awulethe kabacwengileko na ?
46006002	Anazi bonyana abacwengileko bazokugweba iphasi na ? Yeke nakube nina nizokugweba iphasi , anikalungeli ukugweba amacala amancani na ?
46006003	Anazi bona sizokugweba iingilozi na ? Kangangani-ke izinto zepilo le na ?
46006004	Ngalokho-ke naninombango ngeendaba ezinjalo , vane nikhethe ngitjho namadoda aqalelwa phasi ebandleni kobana abe bagwebi na ?
46006005	Ngitjho lokhu ukuze nibe neenhloni . Kuyakghoneka bona kungabikhona umuntu phakathi kwenu ohlakaniphe ngokwaneleko , ongabhalelwa kugweba umbango phakathi kwamakholwa na ?
46006006	Kodwana esikhundleni salokho , umzalwana ugijimela ebandla ayokumangalela omunye umzalwana , koke lokho nikwenza phambi kwabantu abangakholwako !
46006007	Khona lokho ukufunyaneka nimangalelana kutjho khona bona senahlulwa kade . Kubayini ningafuni ukoniwa ? Kubayini ningavumi ukudlelezelwa ?
46006008	Esikhundleni salokho , nina ngokwenu niyadlelezela beniphosise , koke lokho nikwenza kabanye abazalwana benu .
46006009	Kghani anazi bona abakhohlakeleko abazukulidla ilifa lombuso kaZimu na ? Ningakhohliswa : abaziphethe kumbi ngokomseme , abalotjha abosingazimu , abahlobongako , iintjhatjha zamadoda , abaduna abalalanako ,
46006010	amasela , abamarhamaru , iindakwa , abathukanako nabasozisako abazukulidla ilifa lombuso kaZimu .
46006011	Abanye benu beninjalo , kodwana nahlanzwa , nacwengiswa , nalungisiswa ebizweni leKosi uJesu Krestu nangoMoya kaZimethu .
46006012	Koke kuvumelekile kimi , kodwana akusikho koke okulisizo . Koke kuvumelekile kimi , kodwana akukho nakhunye okuzangibusa .
46006013	Ukudla kungekwesisu , nesisu singesokudla , kodwana uZimu uzokubhubhisa kokubili . Umzimba awusingewokuziphatha kumbi ngokomseme , kodwana ungoweKosi neKosi ingeyomzimba .
46006014	Ngamandlakhe uZimu wavusa iKosi ekufeni , nje-ke nathi uzosivusa .
46006015	Anazi bona imizimba yenu izizitho zomzimba kaKrestu ngenyama na ? Alo-ke , ngithathe izitho zakaKrestu ngiyozihlanganisa nezengwadla na ? Awa , nakanye !
46006016	Kghani anazi bona loyo ozihlanganisa nengwadla uba nyamanye nayo na ? Angithi kuthiwa : “ Ababili bazakuba nyamanye . ”
46006017	Kodwana loyo ozihlanganisa neKosi , uba mmoya munye nayo .
46006018	Balekelani imikhuba yokuziphatha kumbi ngokomseme . Zoke ezinye izono umuntu azenzako zingaphandle komzimbakhe , kodwana loyo owona ngokwamabhayi wonakalisa umzimbakhe .
46006019	Anazi bona imizimba yenu ilithempeli lakaMoya oCwengileko ongaphakathi kwenu , enimamukele kuZimu nokobana anisingebenu na ?
46006020	Nathengwa ngenani eliphezulu , ngalokho-ke hloniphani uZimu ngemizimba yenu .
46007001	Malungana nalokho eningitlolele khona : Kuhle bona umuntu angathinti umfazi ;
46007002	kodwana ngebanga lobufebe esele bandile , kuhle bona leyo naleyo ndoda ibe nomfazi wayo , nomfazi abe nendoda yakhe .
46007003	Indoda ayanelise umkayo nomfazi enze njalo .
46007004	Umfazi akanalo igunya phezu komzimba wakhe , kodwana yindoda enalo ; ngokunjalo nendoda ayinalo igunya phezu komzimba wayo , kodwana mfazi onalo .
46007005	Ningagodlelani , ngaphandle kwalokha nanivumeleneko begodu kungekwesikhatjhana ukuze nizinikele emthandazweni . Ngemva kwalapho-ke nibuye godu nihlangane ukuze uSathana anganilingi ngebanga lokungakwazi kwenu ukuzibamba .
46007006	Lokhu ngikutjho njengokuvumelana , ingasi njengomthetho .
46007007	Bengifisa inga boke abantu bebangaba njengami ; kodwana omunye nomunye umuntu unesiphiwo sakhe esibuya kuZimu , omunye unalesi kanti omunye unalesiya .
46007008	Kabangakatjhadi kanye nabahlolokazi ngithi : Kuhle bona bahlale bangatjhadi njengami ;
46007009	kodwana nangabe abakghoni ukuzibamba , kumele batjhade ngombana kungcono ukutjhada kunokutjhiswa yikanuko .
46007010	Kilabo abatjhadileko nginomyalo ( ongabuyi kimi , kodwana obuya eKosini ) othi : Umfazi akangahlukani nendoda yakhe ;
46007011	kodwana nakube uyahlukana nayo , akahlale angakatjhadi njalo nakungasi njalo akabuyelane nendoda yakhe . Nendoda ayingatlhali umkayo .
46007012	Kabanye ngithi ( kutjho mina , akutjho iKosi ) : Nangabe umzalwana unomfazi ongakholwako , ovumako ukuhlala naye ije angakholwa njalo , akangamtlhali .
46007013	Nangabe umfazi unendoda engakholwako begodu ivuma ukuhlala naye ije ingakholwa njalo , akangayitlhali .
46007014	Ngitjho ngombana indoda engakholwako icwengisiwe ngomfazi wayo kanti nomfazi ongakholwako ucwengisiwe ngendodakhe ekholwako . Nakungasinjalo abantwana babo bebazakuba bantwana abangakahlambuluki , kodwana nje-ke bahlambulukile .
46007015	Kodwana nakube ongakholwako uyatlhala , akatlhale . Indoda namkha umfazi okholwako akakabotjhelelwa nakunjalo . UZimu usibizele ekuphileni ngokuthula .
46007016	Wazi ngani mfazi bona indoda yakho ingasindiswa ngawe na ? Wazi ngani , wena ndoda bonyana umkakho angasindiswa ngawe na ?
46007017	Omunye nomunye kumele ahlale endaweni iKosi embeke kiyo epilweni begodu nalapho uZimu ambizele khona . Lo-ke mthetho engiwubekako kiwo woke amabandla .
46007018	Kukhona umuntu obesele asokiwe lokha nabizwako na ? Akangabi njengongakasoki . Ukhona obegade angakabi ukusoka lokha nabizwako na ? Akahlale anjalo angasoki .
46007019	Ukusoka akusililitho nokungasoki akusililitho . Ukugcina imiyalo kaZimu ngikho okuqakathekileko .
46007020	Omunye nomunye kumele ahlale angilokho ebegade angikho lokha uZimu nambizako .
46007021	Bewulikhoboka lokha nawubizwako na ? Akungakutshwenyi lokho , nanyana-ke nange unethuba lokukhululeka kuhle bona wenze njalo .
46007022	Loyo obegade alikhoboka lokha nabizwa yiKosi , umumuntu weKosi okhululekileko ; ngokunjalo nogade akhululekile lokha nabizwako , ulikhoboka lakaKrestu .
46007023	Nathengwa ngenani eliphezulu , yeke ningabi makhoboka womuntu .
46007024	Bazalwana , woke umuntu , njengombana anokuziphendulela kuZimu , akahlale ebujameni uZimu ambiza akibo .
46007025	Nje-ke mayelana namatlawu : Anginawo umyalo obuya eKosini , kodwana ngigweba njengaloyo othembekako ngokomusa weKosi .
46007026	Ngebanga lobudisi esele bukhona lobu , ngicabanga bona kuhle ukuzihlalela njengombana ninjalo .
46007027	Utjhadile na ? Ungatlhali . Awukatjhadi na ? Ungasafuna umfazi .
46007028	Kodwana nangabe uyathatha , awukenzi isono ngalokho , netlawu nalendako , alikoni ngalokho . Into nje kukobana loyo otjhadako uzokuqalana nemiraro eminengi epilweni , nje-ke ngilinga ukunibabalela kilokho .
46007029	Engikutjhoko bazalwana kukobana isikhathi sifitjhani . Ukusuka gadesi , labo abanabafazi kumele baphile inga abanabafazi ;
46007030	abazilileko babe njengabangakazili , abathabileko babe njengabangakathabi ; abathenga okuthileko kube inga akusikho kwabo ;
46007031	abasebenzisa izinto zephasi babe njengabangakanamatheli kizo . Ngitjho ngombana iphaseli ngokwesibumbeko salo sanje , liyadlula .
46007032	Ngifuna bona ningatshwenyeki ngalitho . Indoda engakathathi ikhathalela iindaba zeKosi , ifuna ukwazi bona ingayithabisa njani iKosi .
46007033	Kodwana ethetheko ikhathalela iindaba zephaseli , ifuna ukwazi bona ingamthabisa njani umkayo .
46007034	Ipilo yayo ihlukene phakathi . Nomfazi ongakendi namkha itlawu likhathalela iindaba zeKosi : Ihloso yalo kuzinikela eKosini ngomzimba nangomphefumulo . Kodwana nakumfazi owendileko ukhathalela iindaba zephaseli , ufuna ukwazi bona angayithabisa njani indoda yakhe .
46007035	Ngitjho lokhu ukuze nisizeke , ingasi ukuniqabela kodwana ukuze niphile ngendlela efaneleko ninokuzinikela okupheleleko eKosini .
46007036	Nakube umuntu udlumbana bona wenza okungakafaneli malungana netlawu alibonileko , nalo nakube iminyaka yalo iyakhamba begodu lizizwela bona sele lifuna ukwenda , umuntu loyo akenze okufaneleko . Akoni ngalokho , abatjhade .
46007037	Kodwana umuntu oqede nomkhumbulwakhe , ongakagandeleleki kodwana okghona ukujamela ilizwi lakhe , noqede nomkhumbulwakhe bona angendisi itlawu lakhe , naye loyo wenza kuhle .
46007038	Naloyo owendisa itlawu lakhe wenza kuhle , kodwana ongalendisiko wenza kuhle khulu .
46007039	Umfazi ubopheleleke endodeni yakhe qobana isaphila . Kodwana indoda yakhe yahlongakala , utjhaphulukile bona angenda nanyana kiyiphi ayithandako , kwaphela nakube iyakholwa eKosini .
46007040	Ngesingami , kuhle bona ahlale anjalo angabe asenda , nokho ngiyacabanga bonyana nami nginoMoya kaZimu .
46008001	Malungana nokudla okuhlatjelwe abosingazimu : Siyazi bona soke sinelwazi . Ilwazi liyakhukhumeza , kodwana ithando liyakha .
46008002	Umuntu odlumbana bona kukhona akwaziko , akakabukwazi ngombana usafanele azi .
46008003	Kodwana umuntu othanda uZimu waziwa nguZimu .
46008004	Nje-ke , malungana nokugoma ukudla okuhlatjelwe abosingazimu : Siyazi bona usingazimu akasililitho ephasini nokobana akekho omunye uZimu ngaphandle kwaloyo oyedwa .
46008005	Ngitjho nanyana kuthiwa kukhona okubizwa bona bozimu , nanyana kusezulwini namkha ephasini , ( ngambala kunezinto ekuthiwa bozimu abanengi nekuthiwa ziinkosi ezinengi )
46008006	nokho kithi munye uZimu , uBaba , okuvela kuye zoke izinto begodu nesiphilela yena ; yinye kwaphela iKosi , nguJesu Krestu , ngaye okwavela koke okukhona begodu nesiphila ngaye .
46008007	Kodwana akusibo boke abanelwazi leli . Abanye abantu basangenelele emikhubeni yabosingazimu kangangobana nabagoma ukudla okunjalo badlumbana bona kuhlatjelwe abosingazimu , nje-ke njengobana unembeza wabo abuthakathaka , uyasilaphazeka .
46008008	Nokho ukudla akusitjhidezi eduze kwakaZimu ; asibi bambi nasingagomiko , godu asibi ngabangcono nasigomako .
46008009	Tjhejani nokho bonyana ikululeko yenu ingabi sikhubekiso kababuthakathaka .
46008010	Ngitjho ngombana nakukhona ononembeza obuthakathaka , okubonako wena onelwazi leli ugoma ethempelini labosingazimu , akazukukhuthazeka bonyana agome lokho okuhlatjelwe abosingazimu na ?
46008011	Ngaleyondlela umzalwana obuthakathaka lo , uJesu amfelako , uzakulimala ngebanga lelwazi lakho .
46008012	Lokha nanona kubazalwana benu ngalendlela , nilimaze unembeza wabo , nona kuKrestu .
46008013	Yeke nakube lokho engikugomako kubanga bona umzalwana wami awele esonweni , angeze bengisakugoma ukuze ngingamkhubekisi .
46009001	Angikakhululeki na ? Angisuye umpostoli na ? Angikaboni uJesu iKosi yethu na ? Nina anisiwo umphumela womsebenzami eKosini na ?
46009002	Nanyana ngingeze ngaba mpostoli kabanye kodwana kini khona nginguye ! Ngitjho ngombana nina nisigibo sobupostoli bami eKosini .
46009003	Lokhu kukuziphendulela kwami kilabo abangisolako .
46009004	Asinalungelo lokugonywako nokuselwako na ?
46009005	Asinalungelo lokukhamba nomfazi okholwako njengombana kwenza abanye abapostoli kanye nabafowabo leKosi kanye noKhefasi na ?
46009006	Namkha ngimi noBharinabhasi kwaphela ekumele sisebenzele ukudla na ?
46009007	Ngubani osebenza njengejoni ngeendleko zakhe na ? Ngubani otjala isidiribe kodwana angagomi amadiribaso na ? Ngubani owelusa umhlambi kodwana angaseli ibisi lawo na ?
46009008	Kghani ngitjho lokhu ngokususela ebantwini na ? Umthetho awutjho njalo nawo na ?
46009009	Kutloliwe emthethweni kaMosi kwathiwa : “ Ungafaki ikomo isifonyo nayibhula amabele . ” Kghani uZimu ukhathalela iinkomo na ?
46009010	Kanti bekangakaqalisi kithi lokha nakhuluma lokhu na ? Iye , lokhu kwatlolelwa thina ngombana lokha umlimi nalimako nombhuli nabhulako , lokho bakwenza ngethemba lokobana bazokwabelwa isivuno .
46009011	Nakube sitjele imbewu kaMoya hlangana nani , kubudisi bonyana sivune kwenyama kini na ?
46009012	Nakube abanye banelungelo lokondliwa phakathi kwenu , thina asikafaneli samukele ngaphezu kwalokho na ? Kodwana azange khesilisebenzise ilungelweli . Esikhundleni salokho sinyamezelele yoke into kunobana siliye ivangeli lakaKrestu .
46009013	Anazi bona labo abasebenza ngethempelini bafumana ukudla kwabo ethempelini nalabo abalotjha e-aldarini babelana lokho okulethwe e-aldarini na ?
46009014	Ngokunjalo-ke iKosi ikubekile bona labo abatjhumayela ivangeli bafanele bafumane isondlo sabo evangelini .
46009015	Kodwana mina angizange ngisebenzise nalinye lamalungelo la . Nokho angitloli lokhu ngethemba lokobana nizangenzela izintwezo . Kungaba ngcono ngife kunobana umuntu angemuke ukuzikhakhazisa lokhu .
46009016	Nokho nangitjhumayela ivangeli , angikwazi ukuzikhakhazisa ngombana ngikatelelekile bona ngitjhumayele . Maye mina nakube angitjhumayeli ivangeli !
46009017	Nakube ngitjhumayela ngokuzithandela kwami , nginomvuzo ; nakube angikwenzi ngokuzithandela , kutjho bona ngiphetha lokho engikuphathisiweko .
46009018	Alo-ke umvuzo wami uyini na ? Sengilokhu kokuthi ekutjhumayeleni ivangeli , ngilitjhumayela simahla , ngalokho angisebenzisi ilungelo lami ekulitjhumayeleni .
46009019	Ngitjho ngombana nanyana ngikhululekile begodu ngingasilikhoboka lomuntu , ngazenza ikhoboka labo boke ukuze ngizuze abanengi .
46009020	KumaJuda ngaba njengomJuda ukuze ngizuze amaJuda . Kilabo abangaphasi komthetho , ngaba njengongaphasi komthetho ( nanyana mina ngokwami ngingasingaphasi komthetho ) ukuze ngizuze labo abangaphasi komthetho .
46009021	Kilabo abanganamthetho , ngaba njengonganamthetho ( nanyana ngingakatjhaphuluki emthethweni kaZimu , ngisemthethweni kaKrestu ) ukuze ngizuze labo abanganamthetho .
46009022	Kilabo ababuthakathaka , ngaba buthakathaka ukuze ngizuze ababuthakathaka . Ngibe ngikho koke kibo boke abantu ukuze kuthi ngeendlela zoke ngisindise abathileko .
46009023	Koke lokhu ngikwenzela ivangeli ukuze nami ngibe nesabelo eembusisweni zalo .
46009024	Anazi bona emgijimweni boke abagijimi bayagijima , kodwana umvuzo munye na ? Gijima ngendlela yokobana ufunyane umvuzo .
46009025	Boke abaphalisana emdlalweni bathoma ngokuzithabulula ngokuncamileko . Benza lokho ukuze bamukele isihlohlo esingekhe sabambelela ; kodwana thina sikwenza kobana sizuze isihlohlo sesiphelani .
46009026	Yeke angigijimi njengomuntu ovathazelako ; angilwi njengomuntu ofutha ummoya .
46009027	Awa , ngiyawukhandla umzimbami ngiwenze ikhoboka ukuze kuthi ngemva kobana ngitjhumayeze abanye , mina ngokwami ngingakhuthi ekwamukeleni umvuzo .
46010001	Yeke angithandi bazalwana bona ningabi nelwazi lokobana abakhokho bethu boke bebangaphasi kwelifu begodu boke bayama elwandle .
46010002	Boke babhabhadiselwa kuMosi ngelifini bangelwandle .
46010003	Boke bagoma ukudla kunye kwakaMoya ,
46010004	basela isiselo sinye sakaMoya ngombana basela edwaleni lakaMoya ebelibaphekelela . Idwalelo belinguKrestu .
46010005	Nanyana kunjalo uZimu azange athokoze ngenengi labo ; iindumbu zabo zarhatjheka kilo loke irhalawumba .
46010006	Izintwezi zenzeka kobana zibe sibonelo ukusikhandela bona singabeki iinhliziyo zethu ezintweni ezimbi njengombana benza bona .
46010007	Ningabi balotjhi babosingazimu njengombana abanye babo benza ngombana kutloliwe kwathiwa : “ Abantu bahlala phasi bagoma bebasela , basikima bagida . ”
46010008	Asingenzi izenzo zokukhohlakala ngokwamabhayi njengombana abanye babo benza , bekwathi ngelanga linye kwabhujiswa iinkulungwana ezimatjhumi amabili nantathu zabo .
46010009	Asingayilingi iKosi , njengombana abanye babo benza , babulawa ziinyoka .
46010010	Godu ningarhononi njengombana abanye babo benza , babulawa yingilozi ebhubhisako .
46010011	Izintwezi zabehlela zaba sibonelo bezatlolwa njengesiyeleliso kithi thina esele sifikelwe kuphela kweenkhathi .
46010012	Nje-ke nawudlumbana bona ujame udzimelele , yelela bona ungawi .
46010013	Akunasilingo esiniwisileko ngaphandle kwalokho okujayelekileko ebantwini . Nje-ke uZimu uthembekile ; angeze avume bona nilingwe ngaphezu kwamandlenu . Kodwana nanilingwako , uzaninikela nendlela yokuphepha ukuze nijamelane naso .
46010014	Nje-ke , bangani bami abathandekako , balekelani ukulotjha abosingazimu .
46010015	Ngikhuluma nabantu abavuthiweko , ziboneleni nina lokho engikutjhoko .
46010016	Ikapho yokuthokoza esithokoza ngayo , ayisiyo yokuzibandakanya eengazini zakaKrestu na ? Isikwa esisihlephulako akusiso sokuzibandakanya emzimbeni kaKrestu na ?
46010017	Njengombana kunesikwa sinye nje , simzimba munye nanyana sibanengi ngombana soke sihlanganyela isikwa esisodwa .
46010018	Khumbulani abantu bakwa-Israyeli : Kanti labo abagoma umhlabelo abahlanganyeli e-aldarini na ?
46010019	Alo , ngitjho bona umhlabelo owenzelwe usingazimu ulilitho namkha usingazimu ulilitho na ?
46010020	Awa , nginqophe ekutheni imihlabelo yabarhedeni yenzelwe amadimoni ; ingasi uZimu . Nje-ke angithandi bona nihlanganyele namadimoni .
46010021	Angekhe nasela ikapho yeKosi godu nibuye nisele neyamadimoni . Angeze naba nehlanganyelo etafuleni leKosi nelamadimoni .
46010022	Kghani sifuna ukuvusa isikhwele seKosi na ? Sinamandla kunayo na ?
46010023	“ Koke kuvumelekile ” kodwana akusikho koke okusizako . Iye , “ koke kuvumelekile ” kodwana akusikho koke okwakhako .
46010024	Akungabikhona ozifunela ubuhle bakhe , kodwana akafune nekwabanye .
46010025	Gomani koke okuthengiswa esilarheni ngaphandle kokubuza imibuzo ngonembeza
46010026	ngombana : “ Iphasi nakho koke okukilo ngekwakaSomnini . ”
46010027	Nangabe ongakholwako animemela ekudleni , nithanda ukuya , gomani nanyana yini ebekwa phambi kwenu ngaphandle kokubuza imibuzo kanembeza .
46010028	Kodwana nangabe omunye uthi kini : “ Lokhu kuhlatjelwe abosingazimu , ” ningabe nisakugoma ngebanga laloyo otjho njalo nangebanga lakanembeza ,
46010029	unembeza womunye umuntu , angitjho unembeza wenu . Ngitjho ngombana ilungelo lami lizakugwetjelwani ngonembeza womunye umuntu na ?
46010030	Nangabe ngihlanganyela ekudleni ngokuthokoza , kubayini ngifanele ngilahlwe ngebanga lalokho engithokoza uZimu ngakho na ?
46010031	Nje-ke nanyana niyagoma namkha niyasela namkha nenza nanyana yini , kwenzeni koke mayelana nedumo lakaZimu .
46010032	Ningabangeli namunye bona akhubeke , kungaba mJuda , umGirigi namkha ibandla lakaZimu
46010033	njengombana nami ngilinga ukuthokozisa woke umuntu ngazo zoke iindlela . Angizifuneli mina ubuhle kodwana ubuhle babanengi ukuze basindiswe .
46011001	Ngilingisani njengombana nami ngilingisa uKrestu .
46011002	Ngiyanibuka ngombana ningikhumbula ezintweni zoke begodu nibambelela eemfundisweni njengombana ngazidlulisela kini .
46011003	Kodwana ngifuna nazi bonyana ihloko yenye nenye indoda nguKrestu , ihloko yomfazi yindoda , kanti ihloko kaKrestu nguZimu .
46011004	Enye nenye indoda ethandaza namkha ephorofida igubuzese ihloko irhubutjha ihlokwayo .
46011005	Kodwana omunye nomunye umfazi othandaza namkha ophorofida angakagubuzesi ihloko urhubutjha ihlokwakhe , sekufana nalokha ihlokwakhe nayigudiweko .
46011006	Nangabe umfazi akagubuzesi ihlokwakhe , kumele agude begodu nakube kulihlazo kobana umfazi arhune namkha agude , kumele agubuzese ihlokwakhe .
46011007	Indoda ayikafaneli ukugubuzesa ihlokwayo ngombana imfanekiso nedumo lakaZimu ; kodwana umfazi ulidumo lendoda .
46011008	Ngitjho ngombana indoda ayizange ivele emfazini kodwana mfazi owavela endodeni .
46011009	Indoda azange yadalelwa umfazi kodwana mfazi owadalelwa indoda .
46011010	Ngebangelo namkha ngebanga leengilozi umfazi kumele abe netshwayo lokuphathwa ehlokwakhe .
46011011	EKosini nokho umfazi akakazijameli ayedwa ngaphandle kwendoda , nendoda ayikazijameli iyodwa ngaphandle komfazi .
46011012	Njengombana umfazi wavela endodeni , ngokunjalo nendoda ibelethwa mfazi . Kodwana koke kubuya kuZimu .
46011013	Ziboneleni nina ngokwenu bona kufanele umfazi athandaze uZimu angakagubuzesi ihlokwakhe na ?
46011014	Imvelo ngokwayo ayinifundisi bonyana nakube indoda ineenhluthu ezide kulihlazo kiyo ,
46011015	kodwana umfazi naneenhluthu ezide kulidumo kuye na ? Uphiwe iinhluthu ezide bona zibe sisembeso sakhe .
46011016	Nakube ukhona ofuna ukuphika ikani ngalokhu , asinawo omunye umkhuba onjalo thina kanye namabandla akuZimu .
46011017	Emiyalweni elandelako , anginakho ukunibonga ngombana imihlangano yenu ibanga umonakalo kunobana ibange ubuhle .
46011018	Kokuthoma nje ngizwa batjho nanihlanganako njengebandla , kuba khona ukuhlukana phakathi kwenu , begodu ngithanda ukukukholwa lokho .
46011019	Kufanele kube khona ukuhlukana phakathi kwenu ukuze kubonakale bona ngibaphi abaneqiniso .
46011020	Lokha nanihlanganako , kusuke kungasiso isidlo seKosi enisigomako
46011021	ngombana nanigomako , omunye nomunye wenu uragela phambili agome ngaphandle kokulindela abanye . Omunye uhlala alambile kanti omunye uyadakwa .
46011022	Kanti aninamakhaya lapha ningagomela beniselele khona na ? Namkha ninyaza ibandla lakaZimu benirhubutjhe labo abanganalitho na ? Ngizakuthini kini na ? Nginibuke ngalokho na ? Nakanye !
46011023	Ngakwamukela eKosini lokho engikudlulisela kini kokuthi : IKosi uJesu ngobusuku eyakhatjhelwa ngabo , yathatha isikwa ,
46011024	kwathi sele ithokozile kuZimu , yasihlephula yathi : “ Lokhu mzimba wami onikelwe nina , kwenzeni lokhu ukuze ningikhumbule . ”
46011025	Ngokunjalo , ngemva kobana sele bagomile , yabuye yathatha ikapho yathi : “ Ikapho le isivumelwano esitjha eengazini zami . Kwenzeni lokhu njalo lokha naniyiselako ukuze ningikhumbule . ”
46011026	Yeke njalo lokha nanigoma isikwa lesi benisele nekapho le , nimemezela ukufa kweKosi kufikela beyibuye .
46011027	Ngalokho-ke loyo ogoma isikwa lesi namkha asele ikapho yeKosi ngokungakafaneli , uzakuba nomlandu wokona emzimbeni kanye neengazini zeKosi .
46011028	Umuntu kumele azihlolisise ngaphambi kobana agome isikwa abe asele nekapho .
46011029	Loyo ogomako abe asele ngaphandle kokuhlukanisa umzimba weKosi , uzigomela abe aziselele umlandu .
46011030	Kungebangelo abanengi phakathi kwenu babuthakathaka begodu bayagula kanti inengi lenu sele lilele .
46011031	Kodwana nakube besizigweba thina , besingeze sagwetjwa .
46011032	Nasigwetjwa yiKosi , siyakhalinywa ukuze singalahlwa kanye nephasi .
46011033	Ngalokho-ke bazalwana , lokha nanihlanganako kobana nigome , lindanani .
46011034	Nakube kukhona olambileko , akagome ekhaya ukuze kuthi nanihlanganako kungabi ngokokugwetjwa . Mhla ngibuyako ngizaninikela eminye imiyalo .
46012001	Yeke mayelana neemphiwo zakaMoya , bazalwana angithandi bona ningabi nelwazi .
46012002	Niyazi bona lokha nanisesebarhedeni , nathelelwa ngommoya wokudurha kobana nidlhemadlheme ngemva kweenthombembazwa ezingakhulumiko .
46012003	Ngalokho-ke ngiyanitjela bonyana akakho ongakhuluma ngoMoya kaZimu athi : “ UJesu akanikelelwe ! ” Godu akakho umuntu ongathi : “ UJesu uyiKosi ” , ngaphandle kobana atjho lokho ngoMoya oCwengileko .
46012004	Kunemihlobo eyahlukeneko yezipho kodwana ngoMoya munye .
46012005	Kunemisebenzi eyahlukeneko , kodwana ngeKosi yinye .
46012006	Kunokusebenza okuhlukeneko , kodwana yena uZimu loyo nguye okwenza koke kibo boke abantu .
46012007	Nje-ke omunye nomunye unikelwe ukuzibonakalisa kwakaMoya ukuze kusizeke woke umuntu .
46012008	Omunye uphiwe ngoMoya umlayezo wokuhlakanipha , omunye uphiwe umlayezo welwazi ngaye uMoya loyo .
46012009	Omunye uphiwe ukukholwa ngaye uMoya loyo , omunye uphiwe ezinye izipho zokuphilisa ngaye uMoya loyo .
46012010	Omunye uphiwe amandla wemikarisomraro , omunye uphiwe ukuphorofida , omunye uphiwe ukuhlukanisa imimoya , omunye uphiwe ukukhuluma ngamalimi ahlukeneko , kanti omunye uphiwe ukurhumutjha amalimi lawo .
46012011	Koke lokhu kumsebenzi kaMoya munye , begodu unikela omunye nomunye njengokubona kwakhe .

46012014	Nje-ke umzimba awukakhiwa ngesitho esisodwa kodwana ngezitho ezinengi .
46012015	Nange inyawo lingathi : “ Njengombana ngingasiso isandla nje , mina angisingewomzimba ” , ngalokho angeze kwalenza bona lingabi yingcenye yomzimba .
46012016	Godu nange indlebe ingathi : “ Njengombana ngingasililihlo nje , angisingewomzimba ” , ngalokho angeze kwayenza bona ingabi yingcenye yomzimba .
46012017	Nakube umzimba woke bewungaba lilihlo , bewuzokuba kuphi umuzwa wokuzwa na ? Nakube umzimba woke bewungaba yindlebe , bewuzokuba kuphi umuzwa wokunukelela na ?
46012018	Kodwana uZimu uhlele izitho zomzimba , esinye nesinye sazo saba ngendlela afuna bona sibe ngayo .
46012019	Nabegade zoke njalo zisisitho sinye , umzimba bewuzokuba kuphi na ?
46012020	Njengombana kunje , izitho zinengi , kodwana umzimba munye .
46012021	Ilihlo angekhe latjho esandleni lathi : “ Wena angikudingi ” nehloko angeze yathi eenyaweni : “ Nina anginidingi . ”
46012022	Esikhundleni salokho , izitho zomzimba ezibonakala inga zibuthakathaka , ziqakatheke khulu .
46012023	Kanti-ke nezitho esicabanga bonyana azikahlonipheki kangako , sizihlonipha khulu . Izitho ezinganasithunzi ziphathwa ngeenhloni khulu ,
46012024	khisibe lezo ezinesithunzi azidingi ukuphathwa ngokukhethekileko . UZimu uhlanganise amalungu womzimba bewahloniphisa khulu izitho ezithathelwa phasi
46012025	ukuze kungabikhona ukwahlukana emzimbeni , kodwana izitho zawo zikhathalelane ngokulinganako .
46012026	Nangabe isitho esisodwa siyatlhaga , zoke ezinye zitlhaga kanye naso ; nangabe isitho esisodwa siyahlonitjhwa , zoke ezinye zithaba naso .
46012027	Nje-ke nina nimzimba kaKrestu , omunye nomunye wenu uyingcenye yawo .
46012028	Ebandleni , uZimu ujamise koke ngerherho , ukuthoma ngabapostoli , kulandele abaphorofidi , kuze abafundisi bese kuba ngabenza imikarisomraro nalabo abaneemphiwo zokuphilisa , labo abakghona ukusiza abanye , labo abaneemphiwo zokuphatha kanye nalabo abaneemphiwo zokukhuluma ngamalimi ahlukeneko .
46012029	Boke babapostoli na ? Babaphorofidi boke na ? Babafundisi boke na ? Benza imikarisomraro boke na ?

46012031	Kodwana tjhisekelani iimphiwo ezikulu . Nje-ke ngizonikhombisa indlela ezidlula zoke .
46013001	Nanyana ngingakhuluma ngamalimi wabantu namkha weengilozi , kodwana nginganathando , sengifana nekoporo ebanga itjhada namkha isimbi elilako .
46013002	Nanginesiphiwo sokuphorofida , ngikghona ukuzwisisa zoke iimfihlakalo begodu nginelwazi ; nginokukholwa okutjhidisa iintaba , kodwana nginganathando , angisililitho .
46013003	Nangipha abadududu koke enginakho benginikele umzimbami ekutjhisweni , kodwana nginganalo ithando , angisililitho .

46013011	Nangisesemntwana bengikhuluma njengomntwana , ngicabanga njengomntwana , ngizwisisa njengomntwana . Kwathi lokha nangiba yindoda , ngahlukana neendlela zobuntwana .
46013012	Kwagadesi sisabona lififi esibonibonini , kodwana ngesikhatheso sizokubonana ubuso nobuso . Okwanje ngazi ingcenye , ngesikhatheso ngizokwazi koke ngokuzeleko njengombana nami ngaziwa ngokuzeleko .
46013013	Nje-ke okuthathu lokhu kujamile : ukukholwa , ithemba nethando . Kodwana okungaphezu kwakho koke lithando .
46014001	Tjhisekelani ukuba nethando bese nirhuluphela iimphiwo zakaMoya , khulukhulu isiphiwo sokuphorofida .
46014002	Loyo okhuluma ngamalimi akakhulumi nabantu kodwana ukhuluma noZimu . Akunamuntu omzwako ; ukhuluma iimfihlakalo emmoyenakhe .
46014003	Kodwana loyo ophorofidako ukhuluma nabantu ukuze baqine amandla , bakhuthazeke bebaduduzeke .
46014004	Loyo okhuluma ngamalimi , uzakha yena emmoyeni , kodwana ophorofidako wakha ibandla .
46014005	Ngithanda bona omunye nomunye wenu akhulume ngamalimi , kodwana kungcono bona niphorofide . Loyo ophorofidako mkhulu kunaloyo okhuluma ngamalimi , ngaphandle kwanange awarhumutjha ukuze ibandla lakheke .
46014006	Nje-ke bazalwana , nange ngisiza kini ngifike ngikhulume ngamalimi , kuzonisiza ngani lokho na ? Akunisizi ngalitho , ngaphandle kwanange nginilethela isambulo , ilwazi , isiphorofido namkha ilizwi lokuyala .
46014007	Ngitjho nezintweni ezingaphiliko ezenza itjhada njengenghwani namkha iharibha , umuntu uzakwazi njani bona zilila ngayiphi indlela nakube akukho ukuhlukanisa ngomdumo na ?
46014008	Godu nakube iporompita ayizwakali kuhle bona ibiza abantu bonyana baye epini , ngubani ozazilungiselela ipi na ?
46014009	Ngokunjalo-ke nani , nakube anikhulumi okuzwakalako ngamalimi wenu , bazakuzwa njani abanye abantu bona nithini na ? Nizabe nikhulumela emmoyeni .
46014010	Kunamalimi okungazazeki bonyana manengi ephasinapha , kodwana akukho nalinye lawo elinganahlathululo .
46014011	Nje-ke nakube angizwisisi okutjhiwo ngiloyo okhulumako , kutjho bona ngiliphandle kiloyo okhulumako , naye uliphandle kimi .

46014016	Nakube udumisa uZimu ngommoyakho , angatjho njani loyo ozifunyana ahlangana nalabo abangazwisisiko ukuthi : “ Amen ” ekuthokozeni kwakho njengombana angazi bona uthini na ?

46014018	Ngiyamthokoza uZimu bona ngikhuluma ngamalimi ukunedlula noke nje .
46014019	Kodwana nangisebandleni , ngikhetha ukukhuluma amezwi abe mahlanu azwisisekako ukuyala abanye , kunobana ngikhulume amezwi alitjhumi leenkulungwana ngelimi elingaziwako .
46014020	Bazalwana , lisani ukucabanga njengabantwana . Iye , malungana nobumbi , yibani masana , kodwana nibe ngabakhulileko ngengqondo .
46014021	Emthethweni kutloliwe kwathiwa : “ Ngabantu bamalimi atjhili nangeembhena zamaphandle , ngizokukhuluma nabantwaba kodwana khonapho abazukungizwa . Kutjho uSomnini . ”
46014022	Nje-ke amalimi alitshwayo kabangakholwako , ingasi kabakholwako ; kodwana ukuphorofida kungokwabakholwako , ingasi abangakholwako .

46014026	Alo , sizakuthini bazalwana na ? Lokha nanihlanganako , omunye nomunye akabe nerhubo , ilizwi lokufundisa , umbono , ilimi namkha irhumutjho lalo . Koke lokhu akwenzelwe ukuqiniswa kwebandla .

46015001	Bazalwana , ngithanda ukunikhumbuza ngevangeli engalitjhumayela kini , enalamukelako nenidzimelele kilo .

46015011	Nje-ke nanyana bekungimi namkha bekungibo , leli ngilo ivangeli esilitjhumayelako begodu ngilo enalikholwako .

46015035	Kodwana omunye angase abuze athi : “ Abafileko bavuswa njani na ? Bazokuvuka ngomzimba onjani na ? ”
