46015037	Lokha nawutjalako , awutjali umzimba ngesingawo kodwana utjala imbewu kwaphela kungaba mhlambe ngeyekoroyi namkha okhunye nje .

46016011	Yeke akungabikhona namunye omnyazako ! Nasele akhamba , mlayeliseni ngokuthula abuyele kimi ngombana ngimlindele kanye nabazalwana .
46016012	Malungana nomzalwana wethu u-Apholo : Ngimkhuthaze ngamandla bona eze kini kanye nabazalwana . Ubengakazimiseli ukuza njenganje , kodwana uzakuza nafunyene ithuba .
46016013	Hlalani niqaphile , nijame nidzimelele ekukholweni , nibe nesibindi , niqine .
46016014	Koke enikwenzako , kwenzeni ngethando .
46016015	Bazalwana , ngiyanincenga njengombana nisazi bonyana umndeni kaStefana ube ngewokuthoma ukwamukela ukukholwa e-Arhaya , begodu uzinikele khulu emsebenzini wabacwengileko ,

47001001	Mina Powula umpostoli kaKrestu Jesu ngokwentando kaZimu , noThimothi umzalwana , silotjhisa ibandla lakaZimu eKorinte nabo boke abacwengileko abakilo loke le-Arhaya .

47001004	osiduduza kizo zoke iinhlupheko zethu ukuze sikwazi ukududuza labo abasesizini nanyana kungelinjani ngenduduzo esiyifunyene kuZimu .
47001005	Njengombana iinhlupheko zakaKrestu zivamile kithi , nokududuzwa kwethu kwandile ngoKrestu .

47001009	Ngambala sazizwela inga sigwetjelwe ukufa . Nokho lokhu kwenzeka ukuze singazithembi thina kodwana sithembe uZimu okunguye ovusa abafileko .

47001012	Iye , nakhu ukuzigqaja kwethu : Unembeza wethu uyafakaza bonyana ephasinapha , khulukhulu mayelana nobudlelwano bethu nani , saziphatha ngokucwenga nangokuthembeka okuvela kuZimu . Senza njalo ingasi ngokokuhlakanipha kwephaseli kodwana ngokomusa kaZimu .

47001015	Njengombana benginesiqiniseko ngalokhu , bengifuna ukuza kini qangi ukuze nikwazi ukuba nomusa obuyelelweko .

47001017	Kghani nidlumbana bona bengizaza nangihlela lokhu na ? Ngenza amahlelo wami ngokwamazinga wabantu , ngilungele ukuthi , “ Iye , iye ” , khonapho ngithi , “ Awa , awa ” na ?
47001018	Ngokuthembeka kwakaZimu , umyalezwethu kini awusi ngu : “ Iye ; awa ” .

47001020	Kiyo , esinye nesinye isithembiso sakaZimu singu “ Iye ” . Yeke ngalokho ngayo sithi “ Amen ” kilo idumo lakaZimu .
47001021	Kodwana nguZimu osiqinisako sikanye nani kuKrestu bewasizesa ,

47002016	Komunye sisivunda sokufa , komunye siliphunga lokuphila . Ngubani ongangomthwalo lo na ?
47002017	Thina asisinjengabo abanengi , asikhambi sikhangisa ngelizwi lakaZimu ukuzenzela inzuzo . Kodwana kuKrestu sikhuluma phambi koZimu ngobuqotho njengabantu abathunywe nguye .
47003001	Kghani sele sithome ukuzibuka godu na ? Nakanye , abe asidingi iincwadi zokusethula kini namkha ezivela kini njengombana abanye basenza .
47003002	Nina ngokwenu niyincwadi yethu etlolwe eenhliziyweni zethu bona yaziwe beyifundwe babantu boke .

47003004	Ithemba elinjalo ngelethu ngoKrestu phambi koZimu .

47004001	Yeke , njengombana kungomusa kaZimu bona sibe nekonzo le , asililahli ithemba .
47004002	Kunalokho silahle iindlela zokufihla izinto eziphathisa iinhloni , salile ukwenza ubuqili namkha ukuphambanisa ilizwi lakaZimu , kodwana ngokubeka iqiniso epepeneneni , siyazibuka kunembeza womuntu woke phambi koZimu .

47005001	Siyazi bona nakudilika idladla lephasinapha esihlala ngakilweli , sinesakhiwo esivela kuZimu , ikumba engakenziwa ngezandla , engeyanini nanini ezulwini .

47005003	ngombana nasembathisiweko , angeze safunyanwa sibulanzi .
47005004	Nasisahlezi ngedladlenapha , siyabubula begodu siyadisibezeka ngombana asifisi ukwambulwa kodwana sifuna ukumbathiswa ngobuhlalo bethu bezulwini ukuze kuthi okubhubhako kuginywe kuphila .
47005005	Yeke nguZimu owasidalela sona isizathwesi bewasipha noMoya njengesibambiso .

47005009	Nje-ke nanyana sisekhayapha namkha sele sikhambile , sikwenza kube mnqopho wethu ukuyithokozisa iKosi .
47005010	Ngitjho ngombana soke sifanelwe kuvela phambi kwesihlalo sokugweba sakaKrestu ukuze ngiloyo naloyo amukeliswe umvuzo walokho akwenzileko nasesengemzimbenapha , kungaba ngokuhle namkha okumbi .

47005021	Wamenza bona abe sisono ngebanga lethu loyo ongazange asazi isono ukuze kuthi kuye sibe ngabalungisisiweko bakaZimu .

47006003	Asibeki isiqabo endleleni yomuntu ukuze kungafunyanwa iphoso emsebenzini wethu .

47006011	Sikhulume sitjhaphulukile kini maKorinte , sanivulela iinhliziyo zethu .

47006015	Unasivumelwano bani uKrestu noBheliyara na ? Namkha yini ikholwa elingayabelana nomuntu ongakholwako na ?
47006016	Linasivumelwano bani ithempeli lakaZimu nabosingazimu na ? 47006018	Mina ngizakuba nguYihlo , nina-ke nibe madodana namadodakazami . Kutjho uSomnini uMninimandla woke . ”
47007001	Njengombana sineenthembiswezi nje bathandekako , asizihlambululeni kikho koke ukusilaphala komzimba nekomphefumulo , siphelelise ukucwengeka ngokwesaba uZimu .
47007002	Akhe nisivulele indawo eenhliziyweni zenu . Akunamuntu esimonileko , akunamuntu esimtjhaphisileko , akakho nesimcaphazileko .
47007003	Angitjho lokhu ukuze nginilahle ngombana ngikhe ngatjho bona niseenhliziyweni zethu , sizokufa ndawonye besiphile ndawonye .
47007004	Nginesibindi khulu ngani begodu nginegugu khulu ngani . Ngigcwele ukududuzeka begodu ngithabe khulu ngazo zoke iinhlupheko zethu .
47007005	Kwamambala nanyana sesifikile eMasedoniya , imizimba yethu azange ifumane ukuphumula , kodwana sakhathazeka ngeendlela zoke ; kwaba yipikiswano ngaphandle , ngaphakathi saba nokwesaba .
47007006	Kodwana uZimu oduduza abadanileko , wasiduduza ngokufika kwakaTitosi ,

47013002	Ngabayelelisa labo abonako ngaphambilini kanye nabo boke abanye , godu ngisabayelelisa nanje nanyana ngingekho phakathi kwabo , njengombana ngenza lokha nangiphakathi kwenu nanginikhambele kwesibili . Ngithi angisoze ngaba nesirhawu

47013004	Yena wabethelwa ebuthakathakeni kodwana waphila ngamandla kaZimu . Sibuthakathaka kuye , kodwana ekusebenzeni kwethu ngani , sizokuphila naye ngamandla kaZimu .
47013005	Zihlolisiseni bona nisaphila ekukholweni na . Zizizinyeni . Kanti anilemuki bonyana uJesu Krestu ungaphakathi kwenu na ? Nakungasinjalo khona-ke kutjho bona anikayiphumeleli ihlolo .
47013006	Ngiyathemba bona nizakufunyana bonyana thina azange sibhalelwe .
47013007	Sithandaza kuZimu bona ningenzi ilitho elingakalungi . Ingasi bona sibonakalise ebantwini bonyana siphumelele ihlolo , kodwana kobana nenze okulungileko ngitjho nanyana kubonakala inga sibhalelwe .
47013008	Ngitjho ngombana akunalitho esingalenza ukujamelana neqiniso ngaphandle kobana silijamele ,
47013009	ngombana sihlala sithabile njalo lokha nasibuthakathaka kodwana nina ninamandla . Nje-ke imithandazwethu kukobana nipheleliswe .
47013010	Kungalokho ngitlola izintwezi nangingekho phakathi kwenu ukuze kuthi nangizako ngingafiki ngibe bukhali ekusebenziseni kwami igunya , iye , igunya engaliphiwa yiKosi kobana nginakhe ingasi bona nginigirize .
47013011	Kokugcina bazalwana , yenisale kuhle . Phikelelani ukupheleliswa , nilalele isibawo sami . Yibani hliziyonye , nihlale ngokuthula . UZimu wethando nokuthula uzakuba nani .
47013012	Lotjhisanani ngokwangana okukhethekileko .
47013013	Boke abazalwana bayanilotjhisa .

48001001	UPowula , ompostoli ongaveli ebantwini namkha ongakezi ngabantu kodwana ngoJesu Krestu noZimu uBaba , owavusa uJesu ekufeni ,

48001004	owazinikela ngebanga lezono zethu kobana asihlangule esikhathini lesi sobukhohlakali ukuya ngokwentando kaZimethu nonguBaba .
48001005	Akadunyiswe ngokungapheliko ! Amen .
48001006	Ngiyarareka ngombana nimsinyana kangaka ukuhlubuka loyo owanibiza ngomusa kaKrestu , naphendukela evangelini elehlukileko ,
48001007	ekhabo lakhona ekungasilivangeli nokuba livangeli . Kuyabonakala bona kunabantu abanihlangahlanganisako , abalinga ukona ivangeli lakaKrestu .
48001008	Kodwana nanyana kungaba ngithi namkha ingilozi evela ezulwini ingatjhumayela elinye ivangeli ngaphandle kwalelo esanitjhumayeza lona , ayithuweleliswe !
48001009	Njengombana besele sitjhwile , ngisabuyelela godu ngithi : Nakube kunomuntu onitjhumayeza ivangeli ngaphandle kwalelo esanitjhumayeza lona , akathuweleliswe loyo .
48001010	Kghani nje-ke ngizifunela ukuthandwa babantu namkha nguZimu na ? Kghani ngifuna ukuthabisa abantu ? Nakube bengisafuna ukuthabisa abantu , bengingeze ngaba likhoboka lakaKrestu .
48001011	Akhese nginitjele bazalwana bona ivangeli engilitjhumayelakweli akusiyinto ethonywe babantu .
48001012	Akhange ngilamukele emuntwini , godu azange ngafundiswa lona . Kodwana ngalifumana ngokwambulelwa nguJesu Krestu .
48001013	Nizwile ngepilo ebengiyiphila phambilini ebuJudeni bona bengilitlhagisa kangangani ibandla lakaZimu , ngilinga ukulitjhabalalisa .
48001014	Besele nginendima ekulu ebuJudeni , sele ngiphala namaJuda amanengi abontanga begodu bengitjhabatjheka khulu ngamasiko wabobaba .
48001015	Kodwana uZimu owangihlukanisela ngingakabelethwa , wangibiza ngomusa wakhe , wakuthabela
48001016	ukubonakalisa iNdodanakhe kimi ukuze ngimtjhumayele kabatjhili . Azange ngikhulumisane nenyama neengazi
48001017	namkha ngiye eJerusalema ukuyokubonana nalabo ebegade babapostoli ngaphambi kwami . Kodwana ngasuka khonokho ngaya e-Arabhiya , kwathi ngemva kwesikhathi ngabuyela eDamaseku .
48001018	Ngemva kweminyaka emithathu , ngakhuphukela eJerusalema kobana ngiyokwazana noPitrosi . Yeke ngahlala naye amalanga alitjhumi nahlanu .

48001020	Lokhu enginitlolela khona kuliqiniso phambi kwakaZimu .
48001021	Ngemva kwalokho ngaya eSiriya neSilisiya .
48001022	Bengingaziwa ubuso nobuso emabandleni weJudiya akuKrestu .
48001023	Bebezwe kwaphela umbiko ngami othi : “ Umuntu obegade azumana nathi phambilini , kwanjesi sele atjhumayela ukukholwa ebegade alinga ukukutjhabalalisa . ”
48001024	Yeke badumisa uZimu ngebanga lami .
48002001	Ngemva kweminyaka elitjhumi nane godu ngabuyela eJerusalema , kilelihlandla bengikhamba noBharinabhasi , ngathatha noTitosi .
48002002	Ngaya ngebanga lesambulo engasifumanako , ngafese ngendlala phambi kwabo ivangeli engilitjhumayela phakathi kwabatjhili . Kodwana lokhu ngakwenza ngasese kilabo ebebabonakala inga babarholi , ngokwesaba bona umgijimo engiwugijimako nengiwugijimileko ungabi lilize lakolize .

48002004	Indaba le ivuswe kukuthi kube nabafowethu bamala abazifake hlangana nathi kobana bazozihlolisa ikululeko esinayo kuKrestu Jesu bese basenze amakhoboka .

48002009	UJakopo , uKhefasi noJwanisi baba ziinsika , bangisekela mina noBharinabhasi ngokuhlanganyela , bavuma umusa engiphathiswe wona . Bavuma nokobona thina siye kabatjhili , bona baye kumaJuda .
48002010	Into nje abayibawako kukobanyana sikhumbule abadududu , ebekuyinto ebengivele ngitjhisakalela ukuyenza .

48002012	Ngaphambi kobana kufike abantu abathileko abavela kuJakopo , bekagoma nabatjhili . Kodwana kuthe bona kufike abantwabo , watsomuka , wazihlukanisa nabatjhili ngombana bekesaba labo abangebesiqhema esisokako .
48002013	Amanye amaJuda amlandela ekubeni bazenzisi , nje-ke ngokuzenzisa kwabo noBharinabhasi wayengeka .

48002015	“ Thina esimaJuda ngokubelethwa , singasizo ‘ izoni ezitjhili ’ ,
48002016	siyazi bona umuntu akalungisiswa ngokuthobela umthetho , kodwana ngokukholwa kuJesu Krestu . Nathi-ke sibeke ukukholwa kwethu kuKrestu Jesu ukuze silungisiswe ngokukholwa kuKrestu ingasi ngokuthobela umthetho ngombana akunamuntu ozakulungisiswa ngokuthobela umthetho .
48002017	Nakube thina silinga ukulungisiswa kuKrestu , khibe ngapha sisesezizoni , lokho kuzabe kutjho bona uKrestu ukhuthaza ukona na ? Awa , nakanye !
48002018	Nakube ngakha kabutjha lokho engakutjhabalalisako , ngiyazibonakalisa bona ngisisephulamthetho .
48002019	Ngomthetho ngafa emthethweni ukuze ngiphilele uZimu .
48002020	Ngabethelwa kanye noKrestu Jesu , nje-ke akusese ngimi ophilako , kodwana nguKrestu ophila ngaphakathi kwami . Ipilo engiyiphila emzimbeni lo , ngiyiphila ngokukholwa eNdodaneni kaZimu , eyangithandako beyanikela ipilwayo ngebanga lami .
48002021	Angiwubekeli eqadi umusa kaZimu ngombana nakube ukulunga kungafumaneka ngomthetho , kutjho bona uKrestu wafela ilize . ”
48003001	Nina ndlhadlha zamaGalatiya ! Niloywe ngubani na ? Emehlwenenu besele kwazeka bona uJesu Krestu wabethelwa .
48003002	Akhe nginibuze okukodwa nakhu : Namukele uMoya ngemisebenzi yomthetho namkha ngokuzwa ngokukholwa na ?
48003003	Kanti niziindlhayela kangaka na ? Ngemva kobana nithome ngoMoya , senigcina ngenyama na ?
48003004	Nahlupheka kangaka ngelize na ? Nakube mbala bekungelize !
48003005	Kghani loyo oninikela uMoya abe enze imikarisomraro phakathi kwenu ukwenza lokho ngemisebenzi yomthetho namkha ngokuzwa ukukholwa na ?
48003006	Yeke u-Abrahamu “ wakholwa uZimu , kwabalelwa kuye bona kukulunga ” .
48003007	Yazini-ke bona labo abakholwako babantwana baka-Abrahamu .
48003008	Yeke umtlolo , ngokubona bona uZimu uzakulungisisa abatjhili ngokukholwa , watjhumayela ivangeli ku-Abrahamu ngaphambilini , wathi : “ Zoke izizwe zizakubusiswa kuwe . ”
48003009	Ngalokho-ke labo abanokukholwa babusiswa kanye no-Abrahamu , indoda yokukholwa .
48003010	Boke abathembela ekuthobeleni umthetho banikelelwe ngombana umtlolo uthi : “ Bathuwelelisiwe boke abangakhambi ngokuya ngalokho okutlolwe encwadini yomthetho . ”
48003011	Kuyakhanya bona akakho olungisiswa ngomthetho phambi koZimu ngombana , “ Olungileko uzakuphila ngokukholwa ” .

48003014	ukuze kuthi ngoKrestu Jesu isibusiso saka-Abrahamu sehlele phezu kwabatjhili , khona sizakwamukela isithembiso sakaMoya ngokukholwa .
48003015	Bazalwana , akhe ngikhulume okujayelekileko ebantwini : Njengombana kungekho umuntu ongachitha namkha angezelele amezwi welifa nasele litloliwe , kunjalo-ke nangalokhu .
48003016	Nje-ke iinthembiso zenziwa ku-Abrahamu nesizukulwaneni sakhe . Umtlolo awuthi , “ neenzukulwaneni ” okutjho abantu abanengi , kodwana uthi , “ nesizukulwaneni ” , okutjho umuntu munye onguKrestu .
48003017	Engikutjhoko ngilokhu : Umthetho owafakwa eminyakeni emakhulu amane namatjhumi amathathu ngemva kwalokho , awusisusi isivumelwano esenziwa nguZimu phambilini bese ngalokho ususe isithembiso .
48003018	Yeke nakube ilifa liya ngomthetho , khona-ke alisayi ngesithembiso ; kodwana uZimu ngomusa wakhe walinikela u-Abrahamu ngesithembiso .
48003019	Alo , bewuyini-ke umnqopho womthetho na ? Wengezwa ngebanga lamacala kufikela lapha kuza khona isizukulwana esenzelwa isithembiso . Umthetho wafakwa ziingilozi ngesandla somlamuli .
48003020	Yeke umlamuli akasingewomuntu oyedwa , kodwana uZimu munye .
48003021	Alo-ke , umthetho ujamelene neenthembiso zakaZimu na ? Awa , nakanye ! Nakube umthetho bewunikelwe bona uphe ipilo , khona-ke ukulunga bekuzakuza ngomthetho .
48003022	Kodwana umtlolo uthi iphaseli loke nje lisibotjhwa sesono ukuze kuthi okwathenjiswa ngokukholwa kuJesu Krestu , kunikelwe labo abakholwako .
48003023	Ngaphambi kobana ukukholwa kufike , umthetho bewusibambile usenze iimbotjhwa , wasivalela bekwaba kulapha kutjhatjhululwa khona ukukholwa .

48004001	Kodwana ngithi lokha indlalifa nayisesemntwana , ayehluki kunekhoboka , nanyana imnini walo loke ilifa .
48004002	Iba ngaphasi kwabeluleki nabaphatheli bayo bekufike isikhathi esibekwe nguyise .

48004010	Nihlonipha amalanga akhethekileko , iinyanga , iinkhathi neminyaka !
48004011	Nginevalo ngani , kobana mhlamunye ngidlale ngamandlami ngani .

48004021	Akhe ningitjele nina enithanda ukuba ngaphasi komthetho , anilemuki bona umthetho uthini na ?
48004022	Angithi kutloliwe bona u-Abrahamu bekanamadodana amabili , enye ingeyekhobokakazi , enye ingeyomkakhe okhululekileko .
48004023	Indodanakhe yekhobokakazi yabelethwa ngendlela ejayelekileko , kodwana indodanakhe yomfazi okhululekileko yabelethwa ngebanga lesithembiso .

48005001	UKrestu wasikhulula kobana sibe ngabakhululekileko . Ngalokho jamani niqine , ningazidisibezi godu ngejogi lobukhoboka .

48005009	Ingumelo encani ibilisa ihlama yoke .
48005010	Nginethemba eKosini bona anizukuba nomkhumbulo owahlukileko . Loyo onihlangahlanganisako , uzakuthwala isibetho nanyana kungaba ngubani .
48005011	Bazalwana , nakube ngisatjhumayela ukusoka , alo ngisazunyelwani na ? Ngaleyondlela isikhubekiso sesiphambano siphelisiwe .

48005014	ngombana woke umthetho uzaliseka egameni linye lokuthi : “ Thanda umakhelwanakho njengombana uzithanda wena . ”

48005017	ngombana iinkanuko zenyama ziphambene nokufunwa nguMoya , kanti nokufunwa nguMoya kuphambene neenkanuko zenyama . Iye , izintwezi ziphambene , khona ningazukwenza enikuthandako .

48006003	Nakube umuntu udlumbana bona ulilitho ije angasililitho , uyazikhohlisa .
48006004	Omunye nomunye kufanele ahlolisise imisebenzakhe . Ngemva kwalokho-ke angazikhakhazisa ngokungokwakhe , ingasi ngokwabanye
48006005	ngombana omunye nomunye kufanele athwale umthwalo wakhe .
48006006	Akuthi nanyana ngubani ofundiswa ilizwi , abelane naloyo omfundisako kizo zoke izinto ezihle .
48006007	Ningakhohliswa , uZimu akaphoqwa . Umuntu uvuna akutjalileko .
48006008	Otjalela iinkanuko zakhe uzakuvuna ukubhubha okuvela kizo , kodwana otjalela uMoya , uzakuvuna ukuphila okungapheliko kuye uMoya .
48006009	Asingadinwa ukwenza okulungileko ngombana ngesikhathi esifaneleko sizakuvuna nakube asipheli amandla .
48006010	Nje-ke , njengombana sinethuba , asenzeni okuhle kibo boke abantu , khulukhulu kilabo abangebokukholwa .
48006011	Qalani , nginitlolele ngokudarhileko ngesami isandla !
48006012	Abantu abathanda ukubukwa enyameni , ngibo abazonikatelela bona nisoke . Benza lokho ukuze bangazunywa ngebanga lesiphambano sakaKrestu .
48006013	Sengitjho nalabo abasokako abawuthobeli umthetho ; kodwana khonapho bathanda bona nisoke ukuze bazikhakhazise ngenyama yenu .
48006014	Kodwana mina angingazikhakhazisi ngalitho ngaphandle kwesiphambano seKosethu uJesu Krestu , ngayo ekubethelwe iphasi kimi , nami ngabethelwa kilo .
48006015	Ukusoka nokungasoki akutjho ilitho , okukhulu kukobana umuntu abe sidalwa esitjha .
48006016	Akube kuthula nomusa kibo boke abakhamba ngomthetho lo , ngitjho naku-Israyeli kaZimu !
48006017	Ukusuka gadesi , akungabe kusaba nomuntu ongitshwenyako ngombana emzimbenami nginamatshwayo kaJesu .
48006018	Sengathi umusa weKosethu uJesu Krestu ungaba nani , bazalwana . Amen .
49001001	UPowula umpostoli kaKrestu Jesu ngokwentando kaZimu , kibo abacwengileko abase-Efesu nabathembekileko kuKrestu Jesu :
49001002	Akube kini ukuthula nomusa ovela kuZimu uBaba neKosi uJesu Krestu .
49001003	Akadunyiswe uZimu nonguYise weKosethu uJesu Krestu , osibusisileko embusweni wezulu ngazo zoke iimbusiso zakaMoya kuKrestu .
49001004	Wasikhethela kuye ngaphambi kokudalwa kwephasi kobana sibe ngabacwengileko nabamsulwa ebusweni bakhe . Ngethando
49001005	waqunta ngaphambilini bona sithathwe njengabantwana bakhe ngoJesu Krestu , ukuya ngokuthanda kwakhe nangentando yakhe ,
49001006	kiyo indumiso yomusa wakhe ophazimulako asinikele wona ngesihle ngaloyo amthandako !
49001007	Kuye sinesihlengo ngeengazi zakhe , ukucolelwa kwezono , ukuya ngomusa omkhulu kaZimu
49001008	awuthela phezu kwethu ngokuhlakanipha koke nangokuzwisisa .
49001009	Wasazisa ngokuhlakanipha koke nangokulemuka iimangaliso zentando yakhe , ukuya ngokomnqopho wakhe awuveza ngoKrestu
49001010	njengehlelo lokupheleliswa kweenkhathi , ukuhlanganisa zoke izinto kuye , iye , izinto ezisezulwini nezisephasini .
49001011	Kuye godu sakhethwa , saquntelwa ngaphambilini ukuya ngehlelo laloyo owenza koke ngokukhambisana nehloso yentando yakhe ,
49001012	ukuze kuthi thina ebesingebokuthoma ukwethemba kuKrestu , sidumise iphazimulwakhe .
49001013	Nani-ke nafakwa kuKrestu lokha nanizwa ilizwi leqiniso , ivangeli lesindiso yenu . Senikholiwe , nabekwa kuye itshwayo ngesigibo , ekunguMoya oCwengileko owathenjiswako .
49001014	Yena osibambiso esiqinisa ilifa lethu bekufike ukuhlengwa kwalabo abaselifeni lakaZimu , kilo idumo lephazimulwakhe .
49001015	Ngalokho-ke , soloko ngezwa ngokukholwa kwenu eKosini uJesu kanye nethando lenu kibo boke abacwengileko ,
49001016	azange ngilise ukunithokoza , ngihlala nginikhumbula emithandazwenami .
49001017	Ngihlala ngikhombela bona uZimu weKosethu uJesu Krestu , uBaba wephazimulo , aniphe uMoya wokuhlakanipha nesambulo ukuze nimazi ngcono .
49001018	Godu ngithandazela bona inga amehlo weenhliziyo zenu angavuleka ukuze nazi ithemba anibizela kilo , umnono welifa lakhe eliphazimulako kabacwengileko
49001019	namandla wakhe angalinganisekiko ngobukhulu , kithi abakholwako . Amandla lawo afana nokusebenza kwesiphanga sakhe ,
49001020	avusa ngawo uKrestu kabafileko , wambeka ngesigomeni sakhe embusweni wezulu ,
49001021	ngaphezu kwakho koke ukubusa kanye negunya , amandla nobukhosi kanye namabizo woke angabizwa ngawo , ingasi esikhathinesi kwaphela kodwana nakileso esizako .
49001022	UZimu wabeka koke ngaphasi kweenyawo zakaKrestu , wambeka bona abe yihloko phezu kwakho koke kwebandla ,
49001023	elimzimba wakhe nelikuzaliseka kwakhe ozalisa koke ngazo zoke iindlela .
49002001	Nakungini , benifile eemphambekweni nezonweni zenu ,
49002002	ebenijayele ukuphila kizo lokha nabegade nilandela iindlela zephaseli nezombusi wombuso womkayi , okumumoya osebenza phakathi kwalabo abangalaleliko .
49002003	Soke nje sakhe saphila phakathi kwazo ngesinye isikhathi , sanelisa iinkanuko zemvelo yethu yokonakala , salandela iinkanuko nemikhumbulwayo . Njengabo boke , ngokwemvelo besizizinto zokulahlwa .
49002004	Kodwana ngebanga lethando lakhe elikhulu , uZimu onothileko ngomusa ,
49002005	wasenza saphila ngoKrestu nanyana besifile ngeemphambeko . Yeke kungomusa bona nibe ngabasindisiweko .
49002006	UZimu wasivusa naye bewasihlalisa kanye naye embusweni wezulu kuKrestu Jesu
49002007	ukuze kuthi eenkhathini ezizako akhombise umnono ongalinganisekiko womusa wakhe , obonakaliswe esiseni sakhe kithi ngoKrestu Jesu .
49002008	Nje-ke kungomusa kobana nibe ngabasindisiweko ngokukholwa begodu lokhu akuveli kini , kodwana kusisipho sakaZimu ,
49002009	akuveli ngemisebenzi ukuze kungabikho ozozikhakhazisa .
49002010	Thina simsebenzi wezandla zakhe , kuKrestu Jesu kobana senze imisebenzi emihle uZimu asilungiselele yona ngaphambilini ukuze siphile kiyo .
49002011	Ngalokho khumbulani bona phambilini labo abazibiza bona “ ngabasokako ” ( basitjho ukusoka okwenziwa emzimbeni ngezandla zomuntu ) bebanibiza bona ningabatjhili ngokubelethwa .
49002012	Khumbulani bona ngesikhatheso beninganabudlelwano noKrestu , benininwa ekubeni zizakhamuzi zakwa-Israyeli , beningabalwa nesivumelwaneni sesithembiso . Beninganathemba begodu ninganaZimu ephasini .
49002013	Kodwana nina ebenikude noKrestu Jesu , senitjhideziwe ngeengazi zakhe .
49002014	Yena ngokwakhe ukuthula kwethu , iye , loyo owenza ababili baba munye , watjhabalalisa isiqabo okumthangala wobutha owahlukanisako ,
49002015	ngokuphelisa enyamenakhe umthetho nemiyalo yawo kanye neemiso zawo . Umnqopho wakhe bekukubumba kuye umuntu oyedwa ngokuhlanganisa ababili , ngalokho enze ukuthula ,
49002016	kuthi emzimbeni owodwa lowo enze ababili babuyisane noZimu esiphambanweni aphelisa ngaso ubutha .
49002017	Alo-ke , uKrestu weza watjhumayela ukuthula kini nina ebenikude nakilabo ebebaseduze ,
49002018	ngombana ngaye , soke sikghona ukufikelela kuBaba ngoMoya munye .
49002019	Ngalokho-ke , anisesemiqhamuka namaphandle , kodwana nizizakhamuzi kanye nabantu bakaZimu begodu nimalunga womndeni kaZimu .
49002020	Nakhelwe phezu kwesisekelo sabapostoli nabaphorofidi ngoKrestu Jesu ngokwakhe , olilitje elisisekelo .
49002021	Kuye kuhlanganiswe umakhiwo woke , uphakame ube lithempeli elicwengileko kuSomnini .
49002022	Nani-ke , niyakhiwa ndawonye kuye kobana nibe yindlu lapha kuhlala khona uZimu ngoMoya wakhe .
49003001	Ngebangelo-ke , mina Powula engisibotjhwa sakaKrestu Jesu , esikhundleni senu nina abatjhili ,
49003002	ngineqiniso bona nizwile ngokuphathwa komusa wakaZimu enganikelwa wona mayelana nani ,
49003003	okutjho ifihlakalo engaziswa yona ngesambulo njengombana sengatlola kafitjhazana .
49003004	Nanifunda lokhu , ningalemuka umqondo wami mayelana nefihlakalo kaKrestu ,
49003005	engazange yaziswe abantu eenzukulwaneni ezinye njengombana sele yambulwe nguMoya kubapostoli nabaphorofidi bakhe abacwengileko .
49003006	Ifihlakalo leyo kukobana abatjhili baziindlalifa kanye nathi , bamalunga womzimba munye begodu babahlanganyeli besithembiso kuKrestu Jesu ngebanga levangeli .
49003007	Mina ngenziwa inceku yevangeli leli ngokwesipho somusa kaZimu engawuphiwa ngokusebenza kwamandla wakhe .
49003008	Nanyana mina ngingomncancani kunabo boke abacwengileko , ngaphiwa umusa lo , kobana ngitjhumayele kabatjhili umnono kaKrestu ongaphenyekiko ,
49003009	nokulemukisa boke abantu ukubona bonyana liyini ihlelo lefihlakalo ebeyifihlwe kwekadeni kuZimu owadala koke .
49003010	Ihloso yakhe bekukukobana gadesi , ngokusebenzisa ibandla , ukuhlakanipha kwakaZimu okubonakalisiweko kuvezwe ebabusini neemphathimandleni zombuso wezulwini ,
49003011	ngokwehloso yakhe yanini nanini ayiphelelisa ngoKrestu Jesu iKosethu .
49003012	Kuye nangokukholwa kuye , singaya kuZimu ngokukhululeka nangesibindi .
49003013	Yeke ngiyanirabhela , ningapheli amandla ngalokho enginihluphekela ngakho , okulidumo lenu .
49003014	Ngesizathwesi ngiguqa phambi kwakaBaba ,
49003015	imindeni yoke yezulwini nephasinapha ebizwa ngaye .
49003016	Inga ngomnono wephazimulwakhe anganiqinisa ngamandla ngoMoyakhe ongaphakathi kwenu ,
49003017	ukuze uKrestu ahlale eenhliziyweni zenu ngokukholwa . Njengombana nidzimelele benasekeleka ethandweni lakaKrestu , ngithandazela bona
49003018	nibe namandla kanye nabo boke abacwengileko , nilemuke ububanzi , ubude , ukuphakama nokutjhinga kwethando lakhe .
49003019	Godu nilazi ithando lakaKrestu elidlula ilwazi loke ukuze nizaliswe ngalo kufikela esilinganisweni sakho koke ukuphelela kwakaZimu .
49003020	Yeke loyo onamandla wokwenza okukhulu ngokungalinganisekiko ukudlula lokho esikukhombelako namkha esikucabangako , ukuya ngamandla wakhe asebenza ngaphakathi kwethu ,
49003021	akube kuye idumo ebandleni nakuKrestu Jesu iinzukulwana ngeenzukulwana ! Amen .
49004001	Yeke , mina sibotjhwa ngebanga leKosi ngiyanincenga bonyana niphile ipilo efanelana nokubizwa kwenu ,
49004002	ngokobana nizithobe ngokupheleleko , nibe mnene , ninyamezele benibekezelelane ngethando .
49004003	Yenzani ngakho koke okusemandlenenu ukulonda ubunye bakaMoya ngesibopho sokuthula .
49004004	Munye umzimba noMoya munye ; njengombana nanibizwako nabizelwa ethembeni linye ,
49004005	eKosini yinye , ekukholweni kunye nembhajadisweni munye ,
49004006	kuZimu munye nonguYise wabo boke , ongaphezu kwakho koke begodu ngakho koke nakikho koke .
49004007	Kodwana soke siphiwe umusa ukuya ngokwesilinganiso sesipho sakaKrestu .
49004008	Yeke kungakho kuthiwa : “ Lokha nenyukela ekuphakameni , wathumba abathunjiweko , wabela abantu izipho . ”
49004009	Alo-ke ukuthi : “ Wenyuka ” kutjho ukuthini ngaphandle kokobana wakhe wehlela phasi eengcenyeni eziphasi zephasi na ?
49004010	Loyo owehlako , nguye kanye owenyukela ngaphezu kwawo woke amazulu ukuze azalise iphasi loke .
49004011	Nguye owabela abanye bona babe bapostoli , abanye babe baphorofidi , abanye babe bavangeli , abanye babe belusi kanye nabafundisi ,
49004012	ukulungiselela abacwengileko imisebenzi yokulotjha ukuze kwakheke umzimba kaKrestu ,
49004013	kufikela lapha soke siba munye khona ekukholweni nelwazini leNdodana kaZimu . Iye sikhule besifikelele ekuzuzeni isilinganiso soke sokuphelela kwakaKrestu .
49004014	Nje-ke asisesebantwana abawunawunwa mamaza , baphetjhulelwe le na le ngiyo yoke imimoya kanye nabantu abanobuqili ngamaqhingabo wekohliso .
49004015	Esikhundleni salokho , asikhulumeni iqiniso ngethando , ngakho koke sikhulele kiloyo oyihloko okunguKrestu
49004016	nokuhlangana kuye umzimba woke , ubumbane ndawonye ngamalungu woke onikelwa wona lokha isitho ngasinye nasisebenza ngendlela efaneleko , kwakheke umzimba , udzimelele ethandweni .
49004017	Yeke nginitjela lokhu begodu ngifakaza eKosini bonyana ningasaphili njengabatjhili emikhumbulwenabo elilize lakolize .
49004018	Imikhumbulwabo isebumnyameni , bahlukaniswe nendlela yokuphila evela kuZimu ngokungayeleli kwabo ngebanga lobukhuni beenhliziyo zabo .
49004019	Nasele bangasenanhloni , bazineka emanyaleni ukuze benze koke ukusilaphala , baragela phambili ngokukhanuka okungaphezu kwalokho .
49004020	Kodwana nina azange nifunde uKrestu ngendlela enjalo ,
49004021	ngombana sele nezwa ngaye benafundiswa ngaye ngokweqiniso elikuJesu .
49004022	Nafundiswa mayelana neendlela zenu zokuphila zaphambilini , kobana nilise imikhuba yenu yaphambilini eyonakaliswe ziinkanuko zayo zekohliso ;
49004023	kobana nenziwe butjha emikhubeni yemikhumbulwenu ,
49004024	nembathe ubuntu obutjha obubunjwe bafuza uZimu , ekulungeni kweqiniso nangokucwengeka .
49004025	Yeke lisani amanga , ngiloyo naloyo akhulume iqiniso nomakhelwanakhe ngombana soke simalungu womzimba munye .
49004026	Thukuthelani , kodwana ningoni . Akungatjhingi ilanga nisathukuthele ,
49004027	ningamnikeli ithuba uSathana .
49004028	Owebako akalise ukweba , kodwana akasebenze , enze okuhle ngezandla zakhe ukuze akwazi ukuba nelitho azalabela abaswelako .
49004029	Ningavumi bona ngemilonyeni yenu kuphume iinkulumo ezimbi ezilihlazo , kodwana nikhulume lokho okulisizo ekwakheni abanye ngokweendingo zabo ukuze kusizakale labo abalaleleko .
49004030	Ningamdabukisi uMoya oCwengileko kaZimu enabekwa ngaye itshwayo mayelana nelanga lokuhlengwa .
49004031	Akuphele koke : ubumunyu , itukuthelo , ilaka , ukubangelana itjhada , ukukhulumana kumbi , kanye nabo boke ubumbi .
49004032	Yibani mnene , nirhawukelane , nilibalelane njengombana noZimu anilibalela ngoKrestu .
49005001	Yeke yibani balingisi bakaZimu njengabantwana abathandekako ,
49005002	niphile ipilo yethando njengombana uKrestu asithanda wabe wazinikela ngenca yethu , waba mnikelo onuka kamnandi kanye nomhlabelo kuZimu .
49005003	Kodwana phakathi kwenu akungabikho ukuziphatha kumbi ngokwamabhayi , nanyana kungaba ngiliphi ihlobo lokusilaphala namkha lomrhawu ngombana lokho akukalungeli abantu abacwengileko bakaZimu .
49005004	Akungabikho amanyala , iinkulumo zobudlhadlha namkha isikhathi samahlaya angayi ngandlela , kodwana kunalokho yibani nokuthokoza .
49005005	Ngambala qinisekani ngalokhu : Akunasifebe , umuntu osilapheleko namkha omarhamaru njengaloyo olotjha abosingazimu , ozakuba nesabelo elifeni lombuso kaKrestu noZimu .
49005006	Ningakhohliswa mumuntu ngamezwi angatjho ilitho ngombana ngebanga lezinto ezinjalo itukuthelo kaZimu yehlela labo abangalaleliko .
49005007	Nje-ke ningabi nobudlelwano nabo .
49005008	Nani nakhe naba bumnyama , kodwana gadesi sele nikukhanya eKosini . Philani njengabantwana bokukhanya
49005009	ngombana isithelo sokukhanya sinabo boke ubuhle , ukulunga neqiniso
49005010	bese nifunyane bona yini okuthokozisa iKosi .
49005011	Ningabi nandaba nezinto ezililize ezenziwa babantu , izinto ezisebumnyameni , kunalokho zivezeni ekukhanyeni izintwezo .
49005012	Kulihlazo ngitjho nokutjho bona abangalaleliko benzani ngemsitheleni .
49005013	Kodwana koke okuvezwa kukhanya kuba semtarini
49005014	ngombana kukhanya okwenza koke kubonakale . Kungalokho kuthiwa : “ Phaphama wena oleleko , uvuke kabafileko , nje-ke uKrestu uzakukhanya kuwe ! ”
49005015	Ngalokho-ke tjhejisisani bona niziphethe njani , ningabi ziindlhayela , kodwana nihlakaniphe
49005016	ngokusebenzisa elinye nelinye ithuba ngombana imihla le esiphila kiyo mimbi .
49005017	Ningabi ziindlhayela , kodwana lemukani bona iyini intando kaZimu .
49005018	Ningadakwa liwayini ngombana lidosela ekukhohlakaleni . Esikhundleni salokho zaliswani ngoMoya oCwengileko .
49005019	Khulumisanani ngamarhubo , ngeenhlabelelo nangeengoma zakaMoya . Vumani benirhubele iKosi niyidumise ngeenhliziyo zenu ,
49005020	nihlale njalo nithokoza uZimu uBaba ngakho koke , ebizweni leKosethu uKrestu Jesu .
49005021	Thobelanani ngokuhlonipha uKrestu .
49005022	Bafazi , thobelani amadoda wenu sengathi nithobela iKosi
49005023	ngombana indoda iyihloko yomfazi , njengombana uKrestu ayihloko yebandla elimzimba wakhe begodu yena aMsindisi walo .
49005024	Njengombana ibandla limthobela uKrestu , ngokunjalo nabafazi kumele bathobele amadoda wabo kikho koke .
49005025	Madoda , thandani abafazi benu njengombana uKrestu athanda ibandla , wadela ukuphila kwakhe ngebanga lalo .
49005026	Walicwengisa , walihlanza ngamanzi nangelizwi lakhe
49005027	begodu waliletha kuye lilibandla elinephazimulo , elinganachaphazi , ukutjhwabana namkha umphambo wananyana yini kodwana licwengile begodu limsulwa .
49005028	Ngokunjalo namadoda kufanele athande abafazi bawo njengombana athanda imizimba yawo . Othanda umkakhe uzithanda yena ngokwakhe .
49005029	Akakho owakhe wazonda umzimbakhe kodwana ngiloyo naloyo uyawondla awutlhogomele , njengombana noKrestu asenza ebandleni
49005030	ngombana sizizitho zomzimbakhe .
49005031	“ Ngalokho-ke indoda izokutjhiya uyise nonina inamathele kumkayo , nje-ke ababili labo babe nyamanye . ”
49005032	Yifihlakalo ekulu le , kodwana ngikhuluma ngoKrestu nebandla .
49005033	Nokho-ke omunye nomunye wenu kumele athande umkakhe njengombana azithanda yena , nomfazi kumele ahloniphe indodakhe .
49006001	Bantwana , thobelani ababelethi benu eKosini ngombana lokhu kulungile .
49006002	“ Hlonipha uyihlo nonyoko . ” Lo myalo wokuthoma onesithembiso ,
49006003	esithi “ ukuze kunikhambele kuhle nokobana nibe nepilo ede ephasinapha ” .
49006004	Nani bobaba , ningabathukuthelisi abantwabenu , esikhundleni salokho bakhuliseni esifundisweni nemyalweni weKosi .
49006005	Makhoboka , thobelani abaphathi benu bephasini ngehlonipho , ngokwesaba nangobuqotho behliziyo , njengombana beningenza kuKrestu .
49006006	Ningakwenzi ngombana nifuna ukuthenga amehlwabo nabanibeke ilihlo , kodwana thembekani nanyana bangekho , njengamakhoboka kaKrestu , yenzani intando kaZimu ngeenhliziyo zenu ezipheleleko .
49006007	Yenzani umsebenzi wenu ngommoya omuhle kube ngathi anenzeli abantu kodwana nenzela iKosi ,
49006008	njengombana nisazi bonyana iKosi izokuvuza omunye nomunye ngakho koke okuhle akwenzako , nanyana alikhoboka namkha atjhaphulukile .
49006009	Nani baphathi , phathani amakhoboka wenu ngayo yona leyondlela . Ningabasongeli njengombana nisazi bonyana yena loyo oMphathi wabo newenu usezulwini begodu akathengi amehlo wabantu .
49006010	Kokugcina , qinani eKosini nemandleni wayo amakhulu !
49006011	Hlomani zoke iinhlabano zakaZimu ukuze nikghone ukulema nijamelane namaqhinga kaSathana ,
49006012	ngombana asibindani nenyama neengazi , kodwana sibindana nababusi , iimphathimandla , imibuso yephasi elisemnyameneli kanye nemibutho yemimoya emimbi esemkayini .
49006013	Nje-ke hlomani zoke iinhlabano zakaZimu ukuze kuthi nakufika ilanga lobumbi , nikghone ukudzimelela ningatjhidi bekuthi nasele nenze koke , nibonakale nisajamile .
49006014	Dzimelelani-ke , nizibophe ngebhande leqiniso edinini , ukulunga kube sivikelo senu sesifuba ,
49006015	iinyawo zenu zembathe ukulungela ukukhambisa ivangeli lokuthula .
49006016	Phezu kwakho koke lokhu , phakamisani ukukholwa kube sihlangu senu enikghona ukucima ngaso yoke imisubela evuthako yokhohlakeleko .
49006017	Yamukelani isindiso ibe sikupuru , ilizwi lakaZimu libe yisabula kaMoya .
49006018	Thandazani nikuMoya ngeenkhathi zoke ngayo yoke imihlobohlobo yemithandazo kanye neembawo . Nisakhumbule lokho , yelelani begodu ngeenkhathi zoke hlalani nithandazela boke abacwengileko .
49006019	Nami ningithandazele ukuze kuthi njalo nangivula umlomo , ngiphiwe amezwi wokobana ngitjhumayele ifihlakalo yevangeli ngesibindi ,
49006020	engimzenda walo ngibotjhiwe . Thandazani bona ngilitjhumayele ngesibindi njengombana ngifanele .
49006021	UTirhikosi umfowethu othandekako nosisebenzi esithembekako seKosi , uzanitjela koke ukuze nani nazi bonyana ngivuke njani nokobana ngenzani .

50001001	UPowula noThimothi , iinceku zakaKrestu Jesu , kibo boke abacwengileko kuKrestu Jesu abaseFilipi , bakanye nabaphathi namagosa :
50001002	Akube kini umusa nokuthula okuvela kuZimu uBaba wethu neKosini uJesu Krestu .
50001003	Ngihlala ngithokoza uZimu njalo nanginikhumbulako .
50001004	Kiyo yoke imithandazwami , nginithandazela ngethabo ,
50001005	ngebanga lokuhlanganyela kwenu evangelini ukusuka ngelanga lokuthoma bekube gadesi .
50001006	Ngineqiniso bona loyo owathoma umsebenzi omuhle phakathi kwenu , uzawuraga abe awuqedelele bekube lilanga lakaKrestu Jesu .
50001007	Kuhle kimi ukuzizwela ngalendlela ngani noke ngombana nginithwele ehliziyweni yami ! Iye ngombana nihlanganyele nami emseni kaZimu , ekubotjhweni kwami nekuvikeleni kanye nekuqiniseni ivangeli .
50001008	UZimu ungufakazi wami bona nginihlulukela kangangani noke ngesirhawu sakaKrestu Jesu .

50001012	Ngithanda bona nazi bazalwana bonyana izinto ezenzekileko kimi eqinisweni zaba lisizo ekuthuthukiseleni phambili ivangeli .
50001013	Ngalokho-ke , sele kwazeka kibo boke abalindi besigodlo nakiwo woke umuntu bonyana ngibotjhwe ngebanga lakaKrestu .
50001014	Nje-ke inengi labazalwana sele linesibindi eKosini ngebanga lokubotjhwa kwami , sele batjhumayela ngesibindi nangaphandle kokwesaba .
50001015	Iye , abanye batjhumayela uKrestu ngomona nangombango , kodwana abanye batjhumayela ngommoya omuhle .
50001016	Laba besibili bakwenza ngethando , basazi bonyana ngibekwe lapha kobana ngivikele ivangeli .
50001017	Kodwana laba bokuthoma batjhumayela uKrestu ngomrhobholo , ingasi ngokwethembeka , bahlose ukwengeza amatshwenyeko wami ekubotjhweni kwami .
50001018	Alo , kutshwenya ngani nje lokho ? Okuqakathekileko kukobana uKrestu utjhunyayelwa ngazo zoke iindlela nanyana ngeenhloso zamanga namkha ngeqiniso ; mina ngiyathokoza ngalokho . Iye ngizokuragela phambili ngithokoze
50001019	ngombana ngiyazi bona ngemithandazo yenu nesizo elivela kuMoya kaJesu Krestu , lokhu kuzakuba kukhululeka kwami .
50001020	Kuyitjisakalo yerhuluphelwami kanye nethemba lokobana angizukurhubutjhwa ngitjho nanyana kungaba ngayiphi indlela , kodwana ukukhuluma kwami ngesibindi , uKrestu uzakuphakanyiswa gadesi njengombana kunjalo ngemihla emzimbenami , nanyana kungaba ngokuphila namkha ngokufa .
50001021	Ngambala , kimi ukuphila nguKrestu , ukufa yinzuzo .
50001022	Nakube ngimele ngiphile emzimbeni , lokho kutjho bona kuzakuba msebenzi oneenthelo kimi , nje-ke angazi bona ngikuphi engikwenyulako .
50001023	Ngiphakathi kokubili : Isifiso sami kukobana ngemuke ngiyokuba noKrestu ngombana lokho kungcono khulu .
50001024	Kodwana ukuphila emzimbeni kuqakatheke khulu ngebanga lenu .
50001025	Njengombana ngineqiniso ngalokhu nje , ngiyazi bonyana ngizakuhlala ngingakhambi ngiragele phambili nani noke ngebanga lokuragela phambili kanye nethabo lenu ekukholweni .
50001026	Ngalokho ngizazibandakanya ngokungapheliko ekuzikhakhaziseni kwenu kuKrestu Jesu lokha nangiza kini godu .
50001027	Kwaphela philani ngendlela efanele ivangeli lakaKrestu ukuze kuthi nanyana ngiyabuya ngizonibona namkha ngingekho phakathi kwenu , nangizwa ngani , ngizakwazi bonyana nijamile begodu nidzimelele nimunye , nilwela ukukholwa kwevangeli nibambisene ngomkhumbulo owodwa .
50001028	Yeke ningethuswa ngabajamelene nani ngombana kibo , lokho kusibonakaliso sokubhubha kwabo . Kodwana kini kukusindiswa kwenu . Lokhu kusisenzo sakaZimu .

50001030	njengombana ninomtjhikatjhika ofana nalowo enangibona ngiphakathi kwawo , nagadesi nizwa bonyana ngisesenawo .
50002001	Yeke nakube kukhona ukukhuthazeka kuKrestu , nakukhona ukududuzwa okuvela ethandweni , kukhona nehlanganyelo kaMoya godu kukhona umusa nezwelo ,
50002002	khona-ke phelelisani ithabo lami ngokuba nomkhumbulo owodwa , nibe nethando elilodwa , ngokuba mmoya munye begodu nibe hliziyonye .
50002003	Ningenzi ilitho ngehliziyo ede namkha ngokuzitjhaya kodwana ngokuzithoba , nithathe abanye bona bangcono kunani .
50002004	Ngiloyo naloyo angazitjheji yena kwaphela kodwana akatjheje neemfuno zabanye .
50002005	Yibani nomkhumbulo onjengalowo ebegade ukuKrestu Jesu ,
50002006	owathi nanyana gade anejamo lakaZimu , azange azilinganise noZimu njengento yokuphangwa .
50002007	Kodwana wazehlisa , wathatha ijamo lekhoboka , wabelethwa njengomuntu . Wafunyaneka anejamo lomuntu .
50002008	Wazithoba , walalela bekwaba sekufeni , ngitjho ukufa esiphambanweni .

50002013	ngombana nguZimu osebenza ngaphakathi kwenu , owenza bona nikghone begodu nisebenze ngokwentando yakhe .

50002015	ukuze ningasoleki begodu nibe msulwa , nibe bantwana bakaZimu abanganabala hlangana nesizukulwana esiphambeneko nesikhohlakeleko , eniphazima hlangana naso njengeenkwekwezi ephasini .
50002016	Kungebanga lokukakarela kwenu elizwini lokuphila ukobana ngizikhakhazise ngelanga lakaKrestu ngokuthi ukugijima namkha ukujuluka kwami azange kube lilize .

50002027	Ngambala bekagula kangangobana wapheze wahlongakala . Kodwana uZimu wamrhawukela begodu ingasi yena yedwa kodwana nami ukuze ngingabi nesizi phezu kwesizi .

50003001	Kokugcina bazalwana , thabani eKosini . Ukubuyelela ukunitlolela ebenginitlolele khona phambilini akungikhathazi , kodwana kukulondeka kini .

50003003	Ngithi esisokileko , iye , thina esilotjha ngoMoya kaZimu . Sizikhakhazisa ngoKrestu Jesu , asinathemba enyameni ,
50003004	nanyana nami nginazo iinzathu zokuba nethemba enyameni . Nakube kukhona odlumbana bona uneenzathu zokwethembela enyameni , zami-ke zingaphezulu .

50003009	ngifunyanwe ngimunye naye . Angisenakho ukulunga okungekwami okuvela emthethweni kodwana okuvela ngokukholwa kuKrestu , okukulunga okuvela kuZimu nokudzimelele ekukholweni .
50003010	Ngifuna ukwazi uKrestu namandla wokuvuka kwakhe ekufeni kanye nokuhlanganyela ekuhluphekeni kwakhe ngokuba njengaye ekufeni kwakhe ,

50003012	Ingasi bona sele ngikufumene lokho namkha sele ngifikile emnqopheni , kodwana ngihlabela phambili kobana ngikwenze kube ngekwami ngombana uKrestu Jesu ungenze ngaba ngewakhe .
50003013	Bazalwana angitjho bona sengikuzuzile lokho , kodwana yinye into engiyenzako : Ngikhohlwa okungemva kwami , ngihlabele phambili ngamandla kokuphambili kwami .

50003016	Kwaphela asibambeleleni kilokho esele sinakho .

50004001	Nje-ke , bazalwana abathandekako nengibahlulukeleko , nina enikuthaba kwami kanye nesihlohlo sami , kakarelani eKosini ngayo indlela leyo , bathandekako .

50004005	Ukuthobeka kwenu akwaziwe babantu boke . IKosi sele iseduze .

50004008	Kokugcina bazalwana nanyana yini eliqiniso , ehloniphekako , elungileko , emsulwa , ethokozisako , eyazisako , iye , nakukhona ubuhle begodu nakukhona nanyana yini efanele idunyiswe , zindlani ngayo .
50004009	Ragelani phambili nokwenza enakufunda , nakwamukela , nakuzwa benakubona ngikwenza , yeke uZimu wokuthula uzakuba nani .
50004010	Kulithabo elikhulu kimi eKosini bona ekugcineni nibe nethuba lokuvuselela ukungitjheja kwenu . Beniseze ningitjheja , kodwana beninganathuba lokukubonisa lokho .
50004011	Angikhulumi ngebanga lokuswela , kodwana ngikhuluma ngombana ngifundile ukwaneliswa ngalokho enginakho .
50004012	Ngiyazi bona kunjani ukungabi nokwaneleko , godu ngiyazi bona kunjani ukuba nakho koke . Kikho koke nakibo boke ubujamo ngafunda ifihlakalo yokwaneliswa nanyana ngisutha namkha ngilamba .
50004013	Ngikghona ukwenza yoke into ngaloyo ongiqinisako .
50004014	Nokho kwaba kuhle kini kobana nihlanganyele eenhluphekweni zami .
50004015	Khulukhulu nina eniseFilipi , niyazi bona emihleni yokuthoma kwevangeli , nangisuka eMasedoniya , akunabandla elahlanganyela nami endabeni yokupha nokwamukela ngaphandle kwenu kwaphela .
50004016	Ngitjho nalokha nabengiseThesalonika , nangithumelela isizo elimalungana neendingo zami bekwaba kanengana .
50004017	Akusi kukobanyana ngifuna isipho , kodwana ngifuna inzuzo ebalelwa ngakini .

51001001	UPowula ompostoli kaJesu Krestu ngokwentando kaZimu , noThimothi umfowethu ,
51001002	kibo abazalwana abacwengileko nabathembekileko kuKrestu abaseKolose : Sengathi ningaba nomusa nokuthula okuvela kuZimu uBaba wethu .
51001003	Sihlala simthokoza njalo uZimu , uYise weKosethu uJesu Krestu , nasinithandazelako ,
51001004	ngombana sizwile ngokukholwa kwenu kuKrestu Jesu , nangethando eninalo kibo boke abacwengileko ,
51001005	ngebanga lethemba enibekelwe lona ezulwini . Senikhe nezwa ngalelithemba ngaphambilini elizwini leqiniso , okutjho ivangeli ,
51001006	iye , lona lelo esele lifikile kini . Njengombana lithela iinthelo begodu landa nephasi loke , ngokunjalo lithela iinthelo naphakathi kwenu soloko kwamhla nalizwako nabe nazi nomusa kaZimu ngeqiniso .

51001010	Siyanithandazela bona niphile ipilo efanele iKosi , beniyithabise ngakho koke , nithele iinthelo kiwo woke umsebenzi omuhle , nikhule nekumazini uZimu ,
51001011	niqiniswe ngawo woke amandla emandlenakhe amakhulu ukuze nibe nokudzimelela okukhulu kanye nokubekezela . Ngethabo
51001012	nithokoze uBaba owanenza bona nifanelwe sisabelo elifeni labacwengileko embusweni wokukhanya .

51001014	esinokuhlengwa nokulitjalelwa kwezono zethu kiyo .

51001016	ngombana koke kwabunjwa ngaye : okusezulwini nephasinapha , okubonakalako nokungabonakaliko , kungaba mibuso namkha ubukhosi namkha ababusi neemphathimandla . Koke kwabunjwa ngaye , kwabunjelwa yena .
51001017	Yena ngokwakhe waba khona koke kungakabikhona begodu koke kudzimelele ngaye .
51001018	Uyihloko yomzimba , okulibandla ; usithomo , izibulo labavuswa ekufeni , ukuze abe ngewokuthoma kikho koke .

51001020	ukuze kuthi ngaye abuyisele koke kuye nanyana kungaba ngokusephasini namkha okusezulwini , ngokwenza ukuthula ngeengazi zakhe ezathululwa esiphambanweni .
51001021	Nani ebegade nikude noZimu , nimanaba emikhumbulweni yenu ngebanga lezinto ezimbi ebenizenza ,
51001022	nokho sele abuyisene nani ngomzimba kaKrestu wenyama , ngokufa kwakhe ukuze aniveze nicwengile , nimsulwa begodu ningasoleki phambi kwakhe .
51001023	Lokho kwenzeka kwaphela nakube nani nihlala nidzimelele benikakarele esisekelweni sokukholwa , ngaphandle kokutjhida ethembeni elathenjiswa livangeli enalizwako nelatjhunyayelwa kikho koke okudaliweko ngaphasi komthunzi welanga , mina Powula engaba sisebenzi salo .
51001024	Nje-ke ngiyathaba ekuhluphekeni kwami ngenca yenu , begodu emzimbenami ngiphelelisa lokho okutlhayeleko ekuhluphekeni kwakaKrestu ngebanga lomzimbakhe , okutjho ibandla .
51001025	Ngenziwe isikhonzi salo ngokomsebenzi kaZimu enganikelwa wona ngani , ukuzwakalisa ilizwi lakaZimu ngokupheleleko ,
51001026	ekuyifihlakalo ebeyifihliwe kiso soke isikhathi sekadeni kanye neenzukulwaneni , kodwana gadesi sele yambulelwe abacwengileko bakhe .
51001027	UZimu waqunta bona kwazeke kibo bonyana umnono wephazimulo yefihlakalwakhe le mkhulu kangangani hlangana nabatjhili ; ifihlakalo leyo inguKrestu okini nolithemba lephazimulo .
51001028	Nje-ke nguye esimtjhumayelako , siyelelise woke umuntu besibafundise koke ukuhlakanipha kwakhe ukuze silethe woke umuntu aphelele kuKrestu .
51001029	Iye , ngikho lokhu engikusebenzelako , ngitjhabatjheka ngawo woke umfutho awuvusa ngamandla ngaphakathi kwami .
51002001	Ngithanda nazi bonyana ngirubaruba kangangani ngani nangalabo abaseLawodikeya , boke abanengi esingazange khesibonane nabo ubuso nobuso .

57001005	ngombana ngiyezwa ngethando lakho nokukholwa onakho eKosini uJesu nakibo boke abacwengileko .

57001007	Ithando lakho lingilethele ithabo elimangazako nokukhuthazeka ngombana iinhliziyo zabacwengileko zivuselelekile ngawe , mzalwana .
57001008	Ngalokho , nanyana nginesibindi kuKrestu sokukuyala bona wenze okufaneleko ,
57001009	nokho ngebanga lethando ngiyakuncenga . Nje-ke mina Powula njengomuntu osele amdala nosibotjhwa sakaKrestu Jesu njenganje ,
57001010	ngikubawa ngo-Onesimu indodanami engibe nguyise ngesikhathi sokubotjhwa kwami :
57001011	Ngaphambilini gade angasilo isizo kuwe , kodwana manjesi sele alisizo kimi nakuwe .
57001012	Nje-ke ngimthumela bona abuyele kuwe njengomuntu oyihliziywami .
57001013	Bengithanda bona ahlale nami kobana angisize esikhundleni sakho ngesikhathi ngisesesibotjhwa ngebanga levangeli .
57001014	Kodwana angithandi ukwenza ilitho ngaphandle kwemvumo yakho ukuze izenzo zakho ezihle zibe ngezokuzithandela kungabi yinto yokwenziswa .
57001015	Mhlamunye kungebangelo ahlukana nawe isikhatjhana khona azakubuyiselwa kuwe unomphela ,
57001016	angaseselikhoboka kodwana sele angaphezu kwekhoboka , amfowethu othandeka khulukhulu kimi , alo , kangangani-ke kuwe enyameni neKosini .
57001017	Nje-ke nangabe ungithatha njengomhlanganyeli nawe , mamukele njengombana bewuzakwamukela mina .
57001018	Nangabe kukhona akone ngakho , namkha akubamba khona , kubalele kimi lokho .
57001019	Iye , mina Powula , ngitlola ngesandla sami , ngithi : Ngizakuhlawula lokho ! Bengingakathandi ukukukhumbuza bona wena ngokwakho ungibamba ubuwena .
57001020	Iye mfowethu , ngenzela isisa ngebanga leKosi , uvuselele ihliziywami kuKrestu .
57001021	Nginethemba ngokulalela kwakho , ngikutlolela lokhu ngisazi bona uzakwenza ngokungaphezu kwalokho engikubawako .
57001022	Okhunye godu nakhu : Ngilungiselani ilawu labayeni ngombana nginethemba bona ngemithandazo yenu ngizakubuyiselwa kini .
57001023	U-Ephafrasi obotjhwe nami ngebanga lakaKrestu Jesu , uyanilotjhisa ,
57001024	ngokunjalo noMarkosi , u-Aristarirhusi , uDemasi noLukasi ababalingani bami .
57001025	Sengathi umusa weKosi uJesu Krestu ungaba nani noke .
58001001	UZimu wakhuluma ekadeni kibokhokho bethu ngabaphorofidi ngeenkhathi ezinengi nangeendlela ezahlukahlukeneko ,
58001002	kodwana ngemihla yokuphela le ukhulume nathi ngeNdodana ayibeke bona ibe yindlalifa yezinto zoke , yona abumba ngayo izulu nephasi .
58001003	Yona isibonakaliso sephazimulo kaZimu nomfuziselo wamambala wobuyena bakhe ; iphethe izinto zoke ngelizwi layo elinamandla . Lapho sele ikwenzile ukuhlanjululwa kwezono , yahlala ngesigomeni sakaSomandla ezulwini .
58001004	Nje-ke yaba yikulu khulu kuneengilozi njengombana nebizo elizuzileko lilikhulu kunelazo
58001005	ngombana ngiyiphi yeengilozi uZimu akhe atjho kiyo athi : “ Wena uyiNdodanami , namhlanje ngikubelethile , ” “ Ngizakuba nguYise yona izakuba yiNdodanami . ” “ Zoke iingilozi zakaZimu azililotjhe . ” “ Wenza iingilozi zakhe imimoya , iinsebenzi zakhe zibe malangabi womlilo . ” “ Isihlalo sakho , Zimu , ngesanini nanini nokulunga kuzakuba yintonga yobukhosi bakho .
58001006	Godu kwathi lokha uZimu nakaletha izibulo lakhe ephasinapha , wathi : “ Zoke iingilozi zakaZimu azililotjhe . ”
58001007	Nakakhuluma ngeengilozi , uthi : “ Wenza iingilozi zakhe imimoya , iinsebenzi zakhe zibe malangabi womlilo . ”
58001008	Kodwana ngeNdodana uthi : “ Isihlalo sakho , Zimu , ngesanini nanini nokulunga kuzakuba yintonga yobukhosi bakho .
58001009	Uthande ukulunga , wazonda ikohlakalo . Ngalokho-ke Zimu , uZimakho ukuzese ngamafutha wethabo ngaphezu kwabalingani bakho . ” “ Somnini , ekuthomeni wabeka iinsekelo zephasi namazulu amsebenzi wezandla zakho .
58001010	Godu uthi : “ Somnini , ekuthomeni wabeka iinsekelo zephasi namazulu amsebenzi wezandla zakho .
58001011	Zona izintwezo zizakubhubha , kodwana wena ujamile . Iye , zoke zizakuphela njengengubo ;
58001012	uzazibhinca njengesambatho , zitjhuguluke njengengubo . Kodwana wena uzakuhlala unjalo neminyakakho angeze yaphela . ” “ Hlala ngesigomeni sami , kufikela lapha ngenza khona amanabakho abe sinabelo seenyawo zakho ” na ?
58001013	Kodwana ngiyiphi yeengilozi akhe atjho kiyo athi : “ Hlala ngesigomeni sami , kufikela lapha ngenza khona amanabakho abe sinabelo seenyawo zakho ” na ?
58001014	“ Kanti iingilozi azisiyo yoke imimoya elotjhako nethunyelwe bona isize labo abazokuzuza isindiso na ? ”
58002001	Nje-ke kufuze siyelele khulu ngalokho esikuzwileko ukuze singatjhidi kikho .
58002002	Nakube ilizwi elakhulunywa ngeengilozi laqiniseka nokobana esinye nesinye isiphambeko nokungalaleli kwamukela isibetho esifaneleko ,
58002003	alo , thina sizakuphunyurha njani nasithembela isindiso ekulu kangaka na ? Iye , isindiso eyathoma yamenyezelwa yiKosi , yaqiniswa kithi ngilabo abayizwako .
58002004	NoSomnini wafakazela isindiso leyo ngamatshwayo , ngeemangaliso nangemikarisomraro ehlukahlukeneko kanye nangezipho zakaMoya oCwengileko ezabiwe ngokwentando yakhe .
58002005	UZimu azange abeke iphasi elizako nesikhuluma ngalo leli eengilozini .
58002006	Kodwana omunye ufakazile endaweni ethileko wathi : “ Uyini-ke obhubhako bona ungabe umkhumbule , bekayini wephasi bona ungabe umbeke abe mphathi na ?
58002007	Mbala umenze waba ngaphasana kweendalwa zezulu , wamthwesa ukuhlonitjhwa nobukhosi !
58002008	Wamenza waba mphathi womsebenzi wezandla zakho ; wabeka koke ngaphasi kweenyawo zakhe . ”
58002009	Kodwana siyambona uJesu owenziwa waba mncani kuneengilozi kwesikhatjhana ; njenganje sele athweswe isihlohlo esinephazimulo nedumo ngebanga lokubandezeleka kwakhe ngokufa .
58002010	Koke kukhona ngoZimu begodu kungokwakhe . Nje-ke lokha nakaqunta ukurholela inengi labantwana bakhe ephazimulwenakhe kwafaneleka bona enze umsindisi wabo abe ngopheleleko ngokuhlupheka .
58002011	Iye , ngombana loyo ocwengisako nalabo abacwengiswako bamndeni munye . Kungesizathweso uJesu angananhloni zokubabiza bonyana bafowabo ,
58002012	asithi : “ Nje-ke ngizakumemezela ibizo lakho kubafowethu , ngikudumise phakathi kwebandla lamakholwa . ” “ Ngizokuthembela njalo kuZimu . ” “ Nakhu lapha ngikhona nabantwana engabaphiwa nguZimu . ”
58002013	Godu uthi : “ Ngizokuthembela njalo kuZimu . ” Abuye athi : “ Nakhu lapha ngikhona nabantwana engabaphiwa nguZimu . ”
58002014	Njengombana abantwana bahlanganyela inyama neengazi , naye ngokwakhe wahlanganyela khona lokho ukuze kuthi ngokufa kwakhe amchithe loyo ogade anamandla wokufa , okutjho uSathana .
58002015	Wenza lokho bona athukulule boke labo abathi ngesikhathi soke sokuphila kwabo babotjhelelwa ebukhobokeni ngebanga lokwesaba ukufa .
58002016	Kwamambala kuyakhanya bonyana akakezi ukuzokusiza iingilozi , kodwana iinzukulwana zaka-Abrahamu .
58002017	Nje-ke kwamfanela ukuba njengabafowabo kikho koke , khona azakuba mphristi omkhulu onesirhawu nothembekileko emsebenzini kaZimu , abe yihlawulo yokubuyisana kwezono zabantu .
58002018	Njengombana naye ngokwakhe wazizinywa ngalokho ahlupheka ngakho , yeke unamandla wokusiza labo abazizinywako .
58003001	Ngalokho-ke bazalwana abacwengileko , enibahlanganyeli ekubizweni kwezulwini , bekani umkhumbulwenu kuJesu ongumPostoli nomPhristi omkhulu wesivumo sethu .
58003002	Wathembeka kiloyo owamkhethako wambeka njengoMosi owabegade anjalo kiyo yoke indlu kaZimu .
58003003	Nje-ke uJesu kufunyaneke bona ufanele idumo elikhulu kunoMosi ; lokho kunjengombana umakhi wendlu anedumo elikhulu kunendlu ngokwayo .
58003004	Ngileyo naleyo indlu yakhiwe mumakhi wayo , kodwana uZimu umumakhi wakho koke okukhona .
58003005	UMosi bekathembeke njengenceku kiyo yoke indlu yakaZimu bekube bufakazi balokho ebekuzakukhulunywa ngakho esikhathini esizako .
58003006	UKrestu njengeNdodana bekathembekile endlini kaZimu . Thina-ke siyindlu yakhe nangabe sihlala njalo sibambelele ethembeni esizibuka ngalo .
58003007	Yeke , njengombana uMoya oCwengileko uthi : “ Namhlanjesi nanizwa ilizwi lakhe ,
58003008	ningaqinisi iinhliziyo zenu njengeMeriba nanjengelangeni lelo eMasa , erhalawumbeni ,
58003009	lapha aboyihlomkhulu bangizizinya khona nanyana besele babone imisebenzami .
58003010	Iminyaka ematjhumi amane , isizukulwaneso sangikghabhudlha . Nje-ke ngathi , ‘ Sibabantu abaphambene ngehliziyo neendlela zami asiziyeleli . ’
58003011	Ngalokho ngafunga elakeni lami ngathi , ‘ Angeze bangene ekuphumuleni kwami . ’ ”
58003012	Nje-ke bazalwana , tjhejani bona kungabikhona noyedwa wenu onehliziyo embi engakholwako ebangela bonyana ahlubuke kuZimu ophilako .
58003013	Kodwana khuthazanani imihla ngemihla , ije kusathiwa “ namhlanje ” ukuze kungabikhona namunye wenu oqinileko ngebanga lesono esikhohlisako
58003014	ngombana sesibahlanganyeli noKrestu , nangabe kwaphela sibambelela ethembeni lethu bekube sekupheleni .
58003015	Njengombana kuthiwa : “ Namhlanjesi nanizwa ilizwi lakhe , ningaqinisi iinhliziyo zenu njengeMeriba nanjengelangeni lelo eMasa . ”
58003016	Bobani labo abezwa bebamhlubuka na ? Angithi ngilabo boke abakhutjhwa nguMosi eGibhide na ?
58003017	Bobani labo abathukuthelela iminyaka ematjhumi amane na ? Angithi ngilabo abonako , iindumbu zabo zaradlhwa erhalawumbeni ?
58003018	Wafunga kibobani bona angeze bangena ekuphumuleni kwakhe , nakungasi ngilabo ebebanganandlebe na ?
58003019	Nje-ke sesiyabona bonyana bahluleka ukungena ngebanga lokungakholwa kwabo .
58004001	Yeke , njengombana isithembiso sokungena ekuphumuleni kwakhe sisesenjalo , asiyeleleni bonyana kungabikhona noyedwa wenu ozakufunyanwa abhalelwa kufikelela ekuphumuleni
58004002	ngombana nathi satjhunyayezwa ivangeli njengabo . Kodwana ilizwi abalizwako akhange libasize ngombana akhange bakholwe labo ebegade balitjhumayela .
58004003	Nje-ke thina esikholwako siyangena ekuphumuleni njengombana yena uthe : “ Ngafunga elakeni lami ngathi , ‘ Angekhe bangena ekuphumuleni kwami . ’ ” “ Ngelanga lekhomba , waphumula kiwo woke umsebenzakhe . ” “ Angekhe bangena enarheni leyo , inarha ebebayophumula kiyo . ” “ Namhlanje , nanizwa ilizwi lakhe , ningazenzi zibe likhuni iinhliziyo zenu . ”
58004004	Kwenye indawo emitlolweni mayelana nelanga lekhomba kwathiwa : “ Ngelanga lekhomba , waphumula kiwo woke umsebenzakhe . ”
58004005	Kubuye kuthiwe : “ Angekhe bangena enarheni leyo , inarha ebebayophumula kiyo . ”
58004006	Kusabasalele abanye kobana bangene ekuphumuleni nalabo abatjhunyayelwa qangi ivangeli abangazange bangene ngebanga lokungalaleli .
58004007	Yeke usabeke elinye ilanga , ekuthiwa ngalo “ namhlanje ” okwathi ngemva kwesikhathi eside wakhuluma ngoDavida , njengombana besele kukhulunyiwe kwathiwa : “ Namhlanje , nanizwa ilizwi lakhe , ningazenzi zibe likhuni iinhliziyo zenu . ”
58004008	Iye , ngathana uJotjhuwa wabanikela ukuphumula , uZimu ubengekhe akhuluma muva ngelinye ilanga .
58004009	Nje-ke kusabasalele abantu bakaZimu ukuphumula kweSabatha
58004010	ngombana loyo osuke angene ekuphumuleni kwakaZimu , uyaphumula godu nemisebenzinakhe njengoZimu aphumula kweyakhe .
58004011	Nje-ke asikhuthaleleni ukungena ekuphumulenokho ukuze kungabikhona namunye kithi owako ngokulandela isibonelo sokungalaleli kwabo .
58004012	Mbala ilizwi lakaZimu liphilile , linamandla , libukhali kunesabula esika mahlangothi womabili . Lihlaba lingene beliyofika ehlanganweni yomphefumulo nommoya , amalungu nommongo ; likwazi ukuhlukanisa imicabango nemizindlo yehliziyo .
58004013	Akukho nokukodwa okubunjiweko okusithekileko phambi kwakaZimu . Koke kwambuliwe phambi kobuso bakhe , kusemtarini emehlweni waloyo esizaziphendulela kuye .
58004014	Njengombana sinomphristi omkhulu owadabula amazulu , uJesu iNdodana kaZimu , asibambeleleni siqine ekukholweni kwethu esikuvumako
58004015	ngombana asinaye umphristi omkhulu ongakwazi ukuzwelana nobuthakathaka bethu , kodwana ozizinywe ngeendlela zoke njengathi .
58004016	Ngalokho-ke asitjhidele ngesibindi esihlalweni somusa , khona sizakwamukeliswa isirhawu , sizuze umusa , sisizeke ngesikhathi esifaneleko .
58005001	Ngiloyo naloyo umphristi omkhulu okhethwe hlangana nabantu ubekelwe bona abajamele kuZimu , ukunikela iminikelo nemihlabelo yezono .
58005002	Uyakwazi ukunyamezelela ngesisa labo abanganalwazi nabaphambukako njengombana naye ngokwakhe uyabazi ubuthakathaka ;
58005003	kungalokho kufanele bona anikele umhlabelo ngenca yezono zakhe nangenca yezono zabantu .
58005004	Akakho ozikhethela ukuba sesikhundlenesi , kodwana uba kiso ngokubizwa nguZimu njengo-Aroni .
58005005	Ngokunjalo noKrestu azange azinikele idumo ngokuba muphristi omkhulu kodwana waphakanyiswa ngiloyo owathi kuye : “ Wena uyiNdodanami , namhlanje ngikubelethile , ” “ Wena umphristi ngokungapheliko ngokwendlela yakaMalkitsedekhi . ”
58005006	njengombana atjho kwenye indawo wathi : “ Wena umphristi ngokungapheliko ngokwendlela yakaMalkitsedekhi . ”
58005007	Ngesikhathi uJesu asesephasinapha bephele enze imithandazo nokubawela abanye ngesililo esikhulu nangeenyembezi kiloyo ogade anamandla wokumsindisa ekufeni . Begodu bekalalelwa ngombana bekazinikela ngokuzithoba .
58005008	Sengitjho nanyana bekayiNdodana , wafunda ukulalela ngalokho ahlupheka ngakho
58005009	begodu nalapho sele aphelelisiwe , waba mthombo wesindiso wabo boke abamlalelako ,
58005010	bewabekwa nguZimu bona abe mphristi omkhulu ngokwendlela yakaMalkitsedekhi .
58005011	Kusesenokunengi esingakutjho mayelana nalokhu , kodwana kulikhuni ukunihlathululela ngombana nithathela kude ukuzwa .
58005012	Nanyana ngesikhathesi bekufanele ngathana senibafundisi , kodwana nisadinga omunye ozokubuya anifundise godu , anitatayise anithomise phasi kancani eemfundisweni zelizwi lakaZimu . Nisadinga ibisi kunokudla okuqinileko .
58005013	Loyo omunyako usuka asesemntwana , nje-ke akakalemuki ilizwi lokulunga .
58005014	Kodwana ukudla okuqinileko kungokwabakhulileko , asebajayele ukusebenzisa umkhumbulwabo , iye , labo asebanakho ukuhlukanisa okuhle nokumbi .
58006001	Nje-ke asilise iimfundiso zokuthoma ngoKrestu siragele phambili kokuvuthiweko ; singabuyi sithome phasi sibeke isisekelo : ngokuphenduka emisebenzini efileko nokukholwa kuZimu ,
58006002	isifundiso ngokubhajadiswa , ngokubekwa izandla , ngokuvuka kwabafileko nangokugwetjwa isiphelani .
58006003	Sizakwenza lokho uZimu nakavumako .
58006004	Kulikhuni ukubuya baphenduke labo abakhe bakhanyiselwa , banandipha isiphiwo sezulwini , badlelana noMoya oCwengileko ,
58006005	banandipha ubumnandi belizwi lakaZimu namandla wephasi elitjha elizako ,
58006006	nasele khebahlubuka kulikhuni ukubaphendula ngombana ngokuhlubuka kwabo babuye godu bayibethele esiphambanweni iNdodana kaZimu bayithela ngehlazo epepeneneni .
58006007	Ihlabathi emunya amanzi aphele ayinele nemilisa iintjalo ezilisizo kilabo abayilimileko , ibusiswa nguZimu .
58006008	Kodwana nangabe kumila kiyo ameva nekhula , ayinamsebenzi walitho begodu isengozini yokobana inikelelwe nguZimu nesiphelo sayo kutjhiswa ngomlilo .
58006009	Nanyana sikhuluma nje bathandekako , sineqiniso lezinto ezingcono mayelana nani , iye , izinto eziphathelene nokusindiswa .
58006010	UZimu akasuye ongakalungi , angekhe alibale umsebenzi eniwubonakalisileko ngebanga lakhe nisiza abacwengileko njengombana nenza nanjesi .
58006011	Sikhanuka bona omunye nomunye wenu abonakalise ukukhuthala okunjalo ukuze niqinisekise ithemba lenu bekube sekupheleni ;
58006012	ningadondi , kodwana nilingise labo abathi ngokukholwa nangokunyamezela bazuza ilifa lesithembiso .
58006013	Lokha uZimu athembisa u-Abrahamu , wazifunga ngaye ngombana kungekho omkhulu kunaye angamfunga ,
58006014	wathi : “ Kwamambala ngizokubusisa nokukubusisa , ngikwandise khulu . ”
58006015	Ngokunjalo u-Abrahamu ngokunyamezela wazuza isithembiso .
58006016	Kanengi abantu bafunga ngaloyo omkhulu kunabo nesifungo esiqinisa okukhulunyiweko siqeda koke ukuphikisana .
58006017	Ngebanga lokobana uZimu wathanda khulu bona kubakhanyele kamhlophe labo abaziindlalifa zesithembiso , ukungaphenduki kobujamo behloswakhe wabuqinisa ngesifungo .
58006018	Wakwenza lokhu ukuze ngezinto ezimbili lezo ezingaphendukiko angekhe kwenzeke bona aleye amala ; kuthi thina esiphephele kuye sikhuthale ngamandla sibambelele ethembeni elibekwe phambi kwethu .
58006019	Iye , ithembeli sinalo , liliqiniso nobudzimelelo bomphefumulo , kulithemba elingena endaweni ecwenge khulu ngemva kwetjhila lesisitho ,
58006020	lapha uJesu owasandulelako , waba sigijimi sokuthomo esangena lapho ngebanga lethu , sele aba mphristi ngokungapheliko ngokwendlela yakaMalkitsedekhi .
58007001	UMalkitsedekhi lo bekuyikosi yeSalema , amphristi wakaZimu ongoPhezulu . Nguye owahlangabeza u-Abrahamu lokha nakabuya ukuyokubulala amakhosi , bewambusisa ;
58007002	nje-ke u-Abrahamu wamabela kwetjhumi kwakho koke . Kokuthoma , ibizo lakhe litjho , “ ikosi yokulunga ” ; nokuthi ikosi yeSalema okutjho , “ ikosi yokuthula ” .
58007003	Ubenganayise , angananina , anganamndeni , ngitjho namalanga wokuthoma namkha wokuphela kwepilo . UnjengeNdodana kaZimu , uhlala amphristi ngokungapheliko .
58007004	Akhese nibone-ke bonyana bekamkhulu kangangani : U-Abrahamu ukhokho wethu , wamabela okwetjhumi kwalokho akuthumbe epini .
58007005	Ngitjho nalabo abaziinzukulwana zakaLevi abamukela ubuphristi , banomyalo emthethweni wokuthatha kwetjhumi ebantwini , okutjho ebantwini bekhabo , iye , sengitjho nanyana abantu bekhababo baziinzukulwana zaka-Abrahamu .
58007006	Kodwana lo obengabalwa esizukulwaneni sabo , wathatha kwetjhumi ku-Abrahamu bewambusisa loyo owamukela iinthembiso .
58007007	Angekhe kwaphikwa bona omncani ubusiswa ngomkhulu .
58007008	Lapha-ke abamukela kwetjhumi kubabantu abafako , kodwana lapho wamukelwa ngiloyo ofakazelwa bonyana uyaphila .
58007009	Kuhlekuhle kungathiwa noLevi owamukela kwetjhumi , wakhokha kwetjhumi ngenca ka-Abrahamu
58007010	ngombana gade asese sedinini lakakhokho wakhe lokha nakahlangatjezwa nguMalkitsedekhi .
58007011	Nangabe ukupheleliswa kwafunyaneka ngobuphristi bakaLevi njengombana isizwe samukela umthetho ngaphasi kobuphristobu ; bekusadingeke ngani-ke ukukhuluma ngobuphristi obunye obuvuka ngokwendlela kaMalkitsedekhi , kunalobo bendlela ka-Aroni na ?
58007012	Ngombana nangabe kukhona ukuphendulwa kobuphristi , khona-ke kuyafuneka bona kuphendulwe nomthetho .
58007013	Kodwana loyo okukhulunywa izintwezi ngaye , ungowesinye isizwe ekungazange khekube khona noyedwa kiso owakhe walotjha e-aldarini
58007014	ngombana kuyaziwa bona iKosethu isizukulwana sakaJuda , begodu mayelana nesizweso uMosi akazange atjho ilitho ngobuphristi .
58007015	Nje-ke kusemtarini lokha nakuvuka omunye umphristi onjengoMalkitsedekhi ,
58007016	iye , loyo obe mphristi ingasi ngokomyalo weenzukulwana zenyama kodwana ngamandla wepilo engabhubhiko .
58007017	Ngombana kufakazwa ngaye kuthiwa : “ Wena umphristi ngokungapheliko ngokwendlela kaMalkitsedekhi . ” “ USomnini ufungile begodu angeze azisole , wathi , ‘ Wena umphristi ngokungapheliko . ’ ”
58007018	Umthetho omdala wenziwa ilize ngombana gade ubuthakathaka begodu ungasizi .
58007019	Njengombana umthetho ungazange uphelelise ilitho , ngakwelinye ihlangothi kunesingeniso sethemba elingcono ekungalo singatjhidela kuZimu .
58007020	Nokho ithembelo azange libe ngaphandle kwesifungo ngombana abanye ababekwa emsebenzini wobuphristi bangena kiwo ngaphandle kwesifungo ,
58007021	kodwana lo waba mphristi ngaphandle kwesifungo ngebanga laloyo owathi kuye : “ USomnini ufungile begodu angeze azisole , wathi , ‘ Wena umphristi ngokungapheliko . ’ ”
58007022	Ngebanga lalokho uJesu waba siqiniseko sesivumelwano esingcono .
58007023	Nje-ke abaphristabo baba banengi ngesibalo ngebanga lokobana bebaliywa kukufa bona baragele phambili ngomsebenzabo ;
58007024	kodwana uJesu unobuphristi obungapheliko ngombana uphila isiphelani .
58007025	Ngalokho unamandla wokusindisa ngesikhathi soke labo abeza kuZimu ngaye ngombana uhlala njalo abancengela .
58007026	Nje-ke mbala kwasifanela thina bona sibe nomphristi omkhulu onje , ocwengileko , ongasolekiko , onganamphambo , owahlukaniswe kwabazizoni bewaphakanyiswa ngaphezu kwamazulu .
58007027	Ngokuhlukileko kunabanye abaphristi abakhulu , akadingi ukwenza imihlabelo ilanga nelanga , kokuthoma ngebanga lezono zakhe bese kube ngezono zabantu ; yena wakwenza lokho kwaba kanye kibo boke mhlana anikela ukuphila kwakhe .
58007028	Umthetho ubeka abantu ababuthakathaka bona ibe baphristi abakhulu , kodwana ilizwi lesifungo eleza ngemva komthetho , lijamisa iNdodana eyenziwa opheleleko ngokungapheliko .
58008001	Ummongo walokho esikutjhoko ngilokhu : Sinomphristi omkhulu ohlezi ngesigomeni sesihlalo sobukhosi emazulwini ,
58008002	usikhonzi endaweni ecwengileko netendeni lamambala elajanyiswa nguSomnini ingasi mumuntu .
58008003	Ngiloyo naloyo umphristi omkhulu ubekelwe bona anikele ngeminikelo nangemihlabelo . Nje-ke bekufanele bona naye umphristi wethu omkhulu abe nelitho azokunikela ngalo .
58008004	Ngathana bekusephasinapha bekangekhe abe mphristi ngombana bakhona abaphristi abanikela ngeminikelo ngokomthetho .
58008005	Bona balotjha endaweni emfanekiso nesithunzi salokho okusezulwini . Kungakho uMosi ngesikhathi azakwakha itende lesivumelwano , wayalwa kwathiwa : “ Qinisekisa bonyana wenza koke lokhu ngomfanekiso owakhonjiswa wona entabeni . ”
58008006	Kodwana manjesi uJesu wamukela ukulotjha okusezingeni eliphezulu , begodu ngokudluleleko ungumlamuleli wesivumelwano esingcono nesisekelwe phezu kweenthembiso ezingcono .
58008007	Nangathana bekungekho okusolekako esivumelwaneni sokuthoma , kwamambala bekungekhe sisafuneka sesibili .
58008008	Kodwana uZimu uyasisola isizwe sakhe , nakasithi : “ Qalani isikhathi siyeza , lapha ngizakwenza khona isivumelwano esitjha nendlu ka-Israyeli kanye neyakaJuda . Kutjho uSomnini .
58008009	Asizukufana nesivumelwano engasenza naboyise nangibabamba ngesandla kobana ngibakhuphe eGibhide ngombana bona bephula isivumelwano sami , lokha mina nangimphathi wabo . Kutjho uSomnini .
58008010	Nasi isivumelwano engizosenza nendlu ka-Israyeli ngemva kwesikhatheso . Kutjho uSomnini . Ngizakubeka umthethwami emikhumbulwenabo ngiwutlole eenhliziyweni zabo . Ngizakuba nguZimabo , bona babe babantu bami .
58008011	Umuntu angeze asafundisa omunye womphakathi namkha umfowabo athi , ‘ Yazi uSomnini ’ ngombana boke bazabe bangazi , ukusukela komncani ukuya komkhulu . Kutjho uSomnini .
58008012	Mbala ngizakucolela ubukhohlakali babo , ngingasakhumbula icala labo . ”
58008013	Ngokukhuluma athi , “ isivumelwano esitjha ” , wenze bonyana sokuthoma sibe ngesidala ; nje-ke okudala nokulupheleko kuseduze nokunyamalala .
58009001	Nje-ke nesivumelwano sokuthoma besinemithetjhwana obekulotjhwa ngayo ngendaweni ecwengileko .
58009002	Kwakhiwa itende lokuhlanganela ; ngaphakathi kwendawo yalo yokuthoma bekunelithi leembani , itafula nezikwa ezibekwa phambi kwakaZimu , leyo bekuyindawo ecwenge khulu .
58009003	Ngemva kwerharideni lesibili bekukhona indawo okuthiwa yindawo ecwenge khulu .
58009004	Ngaphakathi kwayo bekukhona i-aldari legolide lokutjhisela itjhwalo nomfaji wesivumelwano otshidzwe woke ngegolide . Ngaphakathi kwawo bekubulungwe umjeka ophethe imana , intonga ka-Aroni eyakhe yahluma amakari nomqebethu wesivumelwano .
58009005	Ngaphezu komfaji bekunamakerubhi wephazimulo engamele isihlalo somusa . Okwanje asikwazi ukukhuluma ngokugcweleko ngezintwezi .
58009006	Ngokunjalo , lokha koke sele kuhlelekile ngendlela le , abaphristi bangena njalonjalo ngengcenyeni yokuthoma yetende lokuhlanganela bona benze umsebenzabo wokulotjha .
58009007	Kodwana engcenyeni yesibili kungena kwaphela umphristi omkhulu kanye ngomnyaka ; akangeni ngaphandle kokuthatha iingazi anikela ngazo mayelana naye nangenca yezono ezenziwe babantu ngephoso .
58009008	Ngalokhu uMoya oCwengileko utjengisa bona indlela yokungena endaweni ecwenge khulu ayikavuleki , mlunga ingcenye yokuthoma yetende isajamile .
58009009	Lokho kumfanekiso wesikhathesi , ekutjengiswa ngakho bona iminikelo nemihlabelo enikelweko azange iphelelise isazelo somlotjhi .
58009010	Kodwana beyiphathelene nokudla nokusela kanye nemihlobohlobo yokuhlambuluka ekuziimiso ezimalungana nomzimba bekube sikhathi sehlelo elitjha .
58009011	UKrestu selafikile njengomphristi omkhulu wezinto ezihle esele zikhona , wangena ngetendeni elikhulu neliphelele ukudlula , elingakenziwa ngezandla okutjho elingasilo lalokhu okudaliweko .
58009012	Wangena kwaba kanye kwaphela endaweni ecwenge khulu , kungasi ngeengazi zeembuzi namathole , kodwana ngeengazi zakhe ngokwazo wasizuzela ukuhlengwa okungapheliko .
58009013	Iingazi zeembuzi nezeenkomo kanye nokufafazwa ngomlotha wethokazi elitjhisiweko kuhlambulula labo abasilaphazweko ukuze babe ngabahlwengileko ngokomzimba .
58009014	Khulu kangangani-ke iingazi zakaKrestu owazinikela ngokwakhe kuZimu ngoMoya oCwengileko wesiphelani anganamphambo , zizakuhlanza isazelo sethu emisebenzini efileko ukuze silotjhe uZimu ophilako .
58009015	Ngalokho uKrestu umlamuleli wesivumelwano esitjha ukuze kuthi labo ababiziweko bamukele isithembiso selifa elingapheliko . Nje-ke ukufa kwakhe kwenzeke ukuze abahlenge eemphambekweni zesivumelwano sokuthoma .
58009016	Lapha kunencwadi yelifa , kufanele kube khona ubufakazi bokufa kwaloyo owayitlolako
58009017	ngombana incwadi yelifa isebenza kwaphela nasele kubhujiwe ngebanga lokobana ayisebenzi nakube loyo owayitlolako usaphila .
58009018	Kungalokho nesivumelwano sokuthoma singazange sajanyiswa kungakaphalazwa iingazi .
58009019	UMosi sele amemezele woke umyalo womthetho ebantwini boke , wathatha iingazi zamathole neembuzi , amanzi , uboya obububende nehisopi wafafaza umsongo wencwadi ngokwawo nabantu boke ,
58009020	asithi : “ Qalani , lezi ziingazi zesivumelwano uZimu anijamisele sona . ”

58009023	Ngokunjalo bekufanele bona imifanekiso yezinto zezulwini ihlanjululwe ngalokho . Kodwana izinto zezulwini zifuna imihlabelo engcono kunaleya
58009024	ngombana uKrestu azange angene endaweni ecwengileko eyakhiwe ngezandla zabantu emfanekiso nje waleyo ekungiyo , kodwana wangena ezulwini ngokwalo , khona azasijamela phambi kwakaZimu .
58009025	Yena azange azinikele kanenginengi njengomphristi omkhulu lokha nakangena endaweni ecwengileko iminyaka ngeminyaka neengazi ezingasizo zakhe .
58009026	Ngathana bekunjalo bekufanele ahlupheke kanenginengi kusukela ekusekelweni kwephasi . Kodwana ubonakaliswe kanye kwaphela ekupheleni kwesikhathi bona asuse izono ngokuzinikela kwakhe .

58009028	nje-ke noKrestu sele anikelwe kanye kobana athwale izono zabanengi , uzakubuye abonakale kwesibili , angakezi bonyana uzokuthwala isono kodwana ukusindisa labo abamlindeleko .
58010001	Njengombana umthetho unesithunzi sezinto ezihle ezizako , ungasibo ubujamo bamambala bazo izintwezo , angeze ngayo leyo mihlabelo enikelwa mlibe qobe mnyaka ilungisise labo abatjhidelako .
58010002	Nangathana bekungasinjalo , beyingeze yaliswa bona ingasanikelwa na ? Lokho kutjho bona abalotjhi bebazobe bahlanjululwe kwaba kanye bangasenaso isazelo sesono .
58010003	Kodwana kunalokho imihlabelo leyo isikhumbuzo sesono umnyaka nomnyaka
58010004	ngombana akwenzeki bona iingazi zeenkunzi nezeembuzi zisuse izono .

58010006	iye , imihlabelo yokutjhiswa neyehlambululo awuyibizi .

58010008	Kokuthoma uthe : “ Imihlabelo neminikelo , iye , iminikelo yokutjhiswa neyesono azange uyibize namkha uthokoze ngayo . ” Yona inikelwa ngokuya ngokomthetho .
58010009	Godu uthe : “ Qala ngize bona ngizokwenza intando yakho . ” Ususe kokuthoma kobana ajamise kwesibili .
58010010	Kungentando yakhe leyo sicwengisiwe kwaba kanye ngomnikelo womzimba kaJesu Krestu .

58010017	Godu ungezelela ngokuthi : “ Mbala ngizakucolela ubukhohlakali babo , ngingasakhumbula icala labo . ”
58010018	Lapha kunokulitjalelwa kwalokho , akusekho umhlabelo wesono .
58010019	Ngalokho bazalwana , njengombana sinesiqiniseko sokungangena endaweni ecwengileko ngeengazi zakaJesu ,
58010020	ngendlela etja nephilako asivulela yona ngetjhila elisithileko okutjho ngenyama yakhe ,

58010022	asibandameleni ngehliziyo eqinisileko , ngethemba elipheleleko lokukholwa ; iinhliziyo zethu zifafaziwe esazelweni esimbi nemizimba yethu ihlanzwe ngamanzi ahlanzekileko .
58010023	Nje-ke asibambisiseni ethembeni lokukholwa kwethu esikuvumako ngaphandle kokuzaza ngombana uthembekile loyo othembisileko .
58010024	Asitjhejeni bona singakhuthazana njani ethandweni nemisebenzini emihle ;
58010025	singakudeli ukuhlangana njengombana kunjalo kwabanye ; kodwana asikhuthazaneni omunye nomunye , khulukhulu njengombana nibona bonyana ilanga selitjhidele .
58010026	Nakube siyakhunyalala siraga ngokona emva kokobana sesamukele ukwazi kweqiniso , awusekho umhlabelo wokuhlawulela izono ,

58010028	Odelela umthetho kaMosi uzakufa ngaphandle kokurhawukelwa ngabofakazi ababili namkha abathathu .
58010029	Alo , ucabanga bona uzakuhlunguphazwa kangangani loyo oqalela phasi iNdodana kaZimu , athi iingazi zesivumelwano ezimcwengisako zisilaphele abuye ahlambalaze noMoya womusa na ?
58010030	Ngombana siyamazi loyo owathi : “ Ukubuyiselela kungokwami ; ngimi ozakubuyisela . ” “ USomnini uzakugweba isizwe sakhe . ”
58010031	Kuyinto esabekako ukuwela esandleni sakaZimu ophilako .
58010032	Khumbulani amalanga waphambilini , ekwathi senikhanyiselwe , naqinisela ebunzimeni obukhulu beenhlupheko .
58010033	Ngesinye isikhathi vane phele kubukiswe ngani emtarini nibandezelekile ; kesinye isikhathi nibahlanganyeli nalabo abaphathwa njalo .

58010039	Kodwana thina asisibo abahlehlela emuva babhujiswe , kodwana sihlangana nalabo abakholwako basindiswe .
58011001	Nje-ke ukukholwa kukuqiniseka ngezinto esinethemba ngazo , kuliqiniso ngalokho esingakuboniko .
58011002	Ngakho abokhokho bamukela ubufakazi obuhle .
58011003	Iye , ngokukholwa sizwisisa bona iphasi labunjwa ngelizwi lakaZimu , nokobana lokho okubonwako kwabunjwa ngezinto ezibonwako .
58011004	Ngokukholwa u-Abela wanikela kuZimu ngomhlabelo owamukelekako ukudlula wakaKayini . Ngalokho wafakazelwa bona ulungile noZimu ngokwakhe wafakaza ngokwamukela iminikelo yakhe ; yeke ngokukholwa usakhuluma nanyana aselafa .

58011006	Kodwana ngaphandle kokukholwa akwenzeki ukumthokozisa uZimu ngombana loyo otjhidela kuZimu kufanele akholwe bona ukhona nokobanyana uyabavuza labo abamfunako .
58011007	Ngokukholwa uNowa asele ayeleliswe nguZimu mayelana nesehlakalo ebe singakabonakali , wamukela isiyeleliso wakha umkhumbi ukuze asindise indlu yakhe . Ngalokho wenza iphasi libe nomlandu , wabe waba yindlalifa yokulunga ngokukholwa .
58011008	Ngokukholwa u-Abrahamu walalela lokha nakabizwako bona aphume aye endaweni ebe azoyamukeliswa njengelifa ; nje-ke waphuma angazi lapha aya khona .
58011009	Ngokukholwa wahlala isikhatjhana enarheni yesithembiso njengomqhamuka : Aphila ematendeni njengombana kwenza u-Isaka noJakopo ebebaziindlalifa zesithembisweso kanye naye

58011012	Ngalokho , ngomuntu munye nanyana besele kumlunga afile , kwabelethwa iinzukulwana ezinengi njengeenkwekwezi zezulu nanjengetjhwabatjhwaba yelwandle engabalekiko .
58011013	Boke laba bafa basekukholweni bangazange bamukeliswe ebebakuthenjisiweko , kodwana bakubona bathokoza ngakho kusesekude nabo . Iye , bebavumile bona bamiqhamuka neenkhonzi ephasini .

58011016	Kunalokho bebakhanukela iphasi elingcono , okutjho lezulwini . Yeke uZimu akananhloni ukubizwa bona unguyisabo ngombana ubalungisele umuzi .
58011017	Ngokukholwa u-Abrahamu nakazizinywako , wanikela ngendodanakhe u-Isaka . Iye , loyo owamukela isithembiso walungela ukunikela indodanakhe ekukuphela kwayo ,
58011018	loyo okwathiwa ngaye : “ Iinzukulwana zakho zizokuthiyelelwa ngo-Isaka . ”
58011019	U-Abrahamu bekasazi bona uZimu uyabavusa nabafileko , kungalokho ngokulinganisa ngekulumo , wamukela u-Isaka njengobuya ekufeni .

58011021	Ngokukholwa uJakopo sele azokufa wabusisa leyo naleyo yamadodana kaJosefa ; wakhothama ngokulotjha adzimelele ngedondolo lakhe ebekaliphethe .

58011024	Ngokukholwa uMosi aselakhulile wala bona kuthiwe uyindodana yendodakazi kaFaro ,
58011025	kunalokho wenyula ukuphathwa makghwakghwa nabantu bakaZimu kunobanyana athabe isikhatjhana esonweni .
58011026	Bekasithi ukuthukwa ngebanga lakaKrestu kumnono omkhulu kunamafa weGibhide ngombana gade aqale umvuzo ozako ngaphambili .

58011028	Ngokukholwa wajamisa iPhasika nokufafaza ngeengazi ukuze umbhubhisi angathinti amazibulo .

58011031	Ngokukholwa ingwadla enguRarhabi ayizange ibhubhe nalabo abangakhange bakholwa ngombana yamukela kuhle iinhloli .
58011032	Ngingaraga ngithini ? Asisekho isikhathi sokukhuluma ngoGidiyoni , uBharaki , uSamsoni , uJafta , uDavida , uSamyela nabaphorofidi ,

58011035	Ngokukholwa besifazana babuye babuyiselwa iinhlobo ngokuvuswa ekufeni . Abanye bahlunguphazwa , akhange bavume ukuthukululwa ukuze bazuze ukuvuka okuhle .

58011037	Bakghadlhwa ngamatje , baphadlhulwa kabili , babulawa ngesabula . Bazulazula bembethe iinkhumba zezimvu nezeembuzi . Bebahlubule , bazwiswa ubuhlungu , bahlukunyezwa .
58011038	Iphasi belingakabafaneli ; bandinda emarhalawumbeni neentabeni , emikghotheni nemadongeni wephasi .
