59005007	Ngalokho nyamezelani , bazalwana , bekufike ilanga lokubuya kweKosi uJesu . Qalani , umlimi ulindela isithelo sephasi esiligugu , asinyamezelele bekube lizulu lokuthoma nelokugcina .
59005008	Nani-ke nyamezelani niqunge isibindi ngombana ilanga lokubuya kweKosi uJesu libandamele .
59005009	Bazalwana , ningavungamelani ukuze ningagwetjwa ; qalani , uMgwebi ujame emnyango .
59005010	Thathani ukunyamezela nokuhlupheka kwabaphorofidi abakhuluma ebizweni lakaSomnini njengesibonelo .
59005011	Qalani , sibathatha bona babusisiwe labo abanyamezelako . Nezwa ngokunyamezela kwakaJobho , benabona umnqopho kaSomnini kobana mbala uSomnini unezwelo nesirhawu .
59005012	Ngaphezu kwakho koke bazalwana , ningafungi ; kungaba ngezulu namkha ngephasi nanyana nangasiphi isifungo . U-iye wenu akabe ngu-iye ; u-awa wenu abe ngu-awa ukuze ningalahlwa .
59005013	Kukhona ohluphekako hlangana nani na ? Akathandaze . Kukhona owenamileko na ? Akadumise .
59005014	Kukhona ogulako hlangana nani na ? Akabize abaphathi bebandla bamthandazele bebamzese ngamafutha ebizweni lakaSomnini .
59005015	Umthandazo wokukholwa uzamsindisa ogulako , uSomnini amvuse , nanyana enze izono uzakulitjalelwa zona .
59005016	Ngalokho-ke vumani izono omunye komunye , nithandazelane ukuze niphiliswe . Umthandazo wolungileko unamandla begodu uyasebenza .
59005017	U-Elija bekamumuntu ofana nathi , wathandaza ngokuncama bona izulu lingani , mbala azange lana ephasini iminyaka emithathu neenyanga ezintandathu .
59005018	Wabuye wathandaza godu , umkayi wawulula izulu , iphasi labuye lathela iinthelo zalo .
59005019	Bazalwana bami , nangabe omunye hlangana nani uduka eqinisweni , omunye ambuyise ,
59005020	yazini bona loyo obuyise isoni ekulahlekeni kwaso , usindise umphefumulwaso ekufeni begodu ugubuzesa nezono ezinengi .
60001001	UPitrosi umpostoli kaJesu Krestu , kibo abakhethiweko , abaziinkhambi ephasinapha nabahlakazeke kilo loke lePontusi , leGalatiya , leKaphadosiya , le-Asiya neleBhithiniya ;
60001002	iye , abakhethwe ngokwazi ngaphambili kwakaZimu uBaba , ngokomsebenzi ocwengisako wakaMoya mayelana nokulalela uJesu Krestu kanye nokufafazwa ngeengazi zakhe : Akwandiswe umusa nokuthula kini .
60001003	Akadunyiswe uZimu uYise weKosethu uJesu Krestu , owathi ngomusa wakhe omkhulu wasipha ukubelethwa kabutjha ethembeni eliphilako ngokuvuswa kwakaJesu Krestu kabafileko ,
60001004	kobana sibe nelifa elingabhubhiko , elingasilaphazekiko nelingapheliko enibulungelwe lona ezulwini ;
60001005	iye , nina enilondwa mamandla kaZimu ngokukholwa kube kusindiswa esele kulungele ukwembulwa ngesikhathi sokuphela .
60001006	Kilokho niyathaba nanyana gadesi nimele nihlupheke isikhatjhana esincani kiyo yoke imihlobohlobo yeenlingo
60001007	ukuze kuthi iqiniso lokukholwa kwenu okuligugu kunegolide elibhubhako , nakuzizinywa ngomlilo , kuveze idumo , iphazimulo nokuhlonitjhwa lokha uJesu nakembulwako .
60001008	Niyamthanda nanyana ningakhange nimbone ; niyakholwa kuye nanyana ningamboni njenganje begodu niyathokoza ngethabo elingekhe lahlathululwa nelibabazekako
60001009	ngombana namukela umphumela wokukholwa kwenu , iye , ukusindiswa kwemiphefumulwenu .
60001010	Mayelana nesindiso leyo , abaphorofidi abaphorofida ngomusa obewuzonehlela , bahlolisisa bebaphenyisisa ngayo ,
60001011	bafunisisa bona ngisiphi isikhathi nobujamo uMoya kaKrestu obegade akibo aphawula ngaso lokha nakafakaza ngaphambili ngokuhlupheka ebekubekelwe uKrestu nephazimulo ebeyizakulandela .
60001012	Kwembulwa kibo bonyana bebangazilotjhi bona kodwana nina , lokha nebebakhuluma ngalokho nani esele nikuzwa ngalabo abatjhumayela iindaba ezimnandi ngoMoya oCwengileko ovela ezulwini . Iye , sengitjho nezinto iingilozi ebezifuna ukuzibona .
60001013	Ngalokho lungiselelani iingqondo zenu , nizithibe ; nibeke loke ithemba lenu emseni kaKrestu enizakuphiwa wona lokha nakabonakaliswako .
60001014	Njengabantwana abalalelako , ningaphendukeli eenkanukweni enanikizo phambilini ekungazini kwenu .
60001015	Kunalokho , njengombana owanibizako acwengile , yibani ngabacwengileko kikho koke ukukhamba kwenu
60001016	ngombana umtlolo ocwengileko uthi : “ Yibani ngabacwengileko ngombana mina ngicwengile . ”
60001017	Nangabe nimbiza bona nguBaba , loyo ogweba boke abantu ukuya ngokwemisebenzi yabo ngaphandle kokubandlulula , khona-ke philani ngokwesaba esikhathini sokuba ziinkhonzi kwenu .
60001018	Kufuze nazi bona ekukhambeni kwenu okulilize enakuzuza kiboyihlomkhulu , azange nahlengwa ngezinto ezibhubha njengesiliva negolide ,
60001019	kodwana ngeengazi eziligugu zakaKrestu , iye , njengezemvana enganamphambo namkha isibazi .
60001020	Yena wajanyiswa ngaphambilini iphasi lingakasekelwa , kodwana wabonakaliswa eenkhathini zokuphela ngebanga lenu .
60001021	Ngaye nakholwa kuZimu owamvusa kabafileko wamnikela iphazimulo ukuze ukukholwa nethemba lenu kudzimelele kuZimu .
60001022	Nje-ke , njengombana senihlambulule imiphefumulwenu ngokuthobela iqiniso ukuze nibe nobudlelwano bethando lamambala kubazalwana benu , yeke thandanani omunye nomunye ngehliziyo epheleleko .
60001023	Senibelethwe kabutjha , ingasi ngembewu ebhubhako kodwana ngengabhubhiko , iye , ngelizwi lakaZimu eliphila ngokungapheliko
60001024	ngombana umtlolo uthi : “ Mbala , boke abantu bafana notjani , nedumo labo loke lifana nelikhwa lommango : Utjani buyatjhwaba nelikhwa libune ,
60001025	kodwana ilizwi lakaSomnini lijame ngokungapheliko . ”
60002001	Ngalokho-ke lahlani boke ubumbi nobuqili , ukuzenzisa , umona nayo yoke ihlebo .
60002002	Njengamasana langazelelani ibisi elicwebileko lokommoya ukuze ngalo nikhule esindisweni ,
60002003	nakube seninandiphile bona iKosi ilungile .
60002004	Bandamelani kiyo , ililitje eliphilako , elininwe babantu kodwana kuZimu likhethekile begodu liligugu ;
60002005	nani-ke njengamatje aphilako , nakhelwe endlini yokommoya kobana nibe buphristi obucwengileko , ninikele imihlabelo yokommoya eyamukelekako kuZimu ngoJesu Krestu .
60002006	Ngitjho ngombana umtlolo uthi : “ Qala , ngibekile eZiyoni ilitje , iye , ilitje lejika elikhethekileko neliligugu ; loyo okholwa kilo angekhe adaniswe . ” “ Ilitje abakhi abalininako , seliphenduke laba yihloko yejika ” , “ Lililitje elibakhubako , iye , ilitje elibawisako . ”
60002007	Nje-ke kini nina enikholwako liligugu , kodwana kilabo abangakholwako , “ Ilitje abakhi abalininako , seliphenduke laba yihloko yejika ” ,
60002008	begodu “ Lililitje elibakhubako , iye , ilitje elibawisako . ” Bayakhubeka ngombana akhange balalele ilizwi njengombana bebajanyiselwe ukwenza .
60002009	Kodwana nina nisisizwe esikhethiweko , ubuphristi bobukhosi , isizwe esicwengileko , abantu ekungebakaZimu kobana nitjhumayele imisebenzi yamandla yaloyo owanibiza bona niphume ebumnyameni nize ekukhanyeni kwakhe okukarisako .
60002010	Phambilini beningasibo abantu , kodwana kwanjesi nisisizwe sakaZimu . Nakhe naswela umusa , kodwana kwanjesi niwamukelisiwe .
60002011	Bathandekako , ngiyanincenga njengemiqhamuka namathunjwa kobana nitjhide eenkanukweni zenyama ezilwa nomphefumulo .
60002012	Philani ipilo elungileko hlangana nabangakholwako ukuze kuthi nanyana banisola ngokwenza okumbi , babone imisebenzenu emihle badumise uZimu ngelanga lamatlhuwo .
60002013	Ngebanga leKosi , thobelani zoke iinjamiso ezijanyiswe ziimphathimandla , nanyana kungezekosi njengombana ingekulu ,
60002014	namkha zababusi abathunywe ngiyo kobana bahlunguphaze labo abenza okumbi nokudumisa labo abenza okuhle
60002015	ngombana injalo intando kaZimu , yeke ngokwenza okuhle kufuze nithulise ukungazi kweendlhayela .
60002016	Njengabatjhaphulukileko , philani njengabatjhaphulukileko , nokho ningasebenzisi ukutjhaphuluka kwenu bona kube sibhibho sokumbi , kodwana philani njengeenceku zakaZimu .
60002017	Hloniphani boke abantu , nithande abazalwana , nesabe uZimu benihloniphe umbusi .

60002020	Nakube niyanyamezela nanidulwako ngokwenza okumbi , lokho kunivuza ngani ? Kodwana naninyamezelela ukuhlutjhwa ngebanga lokwenza okuhle , lokho kuyathokozeka kuZimu .
60002021	Kokwakho , nabizelwa khona lokho ngombana noKrestu wahlupheka ngebanga lenu , wanitjhiyela isibonelo bona nilandele emtlhaleni wakhe .

60002023	Kwathi athukwa , akhange azibuyiselele ; kwathi ahlutjhwa , akhange asongele ; kodwana wazibeka kiloyo ogweba ngokulungileko .
60002024	Yena ngokwakhe wathwala izono zethu emzimbenakhe emthini ukuze sife esonweni siphile ekulungeni . Ngemivuvu yakhe naphiliswa

60003001	Ngokunjalo nani bafazi , thobelani amadodenu ukuze kuthi nanyana kukhona amanye angalaleli ilizwi , azuzeke ngaphandle kwekulumo , kodwana ngokuziphatha kwabafazi bawo ,
60003002	lokha nakabona ikambo yenu ehlanzekileko nehloniphekileko .
60003003	Ukuhloba kwenu akungabi ngekwangaphandle kokweluka iinhluthu nokokwembatha izambatho zegolide namkha zakanokutjho .
60003004	Kodwana ukuhloba kwenu akube ngokomuntu wangaphakathi , iye , ngobuhle obungapheliko bommoya wesizotha nothobekileko , okuyinto eligugu phambi kwakaZimu .
60003005	Mbala , leyo yindlela abafazi bekadeni abacwengileko nebebabeka ithemba labo kuZimu , ebebahloba ngayo . Bebathobela amadodabo ,
60003006	njengoSara obegade athobela u-Abrahamu abe ambize ngekosi . Nani-ke senibe madodakazakhe mlunga nje nenza okulungileko , ningesabi ilitho .

60003013	Alo , ngubani onganilimaza nanitjhisekela ukwenza okulungileko na ?
60003014	Kodwana nanyana nihlupheka ngebanga lokulunga , nizakubusiswa ! Ningesabi okwesatjwa babantu begodu ningethuswa .

60003017	Kungcono ukuhlupheka ngokwenza okulungileko nangabe lokho kuyintando kaZimu , kunokuhlupheka ngokwenza okumbi ,
60003018	ngombana noKrestu wahlupheka kwaba kanye ngenca yezono zethu . Iye , olungileko wafela abangakalungi ukuze anilethe kuZimu . Wabulawa ngokwenyama , kodwana wavuswa ngoMoya ,

60003022	osele anyukela ezulwini , uhlezi ngesidleni sakaZimu , kubekwe ngaphasi kwakhe iingilozi , iimphathimandla nemibuso .
60004001	Njengombana uKrestu wahlupheka enyameni , nani hlomani ilemuko elinjalo ngombana ohluphekileko enyameni ukulisile ukona .
60004002	Ngalokho esikhathini sokuphila kwakhe asesenyameni , akasaphili eenkanukweni zabantu , kodwana sele aphila ngentando kaZimu .
60004003	Iye , isikhathi esidlulileko besanele ukwenza okuthandwa ngabatjhili , niphila emanyaleni , eenkanukweni , ebudakweni , ekurhiribideleni , ematjhadeni nekulotjheni abosingazimu ekuyinto esinyenyiso .

60004010	Loyo naloyo owamukele isipho somusa , akasisebenzise ukusiza abanye njengenceku elungileko yomusa owandileko wakaZimu .
60004011	Okhulumako akakhulume kube njengokwamezwi kaZimu , osebenzako kube njengokwamandla uZimu amuphe wona ukuze kikho koke kudunyiswe uZimu ngoJesu Krestu . Kuye akube lidumo namandla nini nanini . Amen .
60004012	Bazalwana , ningarareki ngokulingwa okubuhlungu kangaka enikuzwako , kube sengathi nehlelwa ziziga .
60004013	Kodwana thokozani njengabahlanganyele noKrestu eenhlungwini ukuze nani nisase mhlana iphazimulwakhe yembulwako .

60005001	Nje-ke , njengomphathi nofakazi weenhlupheko zakaKrestu , begodu nanjengaloyo omhlanganyeli wephazimulo ezakwambulwa , ngincenga abaphathi phakathi kwenu , ngithi :

60005004	Kuzakuthi mhlana uMelusi omkhulu abonakalako , nizuze isihlohlo sephazimulo esingabhabhukiko .
60005005	Ngendlela enjalo nani lutjha , thobelani abadala . Noke yembathani ukuthobelana ekusebenzisaneni kwenu omunye komunye ngombana : “ UZimu ujamelene nabazikhukhumezako . Kodwana ubehlisela umusa abazithobileko . ”

61001001	USimoni Pitrosi oyinceku nompostoli kaJesu Krestu , kilabo abamukele ukukholwa okuligugu njengokwethu ngokulunga kwakaZimethu noMsindisi uJesu Krestu .

61001003	Amandlakhe akhethekileko asiphe koke esikudingako ekuphileni nekukholweni ngokwazi kwakhe loyo owasibiza ngephazimulo nokulunga kwakhe .
61001004	Ngalokho wasipha iinthembiso eziligugu nezikulu ukuze kuthi ngazo nibalekele iinkanuko zokonakala okusephasineli , nibe bahlanganyeli besimilo esihle sokukholwa .

61001007	ekumesabeni uZimu ningezelele ukuzwana , ekuzwaneni ithando .

61001010	Ngalokho-ke bazalwana , khuthalani khulu nibonise ukubizwa nokukhethwa kwenu ngombana nanenza lokho angekhe nakhubeka .
61001011	Ngendlela leyo nizakwamukeliswa ngokuphuphumako ukungena embusweni ongapheliko weKosethu noMsindisi , uJesu Krestu .

61001014	ngombana ngiyazi bona ukususwa komtlhatlhanami lo sekuseduze , njengombana neKosethu uJesu Krestu seyikukhanyisile nje lokho kimi .
61001015	Yeke ngizokwenza imizamo yoke bona kuthi emva kokugoduka nikwazi ukuhlala nikhumbula izintwezi .
61001016	Eqinisweni besingalandeli iintolwana zobuhlakani ngesikhathi sinazisa amandla nokufika kweKosethu uJesu Krestu , kodwana besingilabo ababona ngamehlo amandla wobukhosi bakhe .

63001001	Umphathi , kudade okhethiweko nabantwabakhe engibathanda ngeqiniso ; kungasimi ngedwa kodwana nakibo boke abazi iqiniso .

63001007	ngombana banengi abakhohlisi abazele loke iphaseli , iye , labo abangavumi bona uJesu Krestu uze ngenyama . Nje-ke nanyana ngubani onjalo umkhohlisi nophika uKrestu .

63001013	Bayakulotjhisa abantwana bakadadwenu okhethiweko .
64001001	Umphathi , kuGayusi othandekako , engimthanda ngeqiniso .

65001001	UJuda , inceku kaJesu Krestu , umfowabo kaJakopo , kilabo ababiziweko , abathandwe nguZimu uBaba , balondwa nguJesu Krestu .

66003020	Qala , ngijame emnyango ngiyakokoda ! Nakube umuntu uzwa ilizwi lami avule , ngizakungena kuye ngidle naye , naye adle nami .
66003021	Ohlulako ngizomnikela ilungelo lokuhlala nami esihlalweni sami sobukhosi , kuzakuba njengombana nami ngahlula bengahlala noBaba esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi .
66003022	“ Onendlebe akezwe lokho uMoya akutjhoko emabandleni ! ”
66004001	Ngemva kwalokhu , ngaqala ngabona ezulwini umnyango uvulekile . Ilizwi lokuthoma engalizwako likhuluma nami belinjengeporompita , lisithi : “ Akhese unyukele lapha ngizokutjengisa bona kuzokwenzekani emva kwalokhu ! ”
66004002	Khona lapho ngaba kuMoya , ngabona isihlalo sobukhosi ezulwini kukhona obekahlezi kiso .
66004003	Loyo obekahlezi lapho bekabonakala anjengelitje lejasiperi nesardiyo ; begodu esihlalweni sobukhosi mazombe kunezungu leKosi elibonakala inga yimabula .
66004004	Esihlalweni sobukhosi mazombe bekunezinye iinhlalo ezimatjhumi amabili nane , phezu kwazo kuhlezi abaphathi abamatjhumi amabili nane , bembethe izambatho ezimhlophe bathwele neehlohlo zegolide .
66004005	Khona esihlalweni sobukhosi lapho kwabaneka imibani , kwezwakala umdumo neensaba zokuraramba . Phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi leso kwavutha iimbani ezilikhomba ezimimoya elikhomba yakaZimu .
66004006	Godu phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi bekunokuthileko okuqaleka inga lilwandle lerhalasi , kudarhe njengekristali . Esihlalweni sobukhosi mazombe nangemahlangothini woke waso kukhona iimbunjwa ezine eziphilako , zigcwele amehlo ngaphambili nangemuva .
66004007	Isibunjwa sokuthoma besifana nengwenyama , sesibili sifana nekunzi , sesithathu sinobuso bomuntu , sesine sifana nekhozi eliphaphako .
66004008	Iimbunjwa ezine lezi bezineempiko ezisithandathu ngasinye , zembethwe mamehlo ngaphakathi nangaphandle . Bezingaqedi ukurhuba imini nobusuku zithi : “ Ucwengile , ucwengile , ucwengile , uSomnini uZimu uMninimandlawoke , obekavele akhona , okhona nozako ! ”
66004009	Kwathi lokha iimbunjwa eziphilakwezi nazimdumisa , zimhlonipha begodu zimthokoza loyo ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi , iye , yena ophila nini nanini ,
66004010	abaphathi abamatjhumi amabili nane bawa phasi phambi kwaloyo ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi balotjha loyo ophila isiphelani ; baphosa iinhlohlo zabo phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi bathi :
66004011	“ Ufanele wena Somnini Zimethu , ukwamukela idumo , ubukhosi namandla ngombana nguwe owabumba koke begodu koke okukhona kwadalwa ngentando yakho . ”
66005001	Nje-ke ngabona umsongo ngesidleni saloyo ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi utlolwe ngaphakathi nangaphandle , unanyathiselwe amaphawu alikhomba .
66005002	Ngabese ngibona ingilozi enamandla imemezela ngelizwi elikhulu ithi : “ Ngubani ofanele ukunamulula amaphawu alikhomba abe avule umsongo na ? ”
66005003	Bekungekho namunye ezulwini , ephasini nangaphasi kwephasi owaba namandla wokusongulula umsongo alunguze ngaphakathi kwawo .
66005004	Ngadinda isililo ngombana bekunganamuntu ongasongulula umsongo alunguze ngaphakathi kwawo .
66005005	Yeke omunye wabaphathi wathi kimi : “ Ungalili ! Qala , iNgwenyama yekoro yakwaJuda emurabhu kaDavida ihlulile kobana ikwazi ukunamulula umsongo namaphawu wawo alikhomba . ”
66005006	Nje-ke ngabona iMvana ijame kwanga ihlatjiwe , iphakathi kwesihlalo sobukhosi naphakathi kwezinye iimbunjwa eziphilako kanye nahlangana nabaphathi . Beyineempondo ezilikhomba namehlo alikhomba okumimoya elikhomba yakaZimu ethunyelwe kilo loke iphasi .
66005007	Yaya yawuthatha umsongo esidleni saloyo ogade ahlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi .
66005008	Kuthe bona iwuthathe , iimbunjwa ezine eziphilako nabaphathi abamatjhumi amabili nane baguqa phambi kweMvana , omunye nomunye aphethe iharibha nezitja zegolide zizele itjhwalo , okumithandazo yabacwengileko .
66005009	Zavuma irhubo elitjha zathi : “ Ufanele wena ukuthatha umsongo , unamulule amaphawu ngombana gade uhlatjiwe , ngeengazi zakho wahlengela uZimu abacwengileko abavela kenye nenye ikoro , ilimi , abantu nesizwe ,
66005010	wabenza umbuso , baba baphristi bokulotjha uZimethu , begodu bazakubusa ephasini . ”
66005011	Nje-ke ngaqala , ngezwa ilizwi leengilozi ezinengi zizombe isihlalo sobukhosi , iindalwa ezine eziphilako nabaphathi . Bekuziingidigidi neenkulungwana ngeenkulungwana ,
66005012	zirhuba ngelizwi elikhulu zithi : “ Ikufanele iMvana eyahlatjwako ukwamukela amandla nomnono , ukuhlakanipha nobukhosi , idumo , iphazimulo nokubatjazwa ! ”
66005013	Yeke ngezwa zoke iimbunjwa ezulwini nephasini , iye , nezingaphasi kwephasi nangelwandle , ngitjho nakho koke okukikho kukhalela kusithi : “ Kiloyo ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi nakiyo iMvana akube lidumo , iphazimulo namandla ngokungapheliko nini nanini . ”
66005014	Iimbunjwa ezine eziphilako zathi : “ Amen , ” nabaphathi bawa phasi , balotjha .
66006001	Nje-ke ngabona iMvana inamulula elinye lamaphawu alikhomba ; ngezwa esinye seembunjwa ezine eziphilako sirhuwelela inga mdumo sithi : “ Yewuze ! ”
66006002	Ngithe nangiqalako ngabona injomani emhlophe , umkhweli wayo gade aphethe umsebe ; nje-ke wanikelwa isihlohlo , waphuma angohlulako , wahlula .
66006003	Kuthe lokha iMvana nayinamulula iphawu lesibili , ngezwa isibunjwa sesibili esiphilako simemeza sithi : “ Yewuze ! ”
66006004	Nje-ke kwaphuma enye injomani ebovu be ; umkhweli wayo wavunyelwa bona asuse ukuthula ephasini ukuze abantu babulalane , begodu wanikelwa isabula ekulu .
66006005	Kuthe lokha iMvana nayinamulula iphawu lesithathu , ngezwa isibunjwa sesithathu esiphilako simemeza sithi : “ Yewuze ! ” Nje-ke ngaqala , qala bekunenjomani enzima , umkhweli wayo aphethe iinlinganiso ezimbili esandleni sakhe .
66006006	Ngezwa okungathi lilizwi hlangana neembunjwa ezine eziphilako lisithi : “ Isiqwebu sinye sekoroyi ngesipaparwana neenqwebu ezintathu zebhali ngesipaparwana , kodwana ungoni amafutha we-oliva newayini ! ”
66006007	Lokha iMvana nayinamulula iphawu lesine ngezwa isibunjwa sesine simemeza sithi : “ Yewuze ! ”
66006008	Ngithe nangiqalako , naso injomani etshetlha ibizo lomkhweli wayo nguKufa , alandelwa nguHadesi . Banikelwa amandla phezu kwengcenye yesine yephasi bona babulale ngesabula , ngendlala , ngezifo nangeembandana zommango .
66006009	Lokha iMvana nayinamulula iphawu lesihlanu , ngabona ngaphasi kwe-aldari imiphefumulo yalabo egade babulewe ngebanga lelizwi lakaZimu nangebanga lobufakazi ababe nabo .
66006010	Barhuwelela bathi : “ Somnini Somandla , wena ocwengileko noqinisileko , kuzabe kube nini ngaphambi kobana ugwebe begodu usibuyiselele ngeengazi zethu na ? ”
66006011	Nje-ke omunye nomunye wanikelwa isambatho esimhlophe bekwathiwa akhe baphumule kwesikhatjhana bekuphelele isibalo seenceku abakanye nazo nesabazalwana ebebasazokubulawa njengabo .
66006012	Lokha iMvana nayinamulula iphawu lesithandathu , ngaqala , qala bekunokusikinyeka kwephasi okukhulu : Ilanga lafiphala laba nzima njengomsizi , inyanga yaba njengeengazi ;
66006013	iinkwekwezi zesibhakabhaka zawela ephasini njengomuthi wamakhiwani nawuthintitha iinthelo zawo zebusika lokha nawusikinywa mumoya .
66006014	Isibhakabhaka sanyamalala njengomsongo nawusongeka wenyuka , iintaba neenhlengele zatjhidiswa eendaweni zazo .
66006015	Amakhosi wephasi , ababusi , iinkhulu , iinjinga neemphathimandla , omunye nomunye , olikhoboka nokhululekileko , bazifihla emarharheni naphakathi kwamadwala weentaba ;
66006016	barhuwelela iintaba namadwala bathi : “ Welani phezu kwethu nisisithe ebusweni balowo ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi nebukhalini beMvana !
66006017	Mbala ilanga elesabekako lelaka labo lifikile ! Alo , ngubani ongalijamela na ? ”
66007001	Ngemva kwalokho ngabona iingilozi ezine zijame emagumbini womane wephasi . Bezibambe imimoya emine yephasi khona kungazukuba khona ummoya ovunguzako ephasinapha namkha elwandle nanyana uphephule umuthi .
66007002	Ngabona enye ingilozi ikhuphuka ngepumalanga iphethe iphawu lakaZimu ophilako . Yarhuwelela ngelizwi elikhulu iingilozi ezine ebezinikelwe amandla wokona iphasi nelwandle ,
66007003	yathi kizo : “ Ningaloni iphasi , ilwandle namkha imithi singakagibi iphawu eempandla zeenceku zakaZimethu . ”
66007004	Godu ngezwa isibalo salabo abagitjwa ngephawu , bebaziinkulungwana ezilikhulu namatjhumi amane nane bagitjwe ekorweni enye nenye yabantu bakwa-Israyeli :
66007005	Iinkulungwana ezilitjhumi nambili ekorweni yakaJuda ; iinkulungwana ezilitjhumi nambili ekorweni yakaRubeni ; iinkulungwana ezilitjhumi nambili ekorweni yakaGadi ;
66007006	iinkulungwana ezilitjhumi nambili ekorweni yaka-Atjheri ; iinkulungwana ezilitjhumi nambili ekorweni yakaNafitali ; iinkulungwana ezilitjhumi nambili ekorweni yakaManase ;
66007007	Iinkulungwana ezilitjhumi nambili ekorweni yakaSimiyoni ; iinkulungwana ezilitjhumi nambili ekorweni yakaLevi ; iinkulungwana ezilitjhumi nambili ekorweni yaka-Isakari ;
66007008	iinkulungwana ezilitjhumi nambili ekorweni yakaZebuloni ; iinkulungwana ezilitjhumi nambili ekorweni yakaJosefa ; iinkulungwana ezilitjhumi nambili ekorweni yakaBhenjamini .
66007009	Ngemva kwalokho ngaqala ngabona isiqubuthu esikhulu ebesingekhe sabalwa ngobunengi . Besivela kizo zoke izizwe , iinkoro , abantu neenlimi , sijame phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi naphambi kweMvana sembethe okumhlophe siphethe amatjhwaba womuthi wesundu ngezandla .
66007010	Sarhuwelela ngelizwi elikhulu sathi : “ Isindiso ingeyakaZimethu ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi neyeMvana ! ” “ Idumo nephazimulo , ukuhlakanipha , ukuthokozwa nokuhlonitjhwa , iye , amandla neenkhwepha akube kuZimethu nini nanini ! Amen . ”
66007011	Iingilozi zoke bezijame esihlalweni sobukhosi mazombe , godu kuzombe abaphathi neembunjwa ezine eziphilako . Boke labo bawa ngobuso bathi mbo phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi balotjha uZimu ,
66007012	bathi : “ Amen . “ Idumo nephazimulo , ukuhlakanipha , ukuthokozwa nokuhlonitjhwa , iye , amandla neenkhwepha akube kuZimethu nini nanini ! Amen . ”
66007013	Omunye wabaphathi wangibuza wathi : “ Bobani laba abembethe ezimhlophe begodu bavelaphi na ? ”
66007014	Ngathi kuye : “ Kosami , nguwe owaziko . ” Nje-ke wathi kimi : “ Laba ngibo abavela ekuhluphekeni okukhulu . Bazihlanzile iingubo zabo bazenza zaba mhlophe eengazini zeMvana .
66007015	Kungakho bajame phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi sakaZimu , “ bamlotjha imini nobusuku ngethempelini lakhe , iye , loyo ohlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi uyobafukamela .
66007016	Abayokulamba , abasayokoma , abasayokutjhiswa lilanga nanyana sivuthevuthe
66007017	ngombana iMvana ephakathi kwesihlalo sobukhosi izakuba ngumelusi wabo . Izabadosela emithonjeni yamanzi wokuphila , uZimu abasule zoke iinyembezi emehlweni wabo . ”
66008001	Kuthe lokha iMvana nayinamulula iphawu lekhomba , kwathula pheze isiquntu se-awara ezulwini , kwathi du .
66008002	Nje-ke ngabona iingilozi ezilikhomba zijame phambi kwakaZimu ; zanikelwa iimpalapala ezilikhomba .
66008003	Kwasuka enye ingilozi iphethe idengela legolide letjhwalo yajama e-aldarini . Yanikelwa itjhwalo elinengi bona ilinikele nemithandazo yabo boke abacwengileko phezu kwe-aldari legolide , okutjho eliphambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi .
66008004	Intuthu yetjhwalo kanye nemithandazo yabacwengileko yenyukela phambi kwakaZimu isuka esandleni sengilozi .
66008005	Nje-ke ingilozi yathatha idengela yalizalisa ngomlilo we-aldarini , yawurhatjha ephasini ; kwaba khona ukuduma nokuraramba , ukuphazima kombani nokusikinyeka kwephasi .
66008006	Iingilozi ezilikhomba ebeziphethe iimporompita ezilikhomba zalungela ukuzivuthela .
66008007	Ingilozi yokuthoma yavuthela iporompita yayo , kwaba khona isinanja nomlilo kuvangene neengazi , kwathululelwa phezu kwephasi . Ingcenye yesithathu yephasi yatjhiswa ; godu nengcenye yesithathu yemithi nakho koke okubutjani kwatjha kwalotha .
66008008	Ingilozi yesibili yavuthela iporompita yayo , kwabonakala isigidija esifana nentaba sinephuka umlilo , saphoswa ngelwandle . Ingcenye yesithathu yelwandle yaphenduka iingazi .
66008009	Ingcenye yesithathu yalokho okuphilako ngelwandle kwafa nengcenye yesithathu yemikhumbi yoniwa .
66008010	Ingilozi yesithathu yavuthela iporompita , ikwekwezi ekulu yawa ezulwini ibaneka njengesihlothi esivuthako ; yawela engcenyeni yesithathu yemilambo nemithonjeni yamanzi .
66008011	Ibizo lekwekwezi leyo kwathiwa liNghana . Ingcenye yesithathu yamanzi yaphenduka yababa , kwafa abanengi ngamanzi lawo ngombana besele ababa .
66008012	Ingilozi yesine yavuthela iporompita yayo , kwathi ingcenye yesithathu yelanga , ingcenye yesithathu yenyezi nengcenye yesithathu yeenkwekwezi , iye , koke kwengcenye yesithathu yomkhanyo wakhona kwafiphala ; azange kusaba khona ukukhanya engcenyeni yesithathu yemini , ngokunjalo nobusuku .
66008013	Ngisaqalile njalo , ngezwa ikhozi liphapha hlangana nesibanga lilila ngelizwi elikhulu lithi : “ Maye ! Maye ! Maye kibo abakhileko ephasini ! Bazozizwa ngokuzwakala kwezinye zeempporompita ezisazokuvuthelwa ziingilozi ezintathu . ”
66009001	Ingilozi yesihlanu yavuthela iporompita , ngabona ikwekwezi ebeyikhithike ezulwini yawela ephasini ; yona-ke yanikelwa isihluthulelo somgodi onganamkhawulo .
66009002	Yavula umgodi onganamkhawulo kwaphuma intuthu ngesiwulwini kwanga intuthu yekehla yomlilo ; ilanga nesibanga kwafiphala ngebanga lentuthu ephuma ngesiwulwini .
66009003	Hlangana nentuthu kwavela isikhonyani sehlela ephasini , sona saphiwa igunya bona sibe namandla njengeempephenu zephasi .
66009004	Sakhalinywa bona singarhayili utjani bephasi nanyana yini ehlaza , iye , nanyana ngiwuphi umuthi , kwaphela abantu labo abanganaphawu lakaZimu eempandla zabo .
66009005	Savunyelwa bona sibazwise ubuhlungu iinyanga ezihlanu kodwana singababulali . Ubuhlungu esabazwisa bona , bebufana nobuhlungu bepephenu lokha nayitinyela umuntu .
66009006	Ngemihla leyo abantu bayokwenyula ukufa kodwana ukufa angekhe kubafikele ; iye , bazokuthanda bonyana bafe kodwana ukufa kuzobabalekela .
66009007	Godu isikhwenyani saqaleka njengeenjomani ezilungiselwe ipi . Eenhloko zaso besinalokho okufana neenhlohlo zegolide ; ubuso baso bebufana nobabantu ,
66009008	iinhluthu zaso zifana nezabafazi , kuthi amazinyo waso afane newamabhubezi .
66009009	Besineemvikelo zesifuba ezinjengeemviko zesimbi ; itjhada leempiko zaso belifana netjhada leenkarana ezinengi ezibotjhelwe iinjomani ezigijimela epini .
66009010	Besinemisila etinyela njengeempephenu ; begodu imisila leyo inamandla wokulimaza abantu iinyanga ezihlanu .
66009011	Sinekosi yaso ekuyingilozi yomgodi onganamkhawulo ; ibizo layo ngesiHebheru ngu-Abadoni , ngesiGirigi kuthiwa ngu-Apholiyoni .
66009012	Umaye wokuthoma udlulile . Nje-ke abomaye ababili basazokuza .
66009013	Ingilozi yesithandathu yavuthela ipalapala , ngezwa ilizwi livela eempondweni ezine ze-aldari legolide phambi kwakaZimu ,
66009014	lathi engilozini yesithandathu ebeyiphethe iporompita : “ Akhe utjhaphulule iingilozi ezine ezikhungeke emlanjeni omkhulu iYufrathe ! ”
66009015	Ngokunjalo-ke , zatjhatjhululwa iingilozi ezine ebegade sele zilungiselelwe i-awara , ilanga , inyanga nomnyaka kobana zibhubhise okwesithathu kwabantu .
66009016	Isibalo samabutho akhwele iinjomani besiziingidi ezimakhulu amabili ; ngokunjalo ngezwa isibalo sawo .
66009017	Nje-ke nasi indlela engabona ngayo iinjomani embonweni wami : Abakhweli bazo bebafake iimvikelo zeemfuba zombala onjengomlilo , umbala ohlaza njengesibhakabhaka nezimthubi . Iinhloko zeenjomani bezifana neenhloko zamabhubezi ; emilonyeni yazo kwaphuma umlilo , intuthu nesibabuli .
66009018	Ngeenhluphekwezo kwabhujiswa isithathu sabantu , okutjho ngomlilo , ngentuthu nangesibabuli okwaphuma emlonyeni weenjomani .
66009019	Amandla weenjomanezo gade asemilonyeni nemisileni yazo ngombana imisila yazo leyo beyinjengeenyoka , ineenhloko ekungizo eziyingozi yokulimaza .
66009020	Inengi labantu elingazange libulawe ngeenhluphekwezi , akhange liphenduke emisebenzini yalo eliyenzako namkha lilise ukulotjha amadimoni neenthombembunjwa zegolide , zesiliva , zekoporo , zelitje nekhuni ezingakwazi ukubona , ukuzwa namkha ukukhamba .
66009021	Begodu azange baphenduke ekubulaleni , ebuloyini , ekungwadleni nekwebeni kwabo .
66010001	Ngabona enye ingilozi enamandla amakhulu yehla ezulwini , iphuthelwe lilifu inezungu leKosi ehloko . Ubuso bayo bebunjengelanga nemilenzayo injengeensika zomlilo .
66010002	Ngesandleni sayo beyiphethe umsongo omncani ovuliweko . Beyitlakalajile ibeke inyawo layo langesidleni elwandle , langesinceleni yalibeka ehlabathini .
66010003	Yarhuwelela ngelizwi elikhulu elizwakala njengokubhodla kwebhubezi . Kuthe nayirhuwelelako , kwezwakala imidumo elikhomba .
66010004	Lokha nakuzwakala imidumo elikhomba nami besele ngizilungiselele ukutlola , kodwana ngezwa ilizwi livela ezulwini lisithi : “ Kugibe ngephawu lokho okukhulunywe midumo elikhomba , ungakutloli . ”
66010005	Ingilozi engayibonako itlakalajele ngelwandle nehlabathini yaphakamisela isidla ezulwini ,
66010006	yafunga ngaloyo ophila nini nanini ,
66010007	Kodwana emalangeni lokha ingilozi yekhomba nasele izokuvuthela ipalapala yayo , ifihlakalo kaZimu izakupheleliswa njengombana amemezela eencekwini zakhe , abaphorofidi . ”
66010008	Nje-ke ilizwi engalizwako likhuluma lisezulwini labuye lakhuluma nami godu lathi : “ Khamba uyokuthatha umsongo ovulekileko esandleni sengilozi etlakalajele phezu kwelwandle nehlabathini . ”
66010009	Yeke ngaya engilozini ngafese ngayibawa bona inginikele umsongo omncani loyo . Yona yathi kimi : “ Yewuwuthathe uwugome ! Uzokubaba ngendeni yakho kodwana ube mnandi njengeliju ngemlonyeni wakho . ”
66010010	Ngawuthatha-ke umsongo omncani loyo esandleni sengilozi ngawugoma . Waba mnandi njengeliju ngemlonyeni wami , kodwana kuthe lokha nangiqedako ukuwugoma , wangijikela wababa ngendeni .
66010011	Nje-ke kwathiwa kimi : “ Kufanele ubuye uphorofide godu ngabantu abanengi , ngezizwe , ngeenlimi nangamakhosi . ”
66011001	Nganikelwa ilithi lokulinganisa elinjengedondolo bekwathiwa kimi : “ Sikima ulinganise ithempeli ne-aldari lakaZimu , ubale nalabo abalotjha lapho ,
66011002	kodwana ungayilinganisi ikundla engaphandle kwethempeli , ilise ngombana inikelwe izizwe begodu zizokugadanga emzini ocwengileko iinyanga ezimatjhumi amane nambili .
66011003	Ngizokunikela abofakazi bami ababili amandla wokuphorofida amalanga ayikulungwana enamakhulu amabili namatjhumi asithandathu . ”
66011004	Labo bangiyo imithi emibili ye-oliva nezinti ezimbili zesibani ezijame phambi kwakaSomnini iKosi yephasi .
66011005	Nakukhona ofuna ukubakhubaza , kuphuma umlilo emilonyeni yabo iqothule amanaba wabo ; ngileyo-ke indlela ekuthi loyo olinga ukubalimaza ekufuze abulawe ngayo .
66011006	Banegunya lokuvala isibhakabhaka ukuze izulu lingani ngesikhathi abatjhumayela ngaso . Begodu banegunya lokuphendula amanzi abe ziingazi nokumadlha iphasi nanyana ngasiphi isifo ngokuthanda kwabo .
66011007	Kuzakuthi lokha nasele baqede ubufakazi babo , isibandana siphume ngemgodini onganamkhawulo silwe nabo , sibahlule besibabulale .
66011008	Iindumbu zabo ziyokurabhalala eendleleni zomuzi omkhulu obizwa ngokwesiphorofido bona yiSodoma neGibhide , lapha godu neKosi yabo yabethelwa khona .
66011009	Abantu abavela emindenini , eenkorweni , eenlimini nezizweni bayokurhudulela iindumbu zabo amehlo amalanga amathathu nesiquntu bebangavumi bona zibulungwe .
66011010	Abantu bephasi bazakucanasa ngabo bebagidinge ngokuphana izipho . Lokho bazakwenza ngombana abaphorofidi ababilabo babe lihlupho ebantwini abahlala ephasini .
66011011	Kodwana ngemva kwamalanga amathathu nesiquntu kwangena kibo ummoya ophilisako uvela kuZimu , nje-ke basikima bajama ngeenyawo , kwathi labo abababonako bafikelwa kukwesaba .
66011012	Bezwa ilizwi livela ezulwini lisithi kibo : “ Yenyukani nize lapha ! ” Benyukela-ke ezulwini ngelifu amanaba wabo abaqalile .
66011013	Khonokho kwaba khona ukusikinyeka kwephasi bekwadilika kwetjhumi komuzi . Kwafa abantu abaziinkulungwana ezilikhomba ekusikinyekeni lokho ; inengi lesaba beladumisa uZimu wezulwini .
66011014	Umaye wesibili sekadlulile ; masinyana kuza umaye wesithathu .
66011015	Nje-ke ingolozi yekhomba yavuthela ipalapala yayo , kwezwakala amezwi ahlokomako ezulwini asithi : “ Umbuso wephasi sewuphenduke umbuso wakaSomnini nowakaKrestu begodu uzakubusa nini nanini . ”
66011016	Abaphathi abamatjhumi amabili nane abahlezi phambi koZimu bawa mbo ngobuso balotjha uZimu ,
66011017	bathi : “ Siyakuthokoza Somnini , Zimu Mninimandlawoke , wena okhona nogade uvele ukhona , iye , siyakuthokoza ngombana uthethe amandlakho amakhulu , uthomile uyabusa .
66011018	Izizwe zithukuthele kodwana ilaka lakho lifikile , okusikhathi sokugweba labo abangasekho ukuze uvuze iinceku zakho okubaphorofidi ; iye , kuvuzwe nabacwengileko bakho okungilabo abesaba ibizo lakho , abakhulu nabancani begodu kubhujiswe labo ababhubhisa iphasi . ”
66011019	Ithempeli lakaZimu ezulwini lavuleka petle , kwabonakala i-aldari lesivumelwano lingethempelinapho ; begodu bekukhona ukubaneka kwemibani , ukuraramba , ukutletlebula kokuduma kwezulu , ukusikinyeka kwephasi kanye namagidija wesinanja .
66012001	Kwavela isibonakaliso esimangazako ezulwini : Umfazi embethe ilanga , inyezi ingaphasi kweenyawo zakhe , ehloko athwele isihlohlo seenkwekwezi ezilitjhumi nambili .
66012002	Bekasidisi begodu alila ngemirhelo .
66012003	Kwabonakala esinye isibonakaliso ezulwini . Qala nango unomrhaso omkhulu obomvu , oneenhloko ezilikhomba , iimpondo ezilitjhumi neenhlohlo ezilikhomba eenhlokweni zakhe .
66012004	Umsila wakhe wawola ingcenye yesithathu yeenkwekwezi zezulu , waziwululela ephasini . Nje-ke unomrhaso wajama phambi komfazi obekasele azokubeletha ukuze azokudla umntwanakhe loyo emva kobana abelethiwe .
66012005	Wabeletha umsana oyokubusa izizwe zoke ngentonga yesimbi . Nje-ke umntwana womfazi loyo wahlwithwa wasiwa esihlalweni sakaZimu sobukhosi ;
66012006	umfazi yena wabalekela erhalawumbeni lapha bekanendawo ayilungiselwa nguZimu ukuze ondliwe lapho amalanga ayikulungwana namakhulu amabili anamatjhumi asithandathu .
66012007	Kwaba khona ipi ezulwini ; uMikhayeli neengilozi zakhe bekalwa nonomrhaso ; unomrhaso neengilozi zakhe bazibuyiselela ,
66012008	kodwana bebanganamandla aneleko yeke bahlulwa nendawabo yangasabikhona ezulwini .
66012009	Ngalokho waphoswa phasi unomrhaso omkhulu , inyoka endala ekuthiwa nguMtjoli noSathana , umkhohlisi wephasi loke ; iye , waphoselwa ephasini neengilozi zakhe zalahlwa naye .
66012010	Yeke ngezwa ilizwi elikhulu ezulwini lisithi : “ Nje-ke kufike isindiso , amandla nombuso kaZimethu ; igunya lingelakaKrestu ngombana ummangaleli wabazalwana bethu wehliselwe phasi ; iye , loyo obamangalela phambi kwakaZimu ubusuku nemini .
66012011	Bona bamhlula ngeengazi zeMvana nangelizwi lobufakazi babo begodu akhange banconcosele ipilo yabo bekwaba sekufeni .
66012012	Ngalokho thokozani-ke nina mazulu , nani noke enihlala kiwo ! Kodwana maye kuwe phasi , nawe lwandle ! Mbala uSathana wehlela kini ugcwele ilaka uyadlhabhaza ngombana uyazi bona isikhathi sakhe sifitjhani . ”
66012013	Kuthe bona unomrhaso abone bonyana upharwe phasi ephasini , wazuma umfazi osanda ukubeletha umntwana womsana .
66012014	Kodwana umfazi waphiwa iimpiko ezimbili zekhozi elikhulu bona aphaphele endaweni alungiselelwe yona ngerhalawumbeni , lapha azakondliwa khona kwesikhatjhana , iinkhatjhana nengcenye yesikhathi , lapha inyoka ingeze yamfikela khona .
66012015	Nje-ke kwabhubhudlha amanzi aphuma ngemlonyeni wenyoka kwaba inga mlambo ngemva komfazi kobana akhukhulwe .
66012016	Kodwana iphasi laba lisizo emfazini loyo ; lavula umlomo walo laginya amanzi agade abhubhudlha emlonyeni wakanomrhaso .
66012017	Ngalokho unomrhaso wabila khulu ngomfazi loyo , nje-ke wasuka wayokusahlela boke abantwana bakhe , okutjho labo abalalela imiyalo yakaZimu nababambelele ebufakazini bakaJesu .
66013001	Nje-ke unomrhaso wajama eligwini lelwandle . Ngabona isibandana senyuka siphuma elwandle , sineempondo ezilitjhumi neenhloko ezilikhomba . Phezu kweempondo zaso lezo bekuneenhlohlo ezilitjhumi kuthi phezu kweenhloko kube namagama weenhlamba .
66013002	Isibandana engasibonako besifana nengwe , iinyawo zaso zifana nezebhere , umlomo ufana newebhubezi . Nje-ke unomrhaso wasinikela amandla nesihlalo sakhe sobukhosi kanye negunya .
66013003	Enye yeenhloko zesibandana beyinenceba lokufa , kodwana incebelo besele lipholile . Yeke ngokurareka okukhulu , iphasi loke lalandela isibandana .
66013004	Abantu balotjha unomrhaso ngombana bekathwese isibandana igunya , begodu balotjha isibandana bathi : “ Ngubani ofana nesibandana , ngubani ongalwa naso na ? ”
66013005	Isibandana sanikelwa umlomo okhuluma okuphakamileko namezwi wehlamba ; begodu savunyelwa bona sisebenzise igunya laso iinyanga ezimatjhumi amane nambili .
66013006	Savula umlomo waso sakhuluma iinhlamba kuZimu , sithuka ibizo nethaberinakeli lakhe kanye nalabo abahlala ezulwini .
66013007	Godu savunyelwa bona silwe nabacwengileko sibahlule . Saphiwa igunya phezu kweenkoro , kwemindeni , kweenlimi nezizwe .
66013008	Boke abantu abakhe ephasini bazasilotjha , iye , woke loyo ibizo lakhe elingakatlolwa encwadini yokuphila yeMvana eyahlatjwako kusukela ekusekelweni kwephasi .
66013009	Onendlebe akezwe !
66013010	Nangabe kukhona ogade azakuthunjwa , akaye ekuthunjweni ! Nangabe kukhona ogade azakubulawa ngesabula , uzakubulawa ngesabula !
66013011	Nje-ke ngabona godu esinye isibandana senyuka sivela ephasini . Besineempondo ezimbili njengemvana kodwana besikhuluma njengonomrhaso .
66013012	Besisebenzisa loke igunya lesibandana sokuthoma , siqalile . Sakatelela iphasi nabo boke abahlala kilo bona balotjhe isibandana sokuthoma , leso inceba laso lokufa ebesele lipholile .
66013013	Sagila iimbonakaliso ezikulu sabe senza nomlilo ophuma ezulwini , wehlele ephasini phambi kwabantu baqalile .
66013014	Begodu ngeembonakaliso esaphiwa bona sizenze phambi kwesibanda sokuthoma , sakhohlisa abakhileko ephasini . Sabatjela bona babumbe isithombesibunjwa sesibanda ebegade sinengozi yesabula , kodwana nokho sabuye saphila .
66013015	Saphiwa amandla bona senze isithombesibunjwa sesibanda siphefumule ukuze isithombesibunjwa esimfanekiso leso sikhulume . Begodu senza nokobana labo abangalotjhi umfanekiso wesibanda leso babulawe .
66013016	Godu sakatelela boke , okutjho omncani nomkhulu , onjingileko nochakileko , okhululekileko nolikhoboka bonyana babekwe iphawu esandleni sabo sangesidleni namkha epandla
66013017	ukuze kungabikhona ongathenga namkha athengise nakanganalo iphawu , okutjho ibizo lesibanda namkha isibalo sebizo laso .
66013018	Lokhu kubiza ukuhlakanipha : Nje-ke akuthi nanyana ngubani ozwisisako abale isibalo sesibanda namkha isibalo sebizo laso ngombana isibalo saso ngesomuntu . Isibalo saso simakhulu amathandathu namatjhumi asithandathu nesithandathu .
66014001	Nje-ke ngaphakamisa amehlo , qala naso iMvana ijame entabeni iZiyoni ; beyikanye neenkulungwana ezilikhulu namatjhumi amane nane zalabo ebebatlolwe ibizo layo nelakaYise eempandla zabo .
66014002	Ngezwa ilizwi livela ezulwini lihlokoma njengamanzi amanengi , lizwakala njengokuraramba kokuduma kwezulu okwesabekako . Ilizwi engalizwako lalinjengelababethi ababetha amaharibha .
66014003	Bebavuma ingoma etja phambi kwesihlalo sobukhosi naphambi kweembunjwa ezine eziphilako nabaphathi . Gade angekho obekangafunda ingoma leyo ngaphandle kwalabo abaziinkulungwana ezilikhulu namatjhumi amane nane ebebahlengwe ephasini .
66014004	Laba , ngilabo abangazange bazisilaphaze ngabesifazi ngombana bebasesemsulwa njengamancele . Ngibo-ke abalandela iMvana nanyana kukuphi lapha iya khona . Bebahlengwe ebantwini bafana neenthelo zokuthoma ezisilumo kuZimu nakiyo iMvana

66014006	Nje-ke ngabona enye ingilozi iphapha phezulu esibangeni , iphethe ivangeli lesiphelani kobana ilitjhumayele kilabo abaphila ephasini . Iye , ezizweni zoke , eenkorweni , eenlimini nemindenini .
66014007	Yarhuwelela yathi : “ Mesabeni uZimu nimphazimulise ngombana isikhathi sakhe sokugweba sesifikile ! Mlotjheni loyo owenza izulu nephasi , ilwandle nemithombo yamanzi . ”
66014008	Nje-ke enye ingilozi yesibili yalandela yathi : “ Liwile , liwile iBhabheli elikhulu ! Ngilo elenza bona zoke izizwe zisele iwayini lelaka lobungwadla balo ! ”
66014009	Kwalandela enye ingilozi yesithathu isitjho ngelizwi elikhulu ithi : “ Nanyana ngubani olotjha isibandananomfanekiso waso , amukele iphawu epandla namkha esandleni sakhe ,

66014020	Ubutlhodlhelo bewayini bagadangwa ngaphandle komuzi , kwavinyilika iingazi ebutlhodlhelweni zaba zinengi zaphakama bekwaba sematomini weenjomani , kwaba libanga ebelingaba mamayela angaba makhulu amabili .
66015001	Ngabona esinye isibonakaliso esikhulu nesirarako ezulwini : Bekuziingilozi ezilikhomba egade zineenhlupheko ezilikhomba , ekungezokugcina ngombana ngazo ilaka lakaZimu liphelisiwe .
66015002	Ngabona lokho okwabonakala sengathi lilwandle lerhalasi livangene nomlilo nalabo ebebahlule isibandananomfanekiso waso kanye nesibalo sebizo laso . Bebajame eduze nelwandle lerhalasi baphethe amaharibha abawanikelwe nguZimu ezandleni zabo .
66015003	Bavuma irhubo lakaMosi inceku kaZimu kanye nerhubo leMvana , basithi : “ Mikhulu iyababazeka imisebenzakho , wena Somnini Zimu Mninimandla ! Zilungile begodu ziliqiniso iindlela zakho , wena Kosi yezizwe zoke .
66015004	Somnini , ngubani ongekhe akwesaba begodu adumise ibizo lakho na ? Lokhu kungebanga lokobana nguwe wedwa ocwengileko . Izizwe zoke ziyokufika zilotjhe phambi kwakho ngombana iingwebo zakho zisepepeneneni . ”
66015005	Ngemva kwalokho ngaqala , ngabona ithempeli elilitende lobufakazi ezulwini livulekile .
66015006	Ethempelinapho kwaphuma iingilozi ezilikhomba neenhlupheko ezilikhomba , zembethe ilineni elidarhileko , ziqakanise imitletlana yegolide eemfubeni zazo .
66015007	Nje-ke esinye seembunjwa ezine eziphilako sanikela iingilozi ezilikhomba izitja ezilikhomba zegolide zizele ubukhali bakaZimu ophila nini nanini .
66015008	Ithempeli lazala intuthu yephazimulo ebuya ebukhosini nemandleni kaZimu . Begodu bekangekho ongangena ngethempelini zingakapheli iinhlupheko ezilikhomba zeengilozi ezilikhomba .
66016001	Nje-ke ngezwa ilizwi elikhulu livela ethempelini likhuluma eengilozini ezilikhomba lithi : “ Khambani niyokuthululela phezu kwephasi izitja ezilikhomba zelaka lakaZimu ! ”
66016002	Yasuka ingilozi yokuthoma yafese yathulula isitja sayo ephasini . Kwathumbuka iinlonda ezimbi phezu kwalabo ebebanephawu lesibanda begodu balotjha nesithombe somfanekiso waso .
66016003	Ingilozi yesibili yathululela isitja sayo phezu kwelwandle , laphenduka labangathi ziingazi zesidumbu , kwafa koke okuphilako ngelwandle .
66016004	Ingilozi yesithathu yathululela isitja sayo ngemilanjeni nangemithonjeni , khona kwaphenduka iingazi .
66016005	Ngezwa ingilozi yamanzi ithi : “ Ulungile wena okhona nogade uvele ukhona ; iye , wena ocwengileko ngombana ugwebile ngalokho .
66016006	“ Ngebanga lokobana baphalaze iingazi zabacwengileko nabaphorofidi , ngikho nje ubanikele iingazi bona bazisele ngombana kubafanele ! ”
66016007	Ngezwa i-aldari liphendula lithi : “ Iye , Somnini Zimu Mninimandla , iingwebo zakho zilungile begodu ziliqiniso ! ”

66016009	batjha ngomtjhiso obukhali kodwana bathuka ibizo lakaZimu okunguye ogade alawula phezu kweenhlupheko lezo ; begodu azange baphenduke bona bamdumise .
66016010	Ingilozi yesihlanu yathululela isitja sayo phezu kwesihlalo sobukhosi sesibandana , umbuso waso wabhijwa lilifu elinzima ; abantu baziluma amalimu ngebanga lobuhlungu .
66016011	Bahlambalaza uZimu wezulwini ngebanga leenhlungu neenlonda zabo , begodu azange baphenduke ezenzweni zabo .
66016012	Yesithandathu ingilozi yathululela isitja sayo ngemlanjeni omkhulu iYufrathe , amanzi wakhona atjha ukuze kulungiselwe amakhosi avela epumalanga indlela .
66016013	Ngabona imimoya emithathu esilapheleko efana neenrhwarhwa iphuma ngemlonyeni wakanomrhaso nangemlonyeni wesibanda godu nangemlonyeni womphorofidi wamanga .
66016014	Lokhu kumimoya yamadimoni agila iziga ; begodu iya emakhosini wephasi loke ukuwabutha bona alwe ipi ngelanga elikhulu lakaZimu uMninimandlawoke .
66016015	Yelela , ngiza njengesela ! Ubusisiwe loyo ohlala aphaphele begodu embethe ukuze angazukukhamba bhunubhunu bekubonwe ihlazo lakhe .

66016017	Ingilozi yekhomba yathululela isitja sayo esibangeni ; kwaphuma ilizwi elikhulu ethempelini livela esihlalweni sobukhosi lathi : “ Sekwenzekile ! ”

66016019	Umuzi omkhulu waphadlhuka iingcenye ezintathu nemizi yezizwe yawa . UZimu wakhumbula iBhabheli elikhulu , walinikela iwayini lelaka lobukhali bakhe .
66016020	Zoke iinhlengele zabaleka neentaba azange zisatholakala .
66016021	Isinanja esineengidija ezinobudisi obungaba makhilogremu amatjhumi amane nahlanu , sawulukela phezu kwabantu sehla ezulwini . Abantu bahlambalaza uZimu ngebanga lobuhlungu besinanja ngombana besesabeka kokufa .
66017001	Nje-ke kweza kimi enye yeengilozi ezilikhomba iphethe izitja ezilikhomba yathi kimi : “ Yewuze , ngithanda ukukutjengisa isigwebo sengwadlakazi ehlezi phezu kwamanzi amanengi ,

66017003	Nje-ke ingilozi leyo yangithwala ngoMoya yangisa erhalawumbeni . Lapho ngabona umfazi ahlezi phezu kwesibanda esibubende ebesigcwele amabizo wehlamba , sineenhloko ezilikhomba neempondo ezilitjhumi .
66017004	Umfazi loyo bekembethe okububende nokutlerebede begodu azihlobise ngegolide , ngobuphaziphazi nangamatje amahle aligugu . Ngesandla sakhe bekaphethe ikapho yegolide ebeyizele amanyala nokusilaphala kokuhlobonga kwakhe .
66017005	Epandla yakhe bekunebizo elitlolwe ifihlo ethi : “ Bhabheli elikulu , nina weengwadla namanyala wephasi . ” Kuthe lokha nangimbonako , ngabamba ongenzasi .
66017006	Ngabona bona umfazi loyo bekadakwe ziingazi zabacwengileko neengazi zabofakazi bakaJesu .
66017007	Kodwana ingilozi yathi kimi : “ Urarwa yini kangaka na ? Ngizokutjela ifihlakalo yomfazi lo kanye neyesibanda esimthweleko esineenhloko ezilikhomba neempondo ezilitjhumi .
66017008	Isibandana osibonileko sakhe saba khona kodwana kwanjesi asisekho ; nje-ke sele sizokukhuphuka ngemgodini onganamkhawulo bese siyabhujiswa . Abantu bephasi amabizo wabo angakatlolwa encwadini yokuphila kwasesisekelweni sephasi , bazokumangala lokha nababona isibandanangombana sakhe saba khona kodwana kwanjesi asisekho khisibe nokho sizakuba khona .
66017009	“ Lokhu kubiza ingqondo enokuhlakanipha : Iinhloko ezilikhomba ziziintaba ezilikhomba okuhlezi kizo umfazi loyo ; begodu zimakhosi alikhomba ,

66022019	nangabe kukhona ophungula emazwini wesiphorofido sencwadi le , uZimu uzakususa isabelo sakhe emthini wokuphila nemzini ocwengileko , ekuzizinto ezihlathululwe encwadini le .
66022020	Ofakazako ngezintwezi uthi : “ Kwamambala , ngiyeza msinyana . ”
66022021	Umusa weKosi yethu uJesu , awube nabantu boke . Amen .
